anya-e0102n:5_0: 365. Idāni yāsaṃ lokikābhiññānaṃ vasena ayaṃ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsāti vuttā,
anya-e0102n:5_1: tā abhiññā sampādetuṃ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo
anya-e0102n:5_2: kātabbo. Evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṃsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca,
anya-e0102n:5_3: so adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ
anya-e0102n:6_1: uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca “so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte
anya-e0102n:6_2: anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:6_3: abhinīharati abhininnāmeti. So anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā
anya-e0102n:6_4: bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena iddhividhaṃ, dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:6_5: sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
anya-e0102n:7: Tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
anya-e0102n:10_0: 366. Katamaṃ panettha kasiṇānulomaṃ…pe… katamaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpananti. Idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n:10_1: pathavīkasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato āpokasiṇeti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu
anya-e0102n:10_2: satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati, idaṃ kasiṇānulomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:11: Odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:12: Pathavīkasiṇato paṭṭhāya yāva odātakasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:13: Paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānānulomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:14: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:15_0: Paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:15_1: yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:16_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati, tato
anya-e0102n:16_1: tadeva ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā
anya-e0102n:16_2: jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikaṃ nāma. Evaṃ āpokasiṇādimūlikāpi yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0102n:17_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe, tato nīlakasiṇe,
anya-e0102n:17_1: tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena
anya-e0102n:18_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā
anya-e0102n:18_1: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa
anya-e0102n:19: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:20: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe…pe… tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:21_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṃ, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:21_1: vāyokasiṇe catutthaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:21_2: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ ekantarikavasena
anya-e0102n:22_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ, tatiyaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:22_1: tathā catutthaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva
anya-e0102n:23_0: Tathā idaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti vavatthapetvā idaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ…pe… idaṃ odātakasiṇanti
anya-e0102n:23_1: evaṃ ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṃ nāma. Aṅgārammaṇavavatthāpanampi
anya-e0102n:23_2: eke icchanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāmukhaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0102n:24_0: 367. Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko
anya-e0102n:24_1: yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ādikammikassa hi
anya-e0102n:24_2: kasiṇaparikammampi bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Katakasiṇaparikammassa
anya-e0102n:24_3: nimittuppādanaṃ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0102n:24_4: appanādhigamo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Adhigatappanassa cuddasahākārehi
anya-e0102n:24_5: cittaparidamanaṃ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Cuddasahākārehi paridamitacittassāpi
anya-e0102n:24_6: iddhivikubbanaṃ nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Vikubbanappattassāpi
anya-e0102n:24_7: khippanisantibhāvo nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti. Therambatthale
anya-e0102n:24_9: upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya. Tassānubhāvo pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n:24_10: vuttoyeva. Taṃ panassānubhāvaṃ disvā thero āha “āvuso, sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe
anya-e0102n:24_11: garahappattā assāma ‘nāgarājānaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsū’ti. Tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:24_12: āvudhaṃ nāma malaṃ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n:25_0: Khippanisantiyāpi ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova
anya-e0102n:25_1: hoti, giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṃ māpetvā
anya-e0102n:26_0: Balavapubbayogānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhaaggasāvakādīnaṃ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena
anya-e0102n:26_1: bhāvanānukkamena arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṃ aññe ca paṭisambhidādibhedā
anya-e0102n:26_2: guṇā ijjhanti. Tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi
anya-e0102n:26_3: suvaṇṇaṃ muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvāva karoti, yathā ca bhājanavikatiṃ kattukāmo kumbhakāro
anya-e0102n:26_4: mattikaṃ suparimadditaṃ muduṃ katvā karoti, evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi
anya-e0102n:26_6: āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo. Pubbahetusampannena
anya-e0102n:26_7: pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā panettha yogo
anya-e0102n:26_8: kātabbo, taṃ vidhiṃ dassento bhagavā “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
anya-e0102n:27_0: 368. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷinayānusāreneva vinicchayakathā. Tattha soti so adhigatacatutthajjhāno
anya-e0102n:27_1: yogī. Evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanametaṃ. Iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena
anya-e0102n:27_2: catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhiteti iminā catutthajjhānasamādhinā
anya-e0102n:27_3: samāhite. Citteti rūpāvacaracitte. Parisuddhetiādīsu pana upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena
anya-e0102n:27_4: parisuddhe. Parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti vuttaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ
anya-e0102n:27_5: ghātena vihatarāgādiaṅgaṇattā anaṅgaṇe. Anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese. Aṅgaṇena
anya-e0102n:27_6: hi taṃ cittaṃ upakkilissati. Subhāvitattā mudubhūte, vasībhāvappatteti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:27_7: Vase vattamānaṃ hi cittaṃ mudunti vuccati. Muduttāyeva ca kammaniye, kammakkhame
anya-e0102n:27_8: kammayoggeti vuttaṃ hoti. Muduṃ hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ, tañca
anya-e0102n:27_9: ubhayampi subhāvitattāyevāti. Yathāha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0102n:27_10: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti.
anya-e0102n:28_0: Etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite. Ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte, acale niriñjaneti
anya-e0102n:28_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite. Saddhādīhi pariggahitattā
anya-e0102n:28_2: āneñjappatte. Saddhāpariggahitaṃ hi cittaṃ assaddhiyena na iñjati. Vīriyapariggahitaṃ
anya-e0102n:28_3: kosajjena na iñjati. Satipariggahitaṃ pamādena na iñjati. Samādhipariggahitaṃ uddhaccena
anya-e0102n:28_4: na iñjati. Paññāpariggahitaṃ avijjāya na iñjati. Obhāsagataṃ kilesandhakārena na
anya-e0102n:28_5: iñjati. Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0102n:28_6: cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
anya-e0102n:29_0: Aparo nayo, catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite. Nīvaraṇadūrabhāvena parisuddhe. Vitakkādisamatikkamena
anya-e0102n:29_1: pariyodāte. Jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇe. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:29_2: cittassa upakkilesānaṃ vigamena vigatūpakkilese. Ubhayampi cetaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānusārena
anya-e0102n:29_3: veditabbaṃ. Vasippattiyā mudubhūte. Iddhipādabhāvūpagamena kammaniye. Bhāvanāpāripūriyā
anya-e0102n:29_4: paṇītabhāvūpagamena ṭhite āneñjappatte. Yathā āneñjappattaṃ hoti, evaṃ ṭhiteti attho.
anya-e0102n:29_5: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
anya-e0102n:31_0: 369. Iddhividhāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti ettha ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi,
anya-e0102n:31_1: nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yañhi nipphajjati paṭilabbhati
anya-e0102n:31_2: ca, taṃ ijjhatīti vuccati. Yathāha “kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa, tassa cetaṃ samijjhatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:31_3: Tathā “nekkhammaṃ ijjhatīti iddhi, paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Arahattamaggo ijjhatīti
anya-e0102n:32_0: Aparo nayo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Upāyasampadāyetamadhivacanaṃ. Upāyasampadā hi ijjhati
anya-e0102n:32_1: adhippetaphalappasavanato. Yathāha – “ayaṃ kho citto gahapati sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo,
anya-e0102n:32_2: sace paṇidahissati ‘anāgatamaddhānaṃ rājā assaṃ cakkavattī’ti, tassa kho ayaṃ ijjhissati
anya-e0102n:33_0: Aparo nayo, etāya sattā ijjhantīti iddhi. Ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti
anya-e0102n:33_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Sā dasavidhā. Yathāha “kati iddhiyoti dasa iddhiyo”. Puna caparaṃ āha
anya-e0102n:33_2: “katamā dasa iddhiyo? Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā
anya-e0102n:33_3: iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi,
anya-e0102n:33_4: vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:34_0: 370. Tattha “pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjati. Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:34_1: āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0102n:35_0: 371. “So pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe… vividhampi
anya-e0102n:35_1: senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā
anya-e0102n:36_0: 372. “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomaya”nti iminā
anya-e0102n:36_1: nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare aññasseva manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena
anya-e0102n:37_0: 373. Ñāṇuppattito pana pubbe vā pacchā vā taṃkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbatto viseso
anya-e0102n:37_1: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ – “aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya pahānaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:37_2: ijjhatīti ñāṇavipphārā iddhi…pe… arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti
anya-e0102n:37_3: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato bākkulassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato saṃkiccassa
anya-e0102n:37_4: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato bhūtapālassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:38_0: Tattha āyasmā bākkulo daharova maṅgaladivase nadiyā nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā pamādena
anya-e0102n:38_1: sote patito. Tamenaṃ maccho gilitvā bārāṇasītitthaṃ agamāsi. Tatra taṃ macchabandho
anya-e0102n:38_2: gahetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇi. Sā macche sinehaṃ uppādetvā ahameva naṃ pacissāmīti
anya-e0102n:38_3: phālentī macchakucchiyaṃ suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya dārakaṃ disvā putto me laddhoti somanassajātā
anya-e0102n:38_4: ahosi. Iti macchakucchiyaṃ arogabhāvo āyasmato bākkulassa pacchimabhavikassa tena
anya-e0102n:39_0: Saṃkiccattherassa pana gabbhagatasseva mātā kālamakāsi. Tassā citakaṃ āropetvā sūlehi
anya-e0102n:39_1: vijjhitvā jhāpiyamānāya dārako sūlakoṭiyā akkhikūṭe pahāraṃ labhitvā saddaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0102n:39_2: Tato dārako jīvatīti otāretvā kucchiṃ phāletvā dārakaṃ ayyikāya adaṃsu. So tāya paṭijaggito
anya-e0102n:39_3: vuddhimanvāya pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Iti vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:39_4: dārucitakāya arogabhāvo āyasmato saṃkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:40_0: Bhūtapāladārakassa pana pitā rājagahe daliddamanusso. So dārūnaṃ atthāya sakaṭena
anya-e0102n:40_1: aṭaviṃ gantvā dārubhāraṃ katvā sāyaṃ nagaradvārasamīpaṃ patto. Athassa goṇā yugaṃ
anya-e0102n:40_2: ossajjitvā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. So sakaṭamūle puttakaṃ nisīdāpetvā goṇānaṃ anupadaṃ
anya-e0102n:40_3: gacchanto nagarameva pāvisi. Tassa anikkhantasseva dvāraṃ pihitaṃ. Dārakassa vāḷayakkhānucaritepi
anya-e0102n:40_4: bahinagare tiyāmarattiṃ arogabhāvo vuttanayeneva ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma. Vatthu
anya-e0102n:41_0: 374. Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṃkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvanibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā
anya-e0102n:41_1: iddhi. Vuttañhetaṃ “paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā
anya-e0102n:41_3: samādhivipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sañjīvassa,
anya-e0102n:41_4: āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññassa, uttarāya upāsikāya, sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:42_0: Tattha yadā āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ kapotakandarāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:42_1: viharato juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi ajjhokāse nisinnassa eko duṭṭhayakkho
anya-e0102n:42_2: sahāyakena yakkhena vāriyamānopi sīse pahāramadāsi. Yassa meghassa viya gajjato saddo
anya-e0102n:42_3: ahosi. Tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesi. Athassa tena pahārena na
anya-e0102n:42_4: koci ābādho ahosi. Ayaṃ tassāyasmato samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana udāne āgatameva.
anya-e0102n:43_0: Sañjīvattheraṃ pana nirodhasamāpannaṃ kālakatoti sallakkhetvā gopālakādayo tiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni
anya-e0102n:43_1: saṅkaḍḍhetvā aggiṃ adaṃsu. Therassa cīvare aṃsumattampi najjhāyittha. Ayamassa anupubbasamāpattivasena
anya-e0102n:43_2: pavattasamathānubhāvanibbattattā samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana sutte āgatameva.
anya-e0102n:44_0: Khāṇukoṇḍaññatthero pana pakatiyāva samāpattibahulo. So aññatarasmiṃ araññe rattiṃ
anya-e0102n:44_1: samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi. Pañcasatā corā bhaṇḍakaṃ thenetvā gacchantā “idāni amhākaṃ
anya-e0102n:44_2: anupathaṃ āgacchantā natthī”ti vissamitukāmā bhaṇḍakaṃ oropayamānā “khāṇuko aya”nti
anya-e0102n:44_3: maññamānā therasseva upari sabbabhaṇḍakāni ṭhapesuṃ. Tesaṃ vissamitvā gacchantānaṃ
anya-e0102n:44_4: paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassa gahaṇakāle kālaparicchedavasena thero vuṭṭhāsi. Te therassa
anya-e0102n:44_5: calanākāraṃ disvā bhītā viraviṃsu. Thero “mā bhāyittha upāsakā, bhikkhu aha”nti āha.
anya-e0102n:44_6: Te āgantvā vanditvā theragatena pasādena pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
anya-e0102n:44_7: pāpuṇiṃsu. Ayamettha pañcahi bhaṇḍakasatehi ajjhotthaṭassa therassa ābādhābhāvo samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:45_0: Uttarā pana upāsikā puṇṇaseṭṭhissa dhītā. Tassā sirimā nāma gaṇikā issāpakatā tattatelakaṭāhaṃ
anya-e0102n:45_1: sīse āsiñci. Uttarā taṃkhaṇaññeva mettaṃ samāpajji. Telaṃ pokkharapattato udakabindu
anya-e0102n:45_2: viya vivaṭṭamānaṃ agamāsi. Ayamassā samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:46_0: Sāmāvatī nāma udenassa rañño aggamahesī. Māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo attano dhītāya aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:46_1: patthayamāno tassā vīṇāya āsīvisaṃ pakkhipāpetvā rājānaṃ āha “mahārāja, sāmāvatī
anya-e0102n:46_2: taṃ māretukāmā vīṇāya āsīvisaṃ gahetvā pariharatī”ti. Rājā taṃ disvā kupito sāmāvatiṃ
anya-e0102n:46_3: vadhissāmīti dhanuṃ āropetvā visapītaṃ khurappaṃ sannayhi. Sāmāvatī saparivārā rājānaṃ
anya-e0102n:46_4: mettāya phari. Rājā neva saraṃ khipituṃ na oropetuṃ sakkonto vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tato
anya-e0102n:46_5: naṃ devī āha “kiṃ, mahārāja, kilamasī”ti? “Āma kilamāmī”ti. “Tena hi dhanuṃ oropehī”ti.
anya-e0102n:46_6: Saro rañño pādamūleyeva pati. Tato naṃ devī “mahārāja, appaduṭṭhassa nappadussitabba”nti
anya-e0102n:46_7: ovadi. Iti rañño saraṃ muñcituṃ avisahanabhāvo sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n:47_0: 375. Paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññivihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma. Yathāha – “katamā
anya-e0102n:47_1: ariyā iddhi? Idha – bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya’nti,
anya-e0102n:47_2: appaṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati…pe… upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno”ti.
anya-e0102n:47_3: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:48_0: Etāya hi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu paṭikkūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ mettāpharaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:48_1: vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Appaṭikkūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0102n:48_2: asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Tathā
anya-e0102n:48_3: paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesu tadeva mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī
anya-e0102n:48_4: viharati. Appaṭikkūlapaṭikkūlesu ca tadeva asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ
anya-e0102n:48_5: vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hotītiādinā
anya-e0102n:48_6: nayena vuttaṃ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṃ pavattayamāno paṭikkūle ca appaṭikkūle ca tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0102n:48_7: abhinivajjitvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Paṭisambhidāyañhi “kathaṃ paṭikkūle
anya-e0102n:48_8: appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati? Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati dhātuso vā upasaṃharatī”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:48_9: nayena ayameva attho vibhatto. Ayaṃ cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:49_0: 376. Pakkhīādīnaṃ pana vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma. Yathāha – “katamā
anya-e0102n:49_1: kammavipākajā iddhi? Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccānañca
anya-e0102n:49_2: vinipātikānaṃ ayaṃ kammavipākajā iddhī”ti. Ettha hi sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ jhānaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:49_3: vipassanaṃ vā vināyeva ākāsena gamanaṃ. Tathā sabbesaṃ devānaṃ paṭhamakappikānañca
anya-e0102n:49_4: ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ. Tathā piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī uttaramātā phussamittā dhammaguttāti
anya-e0102n:49_5: evamādīnaṃ ekaccānaṃ vinipātikānaṃ ākāsena gamanaṃ kammavipākajā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n:50_0: 377. Cakkavattiādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma. Yathāha “katamā
anya-e0102n:50_1: puññavato iddhi? Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso
anya-e0102n:50_2: assabandhagobandhapurise upādāya. Jotikassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Jaṭilakassa
anya-e0102n:50_3: gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Ghositassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Meṇḍakassa gahapatissa
anya-e0102n:50_4: puññavato iddhi. Pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ puññavato iddhī”ti. Saṅkhepato pana paripākaṃ
anya-e0102n:51_0: Ettha ca jotikassa gahapatissa pathaviṃ bhinditvā maṇipāsādo uṭṭhahi. Catusaṭṭhi
anya-e0102n:51_1: ca kapparukkhāti ayamassa puññavato iddhi. Jaṭilakassa asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato
anya-e0102n:51_2: nibbatti. Ghositassa sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato
anya-e0102n:51_3: iddhi. Meṇḍakassa ekakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ pātubhāvo puññavato
anya-e0102n:51_4: iddhi. Pañca mahāpuññā nāma meṇḍakaseṭṭhi, tassa bhariyā candapadumasirī, putto dhanañcayaseṭṭhi,
anya-e0102n:51_5: suṇisā sumanadevī, dāso puṇṇo nāmāti. Tesu seṭṭhissa sīsaṃ nhātassa ākāsaṃ ullokanakāle
anya-e0102n:51_6: aḍḍhateḷasakoṭṭhasahassāni ākāsato rattasālīnaṃ pūrenti. Bhariyāya nāḷikodanamattampi
anya-e0102n:51_7: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike parivisamānāya bhattaṃ na khīyati. Puttassa sahassatthavikaṃ
anya-e0102n:51_8: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi dentassa kahāpaṇā na khīyanti. Suṇisāya ekaṃ vīhitumbaṃ
anya-e0102n:51_9: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi bhājayamānāya dhaññaṃ na khīyati. Dāsassa ekena
anya-e0102n:51_10: naṅgalena kasato ito satta ito sattāti cuddasa maggā honti. Ayaṃ nesaṃ puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n:52_0: 378. Vijjādharādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana vijjāmayā iddhi. Yathāha “katamā vijjāmayā
anya-e0102n:52_1: iddhi? Vijjādharā vijjaṃ parijapitvā vehāsaṃ gacchanti. Ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi
anya-e0102n:53_0: 379. Tena tena pana sammāpayogena tassa tassa kammassa ijjhanaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā
anya-e0102n:53_1: ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Yathāha – “nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha
anya-e0102n:53_2: tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi…pe… arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ
anya-e0102n:53_3: pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti. Ettha
anya-e0102n:53_4: ca paṭipattisaṅkhātasseva sammāpayogassa dīpanavasena purimapāḷisadisāva pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0102n:53_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakaṭabyūhādikaraṇavasena yaṃkiñci sippakammaṃ yaṃkiñci vejjakammaṃ
anya-e0102n:53_6: tiṇṇaṃ bedānaṃ uggahaṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ uggahaṇaṃ antamaso kasanavapanādīni upādāya
anya-e0102n:53_7: taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbattaviseso tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti āgatā. (10)
anya-e0102n:54: Iti imāsu dasasu iddhīsu iddhividhāyāti imasmiṃ pade adhiṭṭhānā iddhiyeva āgatā. Imasmiṃ panatthe vikubbanāmanomayāiddhiyopi icchitabbā eva.
anya-e0102n:55_0: 380. Iddhividhāyāti iddhikoṭṭhāsāya, iddhivikappāya vā. Cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti
anya-e0102n:55_1: so bhikkhu vuttappakāravasena tasmiṃ citte abhiññāpādake jāte iddhividhādhigamatthāya
anya-e0102n:55_2: parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā iddhividhābhimukhaṃ peseti.
anya-e0102n:55_3: Abhininnāmetīti adhigantabbaiddhipoṇaṃ iddhipabbhāraṃ karoti. Soti so evaṃ katacittābhinīhāro
anya-e0102n:55_4: bhikkhu. Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ. Iddhividhanti iddhikoṭṭhāsaṃ.
anya-e0102n:55_5: Paccanubhotīti paccanubhavati, phusati sacchikaroti pāpuṇātīti attho. Idānissa anekavihitabhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:55_6: dassento “ekopi hutvā”tiādimāha. Tattha ekopi hutvāti iddhikaraṇato pubbe pakatiyā
anya-e0102n:55_7: ekopi hutvā. Bahudhā hotīti bahūnaṃ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā sajjhāyaṃ vā kattukāmo
anya-e0102n:55_8: pañhaṃ vā pucchitukāmo hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti. Kathaṃ panāyamevaṃ hoti? Iddhiyā
anya-e0102n:55_9: catasso bhūmiyo cattāro pādā aṭṭha padāni soḷasa ca mūlāni sampādetvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto.
anya-e0102n:56_0: 381. Tattha catasso bhūmiyoti cattāri jhānāni veditabbāni. Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0102n:56_1: “iddhiyā katamā catasso bhūmiyo? Vivekajabhūmi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, pītisukhabhūmi dutiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:56_2: jhānaṃ, upekkhāsukhabhūmi tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, adukkhamasukhabhūmi catutthaṃ jhānaṃ. Iddhiyā
anya-e0102n:56_3: imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya
anya-e0102n:56_4: iddhivasitāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantī”ti. Ettha ca purimāni tīṇi jhānāni yasmā
anya-e0102n:56_5: pītipharaṇena ca sukhapharaṇena ca sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā lahumudukammaññakāyo
anya-e0102n:56_6: iddhiṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā iminā pariyāyena iddhilābhāya saṃvattanato sambhārabhūmiyoti
anya-e0102n:57_0: 382. Cattāro pādāti cattāro iddhipādā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ “iddhiyā katame cattāro
anya-e0102n:57_1: pādā? Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Vīriya…
anya-e0102n:57_2: citta… vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Iddhiyā ime
anya-e0102n:57_3: cattāro pādā iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantī”ti. Ettha ca chandahetuko
anya-e0102n:57_4: chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi. Kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṃ
anya-e0102n:57_5: adhivacanaṃ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā. Catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ
anya-e0102n:57_6: adhivacanaṃ. Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṃ. Iddhipādanti
anya-e0102n:57_7: nipphattipariyāyena vā ijjhanaṭṭhena, ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā
anya-e0102n:57_8: hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ abhiññācittasampayuttānaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0102n:58_0: Atha vā pajjate anenāti pādo. Pāpuṇīyatīti attho. Iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo. Chandādīnametaṃ
anya-e0102n:58_1: adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha – “chandañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati
anya-e0102n:58_2: cittassekaggataṃ, ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhi. So anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ…pe… padahati,
anya-e0102n:58_3: ime vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārā. Iti ayañca chando ayañca chandasamādhi ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n:58_4: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo”ti. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:59_0: 383. Aṭṭha padānīti chandādīni aṭṭha veditabbāni. Vuttañhetaṃ “iddhiyā katamāni aṭṭha
anya-e0102n:59_1: padāni? Chandañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ. Chando
anya-e0102n:59_2: na samādhi, samādhi na chando. Añño chando, añño samādhi. Vīriyañce bhikkhu… cittañce
anya-e0102n:59_3: bhikkhu… vīmaṃsañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ. Vīmaṃsā
anya-e0102n:59_4: na samādhi, samādhi na vīmaṃsā. Aññā vīmaṃsā, añño samādhi. Iddhiyā imāni aṭṭha padāni
anya-e0102n:59_5: iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantī”ti. Ettha hi iddhimuppādetukāmatāchando
anya-e0102n:59_6: samādhinā ekato niyuttova iddhilābhāya saṃvattati; tathā vīriyādayo. Tasmā imāni
anya-e0102n:60_0: 384. Soḷasa mūlānīti soḷasahi ākārehi āneñjatā cittassa veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0102n:60_1: “iddhiyā kati mūlāni? Soḷasa mūlāni – anonataṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:60_2: anunnataṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, anabhinataṃ cittaṃ rāge na iñjatīti
anya-e0102n:60_3: āneñjaṃ, anapanataṃ cittaṃ byāpāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, anissitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0102n:60_4: na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, appaṭibaddhaṃ cittaṃ chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, vippamuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:60_5: cittaṃ kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:60_6: vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ kilesamariyāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, ekattagataṃ cittaṃ nānattakilese
anya-e0102n:60_7: na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, saddhāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:60_8: vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:60_9: pamāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ,
anya-e0102n:60_10: paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ, obhāsagataṃ cittaṃ avijjandhakāre
anya-e0102n:60_11: na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Iddhiyā imāni soḷasa mūlāni iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:61_0: Kāmañca esa attho evaṃ samāhite cittetiādināpi siddhoyeva, paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ pana
anya-e0102n:61_1: iddhiyā bhūmipādapadamūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna vutto. Purimo ca suttesu āgatanayo.
anya-e0102n:61_2: Ayaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ. Iti ubhayattha asammohatthampi puna vutto.
anya-e0102n:62_0: 385. Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti svāyamete iddhiyā bhūmipādapadabhūte dhamme sampādetvā
anya-e0102n:62_1: abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati “sataṃ homi sataṃ
anya-e0102n:62_2: homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:62_3: adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva sataṃ hoti. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo. Sace evaṃ na ijjhati
anya-e0102n:62_4: puna parikammaṃ katvā dutiyampi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:62_5: hi ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ samāpajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Tattha pādakajjhānacittaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:62_6: Parikammacittāni satārammaṇāni vā sahassārammaṇāni vā, tāni ca kho vaṇṇavasena, no
anya-e0102n:62_7: paṇṇattivasena. Adhiṭṭhānacittampi tatheva satārammaṇaṃ vā sahassārammaṇaṃ vā. Taṃ
anya-e0102n:62_8: pubbe vuttaṃ appanācittamiva gotrabhuanantaraṃ ekameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ.
anya-e0102n:63_0: 386. Yampi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ “pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjati sataṃ vā sahassaṃ
anya-e0102n:63_1: vā satasahassaṃ vā, āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī’ti, bahuko hoti, yathā
anya-e0102n:63_2: āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti. Tatrāpi āvajjatīti parikammavaseneva vuttaṃ. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena
anya-e0102n:63_3: adhiṭṭhātīti abhiññāñāṇavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā bahukaṃ āvajjati, tato tesampi parikammacittānaṃ
anya-e0102n:63_4: avasāne samāpajjati, samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā puna bahuko homīti āvajjitvā tato paraṃ
anya-e0102n:63_5: pavattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṃ anantarā uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena
anya-e0102n:63_6: adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena ekeneva abhiññāñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:64_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yathā āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti, taṃ bahudhābhāvassa kāyasakkhidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:64_1: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana vatthunā dīpetabbaṃ. Te kira dvebhātaro panthe jātattā panthakāti
anya-e0102n:64_2: nāmaṃ labhiṃsu. Tesaṃ jeṭṭho mahāpanthako, so pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
anya-e0102n:65: Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
anya-e0102n:67_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ adāsi. So taṃ catūhi māsehi paguṇaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ thero abhabbo
anya-e0102n:67_1: tvaṃ sāsaneti vihārato nīhari. Tasmiñca kāle thero bhattuddesako hoti. Jīvako theraṃ
anya-e0102n:67_2: upasaṅkamitvā “sve, bhante, bhagavatā saddhiṃ pañcabhikkhusatāni gahetvā amhākaṃ
anya-e0102n:67_3: gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Theropi ṭhapetvā cūḷapanthakaṃ sesānaṃ adhivāsemīti adhivāsesi.
anya-e0102n:68_0: Cūḷapanthako dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā rodati. Bhagavā dibbacakkhunā disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0102n:68_1: kasmā rodasīti āha. So taṃ pavattimācikkhi. Bhagavā na sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto
anya-e0102n:68_2: mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti, mā soci bhikkhūti taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā
anya-e0102n:68_3: iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ abhinimminitvā adāsi, handa bhikkhu imaṃ parimajjanto rajoharaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:68_4: rajoharaṇanti punappunaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohīti. Tassa tathā karoto taṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0102n:68_5: So parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ, natthettha doso, attabhāvassa panāyaṃ dosoti saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e0102n:68_6: pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anulomato gotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi.
anya-e0102n:69: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n:74: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n:78: Tassa gāthāpariyosāne catupaṭisambhidāchaḷabhiññāparivārā nava lokuttaradhammā hatthagatāva ahesuṃ.
anya-e0102n:79_0: Satthā dutiyadivase jīvakassa gehaṃ agamāsi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Atha dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
anya-e0102n:79_1: yāguyā diyyamānāya hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Jīvako kiṃ bhanteti pucchi. Vihāre eko
anya-e0102n:79_2: bhikkhu atthīti. So purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha, ayyaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ ehī”ti. Vihārato
anya-e0102n:82_0: Atha so puriso gantvā kāsāvehi ekapajjotaṃ ārāmaṃ disvā āgantvā bhikkhūhi bharito
anya-e0102n:82_1: bhante ārāmo, nāhaṃ jānāmi katamo so ayyoti āha. Tato naṃ bhagavā āha “gaccha yaṃ
anya-e0102n:82_2: paṭhamaṃ passasi, taṃ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘satthā taṃ āmantetī’ti vatvā ānehī”ti.
anya-e0102n:82_3: So taṃ gantvā therasseva cīvarakaṇṇe aggahesi. Tāvadeva sabbepi nimmitā antaradhāyiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:82_4: Thero “gaccha tva”nti taṃ uyyojetvā mukhadhovanādisarīrakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā paṭhamataraṃ
anya-e0102n:82_5: gantvā pattāsane nisīdi. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yathā āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti.
anya-e0102n:83_0: Tatra ye te bahū nimmitā te aniyametvā nimmitattā iddhimatā sadisāva honti. Ṭhānanisajjādīsu
anya-e0102n:83_1: vā bhāsitatuṇhībhāvādīsu vā yaṃ yaṃ iddhimā karoti, taṃ tadeva karonti. Sace pana
anya-e0102n:83_2: nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hoti, keci paṭhamavaye, keci majjhimavaye, keci pacchimavaye,
anya-e0102n:83_3: tathā dīghakese, upaḍḍhamuṇḍe, muṇḍe, missakese, upaḍḍharattacīvare, paṇḍukacīvare,
anya-e0102n:83_5: karonte aparepi vā nānappakārake kātukāmo hoti, tena pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ettakā
anya-e0102n:83_6: bhikkhū paṭhamavayā hontūtiādinā nayena parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:83_7: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saddhiṃ icchiticchitappakārāyeva hontīti. Esa nayo
anya-e0102n:84_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso, iminā bhikkhunā evaṃ bahubhāvaṃ nimminitvā puna “ekova hutvā caṅkamissāmi,
anya-e0102n:84_1: sajjhāyaṃ karissāmi, pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā vā, “ayaṃ vihāro appabhikkhuko,
anya-e0102n:84_2: sace keci āgamissanti ‘kuto ime ettakā ekasadisā bhikkhū, addhā therassa esa ānubhāvo’ti
anya-e0102n:84_3: maṃ jānissantī”ti appicchatāya vā antarāva “eko homī”ti icchantena pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:84_4: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko
anya-e0102n:84_5: homī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saddhiṃyeva eko hoti. Evaṃ akaronto pana
anya-e0102n:85_0: 387. Āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvanti ettha āvibhāvaṃ karoti tirobhāvaṃ karotīti ayamattho.
anya-e0102n:85_1: Idameva hi sandhāya paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ hoti appaṭicchannaṃ
anya-e0102n:85_2: vivaṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Tirobhāvanti kenaci āvaṭaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ pihitaṃ paṭikujjita”nti.
anya-e0102n:85_3: Tatrāyaṃ iddhimā āvibhāvaṃ kātukāmo andhakāraṃ vā ālokaṃ karoti, paṭicchannaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:85_4: vivaṭaṃ, anāpāthaṃ vā āpāthaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi yathā paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi
anya-e0102n:85_5: vā dissati, evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya idaṃ andhakāraṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:85_6: ālokajātaṃ hotūti vā, idaṃ paṭicchannaṃ vivaṭaṃ hotūti vā, idaṃ anāpāthaṃ āpāthaṃ
anya-e0102n:85_7: hotūti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti, saha adhiṭṭhānacittena
anya-e0102n:85_8: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Pare dūre ṭhitāpi passanti. Sayampi passitukāmo passati.
anya-e0102n:86_0: 388. Etaṃ pana pāṭihāriyaṃ kena katapubbanti? Bhagavatā. Bhagavā hi cūḷasubhaddāya
anya-e0102n:86_1: nimantito vissakammunā nimmitehi pañcahi kūṭāgārasatehi sāvatthito sattayojanabbhantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:86_2: sāketaṃ gacchanto yathā sāketanagaravāsino sāvatthivāsike, sāvatthivāsino ca sāketavāsike
anya-e0102n:86_3: passanti, evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi. Nagaramajjhe ca otaritvā pathaviṃ dvidhā bhinditvā yāva
anya-e0102n:86_4: avīciṃ ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā yāva brahmalokaṃ dassesi.
anya-e0102n:87_0: Devorohaṇenapi ca ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Bhagavā kira yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni
anya-e0102n:87_1: bandhanā pamocetvā atītā buddhā yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne kuhiṃ gatāti āvajjitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
anya-e0102n:87_2: gatāti addasa. Athekena pādena pathavītalaṃ akkamitvā dutiyaṃ yugandharapabbate patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n:87_3: puna purimapādaṃ uddharitvā sinerumatthakaṃ akkamitvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilātale
anya-e0102n:87_4: vassaṃ upagantvā sannipatitānaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya abhidhammakathaṃ
anya-e0102n:87_5: ārabhi. Bhikkhācāravelāya nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. So dhammaṃ deseti. Bhagavā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0102n:87_6: khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā anotattadahatīre
anya-e0102n:87_7: paribhuñjati. Sāriputtatthero tattha gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandati. Bhagavā ajja ettakaṃ
anya-e0102n:87_8: dhammaṃ desesinti therassa nayaṃ deti. Evaṃ tayo māse abbocchinnaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ
anya-e0102n:87_9: kathesi. Taṃ sutvā asītikoṭidevatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0102n:88_0: Yamakapāṭihāriye sannipatitāpi dvādasayojanā parisā bhagavantaṃ passitvāva gamissāmāti
anya-e0102n:88_1: khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhiyeva sabbapaccayehi upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:88_2: Manussā kuhiṃ bhagavāti jānanatthāya anuruddhattheraṃ yāciṃsu. Thero ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0102n:88_3: addasa dibbena cakkhunā tattha vassūpagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā ārocesi.
anya-e0102n:89_0: Te bhagavato vandanatthāya mahāmoggallānattheraṃ yāciṃsu. Thero parisamajjheyeva
anya-e0102n:89_1: mahāpathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā sinerupabbataṃ nibbijjhitvā tathāgatapādamūle bhagavato
anya-e0102n:89_2: pāde vandamānova ummujjitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “jambudīpavāsino, bhante, bhagavato
anya-e0102n:89_3: pāde vanditvā passitvāva gamissāmāti vadantī”ti. Bhagavā āha “kuhiṃ pana te, moggallāna,
anya-e0102n:89_5: daṭṭhukāmā sve saṅkassanagaraṃ āgacchantu, ahaṃ sve mahāpavāraṇapuṇṇamāsīuposathadivase
anya-e0102n:89_6: saṅkassanagare otarissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero dasabalaṃ vanditvā āgatamaggeneva
anya-e0102n:89_7: oruyha manussānaṃ santikaṃ sampāpuṇi. Gamanāgamanakāle ca yathā naṃ manussā passanti,
anya-e0102n:89_8: evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi. Idaṃ tāvettha mahāmoggallānatthero āvibhāvapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0102n:90_0: So evaṃ āgato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “dūranti saññaṃ akatvā katapātarāsāva nikkhamathā”ti
anya-e0102n:90_1: āha. Bhagavā sakkassa devarañño ārocesi “mahārāja, sve manussalokaṃ gacchāmī”ti.
anya-e0102n:90_2: Devarājā vissakammaṃ āṇāpesi “tāta, sve bhagavā manussalokaṃ gantukāmo, tisso sopānapantiyo
anya-e0102n:90_3: māpehi ekaṃ kanakamayaṃ, ekaṃ rajatamayaṃ, ekaṃ maṇimaya”nti. So tathā akāsi. Bhagavā
anya-e0102n:90_4: dutiyadivase sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā puratthimalokadhātuṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
anya-e0102n:90_5: vivaṭāni hutvā ekaṅgaṇaṃ viya pakāsiṃsu. Yathā ca puratthimena, evaṃ pacchimenapi
anya-e0102n:90_6: uttarenapi dakkhiṇenapi sabbaṃ vivaṭamaddasa. Heṭṭhāpi yāva avīci, upari yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanaṃ, tāva addasa.
anya-e0102n:91_0: Taṃ divasaṃ kira lokavivaraṇaṃ nāma ahosi. Manussāpi deve passanti, devāpi manusse.
anya-e0102n:91_1: Tattha neva manussā uddhaṃ ullokenti, na devā adho olokenti, sabbe sammukhāva aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:91_2: passanti. Bhagavā majjhe maṇimayena sopānena otarati, chakāmāvacaradevā vāmapasse
anya-e0102n:91_3: kanakamayena, suddhāvāsā ca mahābrahmā ca dakkhiṇapasse rajatamayena. Devarājā pattacīvaraṃ
anya-e0102n:91_4: aggahesi, mahābrahmā tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ, suyāmo vāḷabījaniṃ, pañcasikho gandhabbaputto
anya-e0102n:91_5: tigāvutamattaṃ beḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa pūjaṃ karonto otarati. Taṃdivasaṃ
anya-e0102n:91_6: bhagavantaṃ disvā buddhabhāvāya pihaṃ anuppādetvā ṭhitasatto nāma natthi. Idamettha
anya-e0102n:92_0: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpe talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattheropi tissamahāvihāre cetiyaṅgaṇasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:92_1: nisīditvā “tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno
anya-e0102n:92_2: hotī”ti apaṇṇakasuttaṃ kathento heṭṭhāmukhaṃ bījaniṃ akāsi, yāva avīcito ekaṅgaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:92_3: ahosi. Tato uparimukhaṃ akāsi, yāva brahmalokā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi. Thero nirayabhayena
anya-e0102n:92_4: tajjetvā saggasukhena ca palobhetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahantoti.
anya-e0102n:93_0: 389. Tirobhāvaṃ kātukāmo pana ālokaṃ vā andhakāraṃ karoti, appaṭicchannaṃ vā paṭicchannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:93_1: āpāthaṃ vā anāpāthaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi yathā appaṭicchannopi samīpe ṭhitopi
anya-e0102n:93_2: vā na dissati, evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ ālokaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:93_3: andhakāraṃ hotū”ti vā, “idaṃ appaṭicchannaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hotū”ti vā, “idaṃ āpāthaṃ
anya-e0102n:93_4: anāpāthaṃ hotū”ti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti. Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena
anya-e0102n:93_5: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Pare samīpe ṭhitāpi na passanti. Sayampi apassitukāmo na passati.
anya-e0102n:94_0: 390. Etaṃ pana pāṭihāriyaṃ kena katapubbanti? Bhagavatā. Bhagavā hi yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ
anya-e0102n:94_1: samīpe nisinnaṃyeva yathā naṃ pitā na passati, evamakāsi. Tathā vīsayojanasataṃ mahākappinassa
anya-e0102n:94_2: paccuggamanaṃ katvā taṃ anāgāmiphale, amaccasahassañcassa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā,
anya-e0102n:94_3: tassa anumaggaṃ āgatā sahassitthiparivārā anojādevī āgantvā samīpe nisinnāpi yathā
anya-e0102n:94_4: saparisaṃ rājānaṃ na passati, tathā katvā “api, bhante, rājānaṃ passathā”ti vutte
anya-e0102n:94_5: “kiṃ pana te rājānaṃ gavesituṃ varaṃ, udāhu attāna”nti? “Attānaṃ, bhante”ti vatvā
anya-e0102n:94_6: nisinnāya tassā tathā dhammaṃ desesi, yathā sā saddhiṃ itthisahassena sotāpattiphale
anya-e0102n:94_7: patiṭṭhāsi, amaccā anāgāmiphale, rājā arahatteti. Apica tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgatadivase
anya-e0102n:94_8: yathā attanā saddhiṃ āgate avasese rājā na passati, evaṃ karontena mahindattherenāpi idaṃ katameva.
anya-e0102n:95_0: 391. Apica sabbampi pākaṭaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ āvibhāvaṃ nāma. Apākaṭapāṭihāriyaṃ tirobhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:95_1: nāma. Tattha pākaṭapāṭihāriye iddhipi paññāyati iddhimāpi. Taṃ yamakapāṭihāriyena
anya-e0102n:95_2: dīpetabbaṃ. Tatra hi “idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi.
anya-e0102n:95_3: Uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:95_4: ubhayaṃ paññāyittha. Apākaṭapāṭihāriye iddhiyeva paññāyati, na iddhimā. Taṃ mahakasuttena
anya-e0102n:95_5: ca brahmanimantanikasuttena ca dīpetabbaṃ. Tatra hi āyasmato ca mahakassa, bhagavato
anya-e0102n:97_0: “Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ etadavoca ‘sādhu me, bhante,
anya-e0102n:97_1: ayyo mahako uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetū’ti. Tena hi tvaṃ gahapati
anya-e0102n:97_2: āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsehīti. ‘Evaṃ, bhante’ti kho citto
anya-e0102n:97_3: gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ
anya-e0102n:97_4: okāsesi. Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṃ pavisitvā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi,
anya-e0102n:97_5: yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi, uttarāsaṅgaṃ na jhāpesī”ti.
anya-e0102n:99_0: “Atha khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsiṃ ‘ettāvatā brahmā
anya-e0102n:99_1: ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca saddañca me sossanti, na ca maṃ dakkhissantī’ti
anya-e0102n:101: Bhavaṃ nābhivadiṃ kiñci, nandiñca na upādiyi”’nti. ;
anya-e0102n:102_0: 392. Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāseti ettha
anya-e0102n:102_1: tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṃ, kuṭṭassa parabhāganti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo itaresu. Kuṭṭoti
anya-e0102n:102_2: ca gehabhittiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Pākāroti gehavihāragāmādīnaṃ parikkhepapākāro. Pabbatoti
anya-e0102n:102_3: paṃsupabbato vā pāsāṇapabbato vā. Asajjamānoti alaggamāno. Seyyathāpi ākāseti ākāse
anya-e0102n:102_4: viya. Evaṃ gantukāmena pana ākāsakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kuṭṭaṃ vā pākāraṃ
anya-e0102n:102_5: vā sinerucakkavāḷesupi aññataraṃ pabbataṃ vā āvajjitvā kataparikammena ākāso hotūti
anya-e0102n:102_6: adhiṭṭhātabbo. Ākāsoyeva hoti. Adho otaritukāmassa, uddhaṃ vā ārohitukāmassa susiro
anya-e0102n:102_7: hoti, vinivijjhitvā gantukāmassa chiddo. So tattha asajjamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n:103_1: kiṃ hatthiassādīni abhinimminitukāmo hatthiassādi kasiṇāni samāpajjati, nanu yattha
anya-e0102n:103_2: katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ icchati,
anya-e0102n:103_3: taṃ tadeva hotī”ti. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “pāḷiyā, bhante, ākāsakasiṇaṃyeva āgataṃ, tasmā
anya-e0102n:104_0: “Pakatiyā ākāsakasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ
anya-e0102n:104_1: āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘ākāso hotū’ti. Ākāso hoti. Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ
anya-e0102n:104_2: tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati. Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe
anya-e0102n:104_3: aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti, evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ
anya-e0102n:105_0: Sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassa antarā pabbato vā rukkho vā uṭṭheti,
anya-e0102n:105_1: kiṃ puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti? Doso natthi. Puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:105_2: hi upajjhāyassa santike nissayaggahaṇasadisaṃ hoti. Iminā ca pana bhikkhunā ākāso
anya-e0102n:105_3: hotūti adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva. Purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato
anya-e0102n:105_4: vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānamevetaṃ. Aññena iddhimatā nimmite pana
anya-e0102n:105_5: paṭhamanimmānaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Itarena tassa uddhaṃ vā adho vā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:106_0: 393. Pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjanti ettha ummujjanti uṭṭhānaṃ vuccati. Nimujjanti
anya-e0102n:106_1: saṃsīdanaṃ. Ummujjañca nimujjañca ummujjanimujjaṃ. Evaṃ kātukāmena āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0102n:106_2: uṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne pathavī udakaṃ hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:106_3: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinne ṭhāne pathavī udakameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:106_4: So tattha ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:107_0: “Pakatiyā āpokasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Pathaviṃ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
anya-e0102n:107_1: – ‘udakaṃ hotū’ti. Udakaṃ hoti. So pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti. Yathā manussā
anya-e0102n:107_2: pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti, evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto
anya-e0102n:108_0: Na kevalañca ummujjanimujjameva, nhānapānamukhadhovanabhaṇḍakadhovanādīsu yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0102n:108_1: icchati, taṃ taṃ karoti. Na kevalañca udakameva, sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīsupi yaṃ
anya-e0102n:108_2: yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ idañcidañca ettakaṃ hotūti āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa
anya-e0102n:108_3: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Uddharitvā bhājanagataṃ karontassa sappi sappimeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:108_4: Telādīni telādīniyeva. Udakaṃ udakameva. So tattha temitukāmova temeti, na temitukāmo
anya-e0102n:108_5: na temeti. Tasseva ca sā pathavī udakaṃ hoti sesajanassa pathavīyeva. Tattha manussā
anya-e0102n:108_6: pattikāpi gacchanti, yānādīhipi gacchanti, kasikammādīnipi karontiyeva. Sace panāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:108_7: tesampi udakaṃ hotūti icchati, hotiyeva. Paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā yaṃ pakatiyā
anya-e0102n:108_8: ghaṭataḷākādīsu udakaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:109_0: 394. Udakepi abhijjamāneti ettha yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā saṃsīdati, taṃ bhijjamānanti
anya-e0102n:109_1: vuccati. Viparītaṃ abhijjamānaṃ. Evaṃ gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0102n:109_2: vuṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne udakaṃ pathavī hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:109_3: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinnaṭṭhāne udakaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:110_0: “Pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Udakaṃ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena
anya-e0102n:110_1: adhiṭṭhāti – ‘pathavī hotū’ti. Pathavī hoti. So abhijjamāne udake gacchati. Yathā
anya-e0102n:110_2: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti, evameva so iddhimā
anya-e0102n:110_3: cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviya”nti.
anya-e0102n:111_0: Na kevalañca gacchati, yaṃ yaṃ iriyāpathaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ karoti. Na kevalañca
anya-e0102n:111_1: pathavimeva karoti, maṇisuvaṇṇapabbatarukkhādīsupi yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:111_2: āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhāti, yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Tasseva ca taṃ udakaṃ pathavī hoti,
anya-e0102n:111_3: sesajanassa udakameva, macchakacchapā ca udakakākādayo ca yathāruci vicaranti. Sace
anya-e0102n:111_4: panāyaṃ aññesampi manussānaṃ taṃ pathaviṃ kātuṃ icchati, karotiyeva. Paricchinnakālātikkamena
anya-e0102n:112_0: 395. Pallaṅkena kamatīti pallaṅkena gacchati. Pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo.
anya-e0102n:112_1: Evaṃ kātukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace nisinno gantumicchati,
anya-e0102n:112_2: pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:112_3: Sace nipanno gantukāmo hoti mañcappamāṇaṃ, sace padasā gantukāmo hoti maggappamāṇanti
anya-e0102n:112_4: evaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā vuttanayeneva pathavī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:112_5: saha adhiṭṭhānena pathavīyeva hoti. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:113_0: “Ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇoti. Pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā
anya-e0102n:113_1: lābhī hoti, ākāsaṃ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘pathavī hotū’ti. Pathavī
anya-e0102n:113_2: hoti. So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti. Yathā
anya-e0102n:113_3: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyaṃ caṅkamantipi…pe… seyyampi kappenti, evameva
anya-e0102n:113_4: so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi…pe… seyyampi kappetī”ti.
anya-e0102n:114_0: Ākāse gantukāmena ca bhikkhunā dibbacakkhulābhināpi bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Antare utusamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0102n:114_1: vā pabbatarukkhādayo honti, nāgasupaṇṇādayo vā usūyantā māpenti, nesaṃ dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0102n:114_2: Te pana disvā kiṃ kātabbanti? Pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ākāso hotūti parikammaṃ
anya-e0102n:114_3: katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Thero panāha “samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, āvuso, kimatthiyaṃ, nanu
anya-e0102n:114_4: samāhitamevassa cittaṃ, tena yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, ākāsoyeva hotī”ti.
anya-e0102n:114_5: Kiñcāpi evamāha, atha kho tirokuṭṭapārihāriye vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:115_0: Apica okāse orohaṇatthampi iminā dibbacakkhulābhinā bhavitabbaṃ, ayañhi sace anokāse
anya-e0102n:115_1: nhānatitthe vā gāmadvāre vā orohati. Mahājanassa pākaṭo hoti. Tasmā dibbacakkhunā
anya-e0102n:116_0: 396. Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti
anya-e0102n:116_1: ettha candimasūriyānaṃ dvācattālīsayojanasahassassa upari caraṇena mahiddhikatā,
anya-e0102n:116_2: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā. Evaṃ upari caraṇaālokakaraṇehi
anya-e0102n:116_3: vā mahiddhike teneva mahānubhāve. Parāmasatīti pariggaṇhati ekadese vā chupati. Parimajjatīti
anya-e0102n:116_4: samantato ādāsatalaṃ viya parimajjati. Ayaṃ panassa iddhi abhiññāpādakajjhānavaseneva
anya-e0102n:117_0: “Imepi candimasūriye…pe… parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto candimasūriye
anya-e0102n:117_1: āvajjati, āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘hatthapāse hotū’ti. Hatthapāse hoti. So
anya-e0102n:117_2: nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati. Yathā
anya-e0102n:117_3: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṃ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti
anya-e0102n:118_0: Svāyaṃ yadi icchati gantvā parāmasituṃ, gantvā parāmasati, yadi pana idheva nisinnako
anya-e0102n:118_1: vā nipannako vā parāmasitukāmo hoti, hatthapāse hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, adhiṭṭhānabalena
anya-e0102n:118_2: vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite vā parāmasati, hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā.
anya-e0102n:118_3: Vaḍḍhentassa pana kiṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ vaḍḍhati, anupādiṇṇakanti? Upādiṇṇakaṃ nissāya
anya-e0102n:119_0: Tattha tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha “kiṃ panāvuso, upādiṇṇakaṃ khuddakampi mahantampi
anya-e0102n:119_1: na hoti, nanu yadā bhikkhu tālacchiddādīhi nikkhamati, tadā upādiṇṇakaṃ khuddakaṃ
anya-e0102n:119_2: hoti. Yadā mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ karoti, tadā mahantaṃ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti.
anya-e0102n:121_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “sve, bhante,
anya-e0102n:121_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ amhākaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkami.
anya-e0102n:121_2: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā taṃdivasāvasesaṃ rattibhāgañca vītināmetvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
anya-e0102n:121_3: olokesi. Athassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi. Bhagavā “ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:121_4: nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi, atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti āvajjento
anya-e0102n:121_5: “ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasannoti disvā ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhito
anya-e0102n:122_0: Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
anya-e0102n:122_1: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṃ gacchatī”ti. Taṃ divasañca
anya-e0102n:122_2: nandopanandassa āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsu. So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena
anya-e0102n:122_3: dhāriyamānena tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṃ
anya-e0102n:122_4: annapānavidhiṃ olokayamāno nisinno hoti. Atha bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati, tathā
anya-e0102n:122_5: katvā tassa vitānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0102n:123_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:123_1: hoti – “ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṃ uparūparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ
anya-e0102n:123_2: bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake
anya-e0102n:123_3: pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:123_4: vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
anya-e0102n:124_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe, bhante, imasmiṃ padese ṭhito
anya-e0102n:124_1: sineruṃ passāmi, sineruparibhaṇḍaṃ passāmi, tāvatiṃsaṃ passāmi, vejayantaṃ passāmi,
anya-e0102n:124_2: vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmi. Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0102n:124_3: yaṃ etarahi neva sineruṃ passāmi…pe… na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmī”ti.
anya-e0102n:124_4: “Ayaṃ, raṭṭhapāla, nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ
anya-e0102n:124_5: bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhito”ti. “Damemi
anya-e0102n:124_6: naṃ, bhante”ti. Na bhagavā anujāni. Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena
anya-e0102n:124_7: sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu. Na bhagavā anujāni.
anya-e0102n:125_0: Avasāne mahāmoggallānatthero “ahaṃ, bhante, damemi na”nti āha. “Damehi moggallānā”ti
anya-e0102n:125_1: bhagavā anujāni. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā
anya-e0102n:125_2: nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:125_3: ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi. Nāgarājā padhūmāyi. Theropi na tuyhaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:125_4: sarīre dhūmo atthi, mayhampi atthīti padhūmāyi. Nāgarājassa dhūmo theraṃ na bādhati.
anya-e0102n:125_5: Therassa pana dhūmo nāgarājānaṃ bādhati. Tato nāgarājā pajjali. Theropi na tuyhaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:125_6: sarīre aggi atthi, mayhampi atthīti pajjali. Nāgarājassa tejo theraṃ na bādhati.
anya-e0102n:125_7: Therassa pana tejo nāgarājānaṃ bādhati. Nāgarājā ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā
anya-e0102n:125_8: dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cāti cintetvā “bho tvaṃ kosī”ti paṭipucchi. “Ahaṃ kho, nanda,
anya-e0102n:126_0: Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena
anya-e0102n:126_1: nikkhami, vāmakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena nikkhami, tathā dakkhiṇanāsasotena
anya-e0102n:126_2: pavisitvā vāmanāsasotena nikkhami, vāmanāsasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇanāsasotena nikkhami.
anya-e0102n:126_3: Tato nāgarājā mukhaṃ vivari. Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena
anya-e0102n:126_4: ca caṅkamati. Bhagavā “moggallāna, manasikarohi mahiddhiko esa nāgo”ti āha. Thero
anya-e0102n:126_5: “mayhaṃ kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā
anya-e0102n:126_6: paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante, nandopanando, ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ
anya-e0102n:126_7: nāgarājānaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya”nti āha.
anya-e0102n:127_0: Nāgarājā cintesi “pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho, nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhantare
anya-e0102n:127_1: pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī”ti cintetvā nikkhama bhante, mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ
anya-e0102n:127_2: caṅkamanto bādhayitthāti āha. Thero nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Nāgarājā ayaṃ soti
anya-e0102n:127_3: disvā nāsavātaṃ vissajji. Thero catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji. Lomakūpampissa vāto cāletuṃ
anya-e0102n:127_4: nāsakkhi. Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
anya-e0102n:127_5: imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ na sakkhissantīti
anya-e0102n:128_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mahiddhiko
anya-e0102n:128_1: samaṇo”ti cintesi. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ
anya-e0102n:128_2: dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi. Nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:128_3: abhinimminitvā “bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
anya-e0102n:128_4: Thero “satthā, nanda, āgato, ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṃ damayitvā nibbisaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:128_5: gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. Nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “bhante, tumhākaṃ
anya-e0102n:128_6: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti āha. Bhagavā “sukhī hohi, nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
anya-e0102n:129_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko “kiṃ, bhante, atidivā āgatatthā”ti āha. Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa
anya-e0102n:129_1: ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. Kassa, bhante, jayo, kassa parājayoti. Moggallānassa jayo, nandassa
anya-e0102n:129_2: parājayoti. Anāthapiṇḍiko “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0102n:129_3: bhattaṃ, sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhapamukhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:129_4: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi. Iti imaṃ imasmiṃ nandopanandadamane
anya-e0102n:129_5: kataṃ mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “yadā mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ karoti, tadā
anya-e0102n:129_6: mahantaṃ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti. Evaṃ vuttepi bhikkhū upādiṇṇakaṃ nissāya
anya-e0102n:129_7: anupādiṇṇakameva vaḍḍhatīti āhaṃsu. Ayameva cettha yutti.
anya-e0102n:130_0: So evaṃ katvā na kevalaṃ candimasūriye parāmasati. Sace icchati pādakathalikaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:130_1: pāde ṭhapeti, pīṭhaṃ katvā nisīdati, mañcaṃ katvā nipajjati, apassenaphalakaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:130_2: apassayati. Yathā ca eko, evaṃ aparopi. Anekesupi hi bhikkhusatasahassesu evaṃ karontesu
anya-e0102n:130_3: tesañca ekamekassa tatheva ijjhati. Candimasūriyānañca gamanampi ālokakaraṇampi tatheva
anya-e0102n:130_4: hoti. Yathā hi pātisahassesu udakapūresu sabbapātīsu ca candamaṇḍalāni dissanti.
anya-e0102n:130_5: Pākatikameva ca candassa gamanaṃ ālokakaraṇañca hoti. Tathūpamametaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:131_0: 397. Yāva brahmalokāpīti brahmalokampi paricchedaṃ katvā. Kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti
anya-e0102n:131_1: tattha brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṃ vatteti. Tassattho pāḷiṃ anugantvā veditabbo. Ayañhettha pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:132_0: “Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti. Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṃ
anya-e0102n:132_1: gantukāmo hoti, dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhāti santike hotūti, santike hoti. Santikepi
anya-e0102n:132_2: dūre adhiṭṭhāti dūre hotūti, dūre hoti. Bahukampi thokanti adhiṭṭhāti thokaṃ hotūti,
anya-e0102n:132_3: thokaṃ hoti. Thokampi bahukanti adhiṭṭhāti bahukaṃ hotūti, bahukaṃ hoti. Dibbena
anya-e0102n:132_4: cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati. Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṃ
anya-e0102n:132_5: suṇāti. Cetopariyañāṇena tassa brahmuno cittaṃ pajānāti. Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto
anya-e0102n:132_6: dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti, kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti, kāyavasena
anya-e0102n:132_7: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetvā kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0102n:132_8: sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati. Sace
anya-e0102n:132_9: so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti, cittavasena
anya-e0102n:132_10: kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetvā cittavasena
anya-e0102n:132_11: kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ
anya-e0102n:132_12: gacchati. So tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapañcaṅgiṃ
anya-e0102n:132_13: ahīnindriyaṃ. Sace so iddhimā caṅkamati, nimmitopi tattha caṅkamati. Sace so iddhimā
anya-e0102n:132_14: tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyaṃ kappeti. Sace so iddhimā
anya-e0102n:132_15: dhūmāyati, pajjalati, dhammaṃ bhāsati, pañhaṃ pucchati, pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti,
anya-e0102n:132_16: nimmitopi tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti. Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:132_17: santiṭṭhati, sallapati, sākacchaṃ samāpajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:132_18: santiṭṭhati, sallapati, sākacchaṃ samāpajjati. Yaṃ yadeva hi so iddhimā karoti, taṃ
anya-e0102n:133_0: Tattha dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātīti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dūre devalokaṃ vā brahmalokaṃ
anya-e0102n:133_1: vā āvajjati santike hotūti. Āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
anya-e0102n:133_2: santike hotūti, santike hoti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
anya-e0102n:134_0: Tattha ko dūraṃ gahetvā santikaṃ akāsīti? Bhagavā. Bhagavā hi yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne
anya-e0102n:134_1: devalokaṃ gacchanto yugandharañca sineruñca santike katvā pathavītalato ekapādaṃ
anya-e0102n:134_2: yugandhare patiṭṭhapetvā dutiyaṃ sinerumatthake ṭhapesi. Añño ko akāsi? Mahāmoggallānatthero.
anya-e0102n:134_3: Thero hi sāvatthito bhattakiccaṃ katvā nikkhantaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ
anya-e0102n:135_0: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpe cūḷasamuddattheropi akāsi. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira therassa santikaṃ
anya-e0102n:135_1: pātova satta bhikkhusatāni āgamaṃsu. Thero “mahā bhikkhusaṅgho kuhiṃ bhikkhācāro
anya-e0102n:135_2: bhavissatī”ti cintento sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe adisvā “paratīre pāṭaliputte bhavissatī”ti
anya-e0102n:135_3: disvā bhikkhū pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā “ethāvuso, bhikkhācāraṃ gamissāmā”ti pathaviṃ
anya-e0102n:135_4: saṅkhipitvā pāṭaliputtaṃ gato. Bhikkhū “kataraṃ, bhante, imaṃ nagara”nti pucchiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:135_5: Pāṭaliputtaṃ, āvusoti. Pāṭaliputtaṃ nāma dūre bhanteti. Āvuso, mahallakattherā nāma
anya-e0102n:135_6: dūrepi gahetvā santike karontīti. Mahāsamuddo kuhiṃ, bhanteti? Nanu, āvuso, antarā
anya-e0102n:135_7: ekaṃ nīlamātikaṃ atikkamitvā āgatatthāti? Āma, bhante. Mahāsamuddo pana mahantoti.
anya-e0102n:135_8: Āvuso, mahallakattherā nāma mahantampi khuddakaṃ karontīti.
anya-e0102n:136: Yathā cāyaṃ, evaṃ tissadattattheropi sāyanhasamaye nhāyitvā katuttarāsaṅgo mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti citte uppanne santike akāsi.
anya-e0102n:137: Santikaṃ pana gahetvā ko dūramakāsīti? Bhagavā. Bhagavā hi attano ca aṅgulimālassa ca antaraṃ santikampi dūramakāsīti.
anya-e0102n:138_0: Atha ko bahukaṃ thokaṃ akāsīti? Mahākassapatthero. Rājagahe kira nakkhattadivase
anya-e0102n:138_1: pañcasatā kumāriyo candapūve gahetvā nakkhattakīḷanatthāya gacchantiyo bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0102n:138_2: disvā kiñci nādaṃsu. Pacchato āgacchantaṃ pana theraṃ disvā amhākaṃ thero eti pūvaṃ
anya-e0102n:138_3: dassāmāti sabbā pūve gahetvā theraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Thero pattaṃ nīharitvā sabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:138_4: ekapattapūramattamakāsi. Bhagavā theraṃ āgamayamāno purato nisīdi. Thero āharitvā bhagavato adāsi.
anya-e0102n:139_0: Illisaseṭṭhivatthusmiṃ pana mahāmoggallānatthero thokaṃ bahukamakāsi, kākavaliyavatthusmiñca
anya-e0102n:139_1: bhagavā. Mahākassapatthero kira sattāhaṃ samāpattiyā vītināmetvā daliddasaṅgahaṃ
anya-e0102n:139_2: karonto kākavaliyassa nāma duggatamanussassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Tassa jāyā theraṃ
anya-e0102n:139_3: disvā patino pakkaṃ aloṇambilayāguṃ patte ākiri. Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato hatthe
anya-e0102n:139_4: ṭhapesi. Bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghassa pahonakaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Ekapattena ābhatā
anya-e0102n:139_5: sabbesaṃ pahosi. Kākavaliyopi sattame divase seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ alatthāti.
anya-e0102n:140_0: Na kevalañca thokassa bahukaraṇaṃ, madhuraṃ amadhuraṃ, amadhuraṃ madhurantiādīsupi
anya-e0102n:140_1: yaṃ yaṃ icchati, sabbaṃ iddhimato ijjhati. Tathā hi mahāanuḷatthero nāma sambahule
anya-e0102n:140_2: bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā sukkhabhattameva labhitvā gaṅgātīre nisīditvā paribhuñjamāne
anya-e0102n:140_3: disvā gaṅgāya udakaṃ sappimaṇḍanti adhiṭṭhahitvā sāmaṇerānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi. Te thālakehi
anya-e0102n:140_4: āharitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu. Sabbe madhurena sappimaṇḍena bhuñjiṃsūti.
anya-e0102n:141_0: Dibbena cakkhunāti idheva ṭhito ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati. Idheva
anya-e0102n:141_1: ca ṭhito sabbaṃ tassa bhāsato saddaṃ suṇāti. Cittaṃ pajānāti. Kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetīti
anya-e0102n:141_2: karajakāyassa vasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti. Pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā kāye āropeti.
anya-e0102n:141_3: Kāyānugatikaṃ karoti dandhagamanaṃ. Kāyagamanaṃ hi dandhaṃ hoti. Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
anya-e0102n:141_4: okkamatīti pādakajjhānārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
anya-e0102n:141_5: okkamati pavisati phasseti sampāpuṇāti. Sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttasaññā. Upekkhā
anya-e0102n:141_6: hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttā. Sāyeva ca saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādīhi paccanīkehi
anya-e0102n:141_7: ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā. Taṃ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu
anya-e0102n:141_8: viya sallahuko hoti. So evaṃ vāyukkhittatūlapicunā viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena
anya-e0102n:141_9: brahmalokaṃ gacchati. Evaṃ gacchanto ca sace icchati pathavīkasiṇavasena ākāse maggaṃ
anya-e0102n:141_10: nimminitvā padasā gacchati. Sace icchati vāyokasiṇavasena vāyuṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā tūlapicu
anya-e0102n:141_11: viya vāyunā gacchati. Apica gantukāmatā eva ettha pamāṇaṃ. “Sati hi gantukāmatāya”
anya-e0102n:141_12: evaṃ katacittādhiṭṭhāno adhiṭṭhānavegukkhittova so issāsakhittasaro viya dissamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n:142_0: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetīti kāyaṃ gahetvā citte āropeti. Cittānugatikaṃ karoti
anya-e0102n:142_1: sīghagamanaṃ. Cittagamanaṃ hi sīghaṃ hoti. Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti
anya-e0102n:142_2: rūpakāyārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti. Sesaṃ
anya-e0102n:142_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ pana cittagamanameva hoti. Evaṃ adissamānena kāyena
anya-e0102n:142_4: gacchanto panāyaṃ kiṃ tassa adhiṭṭhānacittassa uppādakkhaṇe gacchati, udāhu ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:142_5: bhaṅgakkhaṇe vāti vutte tīsupi khaṇesu gacchatīti thero āha. Kiṃ pana so sayaṃ gacchati
anya-e0102n:142_6: nimmitaṃ pesetīti. Yathāruci karoti. Idha panassa sayaṃ gamanameva āgataṃ.
anya-e0102n:143_0: Manomayanti adhiṭṭhānamanena nimmitattā manomayaṃ. Ahīnindriyanti idaṃ cakkhusotādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:143_1: saṇṭhānavasena vuttaṃ. Nimmitarūpe pana pasādo nāma natthi. Sace iddhimā caṅkamati
anya-e0102n:143_2: nimmitopi tattha caṅkamatītiādi sabbaṃ sāvakanimmitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Buddhanimmito
anya-e0102n:143_3: pana yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā karoti, taṃ tampi karoti. Bhagavato rucivasena aññampi karotīti.
anya-e0102n:143_4: Ettha ca yaṃ so iddhimā idheva ṭhito dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:143_5: saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena cittaṃ pajānāti, na ettāvatā kāyena vasaṃ vatteti.
anya-e0102n:143_6: Yampi so idheva ṭhito tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:143_7: ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṃ vatteti. Yampissa dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātītiādikaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:143_8: ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṃ vatteti. Yampi so dissamānena vā adissamānena vā kāyena
anya-e0102n:143_9: brahmalokaṃ gacchati, ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṃ vatteti. Yañca kho so tassa brahmuno
anya-e0102n:143_10: purato rūpaṃ abhinimminātītiādinā nayena vuttavidhānaṃ āpajjati, ettāvatā kāyena
anya-e0102n:143_11: vasaṃ vatteti nāmaṃ. Sesaṃ panettha kāyena vasaṃ vattanāya pubbabhāgadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:144_0: 398. Vikubbanāya pana manomayāya ca idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ. Vikubbanaṃ tāva karontena “so
anya-e0102n:144_1: pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:144_2: vā dasseti, asuravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, devavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti,
anya-e0102n:144_3: brahmavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, samuddavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, pabbatavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, sīhavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:144_4: vā dasseti, byagghavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, dīpivaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, hatthimpi dasseti, assampi
anya-e0102n:144_5: dasseti, rathampi dasseti, pattimpi dasseti, vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:144_6: vuttesu kumārakavaṇṇādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhahantena
anya-e0102n:144_7: ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato abhiññāpādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya attano kumārakavaṇṇo
anya-e0102n:144_8: āvajjitabbo. Āvajjitvā parikammāvasāne puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya evarūpo nāma kumārako
anya-e0102n:144_9: homīti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena kumārako hoti devadatto viya. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0102n:145_0: Hatthimpi dassetītiādi panettha bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0102n:145_1: hatthī homīti anadhiṭṭhahitvā hatthī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, assādīsupi eseva nayoti.
anya-e0102n:146_0: 399. Manomayaṃ kātukāmo pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāyaṃ tāva āvajjitvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:146_1: susiro hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, susiro hoti. Athassa abbhantare aññaṃ kāyaṃ āvajjitvā parikammaṃ
anya-e0102n:146_2: katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti, tassa abbhantare añño kāyo hotūti. So taṃ muñjamhā
anya-e0102n:146_3: īsikaṃ viya kosiyā asiṃ viya karaṇḍāya ahiṃ viya ca abbāhati. Tena vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n:146_4: imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:146_5: Seyyathāpi puriso muñjamhā īsikaṃ pavāheyya, tassa evamassa ayaṃ muñjo ayaṃ īsikā,
anya-e0102n:146_6: añño muñjo aññā īsikā, muñjamhātveva īsikā pavāḷhā”tiādi. Ettha ca yathā īsikādayo
anya-e0102n:146_7: muñjādīhi sadisā honti, evaṃ manomayarūpaṃ iddhimatāsadisameva hotīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:146_8: etā upamā vuttāti. Ayaṃ manomayā iddhi.
anya-e0102n:152_0: 400. Idāni dibbasotadhātuyā niddesakkamo anuppatto. Tattha tato parāsu ca tīsu abhiññāsu
anya-e0102n:152_1: so evaṃ samāhite cittetiādīnaṃ attho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sabbattha pana visesamattameva
anya-e0102n:152_2: vaṇṇayissāma. Tatra dibbāya sotadhātuyāti ettha dibbasadisattā dibbā. Devānaṃ hi
anya-e0102n:152_4: ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanasamatthā dibbapasādasotadhātu hoti. Ayañcāpi imassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0102n:152_5: vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā ñāṇasotadhātu tādisāyevāti dibbasadisattā dibbā. Apica
anya-e0102n:152_6: dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā. Savanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:152_7: nijjīvaṭṭhena ca sotadhātu. Sotadhātukiccakaraṇena ca sotadhātu viyātipi sotadhātu.
anya-e0102n:153_0: Visuddhāyāti parisuddhāya nirupakkilesāya. Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0102n:153_1: saddasavanena mānusikaṃ maṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkantāya vītivattitvā ṭhitāya. Ubho sadde
anya-e0102n:153_2: suṇātīti dve sadde suṇāti. Katame dve? Dibbe ca mānuse ca, devānañca manussānañca
anya-e0102n:153_3: saddeti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena padesapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ye dūre santike cāti ye
anya-e0102n:153_4: saddā dūre paracakkavāḷepi ye ca santike antamaso sadehasannissitapāṇakasaddāpi,
anya-e0102n:153_5: te suṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena nippadesapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:154_0: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ uppādetabbāti? Tena bhikkhunā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:154_1: parikammasamādhicittena paṭhamataraṃ pakatisotapathe dūre oḷāriko araññe sīhādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:154_2: saddo āvajjitabbo. Vihāre ghaṇḍisaddo, bherisaddo, saṅkhasaddo, sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0102n:154_3: sabbathāmena sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyanasaddo, pakatikathaṃ kathentānaṃ “kiṃ bhante,
anya-e0102n:154_4: kimāvuso”tiādisaddo, sakuṇasaddo, vātasaddo, padasaddo, pakkuthitaudakassa cicciṭāyanasaddo,
anya-e0102n:154_5: ātape sussamānatālapaṇṇasaddo, kunthakipillikādisaddoti evaṃ sabboḷārikato pabhuti
anya-e0102n:154_6: yathākkamena sukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā. Tena puratthimāya disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:154_7: manasikātabbaṃ. Pacchimāya, uttarāya, dakkhiṇāya, heṭṭhimāya, uparimāya disāya, puratthimāya
anya-e0102n:154_8: anudisāya, pacchimāya, uttarāya, dakkhiṇāya anudisāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:154_9: Oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. Tassa te saddā pākatikacittassāpi
anya-e0102n:154_10: pākaṭā honti. Parikammasamādhicittassa pana ativiya pākaṭā.
anya-e0102n:155_0: Tassevaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikaroto idāni dibbasotadhātu uppajjissatīti tesu saddesu
anya-e0102n:155_1: aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati. Tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri pañca
anya-e0102n:155_2: vā javanāni javanti, yesaṃ purimāni tīṇi cattāri vā parikammaupacārānulomagotrabhunāmakāni
anya-e0102n:155_3: kāmāvacarāni, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0102n:155_4: yaṃ tena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ayaṃ dibbasotadhātūti veditabbā. Tato
anya-e0102n:155_5: paraṃ tasmiṃ sote patito hoti. Taṃ thāmajātaṃ karontena “etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmī”ti
anya-e0102n:155_7: yāva cakkavāḷaṃ tato vā bhiyyopi paricchinditvā paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:156_0: Evaṃ adhigatābhiñño esa pādakajjhānārammaṇena phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragatepi sadde puna
anya-e0102n:156_1: pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi abhiññāñāṇena suṇātiyeva. Evaṃ suṇanto ca sacepi yāva
anya-e0102n:156_2: brahmalokā saṅkhabheripaṇavādisaddehi ekakolāhalaṃ hoti, pāṭiyekkaṃ vavatthapetukāmatāya
anya-e0102n:156_3: sati ayaṃ saṅkhasaddo ayaṃ bherisaddoti vavatthapetuṃ sakkotiyevāti.
anya-e0102n:159_0: 401. Cetopariyañāṇakathāya cetopariyañāṇāyāti ettha pariyātīti pariyaṃ, paricchindatīti
anya-e0102n:159_1: attho. Cetaso pariyaṃ cetopariyaṃ. Cetopariyañca taṃ ñāṇañcāti cetopariyañāṇaṃ. Tadatthāyāti
anya-e0102n:159_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Parasattānanti attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti idampi
anya-e0102n:159_3: iminā ekatthameva. Veneyyavasena pana desanāvilāsena ca byañjananānattaṃ kataṃ. Cetasā
anya-e0102n:159_4: cetoti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ. Paricca pajānātīti paricchinditvā sarāgādivasena
anya-e0102n:160_0: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādetabbanti? Etañhi dibbacakkhuvasena ijjhati, taṃ etassa
anya-e0102n:160_1: parikammaṃ. Tasmā tena bhikkhunā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:160_2: nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇaṃ passitvā cittaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ. Yadā hi somanassacittaṃ
anya-e0102n:160_3: vattati, tadā rattaṃ nigrodhapakkasadisaṃ hoti. Yadā domanassacittaṃ vattati, tadā
anya-e0102n:160_4: kāḷakaṃ jambupakkasadisaṃ. Yadā upekkhācittaṃ vattati, tadā pasannatilatelasadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:160_5: Tasmā tena “idaṃ rūpaṃ somanassindriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ domanassindriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:160_6: idaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhāna”nti parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā cittaṃ pariyesantena
anya-e0102n:160_7: cetopariyañāṇaṃ thāmagataṃ kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ thāmagate hi tasmiṃ anukkamena sabbampi
anya-e0102n:160_8: kāmāvacaracittaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaracittañca pajānāti cittā cittameva saṅkamanto
anya-e0102n:160_9: vināpi hadayarūpadassanena. Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āruppe parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo
anya-e0102n:160_10: kassa hadayarūpaṃ passati, kassindriyavikāraṃ oloketīti? Na kassaci. Iddhimato visayo
anya-e0102n:160_11: esa yadidaṃ yattha katthaci cittaṃ āvajjanto soḷasappabhedaṃ cittaṃ jānāti. Akatābhinivesassa
anya-e0102n:161_0: Sarāgaṃ vā cittantiādīsu pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhasahagataṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti
anya-e0102n:161_1: veditabbaṃ. Avasesaṃ catubhūmakaṃ kusalābyākataṃ cittaṃ vītarāgaṃ. Dve domanassacittāni
anya-e0102n:161_2: dve vicikicchuddhaccacittānīti imāni pana cattāri cittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na
anya-e0102n:161_3: gacchanti. Keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhanti. Duvidhaṃ pana domanassacittaṃ sadosaṃ
anya-e0102n:161_4: cittaṃ nāma. Sabbampi catubhūmakaṃ kusalābyākataṃ vītadosaṃ. Sesāni dasākusalacittāni
anya-e0102n:161_5: imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti. Keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhanti.
anya-e0102n:162_0: Samohaṃ vītamohanti ettha pana pāṭipuggalikanayena vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayameva
anya-e0102n:162_1: samohaṃ, mohassa pana sabbākusalesu sambhavato dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ samohaṃ
anya-e0102n:162_2: cittanti veditabbaṃ. Avasesaṃ vītamohaṃ. Thinamiddhānugataṃ pana saṃkhittaṃ. Uddhaccānugataṃ
anya-e0102n:162_3: vikkhittaṃ. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ mahaggataṃ. Avasesaṃ amahaggataṃ. Sabbampi tebhūmakaṃ
anya-e0102n:162_4: sauttaraṃ. Lokuttaraṃ anuttaraṃ. Upacārappattaṃ appanāppattañca samāhitaṃ. Ubhayamappattaṃ
anya-e0102n:162_6: Pañcavidhampi etaṃ vimuttimappattaṃ avimuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iti cetopariyañāṇalābhī
anya-e0102n:162_7: bhikkhu sabbappakārampi idaṃ sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ…pe… avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ avimuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:165_1: yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tadatthāya. Pubbenivāsoti pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthakkhandhā. Nivutthāti
anya-e0102n:165_2: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā. Nivutthadhammā vā. Nivutthāti
anya-e0102n:165_3: gocaranivāsena nivutthā attano viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā, paraviññāṇaviññātāpi
anya-e0102n:165_4: vā chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu, te buddhānaṃyeva labbhanti. Pubbenivāsānussatīti
anya-e0102n:165_5: yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, sā pubbenivāsānussati. Ñāṇanti tāya satiyā sampayuttañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:165_6: Evamimassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa atthāya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya etassa ñāṇassa
anya-e0102n:166_0: Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇitanti attho.
anya-e0102n:166_1: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ. Anussaratīti
anya-e0102n:166_2: khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā sarati. Imañhi
anya-e0102n:166_3: pubbenivāsaṃ cha janā anussaranti – titthiyā, pakatisāvakā, mahāsāvakā, aggasāvakā,
anya-e0102n:167_0: Tattha titthiyā cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussaranti, na tato paraṃ. Kasmā, dubbalapaññattā.
anya-e0102n:167_1: Tesañhi nāmarūpaparicchedavirahitattā dubbalā paññā hoti. Pakatisāvakā kappasatampi
anya-e0102n:167_3: anussaranti. Dve aggasāvakā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ satasahassañca. Paccekabuddhā dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
anya-e0102n:167_4: satasahassañca. Ettako hi etesaṃ abhinīhāro. Buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:168_0: Titthiyā ca khandhapaṭipāṭimeva saranti, paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena
anya-e0102n:168_1: sarituṃ na sakkonti. Tesañhi andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ natthi. Yathā pana
anya-e0102n:168_2: andhā yaṭṭhiṃ amuñcitvāva gacchanti, evaṃ te khandhānaṃ paṭipāṭiṃ amuñcitvāva saranti.
anya-e0102n:168_3: Pakatisāvakā khandhapaṭipāṭiyāpi anussaranti cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamanti. Tathā
anya-e0102n:168_4: asītimahāsāvakā. Dvinnaṃ pana aggasāvakānaṃ khandhapaṭipāṭikiccaṃ natthi. Ekassa
anya-e0102n:168_5: attabhāvassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti, puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti
anya-e0102n:168_6: evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivaseneva saṅkamantā gacchanti. Tathā paccekabuddhā.
anya-e0102n:169_0: Buddhānaṃ pana neva khandhapaṭipāṭikiccaṃ, na cutipaṭisandhivasena saṅkamanakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:169_1: atthi. Tesañhi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchanti, taṃ
anya-e0102n:169_2: taṃ pākaṭameva hoti. Tasmā anekāpi kappakoṭiyo peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṃkhipitvā yaṃ
anya-e0102n:169_3: yaṃ icchanti, tatra tatreva okkamantā sīhokkantavasena gacchanti. Evaṃ gacchantānañca
anya-e0102n:169_4: nesaṃ ñāṇaṃ yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayassa sarabhaṅgasadisassa dhanuggahassa
anya-e0102n:169_5: khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva patati, na sajjati, na virajjhati,
anya-e0102n:169_6: evaṃ antarantarāsu jātīsu na sajjati, na virajjhati, asajjamānaṃ avirajjhamānaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃyeva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:170_0: Imesu ca pana pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇasattesu titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsadassanaṃ khajjupanakapabhāsadisaṃ
anya-e0102n:170_1: hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Pakatisāvakānaṃ dīpappabhāsadisaṃ. Mahāsāvakānaṃ ukkāpabhāsadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:171_0: Titthiyānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya hoti. Pakatisāvakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:171_1: daṇḍakasetugamanaṃ viya. Mahāsāvakānaṃ jaṅghasetugamanaṃ viya. Aggasāvakānaṃ sakaṭasetugamanaṃ
anya-e0102n:171_2: viya. Paccekabuddhānaṃ mahājaṅghamaggagamanaṃ viya. Buddhānaṃ mahāsakaṭamaggagamanaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:172: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “anussaratīti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā saratī”ti.
anya-e0102n:173_0: 403. Tasmā evamanussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
anya-e0102n:173_1: rahogatena paṭisallinena paṭipāṭiyā cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānato
anya-e0102n:173_2: vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchimā nisajjā āvajjitabbā. Tato āsanapaññāpanaṃ, senāsanappavesanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:173_3: pattacīvarapaṭisāmanaṃ, bhojanakālo, gāmato āgamanakālo, gāme piṇḍāya caritakālo,
anya-e0102n:173_4: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakālo, vihārato nikkhamanakālo, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavandanakālo,
anya-e0102n:173_5: pattadhovanakālo, pattapaṭiggahaṇakālo, pattapaṭiggahaṇato yāva mukhadhovanā katakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:173_6: paccūsakāle katakiccaṃ, majjhimayāme katakiccaṃ, paṭhamayāme katakiccanti evaṃ paṭilomakkamena
anya-e0102n:173_7: sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Ettakaṃ pana pakaticittassapi pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0102n:174_0: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti, puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:174_1: Ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti. Evaṃ paṭilomakkameneva dutiyadivasepi tatiyacatutthapañcamadivasepi
anya-e0102n:174_2: dasāhepi aḍḍhamāsepi māsepi yāva saṃvaccharāpi katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Eteneva upāyena
