anya-e0102n:174_3: dasavassāni vīsativassānīti yāva imasmiṃ bhave attano paṭisandhi, tāva āvajjantena
anya-e0102n:174_4: purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Pahoti hi paṇḍito bhikkhu
anya-e0102n:174_5: paṭhamavāreneva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpamārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ.
anya-e0102n:175_0: Yasmā pana purimabhave nāmarūpaṃ asesaṃ niruddhaṃ aññaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:175_1: āhundarikaṃ andhatamamiva hoti duddasaṃ duppaññena. Tenāpi “na sakkomahaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0102n:175_2: ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpamārammaṇaṃ kātu”nti dhuranikkhepo na kātabbo.
anya-e0102n:175_3: Tadeva pana pādakajjhānaṃ punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. Tato ca vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhāya taṃ
anya-e0102n:176_0: Evaṃ karonto hi seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso kūṭāgārakaṇṇikatthāya mahārukkhaṃ chindanto
anya-e0102n:176_1: sākhāpalāsacchedanamatteneva pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahārukkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontopi
anya-e0102n:176_2: dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvāva kammārasālaṃ gantvā tikhiṇaṃ pharasuṃ kārāpetvā puna āgantvā
anya-e0102n:176_3: chindeyya, puna vipannāya ca punapi tatheva kāretvā chindeyya. So evaṃ chindanto
anya-e0102n:176_4: chinnassa chinnassa puna chetabbābhāvato acchinnassa ca chedanato nacirasseva mahārukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:176_5: pāteyya, evamevaṃ pādakajjhānā vuṭṭhāya pubbe āvajjitaṃ anāvajjitvā paṭisandhimeva
anya-e0102n:176_6: āvajjanto nacirasseva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:177_0: Tattha pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:177_1: pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ nāma na hoti. Taṃ pana parikammasamādhiñāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Atītaṃsañāṇantipi
anya-e0102n:177_2: eke vadanti. Taṃ rūpāvacaraṃ sandhāya na yujjati. Yadā panassa bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0102n:177_3: atikkamma cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:177_4: tasmiñca niruddhe tadevārammaṇaṃ katvā cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti. Sesaṃ pubbe
anya-e0102n:177_5: vuttanayeneva purimāni parikammādināmakāni kāmāvacarāni honti. Pacchimaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0102n:177_6: catutthajjhānikaṃ appanācittaṃ. Tadāssa yaṃ tena cittena saha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ
anya-e0102n:177_7: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāma. Tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ
anya-e0102n:177_8: anussarati. Seyyathidaṃ, ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo…pe… iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ
anya-e0102n:178_0: 404. Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0102n:178_1: khandhasantānaṃ. Esa nayo dvepi jātiyotiādīsupi. Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana
anya-e0102n:178_2: parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo, vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappoti veditabbo. Tattha saṃvaṭṭena
anya-e0102n:178_3: saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti, taṃmūlakattā. Vivaṭṭena ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, evañhi sati
anya-e0102n:178_4: yāni tāni “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Saṃvaṭṭo,
anya-e0102n:178_5: saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuttāni, tāni pariggahitāni honti.
anya-e0102n:179: Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā – āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā – ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti.
anya-e0102n:180_0: Yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati,
anya-e0102n:180_1: subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati. Yadā vāyunā saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā
anya-e0102n:180_2: vātena viddhaṃsati. Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakhettaṃ vinassati.
anya-e0102n:181_0: Buddhakhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti – jātikhettaṃ, āṇākhettaṃ, visayakhettañca. Tattha
anya-e0102n:181_1: jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti. Yaṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhigahaṇādīsu
anya-e0102n:181_2: kampati. Āṇākhettaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ, yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ
anya-e0102n:181_3: dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati.
anya-e0102n:181_4: Visayakhettaṃ anantamaparimāṇaṃ. Yaṃ “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ, yattha
anya-e0102n:181_5: yaṃ yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ jānāti. Evametesu tīsu buddhakhettesu ekaṃ āṇākhettaṃ
anya-e0102n:181_6: vinassati. Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikhettampi vinaṭṭhameva hoti. Vinassantañca
anya-e0102n:181_7: ekatova vinassati, saṇṭhahantampi ekato saṇṭhahati. Tassevaṃ vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:182_0: 405. Yasmiṃ hi samaye kappo agginā nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0102n:182_1: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekaṃ mahāvassaṃ vassati. Manussā tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā sabbabījāni
anya-e0102n:182_2: nīharitvā vapanti. Sassesu pana gokhāyitakamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi
anya-e0102n:182_3: na vassati, tadā pacchinnaṃ pacchinnameva vassaṃ hoti. Idaṃ sandhāya hi bhagavatā
anya-e0102n:182_4: “hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṃ bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni
anya-e0102n:182_5: bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassatī”ti vuttaṃ. Vassūpajīvino sattā kālaṅkatvā
anya-e0102n:182_6: brahmaloke nibbattanti, pupphaphalūpajīviniyo ca devatā. Evaṃ dīghe addhāne vītivatte
anya-e0102n:182_7: tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati, athānupubbena macchakacchapāpi kālaṅkatvā
anya-e0102n:182_8: brahmaloke nibbattanti, nerayikasattāpi. Tattha nerayikā sattamasūriyapātubhāve vinassantīti eke.
anya-e0102n:183_0: Jhānaṃ vinā natthi brahmaloke nibbatti, etesañca keci dubbhikkhapīḷitā keci abhabbā
anya-e0102n:183_1: jhānādhigamāya, te kathaṃ tattha nibbattantīti. Devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena.
anya-e0102n:183_2: Tadā hi “vassasatasahassassaccayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā
anya-e0102n:183_3: muttasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya
anya-e0102n:183_4: virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā ito vassasatasahassassaccayena
anya-e0102n:183_5: kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati, ayaṃ loko vinassissati, mahāsamuddopi ussussissati, ayañca
anya-e0102n:183_6: mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uddayhissanti vinassissanti. Yāva brahmalokā lokavināso
anya-e0102n:183_7: bhavissati. Mettaṃ mārisā bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ mārisā bhāvetha, mātaraṃ
anya-e0102n:183_8: upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti.
anya-e0102n:184_0: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:184_1: muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti. Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ
anya-e0102n:184_2: bhuñjitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Tadaññe pana aparāpariyavedanīyena
anya-e0102n:184_3: kammena devaloke nibbattanti. Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaramāno
anya-e0102n:184_4: satto nāma natthi. Tepi tattha tatheva jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
anya-e0102n:185_0: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:185_1: Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā “hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo”ti sattasūriyaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:185_2: Pātubhūte ca pana tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divāparicchedo paññāyati. Eko sūriyo
anya-e0102n:185_3: uṭṭheti, eko atthaṃ gacchati. Avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti. Yathā ca pakatisūriye
anya-e0102n:185_4: sūriyadevaputto hoti, evaṃ kappavināsakasūriye natthi. Tattha pakatisūriye vattamāne
anya-e0102n:185_5: ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi caranti. Kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ
anya-e0102n:185_6: ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti. Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
anya-e0102n:186: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
anya-e0102n:187_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā himavati
anya-e0102n:187_1: mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā “sīhapapāto haṃsapātano kaṇṇamuṇḍako rathakāradaho anotattadaho
anya-e0102n:187_2: chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho”ti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti.
anya-e0102n:188: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:189_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
anya-e0102n:189_1: ekadhūmaṃ hoti. Pariyādiṇṇasinehaṃ dhūmena. Yathā cidaṃ, evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānipi.
anya-e0102n:190_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
anya-e0102n:190_1: ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi. Yojanasatikādibhedāni sinerukūṭānipi
anya-e0102n:190_2: palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sā aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:190_3: Tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānamaṇivimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gaṇhāti. Eteneva
anya-e0102n:190_4: upāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmiṃ gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare
anya-e0102n:190_5: āhacca tiṭṭhati. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na nibbāyati. Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā
anya-e0102n:190_6: pana sappitelajhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati. Heṭṭhāākāsena
anya-e0102n:191_0: 406. Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ
anya-e0102n:191_2: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati. Taṃ udakaṃ
anya-e0102n:191_3: heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti parivaṭumaṃ paduminipatte udakabindusadisaṃ.
anya-e0102n:191_4: Kathaṃ tāva mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce? Vivarasampadānato. Tañhissa tamhi
anya-e0102n:191_5: tamhi vivaraṃ deti. Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:191_6: anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇe otiṇṇe udake brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmalokā, upari
anya-e0102n:192_0: Purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana balavavātā uppajjanti. Te taṃ pihitadvāre dhamakaraṇe
anya-e0102n:192_1: ṭhitaudakamiva nirassāsaṃ katvā rundhanti. Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari
anya-e0102n:192_2: rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:193_0: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā
anya-e0102n:193_1: vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti. Te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā. Te aggaññasutte
anya-e0102n:193_2: vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
anya-e0102n:193_3: Atha nesaṃ sayaṃpabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro hoti. Te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti.
anya-e0102n:194_0: Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0102n:194_1: pātubhavati, te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ
anya-e0102n:194_2: bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā “sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
anya-e0102n:195_0: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate yampi ālokaṃ labhimhā, sopi no naṭṭhoti
anya-e0102n:195_1: puna bhītā honti. Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhu vatassa sace aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
anya-e0102n:195_2: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā
anya-e0102n:195_3: bhiyyoso mattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando
anya-e0102n:195_4: hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti. Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni
anya-e0102n:196_0: Tato pabhuti rattindivā paññāyanti, anukkamena ca māsaddhamāsautusaṃvaccharā. Candimasūriyānaṃ
anya-e0102n:196_1: pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā pātubhavanti. Te ca kho
anya-e0102n:196_2: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma kaṅgubhatte
anya-e0102n:196_3: paccamāne ekappahāreneva pupphuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti. Eke padesā thūpathūpā honti, eke
anya-e0102n:196_4: ninnaninnā, eke samasamā. Evamevaṃ thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti, ninnaninnaṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n:197_0: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kamena ekacce vaṇṇavanto, ekacce
anya-e0102n:197_1: dubbaṇṇā honti. Tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti. Tesaṃ atimānapaccayā sāpi
anya-e0102n:197_2: rasapathavī antaradhāyati. Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati. Atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi
anya-e0102n:197_3: antaradhāyati. Padālatā pātubhavati. Teneva nayena sāpi antaradhāyati. Akaṭṭhapāko
anya-e0102n:197_4: sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e0102n:198_0: Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni uppajjanti. Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e0102n:198_1: sayameva jālasikhā uṭṭhahitvā taṃ pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na
anya-e0102n:198_2: tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi. Yaṃ yaṃ rasaṃ bhuñjitukāmā honti,
anya-e0102n:198_3: taṃ taṃ rasova hoti. Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ
anya-e0102n:198_4: sañjāyati. Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti, purisassa purisabhāvo,
anya-e0102n:199_0: Tatra sudaṃ itthī purisaṃ, puriso ca itthiṃ ativelaṃ upanijjhāyati. Tesaṃ ativelaṃ
anya-e0102n:199_1: upanijjhāyanapaccayā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati. Tato methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanti. Te
anya-e0102n:199_2: asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa
anya-e0102n:199_3: paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti. Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa
anya-e0102n:199_4: alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti. Tato pabhuti kaṇopi
anya-e0102n:199_5: thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhati, lāyitaṭṭhānampi na paṭivirūhati.
anya-e0102n:200_0: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā, mayaṃ hi
anya-e0102n:200_1: pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti aggaññasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Tato mariyādaṃ
anya-e0102n:200_2: ṭhapenti. Atha aññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati. Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsetvā
anya-e0102n:200_3: tatiyavāre pāṇileṭṭudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṃ adinnādānagarahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu
anya-e0102n:200_4: uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti “yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma, yo no
anya-e0102n:200_5: sammā khīyitabbaṃ khīyeyya, garahitabbaṃ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṃ pabbājeyya, mayaṃ
anya-e0102n:201_0: Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto
anya-e0102n:201_1: tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno
anya-e0102n:201_2: paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ. Te taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammanniṃsu. So tena
anya-e0102n:201_3: mahājanena sammatoti mahāsammato, khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyo, dhammena samena
anya-e0102n:201_4: pare rañjetīti rājāti tīhi nāmehi paññāyittha. Yañhi loke acchariyaṭṭhānaṃ, bodhisattova
anya-e0102n:201_5: tattha ādipurisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena
anya-e0102n:202: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālupacchedo, idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:203: Kappavināsakajālupacchedato yāva koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparipūrako sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:204: Sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ tatiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:205_0: Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho, idaṃ catutthaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
anya-e0102n:205_1: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ tāva
anya-e0102n:206_0: 407. Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvāti
anya-e0102n:206_1: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso, yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e0102n:206_2: evamidha kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti. So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto
anya-e0102n:206_3: anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati. Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
anya-e0102n:206_4: pathavīpabbatādayo vilīyanti, udakaṃ samantato vātehi dhāriyati. Pathavito yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ
anya-e0102n:206_5: udakaṃ gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:206_6: Taṃ yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na vūpasammati. Udakānugataṃ pana
anya-e0102n:206_7: sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati antaradhānaṃ gacchati. Heṭṭhāākāsena
anya-e0102n:206_8: saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ
anya-e0102n:206_9: ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati. Subhakiṇhato ca cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:207_0: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakudakūpacchedo, idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:207_1: Udakūpacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Sampattimahāmeghato…pe…
anya-e0102n:207_2: imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:208_0: 408. Yasmiṃ samaye kappo vātena vinassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvāti
anya-e0102n:208_1: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso, yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e0102n:208_2: evamidha kappavināsanatthaṃ vāto samuṭṭhāti. So paṭhamaṃ thūlarajaṃ uṭṭhāpeti. Tato
anya-e0102n:208_3: saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe
anya-e0102n:208_4: visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti. Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na ca puna patanti.
anya-e0102n:209_0: Athānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlaṃ
anya-e0102n:209_2: bhijjitvā vātavegena khittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Cakkavāḷapabbatampi
anya-e0102n:209_3: sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati. Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
anya-e0102n:209_4: hutvā vinassanti. Eteneva upāyena bhummaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca
anya-e0102n:209_5: vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti. Tattha
anya-e0102n:209_6: cakkavāḷā cakkavāḷehi himavantā himavantehi sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā
anya-e0102n:209_7: cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti. Pathavito yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmiṃ vāto gaṇhāti. Tattha
anya-e0102n:209_8: tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ
anya-e0102n:209_9: vināsetvā sayampi vinassati. Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti
anya-e0102n:209_10: sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:209_11: Vehapphalato ca cavitvā subhakiṇhaṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n:210_0: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakavātūpacchedo, idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:210_1: Vātūpacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ…pe… imāni cattāri
anya-e0102n:210_2: asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:211_0: 409. Kiṃkāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassati? Akusalamūlakāraṇā. Akusalamūlesu hi ussannesu
anya-e0102n:211_1: evaṃ loko vinassati. So ca kho rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati. Dose ussannatare
anya-e0102n:211_2: udakena vinassati. Keci pana dose ussannatare agginā. Rāge ussannatare udakenāti
anya-e0102n:211_3: vadanti. Mohe ussannatare vātena vinassati. Evaṃ vinassantopi ca nirantarameva sattavāre
anya-e0102n:211_4: agginā vinassati. Aṭṭhame vāre udakena. Puna sattavāre agginā. Aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti
anya-e0102n:211_5: evaṃ aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre vinassanto sattakkhattuṃ udakena vinassitvā puna sattavāre
anya-e0102n:211_6: agginā nassati. Ettāvatā tesaṭṭhi kappā atītā honti. Etthantare udakena nassanavāraṃ
anya-e0102n:211_7: sampattampi paṭibāhitvā laddhokāso vāto paripuṇṇacatusaṭṭhikappāyuke subhakiṇhe viddhaṃsento lokaṃ vināseti.
anya-e0102n:212_0: 410. Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopi ca kappānussaraṇako bhikkhu etesu kappesu anekepi
anya-e0102n:212_1: saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe anussarati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:213_0: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā
anya-e0102n:213_1: viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā āsiṃ. Evaṃnāmoti tisso vā phusso vā.
anya-e0102n:213_2: Evaṃgottoti kaccāno vā kassapo vā. Idamassa atītabhave attano nāmagottānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0102n:213_3: vuttaṃ. Sace pana tasmiṃ kāle attano vaṇṇasampattiṃ vā lūkhapaṇītajīvikabhāvaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:213_4: sukhadukkhabahulataṃ vā appāyukadīghāyukabhāvaṃ vā anussaritukāmo hoti, tampi anussaratiyeva.
anya-e0102n:214_0: Tattha evaṃvaṇṇoti odāto vā sāmo vā. Evamāhāroti sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā pavattaphalabhojano
anya-e0102n:214_1: vā. Evaṃ sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ
anya-e0102n:214_2: vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī. Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto
anya-e0102n:214_3: vā caturāsītikappasatasahassāyupariyanto vā. So tato cuto amutra udapādinti sohaṃ
anya-e0102n:214_4: tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto puna
anya-e0102n:214_5: amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
anya-e0102n:214_6: Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye
anya-e0102n:215_0: Apica yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ. So
anya-e0102n:215_1: tato cutoti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, tasmā “idhūpapanno”ti imissā idhūpapattiyā
anya-e0102n:215_2: anantaramevassa upapattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “amutra udapādi”nti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:215_3: Tatrāpāsinti evamādi panassa tatra imissā upapattiyā anantare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:215_4: anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. So tato cuto idhūpapannoti svāhaṃ tato anantarūpapattiṭṭhānato
anya-e0102n:215_5: cuto idha asukasmiṃ nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti. Itīti evaṃ.
anya-e0102n:215_6: Sākāraṃ sauddesanti nāmagottavasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ. Nāmagottena
anya-e0102n:215_7: hi satto tisso kassapoti uddisīyati. Vaṇṇādīhi sāmo odātoti nānattato paññāyati.
anya-e0102n:215_8: Tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā. Anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsamanussaratīti idaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
anya-e0102n:218_0: 411. Sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇakathāya cutūpapātañāṇāyāti cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya.
anya-e0102n:218_1: Yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati, tadatthaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇatthanti
anya-e0102n:218_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati ceva
anya-e0102n:218_3: abhininnāmeti ca. Soti so katacittābhinīhāro bhikkhu. Dibbenātiādīsu pana dibbasadisattā
anya-e0102n:218_4: dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya
anya-e0102n:218_5: dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ
anya-e0102n:218_6: ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā
anya-e0102n:218_7: ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ. Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbaṃ. Tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena
anya-e0102n:218_8: mahāgatikattāpi dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:219_0: Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhu. Cutūpapātadassanena
anya-e0102n:219_1: diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddhaṃ. Yo hi cutimattameva passati, na upapātaṃ. So ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0102n:219_2: gaṇhāti. Yo upapātamattameva passati, na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:219_3: Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati. Tasmāssa
anya-e0102n:219_4: taṃdassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti. Ubhayampi cetaṃ buddhaputtā passanti. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:220_0: Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ, mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ
anya-e0102n:220_1: atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ. Tena dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena.
anya-e0102n:220_2: Satte passatīti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi.
anya-e0102n:221_0: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ
anya-e0102n:221_1: na sakkā. Ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti, te cavamānā. Ye ca gahitapaṭisandhikā
anya-e0102n:221_2: sampatinibbattāva, te upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne ca upapajjamāne
anya-e0102n:222_0: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite ohīḷite oññāte
anya-e0102n:222_1: avaññāte. Paṇīteti amohanissandayuttattā tabbiparīte. Suvaṇṇeti adosanissandayuttattā
anya-e0102n:222_3: Anabhirūpe virūpetipi attho. Sugateti sugatigate. Alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe
anya-e0102n:222_4: mahaddhane. Duggateti duggatigate. Lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne.
anya-e0102n:223_0: Yathākammupageti yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena upagate. Tattha purimehi cavamānetiādīhi
anya-e0102n:223_1: dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā pana padena yathākammupagañāṇakiccaṃ. Tassa ca ñāṇassa
anya-e0102n:223_2: ayamuppattikkamo, idha bhikkhu heṭṭhā nirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayike satte
anya-e0102n:223_3: passati mahādukkhamanubhavamāne. Taṃ dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva. So evaṃ manasikaroti
anya-e0102n:223_4: “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī”ti. Athassa idaṃ nāma
anya-e0102n:223_5: katvāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tathā uparidevalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0102n:223_7: Tampi dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva. So evaṃ manasikaroti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:223_8: ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti. Athassa idaṃ nāma katvāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:223_9: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Idaṃ yathākammupagañāṇaṃ nāma. Imassa visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:223_10: yathā cimassa, evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassāpi. Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti.
anya-e0102n:224_0: Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ, duṭṭhaṃ vā caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ.
anya-e0102n:224_1: Kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ, itaresupi eseva
anya-e0102n:224_2: nayo. Samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā. Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:224_3: ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena
anya-e0102n:224_4: vā upavādakā akkosakā garahakāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha natthi imesaṃ samaṇadhammo,
anya-e0102n:224_5: assamaṇā eteti vadanto antimavatthunā upavadati. Natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho
anya-e0102n:224_6: vā maggo vā phalaṃ vātiādīni vadanto guṇaparidhaṃsanavasena upavadatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:224_7: So ca jānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajānaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi ariyūpavādova hoti. Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0102n:224_8: ānantariyasadisaṃ saggāvaraṇañca maggāvaraṇañca, satekicchaṃ pana hoti. Tassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:225_0: Aññatarasmiṃ kira gāme eko thero ca daharabhikkhu ca piṇḍāya caranti. Te paṭhamaghareyeva
anya-e0102n:225_1: uḷuṅkamattaṃ uṇhayāguṃ labhiṃsu. Therassa ca kucchivāto rujjhati. So cintesi “ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:225_2: yāgu mayhaṃ sappāyā, yāva na sītalā hoti, tāva naṃ pivāmī”ti. So manussehi ummāratthāya
anya-e0102n:225_3: āhaṭe dārukhaṇḍe nisīditvā pivi. Itaro taṃ jigucchanto “atikhuddābhibhūto mahallako,
anya-e0102n:225_4: amhākaṃ lajjitabbakaṃ akāsī”ti āha. Thero gāme caritvā vihāraṃ gantvā daharabhikkhuṃ
anya-e0102n:225_5: āha “atthi te, āvuso, imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti? Āma, bhante, sotāpanno ahanti.
anya-e0102n:225_6: Tena hāvuso, uparimaggatthāya vāyāmaṃ mā akāsi. Khīṇāsavo tayā upavaditoti. So taṃ
anya-e0102n:225_7: khamāpesi. Tenassa taṃ kammaṃ pākatikaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0102n:226_0: Tasmā yo aññopi ariyaṃ upavadati, tena gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti, ukkuṭikaṃ
anya-e0102n:226_1: nisīditvā “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me khamāhī”ti khamāpetabbo. Sace
anya-e0102n:226_2: navakataro hoti, vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhe
anya-e0102n:226_3: idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me khamathā”ti khamāpetabbo. Sace disāpakkanto hoti, sayaṃ
anya-e0102n:226_4: vā gantvā saddhivihārikādike vā pesetvā khamāpetabbo.
anya-e0102n:227_0: Sace ca nāpi gantuṃ, na pesetuṃ sakkā hoti, ye tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū vasanti, tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:227_1: santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, sace vuḍḍhatarā, vuḍḍhe
anya-e0102n:227_2: vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ,
anya-e0102n:227_3: khamatu me so āyasmā”ti vatvā khamāpetabbaṃ. Sammukhā akhamantepi etadeva kattabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:228_0: Sace ekacārikabhikkhu hoti, nevassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, na gataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati, ekassa
anya-e0102n:228_1: paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca
anya-e0102n:228_2: avacaṃ, taṃ me anussarato vippaṭisāro hoti, kiṃ karomī”ti vattabbaṃ. So vakkhati
anya-e0102n:228_3: “tumhe mā cintayittha, thero tumhākaṃ khamati, cittaṃ vūpasamethā”ti. Tenāpi ariyassa
anya-e0102n:228_4: gatadisābhimukhena añjaliṃ paggahetvā khamatūti vattabbaṃ. Sace so parinibbuto hoti,
anya-e0102n:228_5: parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yāvasivathikaṃ gantvāpi khamāpetabbaṃ. Evaṃ kate neva
anya-e0102n:228_6: saggāvaraṇaṃ, na maggāvaraṇaṃ hoti, pākatikameva hotīti.
anya-e0102n:229_1: samādinnanānāvidhakammā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
anya-e0102n:229_2: Ettha ca vacīduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavāde manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0102n:229_3: saṅgahitāyapi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:229_4: Mahāsāvajjo hi ariyūpavādo, ānantariyasadisattā. Vuttampi cetaṃ “seyyathāpi, sāriputta,
anya-e0102n:229_5: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya,
anya-e0102n:229_6: evaṃsampadamidaṃ, sāriputta, vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0102n:229_7: appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto, evaṃ niraye”ti. Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ
anya-e0102n:229_8: nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ
anya-e0102n:229_9: evaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, vajjānī”ti.
anya-e0102n:230_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādiṇṇakkhandhapariccāgā. Parammaraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattikkhandhaggahaṇe.
anya-e0102n:230_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Parammaraṇāti cuticittato uddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:231_0: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā
anya-e0102n:231_1: apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati, dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā
anya-e0102n:231_2: gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti ettha dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto. Vinassantā vā ettha
anya-e0102n:231_3: patanti saṃbhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgātipi vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
anya-e0102n:232_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā,
anya-e0102n:232_1: na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ.
anya-e0102n:232_2: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca, sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā. Na tu vinipāto
anya-e0102n:232_3: asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ. So hi yathāvuttena atthena
anya-e0102n:232_4: apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena
anya-e0102n:232_5: avīciādianekappakāraṃ nirayamevāti. Upapannāti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0102n:233_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso, tattha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. Saggaggahaṇena
anya-e0102n:233_1: devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati. Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo.
anya-e0102n:233_2: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
anya-e0102n:234: “Iti dibbena cakkhunā”tiādi sabbaṃ nigamanavacanaṃ. Evaṃ dibbena cakkhunā…pe… passatīti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
anya-e0102n:235_0: 412. Evaṃ passitukāmena pana ādikammikena kulaputtena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:235_1: sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā “tejokasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇaṃ, ālokakasiṇa”nti imesu
anya-e0102n:235_2: tīsu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ āsannaṃ kātabbaṃ. Upacārajjhānagocaraṃ katvā vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:235_3: Na tattha appanā uppādetabbāti adhippāyo. Sace hi uppādeti, pādakajjhānanissayaṃ
anya-e0102n:235_4: hoti, na parikammanissayaṃ. Imesu ca pana tīsu ālokakasiṇaṃyeva seṭṭhataraṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:235_5: taṃ vā itaresaṃ vā aññataraṃ kasiṇaniddese vuttanayena uppādetvā upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:235_6: ṭhatvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Vaḍḍhanānayopi cassa tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:236_0: Vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānassa antoyeva rūpagataṃ passitabbaṃ. Rūpagataṃ passato panassa parikammassa
anya-e0102n:236_1: vāro atikkamati. Tato āloko antaradhāyati. Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na dissati.
anya-e0102n:236_2: Athānena punappunaṃ pādakajjhānameva pavisitvā tato vuṭṭhāya āloko pharitabbo. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:236_3: anukkamena āloko thāmagato hotīti ettha āloko hotūti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati,
anya-e0102n:236_4: tattha āloko tiṭṭhatiyeva. Divasampi nisīditvā passato rūpadassanaṃ hoti. Rattiṃ
anya-e0102n:237_0: Eko kira rattiṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji. Tassa sā tiṇukkā vijjhāyi. Athassa samavisamāni
anya-e0102n:237_1: na paññāyiṃsu. So taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsitvā tiṇukkā puna ujjālesi. Sā pajjalitvā
anya-e0102n:237_2: purimālokato mahantataraṃ ālokaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena
anya-e0102n:237_3: sūriyo uṭṭhāsi. Sūriye uṭṭhite ukkāya kammaṃ natthīti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:237_4: Tattha ukkāloko viya parikammakāle kasiṇāloko. Ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:237_5: viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:237_6: Ukkāya ghaṃsanaṃ viya punappunaṃ pavesanaṃ. Ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:237_7: viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ. Sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya thāmagatālokassa
anya-e0102n:237_8: yathāparicchedena ṭhānaṃ. Tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya parittālokaṃ
anya-e0102n:238_0: Tattha yadā tassa bhikkhuno maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthagataṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ
anya-e0102n:238_2: ñāṇacakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, maṃsacakkhunā dissamānaṃ viya hoti, tadā dibbacakkhu
anya-e0102n:238_3: uppannaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tadeva cettha rūpadassanasamatthaṃ, na pubbabhāgacittāni.
anya-e0102n:239_0: Taṃ panetaṃ puthujjanassa paribandho hoti. Kasmā? So hi yasmā yattha yattha āloko
anya-e0102n:239_1: hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, taṃ taṃ pathavīsamuddapabbate vinivijjhitvāpi ekālokaṃ hoti, athassa
anya-e0102n:239_2: tattha bhayānakāni yakkharakkhasādirūpāni passato bhayaṃ uppajjati. Yena cittavikkhepaṃ
anya-e0102n:239_3: patvā jhānavibbhantako hoti, tasmā rūpadassane appamattena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:240_0: Tatrāyaṃ dibbacakkhuno uppattikkamo. Vuttappakārametaṃ rūpamārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjane
anya-e0102n:240_1: uppajjitvā niruddhe tadeva rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjantīti
anya-e0102n:240_2: sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi pubbabhāgacittāni savitakkasavicārāni kāmāvacarāni.
anya-e0102n:240_3: Pariyosāne atthasādhakacittaṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ. Tena sahajātaṃ ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:244: Iti pañcakkhandhavidū, pañca abhiññā avoca yā nātho;
anya-e0102n:245: Tā ñatvā tāsu ayaṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
anya-e0102n:246_0: Etāsu hi yadetaṃ cutūpapātañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dibbacakkhu, tassa anāgataṃsañāṇañca yathākammupagañāṇañcāti
anya-e0102n:246_1: dvepi paribhaṇḍañāṇāni honti. Iti imāni ca dve iddhividhādīni ca pañcāti satta abhiññāñāṇāni
anya-e0102n:249: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanā. Cattāro hi ārammaṇattikā mahesinā vuttā. Katame cattāro? Parittārammaṇattiko, maggārammaṇattiko, atītārammaṇattiko, ajjhattārammaṇattikoti.
anya-e0102n:250_1: sattasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena
anya-e0102n:250_2: kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, mahaggatacitte samodahati samāropeti,
anya-e0102n:250_3: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:250_4: Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo kāyavasena cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:250_5: pariṇāmeti, pādakajjhānacittaṃ rūpakāye samodahati samāropeti, tadā upayogaladdhaṃ
anya-e0102n:250_6: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:251_0: Yasmā pana tadeva cittaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tasmā atītārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:251_1: Mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:251_2: hoti. Mahākassapatthero kira mahādhātunidhānaṃ karonto “anāgate aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni
anya-e0102n:251_3: dvevassasatāni ime gandhā mā sussiṃsu, pupphāni mā milāyiṃsu, dīpā mā nibbāyiṃsū”ti
anya-e0102n:251_4: adhiṭṭhahi. Sabbaṃ tatheva ahosi. Assaguttatthero vattaniyasenāsane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e0102n:251_5: sukkhabhattaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ disvā udakasoṇḍiṃ divase divase purebhatte dadhirasaṃ hotūti
anya-e0102n:251_6: adhiṭṭhāsi. Purebhatte gahitaṃ dadhirasaṃ hoti. Pacchābhatte pākatikaudakameva. Kāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:251_7: pana cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:252_0: Kāyavasena cittaṃ, cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle
anya-e0102n:252_1: ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ hoti. Bahiddhā hatthiassādidassanakāle
anya-e0102n:252_2: pana bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ tāva iddhividhañāṇassa sattasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:253_1: pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yasmā saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, saddo ca paritto, tasmā parittārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:253_2: hoti. Vijjamānaṃyeva pana saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato paccuppannārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:253_3: hoti. Taṃ attano kucchisaddasavanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. Paresaṃ saddasavanakāle
anya-e0102n:253_4: bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇassa catūsu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:254_1: aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi paresaṃ kāmāvacaracittajānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:255_0: Ettha ca puthujjano sotāpannassa cittaṃ na jānāti. Sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmissāti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:255_1: yāva arahato netabbaṃ. Arahā pana sabbesaṃ cittaṃ jānāti. Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti
anya-e0102n:255_2: ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. Maggacittārammaṇakāle maggārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yadā pana atīte
anya-e0102n:255_3: sattadivasabbhantare ca anāgate sattadivasabbhantare ca paresaṃ cittaṃ jānāti, tadā
anya-e0102n:256_0: Kathaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti. Paccuppannaṃ nāma tividhaṃ – khaṇapaccuppannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:256_2: Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ. Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:256_3: gatassa na tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, yāva pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare ekadvesantativārā
anya-e0102n:256_4: veditabbā. Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0102n:256_5: hoti, yāva pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā. Dūre ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n:256_6: pana rajakānaṃ hatthavikāraṃ, ghaṇḍibherīākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ
anya-e0102n:256_7: suṇāti, yāva pana taṃ suṇāti, etasmimpi antare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:257_0: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā
anya-e0102n:257_1: gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati, addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye
anya-e0102n:257_2: usumabhāvo na vūpasammati, ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo
anya-e0102n:257_3: na vigacchati, antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa
anya-e0102n:257_4: yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati, ayaṃ rūpasantati nāma. Dve tayo javanavārā
anya-e0102n:257_5: arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmāti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:258_0: Ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte
anya-e0102n:258_1: “yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ
anya-e0102n:258_2: hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto
anya-e0102n:258_3: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratī”ti vuttaṃ. Santatipaccuppannañcettha aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0102n:259_0: Tattha keci khaṇapaccuppannaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:259_1: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Yasmā iddhimato ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti. Idañca nesaṃ
anya-e0102n:259_2: opammaṃ, yathā ākāse khitte pupphamuṭṭhimhi avassaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ ekassa vaṇṭena vaṇṭaṃ
anya-e0102n:259_3: paṭivijjhati, evaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite
anya-e0102n:259_4: avassaṃ ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā
anya-e0102n:259_5: paṭivijjhatīti. Taṃ pana vassasatampi vassasahassampi āvajjanto yena ca cittena āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:259_6: yena ca jānāti. Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭhānābhāvato āvajjanajavanānañca aniṭṭhaṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n:260_0: Santatipaccuppannaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannañca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0102n:260_1: yaṃ vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvittijavanavīthiparimāṇe kāle parassa
anya-e0102n:260_2: cittaṃ, taṃ sabbampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāma. “Addhāpaccuppannaṃ pana javanavārena
anya-e0102n:260_3: dīpetabba”nti saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ suṭṭhu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:261_0: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanā, iddhimā parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo āvajjati, āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:261_1: ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha nirujjhati. Tato cattāri pañca vā javanāni. Yesaṃ pacchimaṃ
anya-e0102n:261_2: iddhicittaṃ, sesāni kāmāvacarāni, tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:261_3: hoti, na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni honti, addhāvasena paccuppannārammaṇattā. Ekārammaṇattepi
anya-e0102n:261_4: ca iddhicittameva parassa cittaṃ jānāti, na itarāni. Yathā cakkhudvāre cakkhuviññāṇameva
anya-e0102n:261_5: rūpaṃ passati, na itarānīti. Iti idaṃ santatipaccuppannassa ceva addhāpaccuppannassa
anya-e0102n:261_6: ca vasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yasmā vā santatipaccuppannampi addhāpaccuppanneyeva
anya-e0102n:261_7: patati, tasmā addhāpaccuppannavasenevetaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti veditabbaṃ. Parassa
anya-e0102n:261_8: cittārammaṇattāyeva pana bahiddhārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:262_1: aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi kāmāvacarakkhandhānussaraṇakāle parittārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:262_2: hoti. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakkhandhānussaraṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ. Atīte attanā parehi
anya-e0102n:262_3: vā bhāvitamaggaṃ sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Bhāvitamaggameva
anya-e0102n:263_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cetopariyañāṇayathākammupagañāṇānipi atītārammaṇāni honti, atha kho
anya-e0102n:263_1: tesaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa sattadivasabbhantarātītaṃ cittameva ārammaṇaṃ. Tañhi aññaṃ
anya-e0102n:263_2: khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti. Maggasampayuttacittārammaṇattā pana
anya-e0102n:263_3: pariyāyato maggārammaṇanti vuttaṃ. Yathākammupagañāṇassa ca atītaṃ cetanāmattameva
anya-e0102n:263_4: ārammaṇaṃ. Pubbenivāsañāṇassa pana atītā khandhā khandhapaṭibaddhañca kiñci anārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:263_5: nāma natthi. Tañhi atītakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu dhammesu sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ
anya-e0102n:263_6: hotīti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. Ayamettha aṭṭhakathānayo. Yasmā pana “kusalā khandhā
anya-e0102n:263_8: anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vuttaṃ. Tasmā cattāropi khandhā
anya-e0102n:263_9: cetopariyañāṇayathākammupagañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇā honti. Tatrāpi yathākammupagañāṇassa kusalākusalā evāti.
anya-e0102n:264_0: Attano khandhānussaraṇakāle panetaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. Parassa khandhānussaraṇakāle
anya-e0102n:264_1: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ. “Atīte vipassī bhagavā ahosi. Tassa mātā bandhumatī, pitā bandhumā”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:264_3: cettha khandhūpanibandho sammutisiddho byañjanattho daṭṭhabbo, na byañjanaṃ. Byañjanañhi
anya-e0102n:264_5: Ayamettha amhākaṃ khanti. Evaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:265_1: pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yasmā rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, rūpañca parittaṃ, tasmā parittārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:265_2: hoti. Vijjamāneyeva ca rūpe pavattattā paccuppannārammaṇaṃ. Attano kucchigatādirūpadassanakāle
anya-e0102n:265_3: ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. Parassa rūpadassanakāle bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇassa
anya-e0102n:266_1: aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi “ayaṃ anāgate kāmāvacare nibbattissatī”ti
anya-e0102n:266_2: jānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti. “Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare vā nibbattissatī”ti jānanakāle
anya-e0102n:266_3: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ. “Maggaṃ bhāvessati, phalaṃ sacchikarissatī”ti jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:266_4: “Maggaṃ bhāvessati”cceva jānanakāle maggārammaṇaṃ. Niyamato pana taṃ anāgatārammaṇameva.
anya-e0102n:267_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cetopariyañāṇampi anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti, atha kho tassa sattadivasabbhantarānāgataṃ
anya-e0102n:267_1: cittameva ārammaṇaṃ. Tañhi aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti. Anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0102n:267_2: pubbenivāsañāṇe vuttanayena anāgate anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi. “Ahaṃ amutra nibbattissāmī”ti
anya-e0102n:267_3: jānanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. “Asuko amutra nibbattissatī”ti jānanakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:267_4: “Anāgate metteyyo bhagavā uppajjissati. Subrahmā nāmassa brāhmaṇo pitā bhavissati.
anya-e0102n:267_5: Brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā”tiādinā pana nayena nāmagottajānanakāle pubbenivāsañāṇe
anya-e0102n:267_6: vuttanayeneva na vattabbārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassa aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:268_1: ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi kāmāvacarakammajānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:268_3: Attano kammaṃ jānanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. Parassa kammaṃ jānanakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:268_4: hoti. Evaṃ yathākammupagañāṇassa pañcasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā. Yañcettha
anya-e0102n:268_5: ajjhattārammaṇañceva bahiddhārammaṇañcāti vuttaṃ, taṃ kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā
anya-e0102n:274_0: 421. Idāni yasmā evaṃ abhiññāvasena adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya
anya-e0102n:274_1: samannāgatena bhikkhunā sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti
anya-e0102n:274_2: ettha cittasīsena niddiṭṭho samādhi sabbākārena bhāvito hoti.
anya-e0102n:275: Tadanantarā pana paññā bhāvetabbā. Sā ca atisaṅkhepadesitattā viññātumpi tāva na sukarā, pageva bhāvetuṃ. Tasmā tassā vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:276: Kā paññā, kenaṭṭhena paññā, kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni, katividhā paññā, kathaṃ bhāvetabbā, paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṃsoti?
anya-e0102n:277_0: 422. Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ, kā paññāti paññā bahuvidhā nānappakārā. Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ
anya-e0102n:277_1: ārabbhamānaṃ vissajjanaṃ adhippetañceva atthaṃ na sādheyya, uttari ca vikkhepāya
anya-e0102n:277_2: saṃvatteyya, tasmā idha adhippetameva sandhāya vadāma. Kusalacittasampayuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ paññā.
anya-e0102n:278_0: 423. Kenaṭṭhena paññāti pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Kimidaṃ pajānanaṃ nāma? Sañjānanavijānanākāravisiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0102n:278_1: nānappakārato jānanaṃ. Saññāviññāṇapaññānaṃ hi samānepi jānanabhāve, saññā “nīlaṃ
anya-e0102n:278_3: pāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Viññāṇaṃ “nīlaṃ pītaka”nti ārammaṇañca jānāti, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhañca
anya-e0102n:278_4: pāpeti. Ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Paññā vuttanayavasena
anya-e0102n:278_5: ārammaṇañca jānāti, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhañca pāpeti, ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvañca pāpeti.
anya-e0102n:279_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake ṭhapitaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ eko ajātabuddhidārako, eko gāmikapuriso,
anya-e0102n:279_1: eko heraññikoti tīsu janesu passamānesu ajātabuddhidārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittadīghacaturassaparimaṇḍalabhāvamattameva
anya-e0102n:279_2: jānāti, “idaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ratanasammata”nti na jānāti. Gāmikapuriso
anya-e0102n:279_4: ca. “Ayaṃ cheko, ayaṃ kūṭo, ayaṃ addhasāro”ti imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ na jānāti. Heraññiko
anya-e0102n:279_5: sabbepi te pakāre jānāti, jānanto ca kahāpaṇaṃ oloketvāpi jānāti, ākoṭitassa saddaṃ
anya-e0102n:279_6: sutvāpi, gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi, rasaṃ sāyitvāpi, hatthena dhārayitvāpi, asukasmiṃ nāma
anya-e0102n:279_7: gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā pabbate vā nadītīre vā katotipi, asukācariyena katotipi
anya-e0102n:280_0: Saññā hi ajātabuddhino dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya hoti, nīlādivasena ārammaṇassa
anya-e0102n:280_1: upaṭṭhānākāramattagahaṇato. Viññāṇaṃ gāmikassa purisassa kahāpaṇadassanamiva hoti,
anya-e0102n:280_2: nīlādivasena ārammaṇākāragahaṇato, uddhaṃpi ca lakkhaṇapaṭivedhasampāpanato. Paññā
anya-e0102n:280_3: heraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanamiva hoti, nīlādivasena ārammaṇākāraṃ gahetvā, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhañca
anya-e0102n:280_4: pāpetvā, tato uddhampi maggapātubhāvapāpanato. Tasmā yadetaṃ sañjānanavijānanākāravisiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0102n:280_5: nānappakārato jānanaṃ. Idaṃ pajānananti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ sandhāya hi etaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:281_0: Sā panesā yattha saññāviññāṇāni, na tattha ekaṃsena hoti. Yadā pana hoti, tadā avinibbhuttā
anya-e0102n:281_1: tehi dhammehi “ayaṃ saññā, idaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ayaṃ paññā”ti vinibbhujjitvā alabbhaneyyanānattā
anya-e0102n:281_2: sukhumā duddasā. Tenāha āyasmā nāgaseno “dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā kata”nti.
anya-e0102n:281_3: Kiṃ, bhante, nāgasena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ katanti? ‘Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā
anya-e0102n:281_4: kataṃ yaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ
anya-e0102n:281_5: akkhātaṃ ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā, ayaṃ saññā, ayaṃ cetanā, idaṃ citta”’nti.
anya-e0102n:282_2: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī”ti vacanato pana samādhi tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:284_0: 425. Katividhā paññāti dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidhā. Lokiyalokuttaravasena
anya-e0102n:284_2: dassanabhāvanābhūmivasena ca. Tividhā cintāsutabhāvanāmayavasena. Tathā parittamahaggataappamāṇārammaṇavasena,
anya-e0102n:284_3: āyāpāyaupāyakosallavasena, ajjhattābhinivesādivasena ca. Catubbidhā catūsu saccesu
anya-e0102n:285: 426. Tattha ekavidhakoṭṭhāso uttānatthoyeva. Duvidhakoṭṭhāse lokiyamaggasampayuttā lokiyā. Lokuttaramaggasampayuttā lokuttarāti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhā.
anya-e0102n:286_0: Dutiyaduke āsavānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā sāsavā. Tesaṃ anārammaṇā anāsavā. Atthato panesā
anya-e0102n:286_1: lokiyalokuttarāva hoti. Āsavasampayuttā sāsavā. Āsavavippayuttā anāsavātiādīsupi
anya-e0102n:287_0: Tatiyaduke yā vipassanaṃ ārabhitukāmassa catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ vavatthāpane paññā,
anya-e0102n:287_1: ayaṃ nāmavavatthāpanapaññā. Yā rūpakkhandhassa vavatthāpane paññā, ayaṃ rūpavavatthāpanapaññāti
anya-e0102n:288_0: Catutthaduke dvīsu kāmāvacarakusalacittesu soḷasasu ca pañcakanayena catukkajjhānikesu
anya-e0102n:288_1: maggacittesu paññā somanassasahagatā. Dvīsu kāmāvacarakusalacittesu catūsu ca pañcamajjhānikesu
anya-e0102n:288_2: maggacittesu paññā upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ somanassupekkhāsahagatavasena duvidhā.
anya-e0102n:289: Pañcamaduke paṭhamamaggapaññā dassanabhūmi. Avasesamaggattayapaññā bhāvanābhūmīti evaṃ dassanabhāvanābhūmivasena duvidhā.
anya-e0102n:290_0: 427. Tikesu paṭhamattike parato assutvā paṭiladdhapaññā attano cintāvasena nipphannattā
anya-e0102n:290_1: cintāmayā. Parato sutvā paṭiladdhapaññā sutavasena nipphannattā sutamayā. Yathā tathā
anya-e0102n:290_2: vā bhāvanāvasena nipphannā appanāppattā paññā bhāvanāmayā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0102n:291_0: “Tattha katamā cintāmayā paññā? Yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu
anya-e0102n:291_1: yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭṭhānesu kammassakataṃ vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti
anya-e0102n:291_2: vā vedanā…pe… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ aniccanti vā, yaṃ evarūpiṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ
anya-e0102n:291_3: diṭṭhiṃ ruciṃ mutiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakhantiṃ parato assutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:291_4: vuccati cintāmayā paññā…pe… sutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ vuccati sutamayā paññā. Sabbāpi
anya-e0102n:293_0: Dutiyattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattā paññā parittārammaṇā. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacare
anya-e0102n:293_1: ārabbha pavattā mahaggatārammaṇā. Sā lokiyavipassanā. Nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattā appamāṇārammaṇā.
anya-e0102n:294: Tatiyattike āyo nāma vuddhi, sā duvidhā anatthahānito atthuppattito ca. Tattha kosallaṃ āyakosallaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:295_0: “Tattha katamaṃ āyakosallaṃ? Ime me dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā
anya-e0102n:295_1: na uppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā pahīyanti, ime vā panime dhamme manasikaroto
anya-e0102n:295_2: anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti. Uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0102n:295_3: bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattantīti, yā tattha paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo
anya-e0102n:296_0: Apāyoti pana avuddhi, sāpi duvidhā atthahānito ca anatthuppattito ca. Tattha kosallaṃ
anya-e0102n:296_1: apāyakosallaṃ. Yathāha “tattha katamaṃ apāyakosallaṃ? Ime dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā
anya-e0102n:297_0: Sabbattha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ upāyesu nibbattikāraṇesu taṃkhaṇappavattaṃ ṭhānuppattikaṃ
anya-e0102n:297_1: kosallaṃ upāyakosallaṃ nāma. Yathāha – “sabbāpi tatrupāyā paññā upāyakosalla”nti.
anya-e0102n:298_0: Catutthattike attano khandhe gahetvā āraddhā vipassanā paññā ajjhattābhinivesā. Parassa
anya-e0102n:298_1: khandhe bāhiraṃ vā anindriyabaddharūpaṃ gahetvā āraddhā bahiddhābhinivesā. Ubhayaṃ
anya-e0102n:298_2: gahetvā āraddhā ajjhattabahiddhābhinivesāti evaṃ ajjhattābhinivesādivasena tividhā.
anya-e0102n:299_0: 428. Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke dukkhasaccaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ. Dukkhasamudayaṃ
anya-e0102n:299_1: ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ. Dukkhanirodhaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:299_2: dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ. Dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
anya-e0102n:299_3: paṭipadāya ñāṇanti evaṃ catūsu saccesu ñāṇavasena catubbidhā.
anya-e0102n:300_0: Dutiyacatukke catasso paṭisambhidā nāma atthādīsu pabhedagatāni cattāri ñāṇāni. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0102n:300_1: – “atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Tatradhammaniruttābhilāpe
anya-e0102n:301_0: Tattha atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Hetuphalaṃ hi yasmā hetuanusārena
anya-e0102n:301_1: ariyati adhigamiyati sampāpuṇiyati, tasmā atthoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0102n:301_2: paccayasambhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti
anya-e0102n:301_3: veditabbā. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:301_4: Dhammotipi saṅkhepato paccayassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paccayo hi yasmā taṃ taṃ dahati
anya-e0102n:301_5: pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā deti, tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci
anya-e0102n:301_6: phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo, bhāsitaṃ, kusalaṃ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā
anya-e0102n:301_7: dhammoti veditabbā. Taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:303_0: “Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Hetumhi
anya-e0102n:303_1: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā
anya-e0102n:303_2: sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:303_3: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, tesu dhammesu
anya-e0102n:303_4: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇasamudaye
anya-e0102n:303_5: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā…pe… saṅkhāranirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā
anya-e0102n:303_6: paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:303_7: vedallaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati dhammapaṭisambhidā. So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti
anya-e0102n:303_8: ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti. Ayaṃ vuccati atthapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:303_9: Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti…pe…
anya-e0102n:303_10: ime dhammā kusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:304_0: Tatradhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti abyabhicārī
anya-e0102n:304_1: vohāro. Tadabhilāpe tassa bhāsane udīraṇe taṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ udīritaṃ sutvāva ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:304_2: sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttīti evaṃ tassā dhammaniruttisaññitāya sabhāvaniruttiyā
anya-e0102n:304_3: māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Niruttipaṭisambhidāppatto
anya-e0102n:304_4: hi phasso vedanāti evamādivacanaṃ sutvāva ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttīti jānāti. Phassā vedanoti
anya-e0102n:305_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbattha ñāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:305_1: yathāvuttesu vā tesu ñāṇesu sagocarakiccādivasena vitthārato ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti attho.
anya-e0102n:306: 429. Catassopi cetā paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti sekkhabhūmiyañca asekkhabhūmiyañca.
anya-e0102n:307_1: sekkhabhūmiyaṃ. Evaṃ dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchantiyopi cetā adhigamena pariyattiyā
anya-e0102n:307_2: savanena paripucchāya pubbayogena cāti imehi pañcahākārehi visadā honti.
anya-e0102n:308_0: Tattha adhigamo nāma arahattappatti. Pariyatti nāma buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:308_1: Savanaṃ nāma sakkaccaṃ atthiṃ katvā dhammassavanaṃ. Paripucchā nāma pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu
anya-e0102n:308_2: gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā, pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane gatapaccāgatikabhāvena
anya-e0102n:313_0: Tattha pubbayogo vuttanayova. Bāhusaccaṃ nāma tesu tesu satthesu ca sippāyatanesu
anya-e0102n:313_1: ca kusalatā. Desabhāsā nāma ekasatavohārakusalatā. Visesena pana māgadhike kosallaṃ.
anya-e0102n:313_2: Āgamo nāma antamaso opammavaggamattassapi buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ. Paripucchā
anya-e0102n:313_3: nāma ekagāthāyapi atthavinicchayapucchanaṃ. Adhigamo nāma sotāpannatā vā…pe… arahattaṃ
anya-e0102n:313_4: vā. Garusannissayo nāma sutapaṭibhānabahulānaṃ garūnaṃ santike vāso. Mittasampatti
anya-e0102n:314_0: Tattha buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca pubbayogañceva adhigamañca nissāya paṭisambhidā
anya-e0102n:314_1: pāpuṇanti. Sāvakā sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni. Paṭisambhidāppattiyā ca pāṭiyekko kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogo
anya-e0102n:314_2: nāma natthi. Sekkhānaṃ pana sekkhaphalavimokkhantikā. Asekkhānaṃ asekkhaphalavimokkhantikāva
anya-e0102n:314_3: paṭisambhidāppatti hoti. Tathāgatānaṃ hi dasabalāni viya ariyānaṃ ariyaphaleneva
anya-e0102n:314_4: paṭisambhidā ijjhantīti imā paṭisambhidā sandhāya vuttaṃ catupaṭisambhidāvasena catubbidhāti.
anya-e0102n:316_0: 430. Kathaṃ bhāvetabbāti ettha pana yasmā imāya paññāya khandhāyatanadhātuindriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādibhedā
anya-e0102n:316_1: dhammā bhūmi. Sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cāti imā dve visuddhiyo mūlaṃ. Diṭṭhivisuddhi,
anya-e0102n:316_3: ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo sarīraṃ. Tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu
anya-e0102n:316_4: uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā
anya-e0102n:316_5: pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0102n:317_0: 431. Ayaṃ pana vitthāro, yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “khandhāyatanadhātuindriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādibhedā
anya-e0102n:317_1: dhammā bhūmī”ti, ettha khandhāti pañca khandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho
anya-e0102n:319: 432. Tattha yaṃ kiñci sītādīhi ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā rūpakkhandhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:321_0: Tattha bhūtarūpaṃ catubbidhaṃ – pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti. Tāsaṃ
anya-e0102n:321_1: lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni catudhātuvavatthāne vuttāni. Padaṭṭhānato pana tā sabbāpi
anya-e0102n:322_0: Upādārūpaṃ catuvīsatividhaṃ – cakkhu, sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhā, kāyo, rūpaṃ, saddo, gandho,
anya-e0102n:322_1: raso, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, hadayavatthu, kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti,
anya-e0102n:322_2: ākāsadhātu, rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā, rūpassa kammaññatā, rūpassa upacayo,
anya-e0102n:322_3: rūpassa santati, rūpassa jaratā, rūpassa aniccatā, kabaḷīkāro āhāroti.
anya-e0102n:323_1: vā cakkhu, rūpesu āviñchanarasaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:324_1: vā sotaṃ, saddesu āviñchanarasaṃ, sotaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, sotukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:325_1: vā ghānaṃ, gandhesu āviñchanarasaṃ, ghānaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ghāyitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:326_1: vā jivhā, rasesu āviñchanarasā, jivhāviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, sāyitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:327_1: vā kāyo, phoṭṭhabbesu āviñchanaraso, kāyaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, phusitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n:328_0: 434. Keci pana “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo cakkhu, vāyupathavīāpādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0102n:328_1: pasādā sotaghānajivhā, kāyo sabbesampī”ti vadanti. Apare “tejādhikānaṃ pasādo cakkhu,
anya-e0102n:328_2: vivaravāyuāpapathavādhikānaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyā”ti vadanti. Te vattabbā “suttaṃ āharathā”ti.
anya-e0102n:328_3: Addhā suttameva na dakkhissanti. Keci panettha “tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anugayhabhāvato”ti
anya-e0102n:328_4: kāraṇaṃ dassenti. Te vattabbā “ko panevamāharūpādayo tejādīnaṃ guṇā’ti. Avinibbhogavuttīsu
anya-e0102n:328_5: hi bhūtesu ayaṃ imassa guṇo ayaṃ imassa guṇoti na labbhā vattu”nti. Athāpi vadeyyuṃ
anya-e0102n:328_6: “yathā tesu tesu sambhāresu tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāya pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādīni
anya-e0102n:328_7: kiccāni icchatha, evaṃ tejādiadhikesu sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato icchitabbametaṃ
anya-e0102n:328_8: rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti. Te vattabbā “iccheyyāma, yadi āpādhikassa āsavassa gandhato
anya-e0102n:328_9: pathavīadhike kappāse gandho adhikataro siyā, tejādhikassa ca uṇhodakassa vaṇṇato
anya-e0102n:328_10: sītudakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha”. Yasmā panetaṃ ubhayampi natthi, tasmā pahāyetaṃ etesaṃ
anya-e0102n:328_11: nissayabhūtānaṃ visesakappanaṃ, “yathā avisesepi ekakalāpe bhūtānaṃ rūparasādayo
anya-e0102n:328_12: aññamaññaṃ visadisā honti, evaṃ cakkhupasādādayo avijjamānepi aññasmiṃ visesakāraṇe”ti gahetabbametaṃ.
anya-e0102n:329_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ yaṃ aññamaññassa asādhāraṇaṃ? Kammameva nesaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ. Tasmā kammavisesato
anya-e0102n:329_1: etesaṃ viseso, na bhūtavisesato. Bhūtavisese hi sati pasādova na uppajjati. Samānānañhi
anya-e0102n:330_0: 435. Evaṃ kammavisesato visesavantesu ca etesu cakkhusotāni asampattavisayagāhakāni,
anya-e0102n:330_1: attano nissayaṃ anallīnanissaye eva visaye viññāṇahetuttā. Ghānajivhākāyā sampattavisayagāhakā,
anya-e0102n:330_2: nissayavasena ceva, sayañca, attano nissayaṃ allīneyeva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
anya-e0102n:331_1: cakkhūti vuccati. Tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa
anya-e0102n:331_2: majjhe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ
anya-e0102n:331_5: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:331_6: vaṇṇagandharasādīhi parivutaṃ pamāṇato ūkāsiramattaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0102n:331_7: vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Vuttampi cetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā –
anya-e0102n:334_0: Sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese sotaṃ vuttappakārāhi
anya-e0102n:334_1: dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ vaṇṇādīhi
anya-e0102n:334_2: parivutaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:335: Sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese ghānaṃ yathāvuttappakārupakārupatthambhanānupālanaparivāraṃ ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0102n:337_0: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇarūpaṃ nāma atthi. Sabbattha kāyo kappāsapaṭale sneho
anya-e0102n:339_0: 437. Tato paresu pana rūpādīsu cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e0102n:339_1: visayabhāvarasaṃ, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, catumahābhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā cetaṃ
anya-e0102n:339_2: tathā sabbānipi upādārūpāni. Yattha pana viseso atthi, tattha vakkhāma. Tayidaṃ nīlaṃ
anya-e0102n:340: Sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo, sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno. Bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādinā nayena anekavidho.
anya-e0102n:341: Ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo gandho, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno. Mūlagandho sāragandhotiādinā nayena anekavidho.
anya-e0102n:342: Jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo raso, jivhāviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno. Mūlaraso khandharasotiādinā nayena anekavidho.
anya-e0102n:343_3: viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpakameva, na ca kāyapasādena ṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vā aṭṭhitokāse
anya-e0102n:343_4: ṭhitanti vāti vattabbataṃ āpajjati, rūparasādayo viya aññamaññaṃ saṅkaro natthi.
anya-e0102n:344_0: 439. Sahajarūpānupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaññeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:344_1: yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0102n:344_2: taṃ sahajarūpāni anupāleti udakaṃ viya uppalādīni. Yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca
anya-e0102n:344_3: dhamme pāleti dhāti viya kumāraṃ. Sayaṃ pavattitadhammasambandheneva ca pavattati
anya-e0102n:344_4: niyāmako viya. Na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattati, attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā.
anya-e0102n:344_5: Na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti, sayaṃ bhijjamānattā. Khīyamāno viya vaṭṭisneho dīpasikhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:344_6: Na ca anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanānubhāvavirahitaṃ, yathāvuttakkhaṇe tassa tassa sādhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:345_1: ādhāraṇarasaṃ, ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Hadayassa anto kāyagatāsatikathāyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
anya-e0102n:345_2: lohitaṃ nissāya sandhāraṇādikiccehi bhūtehi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:346_3: sayañca tena kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātena kāyena viññeyyattā “kāyaviññattī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:346_4: Tāya ca pana calitehi cittajarūpehi abhisambandhānaṃ utujādīnampi calanato abhikkamādayo
anya-e0102n:347_2: Sā panesā vacīghosena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā, sayañca tāya vacīghosasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0102n:347_3: vācāya viññeyyattā “vacīviññattī”ti vuccati. Yathā hi araññe ussāpetvā bandhagosīsādiudakanimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:347_4: disvā udakamettha atthīti viññāyati, evaṃ kāyavipphandanañceva vacīghosañca gahetvā
anya-e0102n:348_2: paricchinnesu rūpesu idamito uddhamadho tiriyanti ca hoti.
anya-e0102n:349_0: 443. Adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā, rūpānaṃ garubhāvavinodanarasā, lahuparivattitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
anya-e0102n:349_1: lahurūpapadaṭṭhānā. Athaddhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa mudutā, rūpānaṃ thaddhabhāvavinodanarasā,
anya-e0102n:350_0: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti, evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo
anya-e0102n:350_2: so rūpavikāro rūpassa lahutā. Yo pana suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu
anya-e0102n:350_4: so rūpavikāro rūpassa mudutā. Yo pana sudantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro
anya-e0102n:351_0: 444. Ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa upacayo, pubbantato rūpānaṃ ummujjāpanaraso, niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno,
anya-e0102n:351_1: paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno. Pavattilakkhaṇā rūpassa santati,
anya-e0102n:351_3: jātirūpassevādhivacanaṃ, ākāranānattato pana veneyyavasena ca “upacayo santatī”ti
anya-e0102n:351_4: uddesadesanā katā. Yasmā panettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi, tasmā imesaṃ padānaṃ niddese
anya-e0102n:351_5: “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatī”ti
anya-e0102n:351_6: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “ācayo nāma nibbatti, upacayo nāma vaḍḍhi, santati nāma pavattī”ti
anya-e0102n:351_7: vatvā “nadītīre khatakūpakamhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti, paripuṇṇakālo
anya-e0102n:351_8: viya upacayo vaḍḍhi, ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattī”ti upamā katā.
anya-e0102n:352_0: Upamāvasāne ca “evaṃ kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? Āyatanena ācayo kathito, ācayena āyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:352_1: kathita”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yā rūpānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti, sā ācayo. Yā tesaṃ upari
anya-e0102n:352_2: aññesampi nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti, sā vaḍḍhiākārena upaṭṭhānato upacayo. Yā tesampi
anya-e0102n:352_3: upari punappunaṃ aññesaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti, sā anupabandhākārena upaṭṭhānato
anya-e0102n:353_1: vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya, paripaccamānarūpapadaṭṭhānā. Khaṇḍiccādibhāvena dantādīsu vikāradassanato
anya-e0102n:353_2: idaṃ pākaṭajaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Arūpadhammānaṃ pana paṭicchannajarā nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:353_3: tassā esa vikāro natthi, yā ca pathavī udakapabbatacandimasūriyādīsu avīcijarā nāma.
anya-e0102n:354: Paribhedalakkhaṇā rūpassa aniccatā, saṃsīdanarasā, khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā, paribhijjamānarūpapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:355: 445. Ojālakkhaṇo kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpāharaṇaraso, upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno, kabaḷaṃ katvā āharitabbavatthupadaṭṭhāno. Yāya ojāya sattā yāpenti, tassā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:356_0: 446. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatarūpāneva. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana balarūpaṃ sambhavarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:356_1: jātirūpaṃ rogarūpaṃ ekaccānaṃ matena middharūpanti evaṃ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā
anya-e0102n:356_2: “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā middharūpaṃ tāva natthiyevāti
anya-e0102n:356_3: paṭikkhittaṃ. Itaresu rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāggahaṇena gahitameva, jātirūpaṃ upacayasantatiggahaṇena,
anya-e0102n:356_4: sambhavarūpaṃ āpodhātuggahaṇena, balarūpaṃ vāyodhātuggahaṇena gahitameva. Tasmā tesu
anya-e0102n:357: Iti idaṃ catuvīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ bhūtarūpañcāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti anūnamanadhikaṃ.
anya-e0102n:358: 447. Taṃ sabbampi na hetu ahetukaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ sappaccayaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavamevātiādinā nayena ekavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:359: Ajjhattikaṃ bāhiraṃ, oḷārikaṃ sukhumaṃ, dūre santike, nipphannaṃ anipphannaṃ, pasādarūpaṃ napasādarūpaṃ, indriyaṃ anindriyaṃ, upādiṇṇaṃ anupādiṇṇantiādivasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:360_0: Tattha cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattikaṃ, sesaṃ tato
anya-e0102n:360_1: bāhirattā bāhiraṃ. Cakkhādīni nava āpodhātuvajjitā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ
anya-e0102n:360_2: ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā sukhumaṃ. Yaṃ sukhumaṃ
anya-e0102n:360_3: tadeva duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā dūre, itaraṃ suppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā santike. Catasso
anya-e0102n:360_4: dhātuyo, cakkhādīni terasa, kabaḷīkārāhāro cāti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ paricchedavikāralakkhaṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:360_5: atikkamitvā sabhāveneva pariggahetabbato nipphannaṃ, sesaṃ tabbiparītatāya anipphannaṃ.
anya-e0102n:360_6: Cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇapaccayabhāvena ādāsatalaṃ viya vippasannattā
anya-e0102n:360_7: pasādarūpaṃ, itaraṃ tato viparītattā napasādarūpaṃ. Pasādarūpameva itthindriyādittayena
anya-e0102n:360_8: saddhiṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā anindriyaṃ. Yaṃ kammajanti
anya-e0102n:360_9: parato vakkhāma, taṃ kammena upādiṇṇattā upādiṇṇaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā anupādiṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:361_0: 448. Puna sabbameva rūpaṃ sanidassanakammajādīnaṃ tikānaṃ vasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha
anya-e0102n:361_1: oḷārike rūpaṃ sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ, sesaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ. Sabbampi sukhumaṃ
anya-e0102n:361_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. Evaṃ tāva sanidassanattikavasena tividhaṃ. Kammajādittikavasena
anya-e0102n:361_3: pana kammato jātaṃ kammajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ akammajaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ neva kammajaṃ
anya-e0102n:361_4: nākammajaṃ. Cittato jātaṃ cittajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ acittajaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ
anya-e0102n:361_5: neva cittajaṃ nācittajaṃ, āhārato jātaṃ āhārajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ anāhārajaṃ,
anya-e0102n:361_6: nakutocijātaṃ neva āhārajaṃ naanāhārajaṃ. Ututo jātaṃ utujaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ
anya-e0102n:361_7: anutujaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ neva utujaṃ naanutujanti evaṃ kammajādittikavasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:362_1: diṭṭhaṃ nāma dassanavisayattā, saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ nāma savanavisayattā, gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattayaṃ
anya-e0102n:362_2: mutaṃ nāma sampattagāhakaindriyavisayattā, sesaṃ viññātaṃ nāma viññāṇasseva visayattāti
anya-e0102n:363_0: Nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāma, ākāsadhātu paricchedarūpaṃ nāma, kāyaviññattiādi
anya-e0102n:363_1: kammaññatāpariyantaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma, jātijarābhaṅgaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāmāti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:364_0: Yaṃ panettha hadayarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ vatthu na dvāraṃ. Viññattidvayaṃ dvāraṃ na vatthu.
anya-e0102n:364_1: Pasādarūpaṃ vatthu ceva dvārañca. Sesaṃ neva vatthu na dvāranti evaṃ vatthādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:365_0: 450. Puna ekajaṃ, dvijaṃ, tijaṃ, catujaṃ, nakutocijātanti imesaṃ vasena pañcavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:365_1: Tattha kammajameva cittajameva ca ekajaṃ nāma. Tesu saddhiṃ hadayavatthunā indriyarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:365_2: kammajameva. Viññattidvayaṃ cittajameva. Yaṃ pana cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0102n:365_3: dvijaṃ nāma, taṃ saddāyatanameva. Yaṃ utucittāhārehi jātaṃ, taṃ tijaṃ nāma, taṃ pana
anya-e0102n:365_4: lahutādittayameva. Yaṃ catūhipi kammādīhi jātaṃ, taṃ catujaṃ nāma, taṃ lakkhaṇarūpavajjaṃ
anya-e0102n:365_5: avasesaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana nakutocijātaṃ. Kasmā? Na hi uppādassa uppādo atthi,
anya-e0102n:365_6: uppannassa ca paripākabhedamattaṃ itaradvayaṃ. Yampi “rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:365_7: rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā,
anya-e0102n:365_8: rūpassa kammaññatā, rūpassa upacayo, rūpassa santati, kabaḷīkāro āhāro, ime dhammā
anya-e0102n:365_9: cittasamuṭṭhānā”tiādīsu jātiyā kutocijātattaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ pana rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0102n:368_0: 451. Itaresu pana yaṃkiñci vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā vedanākkhandho;
anya-e0102n:368_1: yaṃkiñci sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saññākkhandho; yaṃkiñci abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:368_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saṅkhārakkhandho; yaṃkiñci vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato
anya-e0102n:368_3: katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabbo. Tattha yasmā viññāṇakkhandhe viññāte itare suviññeyyā
anya-e0102n:368_4: honti, tasmā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ ādiṃ katvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
anya-e0102n:369_0: Yaṃkiñci vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabboti hi
anya-e0102n:369_1: vuttaṃ. Kiñca vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ? Yathāha “vijānāti vijānātīti kho, āvuso,
anya-e0102n:369_2: tasmā viññāṇanti vuccatī”ti. Viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ manoti atthato ekaṃ. Tadetaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇena
anya-e0102n:369_3: sabhāvato ekavidhampi jātivasena tividhaṃ kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ, abyākatañca.
anya-e0102n:370_0: 452. Tattha kusalaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0102n:370_2: Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā
anya-e0102n:370_3: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ. Upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā ñāṇavippayuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:371_0: Yadā hi deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:371_2: parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti, tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:371_3: asaṅkhāraṃ hoti. Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā amuttacāgatādivasena
anya-e0102n:371_4: saṃsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti, tadāssa tadeva cittaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:371_5: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā vasena pavattassa pubbapayogassādhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:371_6: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā
anya-e0102n:371_7: sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā, tadā tatiyaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:371_8: Yadā pana “detha vandathāti” ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṃ paṭipajjanti, tadā catutthaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:371_9: uppajjati. Yadā pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ
anya-e0102n:371_10: abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni
anya-e0102n:371_11: uppajjantīti. Evaṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:372_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhaṃ hoti. Seyyathidaṃ, vitakkavicārapītisukhasamādhiyuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:372_1: paṭhamaṃ, atikkantavitakkaṃ dutiyaṃ, tato atikkantavicāraṃ tatiyaṃ, tato virattapītikaṃ
anya-e0102n:373_0: Arūpāvacaraṃ catunnaṃ āruppānaṃ yogavasena catubbidhaṃ. Vuttappakārena hi ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānena
anya-e0102n:373_1: sampayuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanādīhi dutiyatatiyacatutthāni. Lokuttaraṃ catumaggasampayogato
anya-e0102n:373_2: catubbidhanti evaṃ tāva kusalaviññāṇameva ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:374: 453. Akusalaṃ pana bhūmito ekavidhaṃ kāmāvacarameva, mūlato tividhaṃ lobhamūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ mohamūlañca.
anya-e0102n:375_1: somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:375_2: Upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:376_0: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti ādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
anya-e0102n:376_1: kāme vā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena
anya-e0102n:376_2: cittena, tadā paṭhamaṃ akusalacittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena,
anya-e0102n:376_3: tadā dutiyaṃ. Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
anya-e0102n:376_4: parasampattiṃ vā abhijjhāyati, parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena
anya-e0102n:376_5: cittena, tadā tatiyaṃ. Yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena, tadā catutthaṃ. Yadā pana
anya-e0102n:376_6: kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu
anya-e0102n:376_7: somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti evaṃ somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedato
anya-e0102n:377: Dosamūlaṃ pana domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti duvidhameva hoti, tassa pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:378: Mohamūlaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttañcāti duvidhaṃ. Tassa sanniṭṭhānavikkhepakāle pavatti veditabbāti evaṃ akusalaviññāṇaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:379_0: 454. Abyākataṃ jātibhedato duvidhaṃ vipākaṃ kiriyañca. Tattha vipākaṃ bhūmito catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0102n:379_1: kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañca. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ kusalavipākaṃ
anya-e0102n:380: Tattha alobhādivipākahetuvirahitaṃ ahetukaṃ, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchanakiccā manodhātu, santīraṇādikiccā dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo cāti aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:382: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇā manodhātu, rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, cakkhuviññāṇādiapagamapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:383_2: pana dvipañcaṭṭhānabhedato ca tassā bhedo. Etāsu hi ekā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato
anya-e0102n:383_3: somanassasampayuttā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne
anya-e0102n:383_4: ca pavattanato dviṭṭhānā hoti. Ekā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsampayuttā
anya-e0102n:384_0: Aṭṭhavidhampi cetaṃ ahetukavipākaviññāṇaṃ niyatāniyatārammaṇattā duvidhaṃ. Upekkhāsukhasomanassabhedato
anya-e0102n:384_1: tividhaṃ. Viññāṇapañcakaṃ hettha niyatārammaṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpādīsuyeva pavattito,
anya-e0102n:384_2: sesaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṃ. Tatra hi manodhātu pañcasupi rūpādīsu pavattati, manoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ
anya-e0102n:384_3: chasūti. Kāyaviññāṇaṃ panettha sukhayuttaṃ, dviṭṭhānā manoviññāṇadhātu somanassayuttā,
anya-e0102n:384_4: sesaṃ upekkhāyuttanti. Evaṃ tāva kusalavipākāhetukaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:385_0: Alobhādivipākahetusampayuttaṃ pana sahetukaṃ, taṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya somanassādi
anya-e0102n:385_1: bhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Yathā pana kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
anya-e0102n:385_2: na idaṃ tathā. Idañhi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesuyeva
anya-e0102n:385_3: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Saṅkhārāsaṅkhārabhāvo panettha āgamanādivasena veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:385_4: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ
anya-e0102n:385_5: vipākaṃ, mukhaṃ viya saussāhaṃ kusalanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:386_0: Kevalaṃ hi akusalavipākaṃ ahetukameva, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:386_1: sampaṭicchanakiccā manodhātu, santīraṇādikiccā pañcaṭṭhānā manoviññāṇadhātūti sattavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:387_1: Tāni ca upekkhāsukhasomanassabhedato tividhāni, imāni dukkhaupekkhāvasena duvidhāni.
