anya-e0102n:387_2: Ettha hi kāyaviññāṇaṃ dukkhasahagatameva, sesāni upekkhāsahagatāni. Sā ca tesu upekkhā
anya-e0102n:387_3: hīnā dukkhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā, itaresu upekkhā paṇītā sukhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā. Iti
anya-e0102n:387_4: imesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ purimānañca soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ vasena kāmāvacaraṃ
anya-e0102n:388_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana kusalaṃ viya pañcavidhaṃ. Kusalaṃ pana samāpattivasena javanavīthiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:388_1: pavattati. Idaṃ upapattiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena. Yathā ca rūpāvacaraṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0102n:388_2: arūpāvacarampi kusalaṃ viya catubbidhaṃ. Pavattibhedopissa rūpāvacare vuttanayo eva.
anya-e0102n:388_3: Lokuttaravipākaṃ catumaggayuttacittaphalattā catubbidhaṃ, taṃ maggavīthivasena ceva
anya-e0102n:388_4: samāpattivasena ca dvidhā pavattati. Evaṃ sabbampi catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsavidhaṃ
anya-e0102n:389_0: Kiriyaṃ pana bhūmibhedato tividhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca. Tattha
anya-e0102n:389_1: kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ ahetukaṃ sahetukañca. Tattha alobhādikiriyahetuvirahitaṃ ahetukaṃ,
anya-e0102n:390: Tattha cakkhuviññāṇādipurecararūpādivijānanalakkhaṇā manodhātu, āvajjanarasā, rūpādiabhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, bhavaṅgavicchedapadaṭṭhānā, sā upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
anya-e0102n:391_0: Manoviññāṇadhātu pana duvidhā sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ca. Tattha sādhāraṇā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyā
anya-e0102n:392_1: arahataṃ anuḷāresu vatthūsu hasituppādanarasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, ekantato
anya-e0102n:393_0: Sahetukaṃ pana somanassādibhedato kusalaṃ viya aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Kevalañhi kusalaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
anya-e0102n:393_1: uppajjati, idaṃ arahataṃyevāti ayamettha viseso. Evaṃ tāva kāmāvacaraṃ ekādasavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:394_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana arūpāvacarañca kusalaṃ viya pañcavidhaṃ catubbidhañca hoti. Arahataṃ
anya-e0102n:394_1: uppattivaseneva cassa kusalato viseso veditabboti. Evaṃ sabbampi tīsu bhūmīsu vīsatividhaṃ
anya-e0102n:395_0: 455. Iti ekavīsati kusalāni dvādasākusalāni chattiṃsa vipākāni vīsati kiriyānīti
anya-e0102n:396_0: Kathaṃ? Yadā hi aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ ānubhāvena devamanussesu sattā nibbattanti,
anya-e0102n:396_1: tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:396_2: katvā aṭṭha sahetukakāmāvacaravipākāni, manussesu paṇḍakādibhāvaṃ āpajjamānānaṃ dubbaladvihetukakusalavipākaupekkhāsahagatāhetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n:396_3: cāti paṭisandhivasena nava vipākacittāni pavattanti. Yadā rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusalānubhāvena
anya-e0102n:396_4: rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattanti, tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammanimittameva
anya-e0102n:396_5: ārammaṇaṃ katvā nava rūpārūpāvacaravipākāni paṭisandhivasena pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:397_0: Yadā pana akusalānubhāvena apāye nibbattanti, tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0102n:397_1: kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekā akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n:397_2: paṭisandhivasena pavattatīti evaṃ tāvettha ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:398_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇe pana niruddhe taṃ taṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇamanubandhamānaṃ tassa tasseva
anya-e0102n:398_1: kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ tasmiññeva ārammaṇe tādisameva bhavaṅgaviññāṇaṃ nāma pavattati,
anya-e0102n:398_2: punapi tādisanti evaṃ asati santānavinivattake aññasmiṃ cittuppāde nadīsotaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:398_3: supinaṃ apassato niddokkamanakālādīsu aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi pavattatiyevāti evaṃ tesaññeva
anya-e0102n:399_0: Evaṃ pavatte pana bhavaṅgasantāne yadā sattānaṃ indriyāni ārammaṇagahaṇakkhamāni
anya-e0102n:399_1: honti, tadā cakkhussāpāthagate rūpe rūpaṃ paṭicca cakkhupasādassa ghaṭṭanā hoti,
anya-e0102n:399_2: tato ghaṭṭanānubhāvena bhavaṅgacalanaṃ hoti, atha niruddhe bhavaṅge tadeva rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:399_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā kiriyamanodhātu
anya-e0102n:399_4: uppajjati. Sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo. Manodvāre pana chabbidhepi ārammaṇe āpāthagate
anya-e0102n:399_5: bhavaṅgacalanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ahetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n:399_6: uppajjati upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ dvinnaṃ kiriyaviññāṇānaṃ āvajjanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:400_0: Āvajjanānantaraṃ pana cakkhudvāre tāva dassanakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ cakkhupasādavatthukaṃ
anya-e0102n:400_2: pavattanti. Tāni iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu visayesu kusalavipākāni, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu
anya-e0102n:400_3: visayesu akusalavipākānīti evaṃ dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:401_0: “Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ
anya-e0102n:401_1: tajjā manodhātū”tiādivacanato pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā tesaññeva visayaṃ
anya-e0102n:401_3: manodhātu uppajjati. Evaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ sampaṭicchanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:402_0: “Manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātū”ti
anya-e0102n:402_1: vacanato pana manodhātuyā sampaṭicchitameva visayaṃ santīrayamānā akusalavipākamanodhātuyā
anya-e0102n:402_2: anantarā akusalavipākā, kusalavipākāya anantarā iṭṭhārammaṇe somanassasahagatā, iṭṭhamajjhatte
anya-e0102n:402_3: upekkhāsahagatā uppajjati vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0102n:403: Santīraṇānantaraṃ pana tameva visayaṃ vavatthāpayamānā uppajjati kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ ekasseva kiriyaviññāṇassa voṭṭhabbanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:404_0: Voṭṭhabbanānantaraṃ pana sace mahantaṃ hoti rūpādiārammaṇaṃ, atha yathāvavatthāpite
anya-e0102n:404_1: visaye aṭṭhannaṃ vā kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ dvādasannaṃ vā akusalānaṃ navannaṃ vā avasesakāmāvacarakiriyānaṃ
anya-e0102n:404_2: aññataravasena cha satta vā javanāni javanti, eso tāva pañcadvāre nayo.
anya-e0102n:405_0: Manodvāre pana manodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ tāniyeva. Gotrabhuto uddhaṃ rūpāvacarato
anya-e0102n:405_1: pañca kusalāni pañca kiriyāni, arūpāvacarato cattāri kusalāni cattāri kiriyāni, lokuttarato
anya-e0102n:405_2: cattāri maggacittāni cattāri phalacittānīti imesu yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ hoti, taṃ
anya-e0102n:405_3: taṃ javatīti evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya kusalākusalakiriyavipākaviññāṇānaṃ javanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:406_0: Javanāvasāne pana sace pañcadvāre atimahantaṃ, manodvāre ca vibhūtamārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:406_2: vasena yo yo paccayo laddho hoti, tassa tassa vasena aṭṭhasu sahetukakāmāvacaravipākesu
anya-e0102n:406_3: tīsu vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūsu ca aññataraṃ paṭisotagataṃ nāvaṃ anubandhamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:406_4: kiñci antaraṃ udakamiva bhavaṅgassārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe javitaṃ javanamanubandhaṃ
anya-e0102n:406_5: dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tadetaṃ javanāvasāne bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe
anya-e0102n:406_6: pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattattā tadārammaṇanti
anya-e0102n:406_7: vuccati. Evaṃ ekādasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:407_0: Tadārammaṇāvasāne pana puna bhavaṅgameva pavattati, bhavaṅge vicchinne puna āvajjanādīnīti
anya-e0102n:407_1: evaṃ laddhapaccayacittasantānaṃ bhavaṅgānantaraṃ āvajjanaṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ dassanādīnīti
anya-e0102n:407_2: cittaniyamavaseneva punappunaṃ tāva pavattati, yāva ekasmiṃ bhave bhavaṅgassa parikkhayo.
anya-e0102n:407_3: Ekasmiṃ hi bhave yaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ, taṃ tato cavanattā cutīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:407_4: Tasmā tampi ekūnavīsatividhameva hoti. Evaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ cutivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:408_0: Cutito pana puna paṭisandhi, paṭisandhito puna bhavaṅganti evaṃ bhavagatiṭhitinivāsesu
anya-e0102n:408_1: saṃsaramānānaṃ sattānaṃ avicchinnaṃ cittasantānaṃ pavattatiyeva. Yo panettha arahattaṃ
anya-e0102n:408_2: pāpuṇāti, tassa cuticitte niruddhe niruddhameva hotīti.
anya-e0102n:411_0: 456. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃkiñci vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā vedanākkhandho
anya-e0102n:411_1: veditabbo”ti, etthāpi vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāva. Yathāha – “vedayati vedayatīti
anya-e0102n:411_2: kho āvuso, tasmā vedanāti vuccatī”ti. Sā pana vedayitalakkhaṇena sabhāvato ekavidhāpi
anya-e0102n:411_3: jātivasena tividhā hoti kusalā, akusalā, abyākatā cāti.
anya-e0102n:412_0: Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhantiādinā nayena vuttena
anya-e0102n:412_1: kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā kusalā, akusalena sampayuttā akusalā, abyākatena sampayuttā
anya-e0102n:412_2: abyākatāti veditabbā. Sā sabhāvabhedato pañcavidhā hoti – sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ
anya-e0102n:413_0: Tattha kusalavipākena kāyaviññāṇena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. Akusalavipākena dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:413_1: Kāmāvacarato catūhi kusalehi, catūhi sahetukavipākehi, ekena ahetukavipākena, catūhi
anya-e0102n:413_2: sahetukakiriyehi, ekena ahetukakiriyena, catūhi akusalehi, rūpāvacarato ṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n:413_3: pañcamajjhānaviññāṇaṃ catūhi kusalehi, catūhi vipākehi, catūhi kiriyehi, lokuttaraṃ
anya-e0102n:413_4: pana yasmā ajhānikaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā aṭṭha lokuttarāni pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena
anya-e0102n:413_5: cattālīsaṃ honti. Tesu ṭhapetvā aṭṭha pañcamajjhānikāni sesehi dvattiṃsāya kusalavipākehīti
anya-e0102n:413_6: evaṃ somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayuttaṃ. Domanassaṃ dvīhi akusalehi. Upekkhā
anya-e0102n:414: Tattha iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ sukhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, kāyikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:415: Aniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ milāpanarasaṃ, kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:416: Iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ somanassaṃ, yathā tathā vā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, passaddhipadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:417: Aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ, yathā tathā vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekanteneva hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:418: Majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā upekkhā, sampayuttānaṃ nātiupabrūhanamilāpanarasā, santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, nippītikacittapadaṭṭhānāti.
anya-e0102n:421_0: 457. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃkiñci sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saññākkhandho
anya-e0102n:421_1: veditabbo”ti, etthāpi sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma saññāva. Yathāha – “sañjānāti sañjānātīti
anya-e0102n:421_2: kho, āvuso, tasmā saññāti vuccatī”ti. Sā panesā sañjānanalakkhaṇena sabhāvato ekavidhāpi
anya-e0102n:421_3: jātivasena tividhā hoti kusalā, akusalā, abyākatā ca.
anya-e0102n:422_0: Tattha kusalaviññāṇasampayuttā kusalā, akusalasampayuttā akusalā, abyākatasampayuttā
anya-e0102n:422_1: abyākatā. Na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi, yaṃ saññāya vippayuttaṃ, tasmā yattako viññāṇassa
anya-e0102n:423_0: Sā panesā evaṃ viññāṇena samappabhedāpi lakkhaṇādito sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā, tadevetanti
anya-e0102n:423_1: puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya, yathāgahitanimittavasena
anya-e0102n:426_0: 458. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yaṃkiñci abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saṅkhārakkhandho
anya-e0102n:426_1: veditabbo”ti, ettha abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nāma rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti,
anya-e0102n:426_2: saṅkhārāyeva. Yathāha – “saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā saṅkhārāti
anya-e0102n:426_3: vuccantī”ti. Te abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā, āyūhanarasā, vipphārapaccupaṭṭhānā, sesakhandhattayapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:427: Evaṃ lakkhaṇādito ekavidhāpi ca jātivasena tividhā kusalā, akusalā, abyākatāti. Tesu kusalaviññāṇasampayuttā kusalā. Akusalasampayuttā akusalā. Abyākatasampayuttā abyākatā.
anya-e0102n:428_0: Tattha kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusalaviññāṇasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati,
anya-e0102n:428_1: yevāpanakā cattāro, aniyatā pañcāti chattiṃsa. Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro,
anya-e0102n:428_2: pīti, vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, saddhā, sati, hirī, ottappaṃ, alobho, adoso, amoho,
anya-e0102n:428_3: kāyapassaddhi, cittapassaddhi, kāyalahutā, cittalahutā, kāyamudutā, cittamudutā,
anya-e0102n:428_4: kāyakammaññatā, cittakammaññatā, kāyapāguññatā, cittapāguññatā, kāyujukatā, cittujukatāti
anya-e0102n:428_5: ime sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati. Chando, adhimokkho, manasikāro, tatramajjhattatāti
anya-e0102n:428_6: ime yevāpanakā cattāro. Karuṇā, muditā, kāyaduccaritavirati, vacīduccaritavirati,
anya-e0102n:428_7: micchājīvaviratīti ime aniyatā pañca. Ete hi kadāci uppajjanti, uppajjamānāpi ca
anya-e0102n:429_0: 459. Tattha phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo. Saṅghaṭṭanaraso, sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno,
anya-e0102n:429_1: āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno. Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva
anya-e0102n:429_2: pavattati. Ekadesena ca analliyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:429_3: ārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭeti, tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā
anya-e0102n:429_4: sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno. Tajjāsamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyeneva
anya-e0102n:429_5: uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati. Vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:430_0: 460. Cetayatīti cetanā. Abhisandahatīti attho. Sā cetanābhāvalakkhaṇā, āyūhanarasā,
anya-e0102n:430_2: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussahanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti.
anya-e0102n:431: Vitakkavicārapītīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ pathavīkasiṇaniddese paṭhamajjhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0102n:432_0: 461. Vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ. Taṃ ussahanalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:432_2: vā, sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:433_0: 462. Jīvanti tena, sayaṃ vā jīvati, jīvanamattameva vā tanti jīvitaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīni
anya-e0102n:433_1: panassa rūpajīvite vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Tañhi rūpadhammānaṃ jīvitaṃ, idaṃ arūpadhammānanti
anya-e0102n:434_0: 463. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādhiyati, sammā vā ādhiyati, samādhānamattameva vā etaṃ
anya-e0102n:434_1: cittassāti samādhi. So avisāralakkhaṇo, avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā, sahajātānaṃ sampiṇḍanaraso
anya-e0102n:434_2: nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya, upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno, visesato sukhapadaṭṭhāno, nivāte
anya-e0102n:434_3: dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:435_0: 464. Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā. Sā
anya-e0102n:435_1: saddahanalakkhaṇā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā, pasādanarasā udakappasādakamaṇi viya, pakkhandanarasā
anya-e0102n:435_2: vā oghuttaraṇo viya. Akālussiyapaccupaṭṭhānā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā vā, saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā,
anya-e0102n:435_3: saddhammassavanādisotāpattiyaṅga padaṭṭhānā vā, hatthavittabījāni viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:436_0: 465. Saranti tāya, sayaṃ vā sarati saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati. Sā apilāpanalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:436_2: kāyādisatipaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ārammaṇe daḷhapatiṭṭhitattā pana esikā viya, cakkhudvārādirakkhaṇato
anya-e0102n:437_0: 466. Kāyaduccaritādīhi hiriyatīti hirī. Lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehiyeva ottappatīti
anya-e0102n:437_1: ottappaṃ. Pāpato ubbegassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī.
anya-e0102n:437_2: Uttāsanalakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ. Lajjākārena pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā hirī. Uttāsākārena ottappaṃ.
anya-e0102n:437_3: Vuttappakāreneva ca pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānā etā, attagāravaparagāravapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:437_4: Attānaṃ garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ jahāti kulavadhū viya. Paraṃ garuṃ katvā ottappena
anya-e0102n:437_5: pāpaṃ jahāti vesiyā viya. Ime ca pana dve dhammā lokapālakāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:438_0: 467. Na lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho.
anya-e0102n:438_1: Adosāmohesupi eseva nayo. Tesu alobho ārammaṇe cittassa agedhalakkhaṇo, alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0102n:438_2: vā kamaladale jalabindu viya. Apariggaharaso muttabhikkhu viya, anallīnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
anya-e0102n:439: 468. Adoso acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo, avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto viya, āghātavinayaraso, pariḷāhavinayaraso vā candanaṃ viya, sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno puṇṇacando viya.
anya-e0102n:440_1: viya, visayobhāsanaraso padīpo viya. Asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno araññagatasudesako viya.
anya-e0102n:441_0: 470. Kāyassa passambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittassa passambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti
anya-e0102n:441_1: cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā
anya-e0102n:442_0: Kāyassa lahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittassa lahubhāvo cittalahutā. Tā kāyacittagarubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:443_0: Kāyassa mudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittassa mudubhāvo cittamudutā. Tā kāyacittatthambhavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:444_0: Kāyassa kammaññabhāvo kāyakammaññatā. Cittassa kammaññabhāvo cittakammaññatā. Tā
anya-e0102n:444_3: pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā, hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhamabhāvāvahā suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:445_0: Kāyassa pāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittassa pāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ
anya-e0102n:446_0: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Tā kāyacittaajjavalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:447_0: 471. Chandoti kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā so kattukāmatālakkhaṇo chando,
anya-e0102n:447_2: Ārammaṇaggahaṇe ayaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:448: 472. Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno, sanniṭṭheyyadhammapadaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:449: 473. Kiriyā kāro. Manamhi kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisamanaṃ karotītipi manasikāro. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako, vīthipaṭipādako, javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro.
anya-e0102n:450_0: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭipādako manamhi kāroti manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0102n:450_2: ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathi viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pana
anya-e0102n:451_0: 474. Tesu dhammesu majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:451_2: cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanabhāvena samappavattānaṃ ājānīyānaṃ ajjhupekkhakasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:452: Karuṇāmuditā ca brahmavihāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi tā appanāppattā rūpāvacarā, imā kāmāvacarāti ayameva viseso.
anya-e0102n:453: Keci pana mettupekkhāyopi aniyatesu icchanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Atthato hi adosoyeva mettā, tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva upekkhāti.
anya-e0102n:454_0: 475. Kāyaduccaritato virati kāyaduccaritavirati. Esa nayo sesāsupi. Lakkhaṇādito
anya-e0102n:454_1: panetā tissopi kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā, amaddanalakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:455: 476. Iti imeva chattiṃsa saṅkhārā paṭhamena kāmāvacarakusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
anya-e0102n:456: Tatiyena pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Tathā catutthena. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
anya-e0102n:457_0: Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti. Yathā
anya-e0102n:457_1: ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso. Sattamena
anya-e0102n:457_2: ca pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Tathā aṭṭhamena. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
anya-e0102n:458_0: Paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ sesā rūpāvacarakusalesu paṭhamena sampayogaṃ
anya-e0102n:458_1: gacchanti. Dutiyena tato vitakkavajjā. Tatiyena tato vicāravajjā. Catutthena tato
anya-e0102n:458_2: pītivajjā. Pañcamena tato aniyatesu karuṇāmuditāvajjā. Teyeva catūsu āruppakusalesu.
anya-e0102n:459_0: Lokuttaresu paṭhamajjhānike tāva maggaviññāṇe paṭhamarūpāvacaraviññāṇe vuttanayena,
anya-e0102n:459_2: pana abhāvo, niyataviratitā, lokuttaratā cāti ayamettha viseso. Evaṃ tāva kusalāyeva saṅkhārā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:460_0: 477. Akusalesu lobhamūle paṭhamākusalasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā terasa,
anya-e0102n:460_1: yevāpanakā cattāroti sattarasa. Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, pīti, vīriyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:460_2: jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, lobho, moho, micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpena
anya-e0102n:460_3: āgatā terasa. Chando, adhimokkho, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti ime yevāpanakā cattāro.
anya-e0102n:461_0: 478. Tattha na hiriyatīti ahiriko. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Na otappatīti anottappaṃ.
anya-e0102n:461_1: Tesu ahirikaṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Anottappaṃ
anya-e0102n:461_2: teheva asārajjalakkhaṇaṃ, anuttāsalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
anya-e0102n:462_0: 479. Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Muyhanti
anya-e0102n:462_1: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. Tesu lobho ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo
anya-e0102n:462_2: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṃsapesi viya. Apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
anya-e0102n:462_4: vaḍḍhamāno sīghasotā nadī iva mahāsamuddaṃ apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:463_0: 480. Moho cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo, aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso
anya-e0102n:464_0: 481. Micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattaṃ vā esāti
anya-e0102n:464_1: micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
anya-e0102n:465_0: 482. Uddhatabhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
anya-e0102n:465_2: viya, cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ, cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:465_3: Sesā kusale vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Akusalabhāvoyeva hi akusalabhāvena ca lāmakattaṃ etesaṃ tehi viseso.
anya-e0102n:466_0: 483. Iti ime sattarasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena akusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0102n:466_1: veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa
anya-e0102n:467_0: Tattha thinanatā thinaṃ. Middhanatā middhaṃ. Anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighāto cāti
anya-e0102n:467_1: attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:468_0: Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Māno panettha
anya-e0102n:468_1: aniyato hoti. Ayaṃ viseso, so uṇṇatilakkhaṇo, sampaggaharaso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno,
anya-e0102n:469_0: Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi ca māno
anya-e0102n:469_1: aniyatesu hotiyeva. Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ
anya-e0102n:469_2: gacchanti. Yathā ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa
anya-e0102n:469_3: ca aniyatabhāvo viseso. Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:469_4: Māno panettha aniyato hoti. Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:470_0: 484. Dosamūlesu pana dvīsu paṭhamasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekādasa,
anya-e0102n:470_1: yevāpanakā cattāro, aniyatā tayoti aṭṭhārasa. Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro,
anya-e0102n:470_2: vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ, anoppattaṃ, doso, mohoti ime sarūpena āgatā
anya-e0102n:470_3: ekādasa. Chando, adhimokkho, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti ime yevāpanakā cattāro. Issā,
anya-e0102n:471_0: 485. Tattha dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti doso. So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo
anya-e0102n:471_1: pahaṭāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi
anya-e0102n:471_2: viya. Dūsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno, visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:472: 486. Issāyanā issā. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā. Tattheva anabhiratirasā, tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā, saṃyojananti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:473_0: 487. Maccharabhāvo macchariyaṃ. Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:473_2: kaṭukañcukatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ, cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:474_0: 488. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ. Tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:474_1: vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ, dāsabyamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesā vuttappakārāyevāti.
anya-e0102n:475: Iti ime aṭṭhārasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena dosamūlena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā pana aniyatesu ca thinamiddhasambhavova viseso.
anya-e0102n:476_0: 489. Mohamūlesu dvīsu vicikicchāsampayuttena tāva phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro,
anya-e0102n:476_1: vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, cittaṭṭhiti, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, moho, vicikicchāti sarūpena
anya-e0102n:476_2: āgatā ekādasa, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti yevāpanakā dve cāti terasa.
anya-e0102n:477_0: 490. Tattha cittaṭṭhitīti pavattiṭṭhitimatto dubbalo samādhi. Vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā.
anya-e0102n:478_0: Uddhaccasampayuttena vicikicchāsampayutte vuttesu ṭhapetvā vicikicchaṃ sesā dvādasa.
anya-e0102n:478_1: Vicikicchāya abhāvena panettha adhimokkho uppajjati. Tena saddhiṃ teraseva, adhimokkhasabbhāvato
anya-e0102n:478_2: ca balavataro samādhi hoti. Yañcettha uddhaccaṃ, taṃ sarūpeneva āgataṃ. Adhimokkhamanasikārā
anya-e0102n:479_0: 491. Abyākatesu vipākābyākatā tāva ahetukasahetukabhedato duvidhā. Tesu ahetukavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā
anya-e0102n:479_1: ahetukā. Tattha kusalākusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tāva phasso, cetanā, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:479_2: cittaṭṭhitīti sarūpena āgatā cattāro, yevāpanako manasikāroyevāti pañca. Sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasampayuttāpi
anya-e0102n:479_3: eteyeva. Ubhayavipākamanodhātuyā ete ceva vitakkavicārādhimokkhā cāti aṭṭha, tathā
anya-e0102n:479_4: tividhāyapi ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā. Yā panettha somanassasahagatā, tāya saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:480_1: tāva aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalehi sampayuttasaṅkhārasadisāyeva. Yā pana tā aniyatesu
anya-e0102n:480_2: karuṇāmuditā, tā sattārammaṇattā vipākesu na santi. Ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā.
anya-e0102n:480_3: Na kevalañca karuṇāmuditā, viratiyopi vipākesu na santi. “Pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:482_2: pana vīriyaṃ adhikaṃ. Vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti. Ayamettha viseso.
anya-e0102n:483_1: tāva ṭhapetvā viratiyo aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalehi sampayuttasaṅkhārasadisā. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyasampayuttā
anya-e0102n:483_2: pana sabbākārenapi tesaṃ kusalaviññāṇasampayuttasadisāyevāti evaṃ abyākatāpi saṅkhārā veditabbāti.
anya-e0102n:485: Idaṃ tāva abhidhamme padabhājanīyanayena khandhesu vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:488_0: “Yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ
anya-e0102n:488_1: vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā
anya-e0102n:488_2: ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho. Yā kāci vedanā… yā kāci saññā… ye keci saṅkhārā… yaṃkiñci
anya-e0102n:488_3: viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe… abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṃ vuccati viññāṇakkhandho”ti –
anya-e0102n:490_0: Tattha yaṃkiñcīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Rūpanti atippasaṅganiyamanaṃ. Evaṃ padadvayenāpi
anya-e0102n:490_1: rūpassa anavasesapariggaho kato hoti. Athassa atītādinā vibhāgaṃ ārabhati. Tañhi
anya-e0102n:490_2: kiñci atītaṃ, kiñci anāgatādibhedanti. Esa nayo vedanādīsu.
anya-e0102n:491: 494. Tattha rūpaṃ tāva addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti. Tathā anāgatapaccuppannaṃ.
anya-e0102n:492: Tattha addhāvasena tāva ekassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito pubbe atītaṃ, cutito uddhaṃ anāgataṃ, ubhinnamantare paccuppannaṃ.
anya-e0102n:493_1: paccuppannaṃ, tato pubbe visabhāgautuāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ. Cittajaṃ
anya-e0102n:493_2: ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattisamuṭṭhānaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā
anya-e0102n:493_3: anāgataṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānassa pāṭiyekkaṃ santativasena atītādibhedo natthi, tesaññeva
anya-e0102n:493_4: pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:494: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattindivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānaṃ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma, tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ.
anya-e0102n:495_0: Khaṇavasena uppādādikhaṇattayapariyāpannaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tato pubbe anāgataṃ, pacchā
anya-e0102n:495_1: atītaṃ. Apica atikkantahetupaccayakiccaṃ atītaṃ, niṭṭhitahetukiccaṃ aniṭṭhitapaccayakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:495_2: paccuppannaṃ, ubhayakiccaṃ asampattaṃ anāgataṃ. Sakiccakkhaṇe vā paccuppannaṃ, tato
anya-e0102n:495_3: pubbe anāgataṃ, pacchā atītaṃ. Ettha ca khaṇādikathāva nippariyāyā. Sesā sapariyāyā.
anya-e0102n:496: 495. Ajjhattabahiddhābhedo vuttanayo eva. Apica idha niyakajjhattampi ajjhattaṃ parapuggalikampi ca bahiddhāti veditabbaṃ. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo vuttanayova.
anya-e0102n:497_0: 496. Hīnapaṇītabhedo duvidho pariyāyato nippariyāyato ca. Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato
anya-e0102n:497_1: sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ hīnaṃ. Tadeva sudassānaṃ rūpato paṇītaṃ. Evaṃ yāva narakasattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:497_2: rūpaṃ, tāva pariyāyato hīnapaṇītatā veditabbā. Nippariyāyato pana yattha akusalavipākaṃ
anya-e0102n:497_3: uppajjati, taṃ hīnaṃ. Yattha kusalavipākaṃ, taṃ paṇītaṃ.
anya-e0102n:498: Dūre santiketi idampi vuttanayameva. Apica okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:499_0: 497. Tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvāti taṃ atītādīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0102n:499_1: niddiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sabbaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇasaṅkhāte ekavidhabhāve paññāya rāsiṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:499_2: rūpakkhandhoti vuccatīti ayamettha attho. Etena sabbampi rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇe rāsibhāvūpagamanena
anya-e0102n:499_3: rūpakkhandhoti dassitaṃ hoti. Na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:500: 498. Yathā ca rūpaṃ, evaṃ vedanādayopi vedayitalakkhaṇādīsu rāsibhāvūpagamanena. Na hi vedanādīhi aññe vedanākkhandhādayo nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:501_0: Atītādivibhāge panettha santativasena khaṇādivasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo
anya-e0102n:501_2: ca paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Khaṇādivasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā
anya-e0102n:501_3: pubbantāparantamajjhattagatā sakiccañca kurumānā vedanā paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā,
anya-e0102n:502_0: 499. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo “akusalā vedanā oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:502_1: nayena vibhaṅge vuttena jātisabhāvapuggalalokiyalokuttaravasena veditabbo. Jātivasena
anya-e0102n:502_2: tāva akusalā vedanā sāvajjakiriyahetuto, kilesasantāpabhāvato ca avūpasantavuttīti
anya-e0102n:502_3: kusalavedanāya oḷārikā, sabyāpārato, saussāhato, savipākato, kilesasantāpabhāvato,
anya-e0102n:502_4: sāvajjato ca vipākābyākatāya oḷārikā, savipākato, kilesasantāpabhāvato, sabyābajjhato,
anya-e0102n:502_5: sāvajjato ca kiriyābyākatāya oḷārikā. Kusalābyākatā pana vuttavipariyāyato akusalāya
anya-e0102n:502_6: sukhumā. Dvepi kusalākusalavedanā sabyāpārato, saussāhato, savipākato ca yathāyogaṃ
anya-e0102n:502_7: duvidhāyapi abyākatāya oḷārikā, vuttavipariyāyena duvidhāpi abyākatā tāhi sukhumā.
anya-e0102n:503_0: 500. Sabhāvavasena pana dukkhā vedanā nirassādato, savipphārato, khobhakaraṇato,
anya-e0102n:503_1: ubbejanīyato, abhibhavanato ca itarāhi dvīhi oḷārikā, itarā pana dve sātato, santato,
anya-e0102n:503_2: paṇītato, manāpato, majjhattato ca yathāyogaṃ dukkhāya sukhumā. Ubho pana sukhadukkhā
anya-e0102n:503_3: savipphārato, khobhakaraṇato, pākaṭato ca adukkhamasukhāya oḷārikā, sā vuttavipariyāyena
anya-e0102n:503_4: tadubhayato sukhumā. Evaṃ sabhāvavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:504: 501. Puggalavasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā nānārammaṇe vikkhittabhāvato samāpannassa vedanāya oḷārikā, vipariyāyena itarā sukhumā. Evaṃ puggalavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:505_0: Lokiyalokuttaravasena pana sāsavā vedanā lokiyā, sā āsavuppattihetuto, oghaniyato,
anya-e0102n:505_1: yoganiyato, ganthaniyato, nīvaraṇiyato, upādāniyato, saṃkilesikato, puthujjanasādhāraṇato
anya-e0102n:505_2: ca anāsavāya oḷārikā. Sā vipariyāyena sāsavāya sukhumā. Evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena
anya-e0102n:506_1: hi vedanā jātivasena abyākatattā sukhumāpi samānā sabhāvādivasena oḷārikā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0102n:506_2: “abyākatā vedanā sukhumā. Dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā. Samāpannassa vedanā sukhumā. Asamāpannassa
anya-e0102n:506_3: vedanā oḷārikā. Sāsavā vedanā oḷārikā. Anāsavā vedanā sukhumā”ti. Yathā ca dukkhā
anya-e0102n:506_4: vedanā, evaṃ sukhādayopi jātivasena oḷārikā sabhāvādivasena sukhumā honti. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:506_5: yathā jātiādivasena sambhedo na hoti, tathā vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:506_6: Seyyathidaṃ – abyākatā jātivasena kusalākusalāhi sukhumā. Tattha katamā abyākatā?
anya-e0102n:506_7: Kiṃ dukkhā? Kiṃ sukhā? Kiṃ samāpannassa? Kiṃ asamāpannassa? Kiṃ sāsavā? Kiṃ anāsavāti?
anya-e0102n:506_8: Evaṃ sabhāvādibhedo na parāmasitabbo. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0102n:507_0: Apica taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā oḷārikasukhumā daṭṭhabbāti vacanato
anya-e0102n:507_1: akusalādīsupi lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatā vedanā aggi viya attano nissayadahanato
anya-e0102n:507_2: oḷārikā, lobhasahagatā sukhumā. Dosasahagatāpi niyatā oḷārikā, aniyatā sukhumā. Niyatāpi
anya-e0102n:507_3: kappaṭṭhitikā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Kappaṭṭhitikāsupi asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, itarā
anya-e0102n:507_4: sukhumā. Lobhasahagatā pana diṭṭhisampayuttā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Sāpi niyatā
anya-e0102n:507_5: kappaṭṭhitikā asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Avisesena ca akusalā bahuvipākā
anya-e0102n:507_6: oḷārikā, appavipākā sukhumā. Kusalā pana appavipākā oḷārikā, bahuvipākā sukhumā.
anya-e0102n:508_0: Apica kāmāvacarakusalā oḷārikā. Rūpāvacarā sukhumā. Tato arūpāvacarā. Tato lokuttarā.
anya-e0102n:508_1: Kāmāvacarā dānamayā oḷārikā. Sīlamayā sukhumā. Tato bhāvanāmayā. Bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā
anya-e0102n:508_2: oḷārikā. Tihetukā sukhumā. Tihetukāpi sasaṅkhārikā oḷārikā. Asaṅkhārikā sukhumā.
anya-e0102n:508_3: Rūpāvacarā ca paṭhamajjhānikā oḷārikā…pe… pañcamajjhānikā sukhumā. Arūpāvacarā ca
anya-e0102n:508_5: Lokuttarā ca sotāpattimaggasampayuttā oḷārikā…pe… arahattamaggasampayuttā sukhumāva.
anya-e0102n:508_6: Esa nayo taṃ taṃ bhūmivipākakiriyavedanāsu ca dukkhādiasamāpannādisāsavādivasena vuttavedanāsu ca.
anya-e0102n:509_0: Okāsavasena cāpi niraye dukkhā oḷārikā. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ sukhumā…pe… paranimmitavasavattīsu
anya-e0102n:509_1: sukhumāva. Yathā ca dukkhā, evaṃ sukhāpi sabbattha yathānurūpaṃ yojetabbā. Vatthuvasena
anya-e0102n:509_2: cāpi hīnavatthukā yā kāci vedanā oḷārikā, paṇītavatthukā sukhumā.
anya-e0102n:510: Hīnapaṇītabhede yā oḷārikā, sā hīnā. Yā ca sukhumā, sā paṇītāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:511_0: 503. Dūrapadaṃ pana “akusalā vedanā kusalābyākatāhi vedanāhi dūre”. Santikepadaṃ
anya-e0102n:511_1: “akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya santike”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge vibhattaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:511_2: akusalā vedanā visabhāgato, asaṃsaṭṭhato, asarikkhato ca kusalābyākatāhi dūre, tathā
anya-e0102n:511_3: kusalābyākatā akusalāya. Esa nayo sabbavāresu. Akusalā pana vedanā sabhāgato, sarikkhato
anya-e0102n:511_4: ca akusalāya santiketi. Idaṃ vedanākkhandhassa atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:518: Tattha kamatoti idha uppattikkamo, pahānakkamo, paṭipattikkamo, bhūmikkamo, desanākkamoti bahuvidho kamo.
anya-e0102n:519_0: Tattha “paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hoti, kalalā hoti abbuda”nti evamādi uppattikkamo. “Dassanena
anya-e0102n:519_1: pahātabbā dhammā, bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā”ti evamādi pahānakkamo. “Sīlavisuddhi,
anya-e0102n:519_2: cittavisuddhī”ti evamādi paṭipattikkamo. “Kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā”ti evamādi bhūmikkamo.
anya-e0102n:519_3: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā”ti vā, “dānakathaṃ, sīlakatha”nti vā
anya-e0102n:519_4: evamādi desanākkamo. Tesu idha uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati, kalalādīnaṃ viya khandhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:519_5: pubbāpariyavavatthānena anuppattito. Na pahānakkamo, kusalābyākatānaṃ appahātabbato.
anya-e0102n:519_6: Napaṭipattikkamo, akusalānaṃ appaṭipajjanīyato. Na bhūmikkamo, vedanādīnaṃ catubhūmipariyāpannattā.
anya-e0102n:520_0: Abhedena hi pañcasu khandhesu attagāhapatitaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanena
anya-e0102n:520_1: attagāhato mocetukāmo bhagavā hitakāmo tassa tassa janassa sukhagahaṇatthaṃ cakkhuādīnampi
anya-e0102n:520_2: visayabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ desesi. Tato iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ
anya-e0102n:520_3: vedanaṃ. “Yaṃ vedayati, taṃ sañjānātī”ti evaṃ vedanāvisayassa ākāragāhikaṃ saññaṃ.
anya-e0102n:520_4: Saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake saṅkhāre. Tesaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nissayaṃ adhipatibhūtañca
anya-e0102n:520_5: nesaṃ viññāṇanti evaṃ tāva kamato vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:521: 505. Visesatoti khandhānañca upādānakkhandhānañca visesato. Ko pana nesaṃ viseso, khandhā tāva avisesato vuttā. Upādānakkhandhā sāsavaupādāniyabhāvena visesetvā. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:522_0: “Pañca ceva vo, bhikkhave, khandhe desessāmi pañcupādānakkhandhe ca, taṃ suṇātha.
anya-e0102n:522_1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, pañcakkhandhā, yaṃkiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:522_2: santike vā, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, rūpakkhandho. Yā kāci vedanā…pe… yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:522_3: santike vā, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, viññāṇakkhandho. Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pañcakkhandhā.
anya-e0102n:522_4: Katame ca, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhā. Yaṃkiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ…pe… santike
anya-e0102n:522_5: vā sāsavaṃ upādāniyaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, rūpupādānakkhandho. Yā kāci vedanā…pe…
anya-e0102n:522_6: yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ…pe… santike vā sāsavaṃ upādāniyaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
anya-e0102n:523_0: Ettha ca yathā vedanādayo anāsavāpi atthi, na evaṃ rūpaṃ. Yasmā panassa rāsaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:523_1: khandhabhāvo yujjati, tasmā khandhesu vuttaṃ. Yasmā rāsaṭṭhena ca sāsavaṭṭhena ca
anya-e0102n:523_2: upādānakkhandhabhāvo yujjati, tasmā upādānakkhandhesu vuttaṃ. Vedanādayo pana anāsavāva
anya-e0102n:523_3: khandhesu vuttā. Sāsavā upādānakkhandhesu. Upādānakkhandhāti cettha upādānagocarā
anya-e0102n:523_4: khandhā upādānakkhandhāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:524_0: 506. Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā pañceva khandhā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
anya-e0102n:524_2: Anekappabhedesu hi saṅkhatadhammesu sabhāgavasena saṅgayhamānesu rūpampi rūpasabhāgekasaṅgahavasena
anya-e0102n:524_3: eko khandho hoti. Vedanā vedanāsabhāgekasaṅgahavasena eko khandho hoti. Esa nayo
anya-e0102n:524_4: saññādīsu. Tasmā sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgahato pañceva vuttā. Etaparamañcetaṃ attattaniyagāhavatthu
anya-e0102n:524_5: yadidaṃ rūpādayo pañca. Vuttañhetaṃ “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:524_6: abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti. Vedanāya,
anya-e0102n:524_7: saññāya, saṅkhāresu, viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṃ upādāya viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi
anya-e0102n:524_8: uppajjati ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti. Tasmā attattaniyagāhavatthussa
anya-e0102n:524_9: etaparamatopi pañceva vuttā. Yepi caññe sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhā vuttā, tepi
anya-e0102n:524_10: saṅkhārakkhandhe pariyāpannattā ettheva avarodhaṃ gacchanti. Tasmā aññesaṃ tadavarodhatopi
anya-e0102n:524_11: pañceva vuttāti evaṃ anūnādhikato vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:525_0: 507. Upamātoti ettha hi gilānasālupamo rūpupādānakkhandho, gilānupamassa viññāṇupādānakkhandhassa
anya-e0102n:525_4: abhisaṅkharontī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā “akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ
anya-e0102n:525_5: kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagata”nti. Gilānupamo viññāṇupādānakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:525_7: ete bhājanabhojanabyañjanaparivesakabhuñjakūpamā cāti evaṃ upamāto vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:526_0: 508. Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti saṅkhepato vitthārato cāti evaṃ dvidhā daṭṭhabbatopettha
anya-e0102n:526_1: vinicchayanayo viññātabbo. Saṅkhepato hi pañcupādānakkhandhā āsīvisūpame vuttanayena
anya-e0102n:526_4: pheṇapiṇḍo viya rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, parimaddanāsahanato. Udakapubbuḷaṃ viya vedanā,
anya-e0102n:526_5: muhuttaramaṇīyato. Marīcikā viya saññā, vippalambhanato. Kadalikkhandho viya saṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n:526_6: asārakato. Māyā viya viññāṇaṃ, vañcakato. Visesato ca suḷārampi ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:526_7: asubhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedanā tīhi dukkhatāhi avinimuttato dukkhāti. Saññāsaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:526_8: avidheyyato anattāti. Viññāṇaṃ udayabbayadhammato aniccanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:527_0: 509. Evaṃ passantassatthasiddhitoti evañca saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā passato
anya-e0102n:527_1: yā atthasiddhi hoti, tatopi vinicchayanayo viññātabbo. Seyyathidaṃ – saṅkhepato tāva
anya-e0102n:527_2: pañcupādānakkhandhe ukkhittāsikapaccatthikādibhāvena passanto khandhehi na vihaññati.
anya-e0102n:527_3: Vitthārato pana rūpādīni pheṇapiṇḍādisadisabhāvena passanto na asāresu sāradassī hoti.
anya-e0102n:528_0: Visesato ca ajjhattikarūpaṃ asubhato passanto kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānāti, asubhe
anya-e0102n:528_1: subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati. Kāmoghaṃ uttarati, kāmayogena visaṃyujjati, kāmāsavena
anya-e0102n:528_2: anāsavo hoti, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ bhindati, kāmupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
anya-e0102n:529_0: Vedanaṃ dukkhato passanto phassāhāraṃ parijānāti, dukkhe sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:529_1: bhavoghaṃ uttarati, bhavayogena visaṃyujjati, bhavāsavena anāsavo hoti, byāpādakāyaganthaṃ
anya-e0102n:530_0: Saññaṃ saṅkhāre ca anattato passanto manosañcetanāhāraṃ parijānāti, anattani attāti
anya-e0102n:530_1: vipallāsaṃ pajahati, diṭṭhoghaṃ uttarati, diṭṭhiyogena visaṃyujjati, diṭṭhāsavena
anya-e0102n:530_2: anāsavo hoti. Idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthaṃ bhindati, attavādupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
anya-e0102n:531_0: Viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti, anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:531_1: avijjoghaṃ uttarati, avijjāyogena visaṃyujjati, avijjāsavena anāsavo hoti, sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ
anya-e0102n:540_0: 510. Āyatanānīti dvādasāyatanāni – cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:540_1: ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:541: Attha lakkhaṇa tāvatva, kama saṅkhepa vitthārā;
anya-e0102n:543_0: Tattha visesato tāva cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti
anya-e0102n:543_1: rūpaṃ, vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ.
anya-e0102n:543_2: Sappatīti saddo, udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Gandhayatīti gandho. Attano
anya-e0102n:543_3: vatthuṃ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṃ sattāti raso, assādentīti
anya-e0102n:543_4: attho. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusiyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:543_5: Munātīti mano. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā.
anya-e0102n:544_0: 511. Avisesato pana āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:544_1: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā
anya-e0102n:544_2: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti, vāyamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca āyabhūte dhamme
anya-e0102n:544_3: etāni tanonti, vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti, idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva
anya-e0102n:544_4: āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:544_5: Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n:545_1: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu
anya-e0102n:545_2: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane
anya-e0102n:545_3: pana “manoramme āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho
anya-e0102n:545_4: gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati
anya-e0102n:546_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
anya-e0102n:546_1: ca nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti
anya-e0102n:546_2: cakkhādayo nesaṃ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:546_3: samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ sañjātideso, tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva
anya-e0102n:546_4: uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tesaṃ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,
anya-e0102n:546_6: kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n:547: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:548: 513. Lakkhaṇāti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:549_0: Tāvatvatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva, evaṃ sati
anya-e0102n:549_1: dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanānīti vuttānīti ce. Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
anya-e0102n:549_2: idha channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayametesaṃ
anya-e0102n:549_3: bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni, cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa
anya-e0102n:549_4: cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṃ, tathā itarāni itaresaṃ.
anya-e0102n:549_5: Chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadesova uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇameva
anya-e0102n:549_6: ca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇanti. Iti channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
anya-e0102n:549_7: dvādasa vuttānīti evamettha tāvatvato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:550_0: 514. Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. Ajjhattikesu
anya-e0102n:550_1: hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṃ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:550_3: bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṃ desitāni, tato ghānāyatanādīni
anya-e0102n:550_4: tīṇi, pañcannampi gocaravisayattā ante manāyatanaṃ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pana gocarattā
anya-e0102n:550_5: tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
anya-e0102n:550_6: ayametesaṃ kamo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:550_7: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti. Evaṃ kamatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:551_0: 515. Saṅkhepavitthārāti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca
anya-e0102n:551_1: nāmena tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṃ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva
anya-e0102n:551_2: honti. Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
anya-e0102n:551_3: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṃ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
anya-e0102n:551_8: sabhāvanānattabhedato anekappabhedanti. Evaṃ saṅkhepavitthārā viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:552_0: 516. Daṭṭhabbatoti ettha pana sabbāneva saṅkhatāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato
anya-e0102n:552_1: ca daṭṭhabbāni. Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti, napi uddhaṃ vayā kuhiñci
anya-e0102n:552_2: gacchanti, atha kho pubbe udayā appaṭiladdhasabhāvāni, uddhaṃ vayā paribhinnasabhāvāni,
anya-e0102n:552_3: pubbantāparantavemajjhe paccayāyattavuttitāya avasāni pavattanti. Tasmā anāgamanato
anya-e0102n:552_4: aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Tathā nirīhakato abyāpārato ca. Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:552_5: evaṃ hoti “aho vata amhākaṃ sāmaggiyaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjeyyā”ti, na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:552_6: dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti, atha
anya-e0102n:552_7: kho dhammatāvesā, yaṃ cakkhurūpādisāmaggiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavantīti. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:552_8: nirīhakato abyāpārato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0102n:552_10: abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhu, bhikkhave, haññati manāpāmanāpehi rūpehī”ti
anya-e0102n:552_11: vitthāro. Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṃ gocarā viyāti.
anya-e0102n:555_0: 517. Tadanantarā pana dhātuyoti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n:555_1: sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n:555_2: jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n:558_0: Tattha atthatoti cakkhatīti cakkhu. Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti
anya-e0102n:558_1: evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṃ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo. Avisesena pana
anya-e0102n:558_2: vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṃ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi
anya-e0102n:558_3: dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ,
anya-e0102n:558_4: anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti. Bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya, sattehi dhīyante,
anya-e0102n:558_5: dhāriyantīti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cesā, avasavattanato. Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi
anya-e0102n:558_6: saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati. Tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati, ṭhapiyatīti
anya-e0102n:558_7: attho. Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati, dhīyatītiādinā atthavasena dhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:559_0: 518. Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā, etā pana attano
anya-e0102n:559_1: sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā dhātuyoti
anya-e0102n:559_2: vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viya dhātuyo. Vicittā hete ñāṇañeyyāvayavāti. Yathā vā
anya-e0102n:559_4: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
anya-e0102n:559_5: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Apica dhātūti
anya-e0102n:559_6: nijjīvamattassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā “cha dhāturo ayaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n:560: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ dhātu ca cakkhudhātu…pe… manoviññāṇañca taṃ dhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātūti. Evaṃ tāvettha atthato veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:561: 519. Lakkhaṇāditoti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇāditopettha veditabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:562_0: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. So ca panāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:562_1: hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasena vutto. Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūti idañhi dvayaṃ hetu,
anya-e0102n:563_0: 520. Tāvatvatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tesu tesu hi suttābhidhammappadesesu
anya-e0102n:563_7: “anekadhātu nānādhātu loko”ti evamādayo aññāpi dhātuyo dissanti. Evaṃ sati sabbāsaṃ
anya-e0102n:563_8: vasena paricchedaṃ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce. Sabhāvato
anya-e0102n:564_0: Rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātu, subhadhātu pana rūpādipaṭibaddhā. Kasmā, subhanimittattā.
anya-e0102n:564_1: Subhanimittañhi subhadhātu. Tañca rūpādivinimuttaṃ na vijjati. Kusalavipākārammaṇā
anya-e0102n:564_2: vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā. Ākāsānañcāyatanadhātuādīsu cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:564_3: manoviññāṇadhātuyeva, sesā dhammadhātu. Saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu pana sabhāvato
anya-e0102n:565_0: Kāmadhātu dhammadhātumattaṃ vā hoti. Yathāha – “tattha katamā kāmadhātu? Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto
anya-e0102n:565_1: takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti. Aṭṭhārasāpi vā dhātuyo. Yathāha – “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ
anya-e0102n:565_2: pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
anya-e0102n:565_3: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:566_0: Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva, “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vacanato
anya-e0102n:567_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītadhātuyo aṭṭhārasa dhātumattameva. Hīnā hi cakkhādayo hīnā dhātu,
anya-e0102n:567_1: majjhimapaṇītā majjhimā ceva paṇītā ca. Nippariyāyena pana akusalā dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo
anya-e0102n:567_2: hīnadhātu, lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu, lokuttarā
anya-e0102n:568: Pathavītejovāyodhātuyo phoṭṭhabbadhātuyeva, āpodhātu ākāsadhātu ca dhammadhātuyeva. Viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātusaṅkhepoyeva.
anya-e0102n:569_0: Sattarasa dhātuyo dhammadhātuekadeso ca saṅkhatadhātu, asaṅkhatā pana dhātu dhammadhātuekadesova.
anya-e0102n:569_1: Anekadhātunānādhātuloko pana aṭṭhārasa dhātuppabhedamattamevāti. Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ
anya-e0102n:570_0: 521. Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ saññāsamūhananatthampi aṭṭhāraseva
anya-e0102n:570_1: vuttā. Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino, tesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedena
anya-e0102n:570_2: tassa anekataṃ cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṃ
anya-e0102n:570_3: jīvasaññaṃ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā. Kiñca bhiyyo tathā
anya-e0102n:570_4: veneyyajjhāsayavasena ca. Ye ca imāya anatisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyasattā,
anya-e0102n:576_0: 522. Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
anya-e0102n:576_2: pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena
anya-e0102n:576_3: dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātuyo. Manodhātu
anya-e0102n:576_5: gacchati. Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ soḷasannaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ asaṅkhatāya
anya-e0102n:576_6: ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena
anya-e0102n:576_7: chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Evamettha saṅkhatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:577_0: 523. Paccayāti ettha ca cakkhudhātu tāva cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā vippayuttapurejātaatthiavigatanissayindriyapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0102n:577_1: vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0102n:577_2: vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ sotadhātusaddadhātuādayo.
anya-e0102n:577_4: pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, tā ca pañcapi sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyā. Tathā sampaṭicchanamanodhātu
anya-e0102n:577_6: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā. Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:577_7: tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Esa tāva pañcadvāre nayo.
anya-e0102n:578_1: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Dhammadhātu
anya-e0102n:578_3: bahudhā paccayo hoti. Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:578_4: ārammaṇapaccayādīhipi paccayā honti. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnañca na kevalaṃ cakkhurūpādayo
anya-e0102n:578_5: paccayā honti, atha kho ālokādayopi. Tenāhu pubbācariyā –
anya-e0102n:579_1: paṭicca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṃ. Ghānagandhavāyumanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:579_3: paṭicca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Bhavaṅgamanadhammamanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:580: Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:581_0: 524. Daṭṭhabbatoti daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo
anya-e0102n:582_0: Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya rūpadhātu, saddo
anya-e0102n:582_1: viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṃ viya rūpadhātu,
anya-e0102n:582_2: mukhanimittaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Atha vā ucchutilā viya cakkhudhātu, yantacakkayaṭṭhi
anya-e0102n:582_3: viya rūpadhātu, ucchurasatelāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇī viya cakkhudhātu,
anya-e0102n:582_4: uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsu.
anya-e0102n:583: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:584_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo. Saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
anya-e0102n:584_1: vedanāsallasūlayogāāturā viya, puthujjanānaṃ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi
anya-e0102n:584_2: viya. Ayathābhuccanimittagāhakato vanamigo viya. Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato
anya-e0102n:584_3: aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanakapurisā viya. Jāti dukkhānubandhato rājapurisānubandhacorā
anya-e0102n:584_4: viya. Sabbānatthāvahassa khandhasantānassa hetuto visarukkhabījāni viya. Rūpaṃ nānāvidhupaddavanimittato
anya-e0102n:584_5: khuracakkaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:585_0: Manoviññāṇadhātu ārammaṇesu vavatthānābhāvato araññamakkaṭo viya, duddamanato assakhaḷuṅko
anya-e0102n:592_0: 525. Dhātūnaṃ anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāni pana indriyānīti bāvīsatindriyāni – cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:592_1: sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:592_2: jīvitindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:592_3: saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:594: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṃ.
anya-e0102n:595_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva cakkhatīti cakkhūtiādinā nayena attho pakāsito. Pacchimesu
anya-e0102n:595_1: pana tīsu paṭhamaṃ pubbabhāge anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmīti
anya-e0102n:595_2: evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti
anya-e0102n:595_3: vuttaṃ. Dutiyaṃ ājānanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññindriyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ aññātāvino
anya-e0102n:595_4: catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitaññāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:596_0: Ko pana nesaṃ indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indadesitaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n:596_1: Indadiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indasiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indajuṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n:596_2: So sabbopi idha yathāyogaṃ yujjati. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
anya-e0102n:596_3: indo. Kusalākusalañca kammaṃ, kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni
anya-e0102n:596_4: tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti. Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:596_5: indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni
anya-e0102n:596_6: abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Teneva bhagavatā
anya-e0102n:596_7: munindena kānici gocarāsevanāya kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenāpi indriyāni.
anya-e0102n:597_0: Apica ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenāpi etāni indriyāni. Cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi
anya-e0102n:597_1: cakkhādīnaṃ siddhaṃ ādhipaccaṃ, tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti. Ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:598_1: attho. Tāni ca nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttāneva. Paññindriyādīni hi cattāri
anya-e0102n:598_2: atthato amohoyeva. Sesāni tattha sarūpeneva āgatāni.
anya-e0102n:599_0: 526. Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho
anya-e0102n:599_1: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. So pana attabhāvo
anya-e0102n:599_2: yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ soti nidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:599_3: tato itthindriyaṃ purisindriyañca. So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:599_4: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Yāva tassa pavatti, tāva etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivatti. Yañca kiñci
anya-e0102n:599_5: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni. Taṃnirodhatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:599_6: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni. Imāya paṭipattiyā
anya-e0102n:599_7: esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato
anya-e0102n:599_8: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbato ca tato aññindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:599_9: Tato paraṃ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmiṃ natthi kiñci uttari
anya-e0102n:599_10: karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
anya-e0102n:600: Bhedābhedāti jīvitindriyasseva cettha bhedo. Tañhi rūpajīvitindriyaṃ arūpajīvitindriyanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Sesānaṃ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n:601_0: 527. Kiccāti kiṃ indriyānaṃ kiccanti ce. Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:601_1: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato yaṃ taṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena
anya-e0102n:601_3: attākārānuvattāpanaṃ, idaṃ kiccaṃ. Evaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ. Manindriyassa pana
anya-e0102n:601_6: sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpanaṃ. Upekkhindriyassa santapaṇītamajjhattākārānupāpanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:602_3: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evamettha bhūmitopi vinicchayaṃ vijāneyya. Evaṃ hi vijānanto –
anya-e0102n:607_0: 529. Tadanantarāni pana saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayo
anya-e0102n:607_1: ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccanti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n:614_0: Tattha vibhāgatoti dukkhādīnaṃ hi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0102n:614_1: ye dukkhādīni abhisamentehi abhisametabbā. Yathāha – “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho
anya-e0102n:614_2: santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho, ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0102n:614_3: Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saṃyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:614_4: vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n:614_5: Ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti. Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:614_6: saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi. Iti evaṃ vibhattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:614_7: catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti. Ayaṃ tāvettha vibhāgato vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:615_0: 530. Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedatoti ettha pana nibbacanato tāva idha du-iti ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:615_1: saddo kucchite dissati. Kucchitaṃ hi puttaṃ dupputtoti vadanti. Khaṃ-saddo pana tucche.
anya-e0102n:615_2: Tucchaṃ hi ākāsaṃ “kha”nti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato.
anya-e0102n:616_0: Saṃ-iti ca ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti. U-iti ayaṃ “uppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:616_1: udita”ntiādīsu uppattiṃ. Aya-saddo kāraṇaṃ dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge
anya-e0102n:616_2: sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṃ. Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:617_0: Tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā ni-saddo abhāvaṃ, rodha-saddo ca cārakaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā abhāvo
anya-e0102n:617_1: ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:617_2: saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti, tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
anya-e0102n:618: Catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhabhūtattā, paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā. Tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:619_0: 531. Yasmā panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n:619_1: Yathāha “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n:619_2: cattāri ariyasaccāni. Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:619_3: Apica ariyassa saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… manussāya
anya-e0102n:619_4: tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā
anya-e0102n:619_5: ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
anya-e0102n:619_6: yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:619_7: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti
anya-e0102n:619_8: attho. Yathāha – “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
anya-e0102n:619_9: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:620_0: 532. Kathaṃ lakkhaṇādippabhedato? Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, santāpanarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:620_4: paṭipāṭiyā. Tathā saṅkhatataṇhā asaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha lakkhaṇādippabhedato
anya-e0102n:621_0: 533. Atthatthuddhārato cevāti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce? Yo paññācakkhunā
anya-e0102n:621_1: upaparikkhamānānaṃ māyāva viparīto, marīciva visaṃvādako, titthiyānaṃ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo
anya-e0102n:621_2: ca na hoti, atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena
anya-e0102n:621_3: ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva. Esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo
anya-e0102n:621_4: saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha – “idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ
anya-e0102n:622: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
anya-e0102n:624: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
anya-e0102n:626: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
anya-e0102n:628: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
anya-e0102n:633_0: 534. Kathaṃ atthuddhārato? Idhāyaṃ sacca-saddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ
anya-e0102n:633_1: – “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n:633_2: viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0102n:633_3: “Ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṃ
anya-e0102n:633_4: ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha
anya-e0102n:634_0: 535. Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti
anya-e0102n:634_1: ce? Aññassāsambhavato aññatarassa ca apaneyyābhāvato. Na hi etehi aññaṃ adhikaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:634_2: etesaṃ vā ekampi apanetabbaṃ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya samaṇo
anya-e0102n:634_3: vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ. Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:634_4: ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:634_5: Yathā cāha – “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:634_6: paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ, ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
anya-e0102n:634_7: paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:635_0: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṃ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṃ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṃ
anya-e0102n:635_3: vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:636_0: 536. Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Ettha ca oḷārikattā, sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca
anya-e0102n:636_1: suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasseva hetudassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:636_2: samudayasaccaṃ. Hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti ñāpanatthaṃ tato nirodhasaccaṃ. Tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:636_3: ante maggasaccaṃ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0102n:636_4: dukkhamāha. Taṃ neva akataṃ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
anya-e0102n:636_5: ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayaṃ. Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ
anya-e0102n:636_6: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ. Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:636_7: nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:637_0: 537. Jātiādīnaṃ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā,
anya-e0102n:637_1: jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi
anya-e0102n:637_2: sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ, saṃkhittena
anya-e0102n:637_3: pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā, “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā
anya-e0102n:637_4: nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī. Seyyathidaṃ, kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā”ti
anya-e0102n:637_5: samudayaniddese tividhā taṇhā, “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo
anya-e0102n:637_6: mutti anālayo”ti evaṃ nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbānaṃ, “katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadā
anya-e0102n:637_7: ariyasaccaṃ, ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti
anya-e0102n:637_8: evaṃ magganiddese aṭṭha dhammāti iti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ niddese jātiādayo dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:637_9: tesaṃ jātiādīnaṃ nicchayāpi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:640_0: Seyyathidaṃ, ayañhi jāti-saddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti
anya-e0102n:640_1: ettha bhave āgato. “Atthi, visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātī”ti ettha nikāye. “Jāti
anya-e0102n:640_2: dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. “Yaṃ mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0102n:640_3: cittaṃ uppannaṃ, paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti ettha paṭisandhiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:640_4: “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto”ti ettha pasūtiyaṃ. “Akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenā”ti
anya-e0102n:640_5: ettha kule. “Yatohaṃ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti ettha ariyasīle.
anya-e0102n:641_0: 538. Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:641_1: tāva pavattesu khandhesu. Itaresaṃ paṭisandhikhandhesvevāti daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi ca
anya-e0102n:641_2: pariyāyakathāva. Nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ye ye
anya-e0102n:641_3: khandhā pātubhavanti, tesaṃ tesaṃ paṭhamapātubhāvo jāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:642: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, niyyātanarasā, atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.
anya-e0102n:643_0: 539. Kasmā panesā dukkhāti ce? Anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato. Anekāni hi dukkhāni.
anya-e0102n:644: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:646_0: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:646_2: jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṃ nāma. Apākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
anya-e0102n:647: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ nāma. Pākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
anya-e0102n:648: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana nippariyāyadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:649_0: Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃ
anya-e0102n:649_1: dukkhaṃ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:650_0: 540. Tatridaṃ gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ – ayaṃ hi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno
anya-e0102n:650_1: na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati, atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa
anya-e0102n:650_3: adhimattajegucche kucchipadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:650_4: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṃ viya paccamāno
anya-e0102n:650_5: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādirahito adhimattaṃ dukkhamanubhotīti,
anya-e0102n:651_0: Yaṃ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato
anya-e0102n:651_1: eḷako viya ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhūnananiddhūnanādinā
anya-e0102n:651_2: upakkamena adhimattaṃ dukkhamanubhavati, yañca mātu sītūdakapānakāle sītanarakupapanno
anya-e0102n:651_4: khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇapatto viya tibbaṃ dukkhamanubhoti, idaṃ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:652: Yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ gabbhavipattimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:653_0: Yaṃ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṃ viya atibhayānakaṃ
anya-e0102n:653_1: yonimaggaṃ paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa
anya-e0102n:653_2: mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghātapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:654_1: sūcimukhakhuradhārāhi vijjhanaphālanasadisaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ mātukucchito
anya-e0102n:655_0: Yaṃ tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
anya-e0102n:655_1: kodhavasena abhuñjantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ attūpakkamamūlakaṃ
anya-e0102n:655_2: dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati, idaṃ parūpakkamamūlakaṃ dukkhanti.
anya-e0102n:656: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṃ jāti vatthumeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:664: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ,
anya-e0102n:672: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
anya-e0102n:677: Jātiṃ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
anya-e0102n:678: Kiṃ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṃ kuhiñci,
anya-e0102n:684_0: 542. Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:684_1: ekabhavapariyāpannakhandhapurāṇabhāvo ca, sā idha adhippetā. Sā panesā jarā khandhaparipākalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:684_4: kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ uppajjati, jarā tassa vatthu. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:689: “Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
anya-e0102n:690: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti.
anya-e0102n:693_0: 543. Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṃ maraṇaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, yaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0102n:693_2: ca, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “niccaṃ maraṇato bhaya”nti. Taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Jātipaccayā
anya-e0102n:693_3: maraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇaṃ sarasamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva
anya-e0102n:693_4: nāmaṃ. Tayidaṃ cutilakkhaṇaṃ, viyogarasaṃ, gativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Dukkhassa
anya-e0102n:693_5: pana vatthubhāvato dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:703_0: 544. Sokādīsu soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo. So kiñcāpi atthato
anya-e0102n:703_1: domanassameva hoti. Evaṃ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parijjhāpanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n:703_2: Dukkho pana dukkhadukkhato dukkhavatthuto ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:707: Dukkhampi vividhaṃ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:710_0: 545. Paridevo nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa vacīpalāpo. So lālappanalakkhaṇo, guṇadosakittanaraso,
anya-e0102n:710_1: sambhamapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato dukkhavatthuto ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:717_0: 546. Dukkhaṃ nāma kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ kāyapīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ, duppaññānaṃ domanassakaraṇarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:717_1: kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Dukkhaṃ pana dukkhadukkhato mānasadukkhāvahanato ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:719: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0102n:722_0: 547. Domanassaṃ nāma mānasaṃ dukkhaṃ. Taṃ cittapīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ, manovighātarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:722_1: mānasabyādhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Dukkhaṃ pana dukkhadukkhato kāyikadukkhāvahanato ca.
anya-e0102n:722_2: Cetodukkhasamappitā hi kese pakiriya kandanti, urāni paṭipisanti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti,
anya-e0102n:722_3: uddhaṃpādaṃ papatanti, satthaṃ āharanti, visaṃ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṃ
anya-e0102n:722_4: pavisantīti taṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhamanubhavanti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:723: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṃ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṃ samāvahati;
anya-e0102n:727_0: 548. Upāyāso nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva.
anya-e0102n:727_1: Saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno eko dhammoti eke. So cittaparidahanalakkhaṇo, nitthunanaraso,
anya-e0102n:727_2: visādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaparidahanato kāyavisādanato
anya-e0102n:728: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṃ;
anya-e0102n:729: Yaṃ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti.
anya-e0102n:731_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko. Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato
anya-e0102n:731_1: bahinikkhamanaṃ viya paridevo. Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamituṃ appahontassa antobhājaneyeva
anya-e0102n:731_2: yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:733_0: 549. Appiyasampayogo nāma amanāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi samodhānaṃ. So aniṭṭhasamodhānalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n:733_1: cittavighātakaraṇaraso, anatthabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana dukkhavatthuto. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:740_0: 550. Piyavippayogo nāma manāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi vinābhāvo. So iṭṭhavatthuviyogalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n:740_1: sokuppādanaraso, byasanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana sokadukkhassa vatthuto. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:747_0: 551. Yampicchaṃ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu
anya-e0102n:747_1: icchāva yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkhanti vuttā. Sā alabbhaneyyavatthuicchanalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:747_2: tappariyesanarasā, tesaṃ appattipaccupaṭṭhānā. Dukkhā pana dukkhavatthuto. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:749: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
anya-e0102n:756: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
anya-e0102n:759_0: Tathā hi indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva paharaṇāni, gorūpaṃ viya ḍaṃsamakasādayo,
anya-e0102n:759_1: khettamiva lāyakā, gāmaṃ viya gāmaghātakā upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi
anya-e0102n:759_2: vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṃ, pupphaphalapallavāni viya rukkhesu upādānakkhandhesuyeva
anya-e0102n:759_3: nibbattanti. Upādānakkhandhānañca ādidukkhaṃ jāti, majjhedukkhaṃ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:759_4: maraṇaṃ, māraṇantikadukkhābhighātena pariḍayhanadukkhaṃ soko, tadasahanato lālappanadukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:759_6: dukkhaṃ, tena bādhiyamānānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:759_7: domanassaṃ, sokādivuddhiyā janitavisādānaṃ anutthunanadukkhaṃ upāyāso, manorathavighātappattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:759_8: icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
anya-e0102n:759_9: dukkhāti. Yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā asesato
anya-e0102n:759_10: vattuṃ, tasmā taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu
anya-e0102n:759_11: kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu saṃkhipitvā dassetuṃ “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0102n:759_12: dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti. Ayaṃ upādānakkhandhesu vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:762_0: 553. Samudayaniddese pana yāyaṃ taṇhāti yā ayaṃ taṇhā. Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:762_1: punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlametissāti ponobbhavikā. Nandīrāgena sahagatāti nandīrāgasahagatā,
anya-e0102n:762_2: nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatra tatrābhinandinīti
anya-e0102n:762_3: yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati, tatra tatrābhinandinī. Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa
anya-e0102n:762_4: sā katamāti ceti attho. Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā paṭiccasamuppādaniddese
anya-e0102n:762_5: āvibhavissanti. Idha panāyaṃ tividhāpi dukkhasaccassa nibbattakaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upanetvā
anya-e0102n:765_0: 554. Dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyātiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto,
anya-e0102n:765_1: so kasmāti ce? Samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho. Samudayanirodhena hi dukkhaṃ nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:770_0: Iti yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṃ desento
anya-e0102n:770_1: samudayanirodheneva desesi. Sīhasamānavuttino hi tathāgatā. Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā
anya-e0102n:770_2: dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale. Suvānavuttino pana titthiyā.
anya-e0102n:770_3: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale
anya-e0102n:770_4: paṭipajjanti, na hetumhīti. Evaṃ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya
anya-e0102n:771_0: 555. Ayaṃ panattho – tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena
anya-e0102n:771_1: vibhattataṇhāya. Virāgo vuccati maggo. “Virāgā vimuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Virāgena nirodho
anya-e0102n:771_2: virāganirodho. Anusayasamugghātato aseso virāganirodho asesavirāganirodho. Atha vā
anya-e0102n:771_3: virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati, tasmā aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:771_4: Atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni. Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho
anya-e0102n:771_5: ariyasaccanti nibbānaṃ vuccati. Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati
anya-e0102n:771_6: ca, tasmā virāgoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati. Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo
