anya-e0102n:771_7: honti, kāmaguṇālayesu cettha ekopi ālayo natthi, tasmā “cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:772: 556. Tayidaṃ santilakkhaṇaṃ, accutirasaṃ, assāsakaraṇarasaṃ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nippapañcapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā.
anya-e0102n:774_0: 557. Nattheva nibbānaṃ, sasavisāṇaṃ viya anupalabbhanīyatoti ce? Na, upāyena upalabbhanīyato.
anya-e0102n:774_1: Upalabbhati hi taṃ tadanurūpapaṭipattisaṅkhātena upāyena, cetopariyañāṇena paresaṃ
anya-e0102n:774_2: lokuttaracittaṃ viya, tasmā “anupalabbhanīyato natthī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi “yaṃ
anya-e0102n:774_3: bālaputhujjanā na upalabhanti, taṃ natthī”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:775_0: 558. Apica nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ, kasmā? Paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpajjanato.
anya-e0102n:775_1: Asati hi nibbāne sammādiṭṭhipurejavāya sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0102n:775_2: vañjhabhāvo āpajjati. Na cāyaṃ vañjhā, nibbānapāpanatoti. Na paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpatti,
anya-e0102n:775_3: abhāvapāpakattāti ce. Na, atītānāgatābhāvepi nibbānapattiyā abhāvato. Vattamānānampi
anya-e0102n:775_4: abhāvo nibbānanti ce. Na, tesaṃ abhāvāsambhavato, abhāve ca avattamānabhāvāpajjanato,
anya-e0102n:775_6: Tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā na dosoti ce. Na, ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvāpajjanato.
anya-e0102n:775_7: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo
anya-e0102n:776_0: 559. “Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādivacanato “khayo nibbāna”nti ce. Na, arahattassāpi
anya-e0102n:776_1: khayamattāpajjanato. Tampi hi “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:776_2: Kiñca bhiyyo nibbānassa ittarakālādippattidosato. Evañhi sati nibbānaṃ ittarakālaṃ,
anya-e0102n:776_4: ca saṅkhatapariyāpannaṃ, saṅkhatapariyāpannattā rāgādīhi aggīhi ādittaṃ, ādittattā
anya-e0102n:776_5: dukkhañcātipi āpajjati. Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti, tassa nibbānabhāvato
anya-e0102n:776_6: na dosoti ce. Na, tādisassa khayassa abhāvato. Bhāvepi cassa vuttappakāradosānativattanato,
anya-e0102n:776_7: ariyamaggassa ca nibbānabhāvāpajjanato. Ariyamaggo hi dose khīṇeti, tasmā khayoti
anya-e0102n:776_8: vuccati. Tato ca paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo dosānaṃ pavattīti.
anya-e0102n:777_0: Anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattā, yassa upanissayo
anya-e0102n:777_1: hoti tadupacārena “khayo”ti vuttaṃ. Sarūpeneva kasmā na vuttanti ce. Atisukhumattā.
anya-e0102n:777_2: Atisukhumatā cassa bhagavato apposukkabhāvāvahanato, ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca siddhāti.
anya-e0102n:778_0: 560. Tayidaṃ maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇaṃ, purimakoṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṃ.
anya-e0102n:778_1: Maggabhāve bhāvato na appabhavanti ce. Na, maggena anuppādanīyato. Pattabbameva hetaṃ
anya-e0102n:778_2: maggena, na uppādetabbaṃ. Tasmā appabhavameva. Appabhavattā ajarāmaraṇaṃ. Pabhavajarāmaraṇānaṃ abhāvato niccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:779_0: Nibbānasseva aṇuādīnampi niccabhāvāpattīti ce. Na, hetuno abhāvā. Nibbānassa niccattā
anya-e0102n:779_1: te niccāti ce. Na, hetulakkhaṇassa anupapattito. Niccā uppādādīnaṃ abhāvato nibbānaṃ
anya-e0102n:780_0: 561. Yathāvuttayuttisabbhāvato pana idameva niccaṃ, rūpasabhāvātikkamato arūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:780_1: Buddhādīnaṃ niṭṭhāya visesābhāvato ekāva niṭṭhā. Yena bhāvanāya pattaṃ, tassa kilesavūpasamaṃ,
anya-e0102n:780_2: upādisesañca upādāya paññāpanīyattā saha upādisesena paññāpiyatīti saupādisesaṃ.
anya-e0102n:780_3: Yo cassa samudayappahānena upahatāyatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddhaṃ pavattikhandhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:780_4: anuppādanato, uppannānañca antaradhānato upādisesābhāvo, taṃ upādāya paññāpanīyato
anya-e0102n:781_0: Asithilaparakkamasiddhena ñāṇavisesena adhigamanīyato, sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthena
anya-e0102n:781_1: sabhāvato nibbānaṃ nāvijjamānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti.
anya-e0102n:784_0: 562. Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese vuttā pana aṭṭha dhammā kāmaṃ khandhaniddesepi
anya-e0102n:784_1: atthato pakāsitāyeva, idha pana nesaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṃ visesāvabodhanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:784_2: vadāma. Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṃ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṃ
anya-e0102n:784_3: paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi. Sā sammā dassanalakkhaṇā, dhātuppakāsanarasā, avijjandhakāraviddhaṃsanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:784_4: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṃsampayuttaṃ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṃ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṃ
anya-e0102n:784_5: sammāsaṅkappo. So sammā cittābhiniropanalakkhaṇo, appanāraso, micchāsaṅkappappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n:785_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṃsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya
anya-e0102n:785_1: virati sammāvācā nāma. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā, viramaṇarasā, micchāvācāppahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n:785_2: Tathā viramato taṃsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto
anya-e0102n:785_4: Yā panassa tesaṃ sammāvācākammantānaṃ visuddhibhūtā taṃsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā
anya-e0102n:785_5: micchājīvavirati, so sammāājīvo nāma. So vodānalakkhaṇo, ñāyājīvapavattiraso, micchājīvappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n:786_0: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo
anya-e0102n:786_1: taṃsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho, esa sammāvāyāmo nāma. So paggahalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n:786_3: taṃsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma. Sā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:786_4: asammussanarasā, micchāsatippahānapaccupaṭṭhānā. Evaṃ anuttarāya satiyā saṃrakkhiyamānacittassa
anya-e0102n:786_5: taṃsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṃsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma. So avikkhepalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n:787_0: 563. Ñāṇakiccatoti saccañāṇassa kiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo. Duvidhaṃ hi saccañāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:787_1: – anubodhañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe
anya-e0102n:787_2: magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāri
anya-e0102n:787_3: saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
anya-e0102n:787_4: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passatī”ti
anya-e0102n:787_5: sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Taṃ panassa kiccaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ āvibhavissati.
anya-e0102n:788_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ lokiyaṃ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0102n:788_1: nivatteti. Samudayañāṇaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ. Nirodhañāṇaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiṃ. Maggañāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:788_2: akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ. Dukkhañāṇaṃ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:788_3: phale vippaṭipattiṃ. Samudayañāṇaṃ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti
anya-e0102n:788_4: akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṃ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṃ. Nirodhañāṇaṃ arūpalokalokathūpikādīsu
anya-e0102n:788_6: avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:790: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
anya-e0102n:792_0: 564. Antogadhānaṃ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṃ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme
anya-e0102n:792_1: ca sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā. Samudayasacce chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni. Nirodhasaccaṃ
anya-e0102n:792_3: Sammāsaṅkappāpadesena tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo. Sammāvācāpadesena cattāri vacīsucaritāni.
anya-e0102n:792_4: Sammākammantāpadesena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni. Sammājīvamukhena appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
anya-e0102n:792_5: ca. Sabbesaṃyeva vā etesaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa
anya-e0102n:792_6: ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṃ atthitāya atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā.
anya-e0102n:792_10: antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṃ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:793_0: 565. Upamātoti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:793_1: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, bhāranikkhepanupāyo viya maggasaccaṃ. Rogo viya
anya-e0102n:793_2: ca dukkhasaccaṃ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṃ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:793_3: bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṃ. Dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṃ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:793_4: subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṃ. Apica verī-veramūla-verasamugghāta-verasamugghātupāyehi,
anya-e0102n:794_0: 566. Catukkatoti atthi cettha dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:794_1: atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Esa nayo samudayādīsu.
anya-e0102n:794_2: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato
anya-e0102n:794_3: saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṃ, na ariyasaccaṃ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na dukkhaṃ. Itaraṃ
anya-e0102n:794_4: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā dukkhaṃ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0102n:794_5: vussati tathattena. Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca
anya-e0102n:794_6: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati
anya-e0102n:794_7: brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Evaṃ samudayādīsupi
anya-e0102n:795: 567. Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:803_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
anya-e0102n:803_1: dukkhassābhāvato, magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
anya-e0102n:803_2: Hetusuññañca phalaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṃ
anya-e0102n:803_3: hetuphalaṃ samavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādi viya. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:805: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃhetunā suñña”nti.
anya-e0102n:808_0: 568. Ekavidhādīhīti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṃ ekavidhaṃ pavattibhāvato. Duvidhaṃ nāmarūpato.
anya-e0102n:809_0: Samudayopi ekavidho pavattakabhāvato. Duvidho diṭṭhisampayuttāsampayuttato. Tividho
anya-e0102n:810_0: Nirodhopi ekavidho asaṅkhatadhātubhāvato. Pariyāyena pana duvidho saupādisesaanupādisesabhedato.
anya-e0102n:810_1: Tividho bhavattayavūpasamato. Catubbidho catumaggādhigamanīyato. Pañcavidho pañcābhinandanavūpasamato.
anya-e0102n:811_0: Maggopi ekavidho bhāvetabbato. Duvidho samathavipassanābhedato, dassanabhāvanābhedato
anya-e0102n:811_1: vā. Tividho khandhattayabhedato. Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi
anya-e0102n:812_0: “Na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā, tīhi
anya-e0102n:812_1: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito. Yā cāvuso visākha,
anya-e0102n:812_2: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n:812_3: Yo ca sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe
anya-e0102n:812_4: saṅgahitā. Yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti.
anya-e0102n:813_0: Ettha hi sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva, tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n:813_1: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavaseneva
anya-e0102n:813_2: veditabbo. Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena
anya-e0102n:813_3: appetuṃ na sakkoti, vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:814_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu
anya-e0102n:814_1: eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā gahetumpi na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n:814_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṃ dadeyya, so tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ
anya-e0102n:814_3: na sakkuṇeyya. Athassa itaro aṃsakūṭaṃ upanāmeyya. So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa
anya-e0102n:814_4: aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:815_0: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
anya-e0102n:815_1: Supupphitacampako viya ārammaṇaṃ. Hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya attano
anya-e0102n:815_2: dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi. Piṭṭhiṃ datvā onatasahāyo
anya-e0102n:815_3: viya vāyāmo. Aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati. Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n:815_4: ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti, evameva vīriye
anya-e0102n:815_5: paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi
anya-e0102n:815_6: sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ. Tasmā samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena
anya-e0102n:815_7: saṅgahito, vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.
anya-e0102n:816_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:816_1: nicchetuṃ na sakkoti. Vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā
anya-e0102n:816_2: hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva
anya-e0102n:816_3: parivattetuṃ sakkoti. Aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ
anya-e0102n:816_4: sakkoti, evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:816_5: Abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena
anya-e0102n:816_6: viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṃ sakkoti. Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito
anya-e0102n:816_7: paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā, sammāsaṅkappo pana kiriyavasena saṅgahito hoti.
anya-e0102n:817: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tena vuttaṃ “tividho khandhattayabhedato”ti. Catubbidho sotāpattimaggādivaseneva.
anya-e0102n:818_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā, abhiññeyyattā vā. Duvidhāni lokiyalokuttarato,
anya-e0102n:818_1: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato vā. Tividhāni dassana-bhāvanāhi pahātabbato, appahātabbato ca.
anya-e0102n:818_2: Catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:819: 569. Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti sabbāneva saccāni aññamaññaṃ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:820_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, ānanda, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:820_1: yo vā dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṃ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ avirādhitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:820_2: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti? Etadeva, bhante, dukkaratarañceva
anya-e0102n:820_3: durabhisambhavatarañca, yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti.
anya-e0102n:820_4: Tato kho te, ānanda, duppaṭivijjhataraṃ paṭivijjhanti. Ye idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:820_5: paṭivijjhanti…pe… ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:821_0: Visabhāgāni salakkhaṇavavatthānato. Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā
anya-e0102n:821_1: lokiyattā sāsavattā ca. Visabhāgāni phalahetubhedato pariññeyyappahātabbato ca. Pacchimānipi
anya-e0102n:821_2: dve sabhāgāni gambhīrattena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n:821_3: visayavisayībhedato sacchikātabbabhāvetabbato ca. Paṭhamatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni
anya-e0102n:821_4: phalāpadesato. Visabhāgāni saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato. Dutiyacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni hetuapadesato.
anya-e0102n:821_5: Visabhāgāni ekantakusalākusalato. Paṭhamacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni saṅkhatato. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n:821_6: lokiyalokuttarato. Dutiyatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni nevasekkhānāsekkhabhāvato. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n:822: Iti evaṃ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0102n:830_1: evaṃ vuttesu imissā paññāya bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu yasmā paṭiccasamuppādoceva, ādisaddena
anya-e0102n:830_2: saṅgahitā paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā ca avasesā honti, tasmā tesaṃ vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
anya-e0102n:831: Tattha avijjādayo tāva dhammā paṭiccasamuppādoti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:832_0: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādo? Avijjāpaccayā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0102n:832_1: viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā
anya-e0102n:832_2: phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā
anya-e0102n:832_3: bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā
anya-e0102n:832_4: sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0102n:833: Jarāmaraṇādayo pana paṭiccasamuppannā dhammāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:834_0: “Katame ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā? Jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ
anya-e0102n:834_1: saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ.
anya-e0102n:834_2: Jāti, bhikkhave…pe… bhavo… upādānaṃ… taṇhā… vedanā… phasso… saḷāyatanaṃ… nāmarūpaṃ…
anya-e0102n:834_3: viññāṇaṃ… saṅkhārā… avijjā, bhikkhave, aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā
anya-e0102n:834_4: vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā. Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā”ti.
anya-e0102n:835_0: 571. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo. Paṭiccasamuppādoti paccayadhammā veditabbā. Paṭiccasamuppannā
anya-e0102n:835_1: dhammāti tehi tehi paccayehi nibbattadhammā. Kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti ce? Bhagavato
anya-e0102n:836_0: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādo? Jātipaccayā, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇaṃ, uppādā
anya-e0102n:836_1: vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā
anya-e0102n:836_2: idappaccayatā. Taṃ tathāgato abhisambujjhati abhisameti, abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā
anya-e0102n:836_3: ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti, passathāti
anya-e0102n:836_4: cāha. Jātipaccayā, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇaṃ. Bhavapaccayā, bhikkhave, jāti…pe… avijjāpaccayā,
anya-e0102n:836_5: bhikkhave, saṅkhārā uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ…pe… uttānīkaroti passathāti cāha. Avijjāpaccayā,
anya-e0102n:836_6: bhikkhave, saṅkhārā. Iti kho, bhikkhave, yā tatra tathatā avitathatā anaññathatā
anya-e0102n:837_0: 572. Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desentena tathatādīhi vevacanehi paccayadhammāva paṭiccasamuppādoti
anya-e0102n:837_1: vuttā. Tasmā jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayalakkhaṇo paṭiccasamuppādo, dukkhānubandhanaraso,
anya-e0102n:838_0: So panāyaṃ tehi tehi paccayehi anūnādhikeheva tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato tathatāti,
anya-e0102n:838_1: sāmaggiṃ upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi tato nibbattadhammānaṃ asambhavābhāvato avitathatāti,
anya-e0102n:838_2: aññadhammapaccayehi aññadhammānuppattito anaññathatāti, yathāvuttānaṃ etesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:838_3: paccayato vā paccayasamūhato vā idappaccayatāti vutto.
anya-e0102n:839: 573. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho, imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā. Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā. Idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho idappaccayatā. Lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato pariyesitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:840_1: uppādo paṭiccasamuppādoti evaṃ uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0102n:840_2: Kasmā? Suttābhāvato, suttavirodhato, gambhīranayāsambhavato, saddabhedato ca. “Uppādamattaṃ
anya-e0102n:840_3: paṭiccasamuppādo”ti hi suttaṃ natthi. Taṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ca vadantassa padesavihārasuttavirodho
anya-e0102n:840_4: āpajjati. Kathaṃ? Bhagavato hi “atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0102n:840_6: padesavihāro ca tassekadesavihāro. Yathāha “yena svāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vihārena paṭhamābhisambuddho
anya-e0102n:840_7: viharāmi, tassa padesena vihāsi”nti. Tatra ca paccayākāradassanena vihāsi, na uppādamattadassanenāti.
anya-e0102n:840_8: Yathāha “so evaṃ pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ
anya-e0102n:840_9: micchāsaṅkappapaccayāpi vedayita”nti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Evaṃ uppādamattaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti
anya-e0102n:841_0: Kaccānasuttepi hi “lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato
anya-e0102n:841_1: yā loke natthitā, sā na hotī”ti anulomapaṭiccasamuppādo lokapaccayato “lokasamudayo”ti
anya-e0102n:841_2: ucchedadiṭṭhisamugghātatthaṃ pakāsito, na uppādamattaṃ. Na hi uppādamattadassanena
anya-e0102n:841_3: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā samugghāto hoti. Paccayānuparamadassanena pana hoti. Paccayānuparame
anya-e0102n:841_4: phalānuparamatoti. Evaṃ uppādamattaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vadantassa kaccānasuttavirodhopi āpajjati.
anya-e0102n:842_0: Gambhīranayāsambhavatoti vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo
anya-e0102n:842_1: gambhīrāvabhāso cā”ti. Gambhīrattañca nāma catubbidhaṃ, taṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma.
anya-e0102n:842_2: Taṃ uppādamatte natthi. Catubbidhanayapaṭimaṇḍitañcetaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
anya-e0102n:842_3: tampi nayacatukkaṃ uppādamatte natthīti gambhīranayāsambhavatopi na uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:843_0: 575. Saddabhedatoti paṭiccasaddo ca panāyaṃ samāne kattari pubbakāle payujjamāno
anya-e0102n:843_1: atthasiddhikaro hoti. Seyyathidaṃ, “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:843_2: Idha pana bhāvasādhanena uppādasaddena saddhiṃ payujjamāno samānassa kattu abhāvato
anya-e0102n:843_3: saddabhedaṃ gacchati, na ca kiñci atthaṃ sādhetīti saddabhedatopi na uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti.
anya-e0102n:844_0: Tattha siyā – “hoti-saddena saddhiṃ yojayissāma ‘paṭiccasamuppādo hotī’ti”, taṃ na
anya-e0102n:844_1: yuttaṃ. Kasmā? Yogābhāvato ceva, uppādassa ca uppādapattidosato. “Paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0102n:844_2: vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādo…pe… ayaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0102n:844_3: bhikkhave, paṭiccasamuppādo”ti. Imesu hi padesu ekenapi saddhiṃ hoti-saddo yogaṃ
anya-e0102n:844_4: na gacchati, na ca uppādo hoti. Sace bhaveyya, uppādassāpi uppādo pāpuṇeyyāti.
anya-e0102n:845_0: 576. Yepi maññanti “idappaccayānaṃ bhāvo idappaccayatā, bhāvo ca nāma yo ākāro avijjādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:845_1: saṅkhārādipātubhāve hetu, so. Tasmiñca saṅkhāravikāre paṭiccasamuppādasaññā”ti, tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:845_2: taṃ na yujjati. Kasmā? Avijjādīnaṃ hetuvacanato. Bhagavatā hi “tasmātiha, ānanda,
anya-e0102n:845_3: eseva hetu, etaṃ nidānaṃ, esa samudayo, esa paccayo jarāmaraṇassa yadidaṃ jāti…pe…
anya-e0102n:845_4: saṅkhārānaṃ, yadidaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjādayova hetūti vuttā, na tesaṃ vikāro. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:845_5: “paṭiccasamuppādoti paccayadhammā veditabbā”ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sammā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:846: 577. Yā panettha “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti imāya byañjanacchāyāya uppādoyevāyaṃ vuttoti saññā uppajjati, sā imassa padassa evamatthaṃ gahetvā vūpasametabbā. Bhagavatā hi,
anya-e0102n:847: Dvedhā tato pavatte, dhammasamūhe yato idaṃ vacanaṃ;
anya-e0102n:849_0: Yo hi ayaṃ paccayatāya pavatto dhammasamūho, tattha paṭiccasamuppādoti idaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e0102n:849_1: dvidhā icchanti. So hi yasmā patīyamāno hitāya sukhāya ca saṃvattati, tasmā paccetumarahanti
anya-e0102n:849_2: naṃ paṇḍitāti paṭicco. Uppajjamāno ca saha sammā ca uppajjati, na ekekato, nāpi ahetutoti
anya-e0102n:849_3: samuppādo. Evaṃ paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo. Apica saha uppajjatīti
anya-e0102n:849_4: samuppādo, paccayasāmaggiṃ pana paṭicca apaccakkhāyāti evampi paṭiccasamuppādo. Tassa
anya-e0102n:849_5: cāyaṃ hetusamūho paccayoti tappaccayattā ayampi, yathā loke semhassa paccayo guḷo
anya-e0102n:849_6: semho guḷoti vuccati, yathā ca sāsane sukhappaccayo buddhānaṃ uppādo “sukho buddhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:849_7: uppādo”ti vuccati, tathā paṭiccasamuppādo icceva phalavohārena vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:852: Sahite uppādeti ca, iti vutto so samuppādo.
anya-e0102n:853_0: Yo hi esa saṅkhārādīnaṃ pātubhāvāya avijjādiekekahetusīsena niddiṭṭho hetusamūho,
anya-e0102n:853_1: so sādhāraṇaphalanipphādakaṭṭhena avekallaṭṭhena ca sāmaggiaṅgānaṃ aññamaññena paṭimukhaṃ
anya-e0102n:853_2: ito gatoti katvā paṭiccoti vuccati. Svāyaṃ sahiteyeva aññamaññaṃ avinibbhogavuttidhamme
anya-e0102n:853_3: uppādetīti samuppādotipi vutto. Evampi paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:855: Paccayatā aññoññaṃ, paṭicca yasmā samaṃ saha ca dhamme;
anya-e0102n:857_0: Avijjādisīsena niddiṭṭhapaccayesu hi ye paccayā yaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ dhammaṃ uppādenti,
anya-e0102n:857_1: na te aññamaññaṃ apaṭicca aññamaññavekalle sati uppādetuṃ samatthāti. Tasmā paṭicca
anya-e0102n:857_2: samaṃ saha ca na ekekadesaṃ, nāpi pubbāparabhāvena ayaṃ paccayatā dhamme uppādetīti
anya-e0102n:857_3: atthānusāravohārakusalena muninā evamidha bhāsitā, paṭiccasamuppādotveva bhāsitāti attho.
anya-e0102n:859: Purimena sassatādīna, mabhāvo pacchimena ca padena;
anya-e0102n:861_2: paridīpito hoti? Kiṃ hi sassatānaṃ, ahetuādivasena vā pavattānaṃ paccayasāmaggiyāti?
anya-e0102n:861_3: Pacchimena ca padenāti dhammānaṃ uppādaparidīpakena samuppādapadena paccayasāmaggiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:861_4: dhammānaṃ uppattito vihatā ucchedanatthikaakiriyavādāti ucchedādivighāto paridīpito
anya-e0102n:861_5: hoti. Purimapurimapaccayavasena hi punappunaṃ uppajjamānesu dhammesu kuto ucchedo,
anya-e0102n:861_6: natthikākiriyavādā cāti. Dvayenāti sakalena paṭiccasamuppādavacanena tassā tassā
anya-e0102n:861_7: paccayasāmaggiyā santatiṃ avicchinditvā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sambhavato majjhimā
anya-e0102n:861_8: paṭipadā, “so karoti so paṭisaṃvedeti, añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vādappahānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:861_9: janapadaniruttiyā anabhiniveso, samaññāya anatidhāvananti ayaṃ ñāyo paridīpito hotīti
anya-e0102n:862_0: 581. Yā panāyaṃ bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desentena “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:862_1: nayena nikkhittā tanti, tassā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otaritvā
anya-e0102n:862_2: ācariye anabbhācikkhantena sakasamayaṃ avokkamantena parasamayaṃ anāyūhantena suttaṃ
anya-e0102n:862_3: appaṭibāhantena vinayaṃ anulomentena mahāpadese olokentena dhammaṃ dīpentena atthaṃ
anya-e0102n:862_4: saṅgāhentena tamevatthaṃ punarāvattetvā aparehipi pariyāyantarehi niddisantena ca
anya-e0102n:862_5: yasmā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā hoti, pakatiyāpi ca dukkarāva paṭiccasamuppādassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā. Yathāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n:864: Duddasā caturo dhammā, desetuṃ ca sudukkarā”ti.
anya-e0102n:865: Tasmā aññatra āgamādhigamappattehi na sukarā paṭiccasamuppādassatthavaṇṇanāti paritulayitvā,
anya-e0102n:877: 582. Iti avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu hi āditoyeva tāva,
anya-e0102n:878: Desanābhedato attha, lakkhaṇekavidhādito. Aṅgānañca vavatthānā, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:879_0: Tattha desanābhedatoti bhagavato hi vallihārakānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ valligahaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:879_1: viya ādito vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ, tathā pariyosānato vā majjhato
anya-e0102n:879_2: vā paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti catubbidhā paṭiccasamuppādadesanā.
anya-e0102n:880_0: Yathā hi vallihārakesu catūsu purisesu eko valliyā mūlameva paṭhamaṃ passati, so
anya-e0102n:880_1: taṃ mūle chetvā sabbaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “iti kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n:880_2: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe… jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi
anya-e0102n:881_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, so majjhe chinditvā
anya-e0102n:881_1: uparibhāgaññeva ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “tassa taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandato
anya-e0102n:881_2: abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī. Yā vedanāsu nandī, tadupādānaṃ. Tassupādānapaccayā
anya-e0102n:881_3: bhavo, bhavapaccayā jātī”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi deseti.
anya-e0102n:882_0: Yathā ca tesu purisesu eko valliyā aggaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, so agge gahetvā aggānusārena
anya-e0102n:882_1: yāva mūlā sabbaṃ ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti
anya-e0102n:882_2: kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, jātipaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇaṃ no vā kathaṃ vo ettha
anya-e0102n:882_3: hotīti? Jātipaccayā, bhante, jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ no ettha hoti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti.
anya-e0102n:882_4: Bhavapaccayā jāti…pe… avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, avijjāpaccayā
anya-e0102n:882_5: nu kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā no vā kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pariyosānato paṭṭhāya yāva
anya-e0102n:883_0: Yathā panetesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhameva paṭhamaṃ passati, so majjhe chinditvā
anya-e0102n:883_1: heṭṭhā otaranto yāva mūlā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “ime ca, bhikkhave, cattāro
anya-e0102n:883_2: āhārā kinnidānā, kiṃsamudayā, kiṃjātikā, kiṃpabhavā? Ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānā,
anya-e0102n:883_3: taṇhāsamudayā, taṇhājātikā, taṇhāpabhavā. Taṇhā kinnidānā… vedanā… phasso… saḷāyatanaṃ…
anya-e0102n:883_4: nāmarūpaṃ… viññāṇaṃ… saṅkhārā kinnidānā…pe… saṅkhārā avijjānidānā…pe… avijjāpabhavā”ti
anya-e0102n:884_0: 583. Kasmā panevaṃ desetīti? Paṭiccasamuppādassa samantabhaddakattā sayañca desanāvilāsappattattā.
anya-e0102n:884_1: Samantabhaddako hi paṭiccasamuppādo, tato tato ñāyapaṭivedhāya saṃvattatiyeva. Desanāvilāsappatto
anya-e0102n:884_2: ca bhagavā catuvesārajjapaṭisambhidāyogena catubbidhagambhīrabhāvappattiyā ca. So
anya-e0102n:885_0: Visesato panassa yā ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanā, sā pavattikāraṇavibhāgasaṃmūḷhaṃ
anya-e0102n:885_1: veneyyajanaṃ samanupassato yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ uppattikkamasandassanatthañca
anya-e0102n:885_2: pavattāti viññātabbā. Yā pariyosānato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanā, sā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:885_3: loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati cā”tiādinā nayena
anya-e0102n:885_4: kicchāpannaṃ lokaṃ anuvilokayato pubbabhāgapaṭivedhānusārena tassa tassa jarāmaraṇādikassa
anya-e0102n:885_5: dukkhassa attanā adhigatakāraṇasandassanatthaṃ. Yā majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādi pavattā,
anya-e0102n:885_6: sā āhāranidānavavatthāpanānusārena yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā puna atītaddhato
anya-e0102n:885_7: pabhuti hetuphalapaṭipāṭisandassanatthaṃ. Yā pana majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ
anya-e0102n:885_8: pavattā, sā paccuppanne addhāne anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhuti anāgataddhasandassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0102n:885_9: Tāsu yā pavattikāraṇasammūḷhassa veneyyajanassa yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:885_10: uppattikkamasandassanatthañca ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanā vuttā, sā idha nikkhittāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:886_0: 584. Kasmā panettha avijjā ādito vuttā, kiṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya avijjāpi akāraṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:886_1: mūlakāraṇaṃ lokassāti? Na akāraṇaṃ. “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi avijjāya
anya-e0102n:886_2: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthi pana pariyāyo yena mūlakāraṇaṃ siyā, ko pana soti? Vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhāvo.
anya-e0102n:887_0: Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā katheti, avijjaṃ vā. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:887_1: – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ‘ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi, atha pacchā
anya-e0102n:887_2: samabhavī’ti, evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā avijjā”ti.
anya-e0102n:887_3: Bhavataṇhaṃ vā. Yathāha – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya ‘ito
anya-e0102n:887_4: pubbe bhavataṇhā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī’ti, evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati,
anya-e0102n:887_5: atha ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā bhavataṇhā”ti.
anya-e0102n:888_0: 585. Kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento ime dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathetīti?
anya-e0102n:888_1: Sugatiduggatigāmino kammassa visesahetubhūtattā. Duggatigāmino hi kammassa visesahetu
anya-e0102n:888_3: vajjhagāvī tāya parissamāturatāya nirassādampi attano anatthāvahampi ca uṇhodakapānaṃ
anya-e0102n:888_4: viya kilesasantāpato nirassādampi duggatinipātanato ca attano anatthāvahampi pāṇātipātādiṃ
anya-e0102n:888_5: anekappakāraṃ duggatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati. Sugatigāmino pana kammassa visesahetu bhavataṇhā.
anya-e0102n:888_6: Kasmā? Yasmā bhavataṇhābhibhūto puthujjano sā vuttappakārā gāvī sītūdakataṇhāya saassādaṃ
anya-e0102n:888_7: attano parissamavinodanañca sītūdakapānaṃ viya kilesasantāpavirahato saassādaṃ sugatisampāpanena
anya-e0102n:888_8: attano duggatidukkhaparissamavinodanañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādiṃ anekappakāraṃ sugatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati.
anya-e0102n:889_0: 586. Etesu pana vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā ekadhammamūlikaṃ
anya-e0102n:889_1: desanaṃ deseti. Seyyathidaṃ, “iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjūpanisā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārūpanisaṃ
anya-e0102n:889_2: viññāṇa”ntiādi. Tathā “upādāniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato
anya-e0102n:889_3: taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādi. Katthaci ubhayamūlikampi. Seyyathidaṃ,
anya-e0102n:889_4: “avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato.
anya-e0102n:889_5: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṃ itthetaṃ dvayaṃ. Dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso saḷevāyatanāni,
anya-e0102n:889_6: yehi phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādi. Tāsu desanāsu “avijjāpaccayā
anya-e0102n:889_7: saṅkhārā”ti ayamidha avijjāvasena ekadhammamūlikā desanāti veditabbā. Evaṃ tāvettha
anya-e0102n:890_0: 587. Atthatoti avijjādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthato. Seyyathidaṃ, pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi
anya-e0102n:890_1: avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho. Taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. Tabbiparītato
anya-e0102n:890_2: kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:890_3: āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ
anya-e0102n:890_4: tathaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0102n:890_5: atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
anya-e0102n:890_6: satte javāpetīti avijjā. Paramatthato avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi
anya-e0102n:890_7: khandhādīsu na javatīti avijjā. Apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca
anya-e0102n:891_0: Yaṃ paṭicca phalameti, so paccayo. Paṭiccāti na vinā apaccakkhatvāti attho. Etīti
anya-e0102n:891_1: uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho. Apica upakārakaṭṭho paccayaṭṭho. Avijjā ca sā
anya-e0102n:892_0: Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Apica avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārasaddena
anya-e0102n:892_1: āgatasaṅkhārāti duvidhā saṅkhārā. Tattha puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā tayo, kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:892_2: tayoti ime cha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā. Te sabbepi lokiyakusalākusalacetanāmattameva honti.
anya-e0102n:893_1: ime pana cattāro saṅkhāra-saddena āgatasaṅkhārā. Tattha “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n:893_2: vuttā sabbepi sappaccayā dhammā saṅkhatasaṅkhārā nāma. Kammanibbattā tebhūmakā rūpārūpadhammā
anya-e0102n:893_3: abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhārāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā, tepi “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti ettheva
anya-e0102n:893_4: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Visuṃ pana nesaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati. Tebhūmikakusalākusalacetanā
anya-e0102n:893_5: pana abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāroti vuccati, tassa “avijjāgatoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo
anya-e0102n:893_6: puññañceva saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati. Kāyikacetasikaṃ
anya-e0102n:893_7: pana vīriyaṃ payogābhisaṅkhāroti vuccati, so “yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati, tāvatikā
anya-e0102n:894_0: Na kevalañca eteyeva, aññepi “saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa kho, āvuso visākha,
anya-e0102n:894_1: bhikkhuno paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāro, tato kāyasaṅkhāro, tato cittasaṅkhāro”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:894_2: nayena saṅkhāra-saddena āgatā aneke saṅkhārā. Tesu natthi so saṅkhāro, yo saṅkhatasaṅkhārehi
anya-e0102n:894_3: saṅgahaṃ na gaccheyya, ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu vuttaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:895_0: Avutte pana vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Namatīti nāmaṃ. Ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Āye tanoti āyatañca
anya-e0102n:895_1: nayatīti āyatanaṃ. Phusatīti phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyatīti
anya-e0102n:895_2: upādānaṃ. Bhavati bhāvayati cāti bhavo. Jananaṃ jāti. Jiraṇaṃ jarā. Maranti etenāti
anya-e0102n:895_3: maraṇaṃ. Socanaṃ soko. Paridevanaṃ paridevo. Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Uppādaṭṭhitivasena
anya-e0102n:895_4: vā dvidhā khaṇatītipi dukkhaṃ. Dummanabhāvo domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
anya-e0102n:896_0: Sambhavantīti abhinibbattanti. Na kevalañca sokādīheva, atha kho sabbapadehi sambhavanti-saddassa
anya-e0102n:896_1: yojanā kātabbā. Itarathā hi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti vutte kiṃ karontīti na paññāyeyya,
anya-e0102n:896_2: sambhavantīti pana yojanāya sati avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo. Tasmā avijjāpaccayā
anya-e0102n:896_3: saṅkhārā sambhavantīti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0102n:897_0: Evanti niddiṭṭhanayanidassanaṃ. Tena avijjādīheva kāraṇehi, na issaranimmānādīhīti
anya-e0102n:897_1: dasseti. Etassāti yathāvuttassa. Kevalassāti asammissassa, sakalassa vā. Dukkhakkhandhassāti
anya-e0102n:897_2: dukkhasamūhassa, na sattassa, na sukhasubhādīnaṃ. Samudayoti nibbatti. Hotīti sambhavati.
anya-e0102n:898_0: 588. Lakkhaṇāditoti avijjādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito. Seyyathidaṃ – aññāṇalakkhaṇā avijjā,
anya-e0102n:898_2: āyūhanarasā, cetanāpaccupaṭṭhānā, avijjāpadaṭṭhānā. Vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ, pubbaṅgamarasaṃ,
anya-e0102n:898_12: upādānapadaṭṭhāno. Jātiādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīni saccaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:899_0: 589. Ekavidhāditoti ettha avijjā aññāṇādassanamohādibhāvato ekavidhā. Appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattito
anya-e0102n:899_1: duvidhā. Tathā sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhārato. Vedanattayasampayogato tividhā. Catusaccapaṭivedhato
anya-e0102n:899_2: catubbidhā. Gatipañcakādīnavacchādanato pañcavidhā. Dvārārammaṇato pana sabbesupi
anya-e0102n:900_0: Saṅkhārā sāsavavipākadhammadhammādibhāvato ekavidhā. Kusalākusalato duvidhā. Tathā
anya-e0102n:901_0: Viññāṇaṃ lokiyavipākādibhāvato ekavidhaṃ. Sahetukāhetukādito duvidhaṃ. Bhavattayapariyāpannato,
anya-e0102n:901_1: vedanattayasampayogato, ahetukadvihetukatihetukato ca tividhaṃ. Yonigativasena catubbidhaṃ, pañcavidhañca.
anya-e0102n:902: Nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasannissayato kammapaccayato ca ekavidhaṃ. Sārammaṇanārammaṇato duvidhaṃ. Atītādito tividhaṃ. Yonigativasena catubbidhaṃ, pañcavidhañca.
anya-e0102n:903_2: iminā nayena phassādīnampi ekavidhādibhāvo veditabboti evamettha ekavidhāditopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:904_0: 590. Aṅgānañca vavatthānāti sokādayo cettha bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0102n:904_1: Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavanti. Yathāha – “assutavā, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n:904_2: puthujjano sārīrikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati
anya-e0102n:904_3: urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohamāpajjatī”ti. Yāva ca tesaṃ pavatti, tāva avijjāyāti punapi
anya-e0102n:904_4: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti sambandhameva hoti bhavacakkaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ jarāmaraṇeneva
anya-e0102n:904_5: ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvā dvādaseva paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti veditabbāni. Evamettha aṅgānaṃ
anya-e0102n:907_0: 561. Ayaṃ pana vitthāranayo – avijjāti suttantapariyāyena dukkhādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu
anya-e0102n:907_1: aññāṇaṃ, abhidhammapariyāyena pubbantādīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu. Vuttañhetaṃ “tattha katamā
anya-e0102n:907_2: avijjā, dukkhe aññāṇaṃ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:907_4: Tattha kiñcāpi ṭhapetvā lokuttaraṃ saccadvayaṃ sesaṭṭhānesu ārammaṇavasena avijjā
anya-e0102n:907_5: uppajjati, evaṃ santepi paṭicchādanavaseneva idha adhippetā. Sā hi uppannā dukkhasaccaṃ
anya-e0102n:907_6: paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati, yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti, tathā samudayaṃ,
anya-e0102n:907_7: nirodhaṃ, maggaṃ, pubbantasaṅkhātaṃ atītaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ, aparantasaṅkhātaṃ anāgataṃ
anya-e0102n:907_9: idappaccayatañceva paṭiccasamuppannadhamme ca paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati. “Ayaṃ avijjā,
anya-e0102n:907_10: ime saṅkhārā”ti evaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇamettha paṭivijjhituṃ na deti. Tasmā dukkhe
anya-e0102n:908_0: 592. Saṅkhārāti puññādayo tayo kāyasaṅkhārādayo tayoti evaṃ pubbe saṅkhepato vuttā
anya-e0102n:908_1: cha, vitthārato panettha puññābhisaṅkhāro dānasīlādivasena pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā
anya-e0102n:908_2: ceva bhāvanāvasena pavattā pañca rūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti terasa cetanā honti.
anya-e0102n:908_3: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro pāṇātipātādivasena pavattā dvādasa akusalacetanā. Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0102n:908_4: bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti tayopi saṅkhārā ekūnatiṃsa cetanā honti.
anya-e0102n:909_0: Itaresu pana tīsu kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā
anya-e0102n:909_1: cittasaṅkhāro. Ayaṃ tiko kammāyūhanakkhaṇe puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:909_2: vutto. Kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā hi kāyadvārato pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā,
anya-e0102n:909_3: dvādasa akusalacetanāti samavīsati cetanā kāyasaṅkhāro nāma. Tā eva vacīviññattiṃ
anya-e0102n:909_4: samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārato pavattā vacīsaṅkhāro nāma. Abhiññācetanā panettha parato
anya-e0102n:909_5: viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitā. Yathā ca abhiññācetanā, evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi
anya-e0102n:909_6: na hoti. Tasmā sāpi viññāṇassa paccayabhāve apanetabbā, avijjāpaccayā pana sabbāpetā
anya-e0102n:909_7: honti. Ubhopi viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre uppannā pana sabbāpi ekūnatiṃsati
anya-e0102n:909_8: cetanā cittasaṅkhāroti. Iti ayaṃ tiko purimattikameva pavisatīti atthato puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:910_0: 593. Tattha siyā – kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “ime saṅkhārā avijjā paccayā hontī”ti?
anya-e0102n:910_1: Avijjābhāve bhāvato. Yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:910_2: so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tasseva
anya-e0102n:910_3: hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhati. Samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtepi taṇhāparikkhāre
anya-e0102n:910_4: saṅkhāre sukhahetuto maññamāno ārabhati. Nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa
anya-e0102n:910_5: anirodhabhūtepi gativisese dukkhanirodhasaññī hutvā nirodhassa ca amaggabhūtesupi
anya-e0102n:910_6: yaññāmaratapādīsu nirodhamaggasaññī hutvā dukkhanirodhaṃ patthayamāno yaññāmaratapādimukhena
anya-e0102n:911_0: Apica so tāya catūsu saccesu appahīnāvijjatāya visesato jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇampi
anya-e0102n:911_1: puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto tassa adhigamāya kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārabhedaṃ
anya-e0102n:911_2: puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati devaccharakāmako viya maruppapātaṃ. Sukhasammatassāpi
anya-e0102n:911_3: ca tassa puññaphalassa ante mahāpariḷāhajanikaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhataṃ appassādatañca
anya-e0102n:911_4: apassantopi tappaccayaṃ vuttappakārameva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati salabho viya
anya-e0102n:911_5: dīpasikhābhinipātaṃ, madhubindugiddho viya ca madhulittasatthadhārālehanaṃ. Kāmupasevanādīsu
anya-e0102n:911_6: ca savipākesu ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhasaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya ca dvārattayappavattampi
anya-e0102n:911_7: apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati, bālo viya gūthakīḷanaṃ, maritukāmo viya ca visakhādanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:911_9: cittasaṅkhārabhūtaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati, disāmūḷho viya pisācanagarābhimukhamaggagamanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:912_0: Evaṃ yasmā avijjābhāvatova saṅkhārabhāvo, na abhāvato. Tasmā jānitabbametaṃ “ime
anya-e0102n:912_1: saṅkhārā avijjāpaccayā hontī”ti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “avidvā, bhikkhave, avijjāgato puññābhisaṅkhārampi
anya-e0102n:912_3: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā, vijjā uppannā; so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā
anya-e0102n:914_0: 594. Etthāha – gaṇhāma tāva etaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayoti, idaṃ pana vattabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:914_1: katamesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kathaṃ paccayo hotīti? Tatridaṃ vuccati, bhagavatā hi “hetupaccayo,
anya-e0102n:914_4: āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo, indriyapaccayo, jhānapaccayo,
anya-e0102n:915: Tattha hetu ca so paccayo cāti hetupaccayo, hetu hutvā paccayo, hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0102n:916_1: hi loke vacanāvayavo hetūti vuccati. Sāsane pana “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n:916_2: kāraṇaṃ. “Tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū”tiādīsu mūlaṃ hetūti vuccati, taṃ idha
anya-e0102n:916_3: adhippetaṃ. Paccayoti ettha pana ayaṃ vacanattho, paṭicca etasmā etīti paccayo. Apaccakkhāya
anya-e0102n:916_4: naṃ vattatīti attho. Yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ apaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati
anya-e0102n:916_5: vā, so tassa paccayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇato pana upakārakalakkhaṇo paccayo. Yo
anya-e0102n:916_6: hi dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā vā uppattiyā vā upakārako hoti, so tassa paccayoti
anya-e0102n:916_7: vuccati. Paccayo, hetu, kāraṇaṃ, nidānaṃ, sambhavo, pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato
anya-e0102n:916_8: nānaṃ. Iti mūlaṭṭhena hetu, upakārakaṭṭhena paccayoti saṅkhepato mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo.
anya-e0102n:917_0: So sāliādīnaṃ sālibījādīni viya, maṇipabhādīnaṃ viya ca maṇivaṇṇādayo kusalādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:917_1: kusalādibhāvasādhakoti ācariyānaṃ adhippāyo. Evaṃ sante pana taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu
anya-e0102n:917_2: hetupaccayatā na sampajjati. Na hi so tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādheti, na ca paccayo
anya-e0102n:917_3: na hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ
anya-e0102n:917_4: hetupaccayena paccayo”ti. Ahetukacittānañca vinā etena abyākatabhāvo siddho, sahetukānampi
anya-e0102n:917_5: ca yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, na sampayuttahetupaṭibaddho. Yadi
anya-e0102n:917_6: ca sampayuttahetūsu sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo siyā, sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddho alobho
anya-e0102n:917_7: kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā. Yasmā pana ubhayathāpi hoti, tasmā yathā sampayuttesu,
anya-e0102n:918_0: Kusalādibhāvasādhanavasena pana hetūnaṃ mūlaṭṭhaṃ agahetvā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena
anya-e0102n:918_1: gayhamāne na kiñci virujjhati. Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā virūḷhamūlā viya pādapā
anya-e0102n:918_2: thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā, ahetukā tilabījakādisevālā viya na suppatiṭṭhitā. Iti
anya-e0102n:918_3: mūlaṭṭhena upakārakoti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:919_0: 596. Tato paresu ārammaṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo. So “rūpāyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:919_1: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”ti ārabhitvāpi “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti
anya-e0102n:919_2: cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti
anya-e0102n:919_3: osāpitattā na koci dhammo na hoti. Yathā hi dubbalo puriso daṇḍaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā ālambitvāva
anya-e0102n:919_4: uṭṭhahati ceva tiṭṭhati ca, evaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbheva uppajjanti
anya-e0102n:919_5: ceva tiṭṭhanti ca. Tasmā sabbepi cittacetasikānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā dhammā ārammaṇapaccayoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:920_0: 597. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo adhipatipaccayo, so sahajātārammaṇavasena duvidho.
anya-e0102n:920_3: dhammā adhipatipaccayoti veditabbā, no ca kho ekato. Yadā hi chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ
anya-e0102n:920_4: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattati, tadā chandova adhipati, na itare. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0102n:921_0: Yaṃ pana dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā arūpadhammā pavattanti, so nesaṃ ārammaṇādhipati. Tena
anya-e0102n:921_1: vuttaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:921_2: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:922_0: 598. Anantarabhāvena upakārako dhammo anantarapaccayo. Samanantarabhāvena upakārako
anya-e0102n:922_1: dhammo samanantarapaccayo. Idañca paccayadvayaṃ bahudhā papañcayanti. Ayaṃ panettha
anya-e0102n:922_2: sāro, yo hi esa cakkhuviññāṇānantarā manodhātu, manodhātuanantarā manoviññāṇadhātūtiādi
anya-e0102n:922_3: cittaniyamo, so yasmā purimapurimacittavaseneva ijjhati, na aññathā, tasmā attano
anya-e0102n:922_4: attano anantaraṃ anurūpassa cittuppādassa uppādanasamattho dhammo anantarapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:922_5: Tenevāha – “anantarapaccayoti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā
anya-e0102n:922_6: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi. Yo anantarapaccayo,
anya-e0102n:922_7: sveva samanantarapaccayo. Byañjanamattameva hettha nānaṃ, upacayasantatīsu viya adhivacananiruttidukādīsu
anya-e0102n:922_8: viya ca. Atthato pana nānaṃ natthi.
anya-e0102n:923_2: samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādīhi virujjhati. Yampi tattha vadanti “dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:923_3: samuṭṭhāpanasamatthatā na parihāyati, bhāvanābalena pana vāritattā dhammā samanantarā
anya-e0102n:923_4: nuppajjantī”ti, tampi kālānantaratāya abhāvameva sādheti. Bhāvanābalena hi tattha
anya-e0102n:923_5: kālānantaratā natthīti, mayampi etadeva vadāma. Yasmā ca kālānantaratā natthi, tasmā
anya-e0102n:923_6: samanantarapaccayatā na yujjati. Kālānantaratāya hi tesaṃ samanantarapaccayo hotīti
anya-e0102n:923_7: laddhi. Tasmā abhinivesaṃ akatvā byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, na
anya-e0102n:923_8: atthato. Kathaṃ? Natthi etesaṃ antaranti hi anantarā. Saṇṭhānābhāvato suṭṭhu anantarāti samanantarā.
anya-e0102n:924_0: 599. Uppajjamānova saha uppādanabhāvena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo pakāsassa
anya-e0102n:924_1: padīpo viya. So arūpakkhandhādivasena chabbidho hoti. Yathāha – “cattāro khandhā
anya-e0102n:924_2: arūpino aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ, okkantikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:924_3: nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññaṃ, cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, mahābhūtā
anya-e0102n:924_4: upādārūpānaṃ, rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kiñcikāle sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0102n:924_5: kiñcikāle na sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti. Idaṃ hadayavatthumeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:925_0: 600. Aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo aññamaññūpatthambhakaṃ
anya-e0102n:925_1: tidaṇḍakaṃ viya. So arūpakkhandhādivasena tividho hoti. Yathāha – “cattāro khandhā
anya-e0102n:925_2: arūpino aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro mahābhūtā okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:926_0: 601. Adhiṭṭhānākārena nissayākārena ca upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo tarucittakammādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:926_1: pathavīpaṭādayo viya. So “cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti
anya-e0102n:926_2: evaṃ sahajāte vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Chaṭṭho panettha koṭṭhāso “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā…pe…
anya-e0102n:926_3: sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:926_4: nissayapaccayena paccayo. Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti,
anya-e0102n:926_5: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena
anya-e0102n:927_0: 602. Upanissayapaccayoti ettha pana ayaṃ tāva vacanattho, tadadhīnavuttitāya attano
anya-e0102n:927_1: phalena nissito na paṭikkhittoti nissayo. Yathā pana bhuso āyāso upāyāso, evaṃ bhuso
anya-e0102n:927_2: nissayo upanissayo, balavakāraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārako
anya-e0102n:928_0: So ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividho hoti. Tattha “dānaṃ
anya-e0102n:928_1: datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhati, pubbe
anya-e0102n:928_2: suciṇṇāni garuṃkatvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhati,
anya-e0102n:928_3: sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhanti. Sekkhā
anya-e0102n:928_4: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhantī”ti evamādinā nayena ārammaṇūpanissayo
anya-e0102n:928_5: tāva ārammaṇādhipatinā saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhatto. Tattha yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ garuṃkatvā
anya-e0102n:928_6: cittacetasikā uppajjanti, taṃ niyamato tesu ārammaṇesu balavārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti garukattabbamattaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:928_7: ārammaṇādhipati, balavakāraṇaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanissayoti evametesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:929_0: Anantarūpanissayopi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ
anya-e0102n:929_1: khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ
anya-e0102n:929_2: akatvāva vibhatto. Mātikānikkhepe pana nesaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā
anya-e0102n:929_3: ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:929_4: nayena anantarassa, “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ
anya-e0102n:929_5: dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena upanissayassa āgatattā nikkhepe
anya-e0102n:929_6: viseso atthi. Sopi atthato ekībhāvameva gacchati. Evaṃ santepi attano attano anantarā
anya-e0102n:929_7: anurūpassa cittuppādassa pavattanasamatthatāya anantaratā, purimacittassa pacchimacittuppādane
anya-e0102n:929_8: balavatāya anantarūpanissayatā veditabbā. Yathā hi hetupaccayādīsu kiñci dhammaṃ
anya-e0102n:929_9: vināpi cittaṃ uppajjati, na evaṃ anantaracittaṃ vinā cittassa uppatti nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:929_10: Tasmā balavapaccayo hoti. Iti attano attano anantarā anurūpacittuppādanavasena anantarapaccayo,
anya-e0102n:930_0: Pakatūpanissayo pana pakato upanissayo pakatūpanissayo. Pakato nāma attano santāne
anya-e0102n:930_1: nipphādito vā saddhāsīlādi upasevito vā utubhojanādi. Pakatiyā eva vā upanissayo
anya-e0102n:930_2: pakatūpanissayo, ārammaṇānantarehi asammissoti attho. Tassa pakatūpanissayo “saddhaṃ
anya-e0102n:930_3: upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e0102n:930_4: vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti. Sīlaṃ,
anya-e0102n:930_5: sutaṃ, cāgaṃ, paññaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti…pe… samāpattiṃ uppādeti. Saddhā, sīlaṃ,
anya-e0102n:930_6: sutaṃ, cāgo, paññā saddhāya, sīlassa, sutassa, cāgassa, paññāya, upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0102n:930_7: paccayo”tiādinā nayena anekappakārato pabhedo veditabbo. Iti ime saddhādayo pakatā
anya-e0102n:931_0: 603. Paṭhamataraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo. So
anya-e0102n:931_2: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Sota…pe…
anya-e0102n:931_3: ghāna, jivhā, kāyāyatanaṃ, rūpa, sadda, gandha, rasa, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:931_4: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Rūpa, sadda, gandha, rasa,
anya-e0102n:931_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā. Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca
anya-e0102n:931_6: vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena
anya-e0102n:931_7: paccayo. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ kiñcikāle purejātapaccayena
anya-e0102n:932_0: 604. Purejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārako arūpadhammo pacchājātapaccayo
anya-e0102n:932_1: gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viya. Tena vuttaṃ “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā
anya-e0102n:933_0: 605. Āsevanaṭṭhena anantarānaṃ paguṇabalavabhāvāya upakārako dhammo āsevanapaccayo
anya-e0102n:933_1: ganthādīsu purimapurimābhiyogo viya. So kusalākusalakiriyajavanavasena tividho hoti.
anya-e0102n:933_2: Yathāha – “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:933_3: āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā akusalā…pe… kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ
anya-e0102n:934_0: 606. Cittapayogasaṅkhātena kiriyabhāvena upakārako dhammo kammapaccayo. So nānakkhaṇikāya
anya-e0102n:934_1: ceva kusalākusalacetanāya sahajātāya ca sabbāyapi cetanāya vasena duvidho hoti. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:934_2: – “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:934_3: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:935_1: So pavatte taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ, sabbattha ca sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:935_2: paccayo hoti. Yathāha –“vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
anya-e0102n:935_3: rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo…pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ
anya-e0102n:935_4: khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ. Tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa. Dve khandhā dvinnaṃ
anya-e0102n:935_5: khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:936_0: 608. Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakaṭṭhena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:936_1: –“kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. Arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:936_2: dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:936_3: vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena
anya-e0102n:937_1: Tattha cakkhundriyādayo arūpadhammānaṃyeva, sesā rūpārūpānaṃ paccayā honti. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:937_2: – “cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā…pe… sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n:937_3: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ
anya-e0102n:937_4: indriyapaccayena paccayo. Arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca
anya-e0102n:937_5: rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā
anya-e0102n:937_6: indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:938_1: sabbānipi kusalādibhedāni satta jhānaṅgāni jhānapaccayo. Yathāha –“jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:938_2: dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:938_3: vipākābyākatāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena
anya-e0102n:939_0: 611. Yato tato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakāni kusalādibhedāni dvādasa maggaṅgāni maggapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:939_1: Yathāha – “maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena
anya-e0102n:939_2: paccayo”ti. Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:939_3: khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ. Ete pana dvepi
anya-e0102n:940_1: arūpadhammā sampayuttapaccayo. Yathāha – “cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:941_0: 613. Ekavatthukādibhāvānupagamena upakārakā rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ, arūpinopi
anya-e0102n:941_1: rūpīnaṃ vippayuttapaccayo. So sahajātapacchājātapurejātavasena tividho hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0102n:941_2: “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:941_3: Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:941_4: Abyākatapadassa pana sahajātavibhaṅge “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ
anya-e0102n:941_5: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa. Vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
anya-e0102n:941_6: paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ. Purejātaṃ pana cakkhundriyādivatthuvaseneva veditabbaṃ. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:941_8: paccayo. Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe… vatthu kusalānaṃ
anya-e0102n:941_9: khandhānaṃ…pe… vatthu akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:942_2: sattadhā mātikā nikkhittā. Yathāha –“cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ atthipaccayena
anya-e0102n:942_3: paccayo, cattāro mahābhūtā, okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññaṃ. Cittacetasikā dhammā
anya-e0102n:942_4: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ. Mahābhūtā upādārūpānaṃ. Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā…pe…
anya-e0102n:942_6: dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṃ…pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca
anya-e0102n:942_7: dhammānaṃ. Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:942_8: manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:943_0: Pañhāvāre pana sahajātaṃ purejātaṃ pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyantipi nikkhipitvā sahajāte
anya-e0102n:943_1: tāva “eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
anya-e0102n:943_2: paccayo”tiādinā nayena niddeso kato, purejāte purejātānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ vasena niddeso
anya-e0102n:943_3: kato. Pacchājāte purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ paccayavasena
anya-e0102n:943_4: niddeso kato. Āhārindriyesu “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:943_5: Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ niddeso katoti.
anya-e0102n:944_0: 615. Attano anantarā uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattiokāsadānena upakārakā samanantaraniruddhā
anya-e0102n:944_1: arūpadhammā natthipaccayo. Yathāha –“samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ
anya-e0102n:945: Te eva vigatabhāvena upakārakattā vigatapaccayo. Yathāha – “samanantaravigatā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ vigatapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:946_0: Atthi paccayadhammā eva ca avigatabhāvena upakārakattā avigatapaccayoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:946_1: Desanāvilāsena pana tathā vinetabbaveneyyavasena vā ayaṃ duko vutto, ahetukadukaṃ
anya-e0102n:950: Paresaṃ pacchimānaṃ sā, ekadhā paccayo matāti.
anya-e0102n:951_0: Tattha puññānaṃ duvidhāti ārammaṇapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā paccayo
anya-e0102n:951_1: hoti. Sā hi avijjaṃ khayato vayato sammasanakāle kāmāvacarānaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0102n:951_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti. Abhiññācittena samohacittaṃ jānanakāle rūpāvacarānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:951_3: Avijjāsamatikkamatthāya pana dānādīni ceva kāmāvacarapuññakiriyavatthūni pūrentassa,
anya-e0102n:951_4: rūpāvacarajjhānāni ca uppādentassa dvinnampi tesaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:951_5: Tathā avijjāsammūḷhattā kāmabhavarūpabhavasampattiyo patthetvā tāneva puññāni karontassa.
anya-e0102n:952_0: Anekadhā pana paresanti apuññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anekadhā paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ? Esā hi
anya-e0102n:952_1: avijjaṃ ārabbha rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanakāle ārammaṇapaccayena, garuṃkatvā assādanakāle
anya-e0102n:952_4: yaṃkiñci akusalaṃ karontassa hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatapaccayehīti
anya-e0102n:953: Pacchimānaṃ sā ekadhā paccayo matāti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ upanissayapaccayeneva ekadhā paccayo matā. So panassā upanissayabhāvo puññābhisaṅkhāre vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
anya-e0102n:954_0: 617. Etthāha – kiṃ panāyamekāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo, udāhu aññepi paccayā
anya-e0102n:954_1: santīti? Kiṃ panettha, yadi tāva ekāva, ekakāraṇavādo āpajjati. Athaññepi santi,
anya-e0102n:954_2: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ekakāraṇaniddeso nupapajjatīti? Na nupapajjati. Kasmā? Yasmā –
anya-e0102n:955: Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
anya-e0102n:957_0: Ekato hi kāraṇato na idha kiñci ekaṃ phalamatthi, na anekaṃ. Nāpi anekehi kāraṇehi
anya-e0102n:957_1: ekaṃ. Anekehi pana kāraṇehi anekameva hoti. Tathā hi anekehi utupathavībījasalilasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0102n:957_2: kāraṇehi anekameva rūpagandharasādikaṃ aṅkurasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ dissati.
anya-e0102n:957_3: Yaṃ panetaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ekekahetuphaladīpanaṃ
anya-e0102n:957_4: kataṃ, tattha attho atthi, payojanaṃ vijjati.
anya-e0102n:958_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci padhānattā, katthaci pākaṭattā, katthaci asādhāraṇattā desanāvilāsassa
anya-e0102n:958_1: ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekameva hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā dīpeti. “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti
anya-e0102n:958_2: hi padhānattā ekameva hetuphalamāha. Phasso hi vedanāya padhānahetu yathāphassaṃ
anya-e0102n:958_3: vedanā vavatthānato. Vedanā ca phassassa padhānaphalaṃ yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānato.
anya-e0102n:958_4: “Semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā”ti pākaṭattā ekaṃ hetumāha. Pākaṭo hi ettha semho, na kammādayo.
anya-e0102n:958_5: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, akusalā dhammā, sabbe te ayonisomanasikāramūlakā”ti asādhāraṇattā
anya-e0102n:958_6: ekaṃ hetumāha. Asādhāraṇo hi ayonisomanasikāro akusalānaṃ, sādhāraṇāni vatthārammaṇādīnīti.
anya-e0102n:958_7: Tasmā ayamidha avijjā vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu
anya-e0102n:958_8: “assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato
anya-e0102n:958_9: aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ hetūti padhānattā, “avidvā, bhikkhave, avijjāgato
anya-e0102n:958_10: puññābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharotī”ti pākaṭattā, asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena
anya-e0102n:958_11: dīpitāti veditabbā. Eteneva ca ekekahetuphaladīpanaparihāravacanena sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane
anya-e0102n:959_0: 618. Etthāha – evaṃ santepi ekantāniṭṭhaphalāya sāvajjāya avijjāya kathaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayattaṃ
anya-e0102n:959_1: yujjati? Na hi nimbabījato ucchu uppajjatīti. Kathaṃ na yujjissati? Lokasmiñhi –
anya-e0102n:961: Dhammānaṃ paccayo siddho, vipākā eva te ca na.
anya-e0102n:962_0: Dhammānaṃ hi ṭhānasabhāvakiccādiviruddho cāviruddho ca paccayo loke siddho. Purimacittaṃ
anya-e0102n:962_1: hi aparacittassa ṭhānaviruddho paccayo, purimasippādisikkhā ca pacchā pavattamānānaṃ
anya-e0102n:962_2: sippādikiriyānaṃ. Kammaṃ rūpassa sabhāvaviruddho paccayo, khīrādīni ca dadhiādīnaṃ.
anya-e0102n:962_3: Āloko cakkhuviññāṇassa kiccaviruddho, guḷādayo ca āsavādīnaṃ. Cakkhurūpādayo pana
anya-e0102n:962_4: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ṭhānāviruddhā paccayā. Purimajavanādayo pacchimajavanādīnaṃ sabhāvāviruddhā kiccāviruddhā ca.
anya-e0102n:963_0: Yathā ca viruddhāviruddhā paccayā siddhā, evaṃ sadisāsadisāpi. Sadisameva hi utuāhārasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:963_1: rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo, sālibījādīni ca sāliphalādīnaṃ. Asadisampi rūpaṃ arūpassa,
anya-e0102n:963_2: arūpañca rūpassa paccayo hoti, golomāviloma-visāṇa-dadhitilapiṭṭhādīni ca dubbā-sarabhūtiṇakādīnaṃ.
anya-e0102n:963_3: Yesañca dhammānaṃ te viruddhāviruddhasadisāsadisapaccayā, na te dhammā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā eva.
anya-e0102n:964_0: Iti ayaṃ avijjā vipākavasena ekantāniṭṭhaphalā, sabhāvavasena ca sāvajjāpi samānā
anya-e0102n:964_2: sadisāsadisapaccayavasena ca paccayo hotīti veditabbā. So cassā paccayabhāvo “yassa
anya-e0102n:964_3: hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti, so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu
anya-e0102n:964_4: ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tassa hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n:968: Abhisaṅkharoti so ete, saṅkhāre tividhe yato;
anya-e0102n:970_0: Kathaṃ pana yo etesu vimuyhati, so tividhepete saṅkhāre karotīti ce. Cutiyā tāva
anya-e0102n:970_1: vimūḷho “sabbattha khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇa”nti cutiṃ agaṇhanto “satto marati, sattassa
anya-e0102n:971: Upapāte vimūḷho “sabbattha khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo jātī”ti upapātaṃ agaṇhanto “satto upapajjati, sattassa navasarīrapātubhāvo”tiādīni vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:975: Evaṃ vaṇṇito saṃsāro, taṃ evaṃ agaṇhanto “ayaṃ satto asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati, parasmā lokā imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchatī”tiādīni vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:976: Saṅkhārānaṃ lakkhaṇe vimūḷho saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca agaṇhanto saṅkhāre attato attaniyato dhuvato sukhato subhato vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:977_0: Paṭiccasamuppannadhammesu vimūḷho avijjādīhi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavattiṃ agaṇhanto “attā
anya-e0102n:977_1: jānāti vā na jānāti vā, so eva karoti ca kāreti ca. So paṭisandhiyaṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0102n:977_2: tassa aṇuissarādayo kalalādibhāvena sarīraṃ saṇṭhapento indriyāni sampādenti. So
anya-e0102n:977_3: indriyasampanno phusati, vediyati, taṇhīyati, upādiyati, ghaṭiyati. So puna bhavantare
anya-e0102n:977_4: bhavatī”ti vā, “sabbe sattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā”ti vā vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:978_0: So avijjāya andhīkato evaṃ vikappento yathā nāma andho pathaviyaṃ vicaranto maggampi
anya-e0102n:978_1: amaggampi thalampi ninnampi samampi visamampi paṭipajjati, evaṃ puññampi apuññampi
anya-e0102n:984: “Yadā ca ñatvā so dhammaṃ, saccāni abhisamessati;
anya-e0102n:988_0: 620. Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇapade – viññāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇādi chabbidhaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0102n:988_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tathā sotaghānajivhākaāyaviññāṇāni.
anya-e0102n:988_2: Manoviññāṇaṃ kusalākusalavipākā dve manodhātuyo, tisso ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo,
anya-e0102n:988_3: aṭṭha sahetukāni kāmāvacaravipākacittāni, pañca rūpāvacarāni, cattāri arūpāvacarānīti
anya-e0102n:988_4: bāvīsatividhaṃ hoti. Iti imehi chahi viññāṇehi sabbānipi bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni
anya-e0102n:988_5: saṅgahitāni honti. Lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
anya-e0102n:989_0: Tattha siyā “kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0102n:989_1: hotī”ti? Upacitakammābhāve vipākābhāvato. Vipākaṃ hetaṃ, vipākañca na upacitakammābhāve
anya-e0102n:989_2: uppajjati. Yadi uppajjeyya sabbesaṃ sabbavipākāni uppajjeyyuṃ, na ca uppajjantīti
anya-e0102n:990_0: Katarasaṅkhārapaccayā kataraṃ viññāṇanti ce. Kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā tāva
anya-e0102n:990_1: kusalavipākāni pañca cakkhuviññāṇādīni, manoviññāṇe ekā manodhātu, dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo,
anya-e0102n:991_0: “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:991_1: hoti… sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyaviññāṇaṃ … vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti. Somanassasahagatā
anya-e0102n:991_2: manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti. Upekkhāsahagatā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti. Somanassasahagatā
anya-e0102n:991_4: ñāṇavippayuttā. Somanassasahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena. Upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā.
anya-e0102n:991_5: Upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena. Upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā. Upekkhāsahagatā
anya-e0102n:993_0: “Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi
anya-e0102n:993_1: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti. Evaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0102n:994: Apuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana akusalavipākāni pañca cakkhuviññāṇādīni, ekā manodhātu, ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ sattavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:995: “Akusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti… sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyaviññāṇaṃ… vipākā manodhātu vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hotī”ti.
anya-e0102n:996: Āneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana cattāri arūpavipākānīti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:997_0: “Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ
anya-e0102n:997_2: sukhassa ca dukkhassa ca pahānā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:998_0: 621. Evaṃ yaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā yaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ ñatvā idānissa evaṃ pavatti
anya-e0102n:998_1: veditabbā – sabbameva hi idaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvedhā pavattati. Tattha dve
anya-e0102n:998_2: pañcaviññāṇāni, dve manodhātuyo, somanassasahagatā ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti imāni
anya-e0102n:998_3: terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaññeva pavattanti. Sesāni ekūnavīsati tīsu bhavesu
anya-e0102n:999_0: Kathaṃ? Kusalavipākāni tāva cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca kusalavipākena akusalavipākena
anya-e0102n:999_1: vā nibbattassa yathākkamaṃ paripākaṃ upagatindriyassa cakkhādīnaṃ āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0102n:999_2: iṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cakkhādipasādaṃ nissāya dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:999_3: sādhayamānāni pavattanti. Tathā akusalavipākāni pañca. Kevalañhi tesaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhamajjhattaṃ
anya-e0102n:999_4: vā ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Ayameva viseso. Dasapi cetāni niyatadvārārammaṇavatthuṭṭhānāni
anya-e0102n:1000_0: Tato kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā kusalavipākā manodhātu tesaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:1000_1: ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha hadayavatthuṃ nissāya sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1000_2: Tathā akusalavipākānaṃ anantarā akusalavipākā. Idañca pana dvayaṃ aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1001_0: Somanassasahagatā pana ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu kusalavipākamanodhātuyā anantarā tassā
anya-e0102n:1001_1: eva ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha hadayavatthuṃ nissāya santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā chasu dvāresu
anya-e0102n:1001_3: pacchinditvā javanena gahitārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena ca sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā
anya-e0102n:1001_4: pavattatīti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe
anya-e0102n:1001_5: dve cittavārā āgatā. Idaṃ pana cittaṃ tadārammaṇanti ca piṭṭhibhavaṅganti cāti dve
anya-e0102n:1001_6: nāmāni labhati. Aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ niyatavatthukaṃ aniyataṭṭhānakiccañca hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1001_7: Evaṃ tāva terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaññeva pavattantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1002_0: Sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattati. Pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1002_1: pana kusalākusalavipākā tāva dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo pañcadvāre kusalākusalavipākamanodhātūnaṃ
anya-e0102n:1002_2: anantarā santīraṇakiccaṃ, chasu dvāresu pubbe vuttanayeneva tadārammaṇakiccaṃ, attanā
anya-e0102n:1002_3: dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ, ante
anya-e0102n:1002_4: cutikiccañcāti cattāri kiccāni sādhayamānā niyatavatthukā aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1003_0: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarasahetukacittāni vuttanayeneva chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccaṃ, attanā
anya-e0102n:1003_1: dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ, ante
anya-e0102n:1003_2: cutikiccañcāti tīṇi kiccāni sādhayamānāni niyatavatthukāni aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1004_0: Pañca rūpāvacarāni cattāri ca āruppāni attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake
anya-e0102n:1004_1: cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ, ante cutikiccañcāti kiccadvayaṃ sādhayamānāni pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1004_2: Tesu rūpāvacarāni niyatavatthārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni, itarāni niyatavatthukāni
anya-e0102n:1004_3: niyatārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattantīti evaṃ tāva bāttiṃsavidhampi
anya-e0102n:1004_4: viññāṇaṃ pavattiyaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā pavattati. Tatrāssa te te saṅkhārā kammapaccayena
anya-e0102n:1005_0: 622. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n:1005_1: na pavattatī”ti, taṃ atisaṃkhittattā dubbijānaṃ. Tenassa vitthāranayadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:1005_2: vuccati – kati paṭisandhiyo, kati paṭisandhicittāni, kena kattha paṭisandhi hoti,
anya-e0102n:1006_0: Asaññapaṭisandhiyā saddhiṃ vīsati paṭisandhiyo. Vuttappakārāneva ekūnavīsati paṭisandhicittāni.
anya-e0102n:1006_1: Tattha akusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti. Kusalavipākāya
anya-e0102n:1006_3: kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca puññavantānaṃ paṭisandhi hoti. Pañcahi rūpāvacaravipākehi
anya-e0102n:1006_4: rūpībrahmaloke. Catūhi arūpāvacaravipākehi arūpaloketi. Yena ca yattha paṭisandhi
anya-e0102n:1006_5: hoti, sā eva tassa anurūpā paṭisandhi nāma. Saṅkhepato pana paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni
anya-e0102n:1006_6: honti atītaṃ paccuppannaṃ navattabbañca. Asaññā paṭisandhi anārammaṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1007_1: kāmāvacarānaṃ atītaṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā. Sesānaṃ navattabbameva. Evaṃ tīsu ārammaṇesu
anya-e0102n:1007_2: pavattamānā pana paṭisandhi yasmā atītārammaṇassa vā navattabbārammaṇassa vā cuticittassa
anya-e0102n:1007_3: anantarameva pavattati. Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ pana cuticittaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā dvīsu
anya-e0102n:1007_4: ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā tīsu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n:1008_0: 623. Seyyathidaṃ – kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ tāva ṭhitassa pāpakammino puggalassa “tānissa
anya-e0102n:1008_1: tasmiṃ samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato maraṇamañce nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1008_2: vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati. Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya
anya-e0102n:1008_3: javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1008_4: niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ
anya-e0102n:1008_5: duggatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā
anya-e0102n:1009_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye vuttappakārakammavasena narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1009_1: manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati, tassa dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge uppajjitvā niruddhe taṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1009_2: ārabbha ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ, maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni,
anya-e0102n:1009_3: dve tadārammaṇānīti tīṇi vīthicittāni uppajjanti. Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1009_4: katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ. Ettāvatā ekādasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti. Athassa avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke
anya-e0102n:1009_5: tasmiññeva ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā
anya-e0102n:1010_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1010_1: āpāthamāgacchati. Tassa yathākkamena uppanne voṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena
anya-e0102n:1010_2: mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni, dve tadārammaṇāni ca uppajjanti. Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1010_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ. Ettāvatā ca dve bhavaṅgāni, āvajjanaṃ, dassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1010_4: sampaṭicchanaṃ, santīraṇaṃ, voṭṭhabbanaṃ, pañca javanāni, dve tadārammaṇāni, ekaṃ
anya-e0102n:1010_5: cuticittanti pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti. Athāvasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke tasmiññeva
anya-e0102n:1010_6: ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā
anya-e0102n:1010_7: paṭisandhi. Esa tāva atītārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya
anya-e0102n:1011_0: 624. Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa vuttanayeneva taṃ anavajjakammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1011_1: vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n:1011_2: sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya
anya-e0102n:1012_0: 625. Sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa “tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato
anya-e0102n:1012_1: maraṇamañce nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre
anya-e0102n:1012_3: pana kammanimittameva āpāthamāgacchati. Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya
anya-e0102n:1012_4: suddhāya vā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1012_5: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tameva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ
anya-e0102n:1012_6: sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā
anya-e0102n:1013_1: vā devaloke uyyānavimānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ vā sugatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0102n:1013_2: tassa duggatinimitte dassitānukkameneva cuticittānantaraṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1013_3: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1014_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye ñātakā “ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyati cittaṃ pasādehī”ti
anya-e0102n:1014_1: vatvā pupphadāmapaṭākādivasena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā, dhammassavanatūriyapūjādivasena saddārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1014_2: vā, dhūmavāsagandhādivasena gandhārammaṇaṃ vā, “idaṃ tāta sāyassu tavatthāya dātabbadeyyadhamma”nti
anya-e0102n:1014_3: vatvā madhuphāṇitādivasena rasārammaṇaṃ vā, “idaṃ tāta phusassu tavatthāya dātabbadeyyadhamma”nti
anya-e0102n:1014_4: vatvā cīnapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭādivasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā pañcadvāre upasaṃharanti,
anya-e0102n:1014_5: tassa tasmiṃ āpāthagate rūpādiārammaṇe yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa
anya-e0102n:1014_6: āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni, dve tadārammaṇāni ca uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1014_7: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ, tadavasāne tasmiññeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike
anya-e0102n:1014_8: ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1015_0: 626. Aparassa pana pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa
anya-e0102n:1015_2: vā nimittaṃ, mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati, cakkhusotānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1015_3: kusaluppattihetubhūtaṃ paṇītamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, tassa yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne
anya-e0102n:1015_4: maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni uppajjanti. Mahaggatagatikānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1015_5: pana tadārammaṇaṃ natthi, tasmā javanānantaraṃyeva bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:1015_6: ekaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjati. Tassāvasāne kāmāvacaramahaggatasugatīnaṃ aññatarasugatipariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1015_7: yathūpaṭṭhitesu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ navattabbārammaṇāya
anya-e0102n:1016: Etenānusārena āruppacutiyāpi anantarā paṭisandhi veditabbā. Ayaṃ atītanavattabbārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītanavattabbapaccuppannārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
anya-e0102n:1017_0: 627. Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana pāpakammino vuttanayeneva taṃ kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1017_1: gatinimittaṃ vā manodvāre. Pañcadvāre vā pana akusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1017_2: āpāthamāgacchati, athassa yathākkamena cuticittāvasāne duggatipariyāpannaṃ tesu ārammaṇesu
