anya-e0102n:1017_3: aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā
anya-e0102n:1021_0: Idañhi ekūnavīsatividhampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ paṭisandhimhi pavattamānā dvedhā kammena
anya-e0102n:1021_1: vattati. Yathāsakañhi ekassa janakakammaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0102n:1021_2: ca paccayo hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0102n:1021_3: paccayo”ti. Evaṃ vattamānassa panassa missādīhi bhedehi duvidhādikopi bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1022_0: Seyyathidaṃ – idañhi paṭisandhivasena ekadhā pavattamānampi rūpena saha missāmissabhedato
anya-e0102n:1022_2: catubbidhaṃ. Gativasena pañcavidhaṃ. Viññāṇaṭṭhitivasena sattavidhaṃ. Sattāvāsavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1024: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā, sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā;
anya-e0102n:1025: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā, omato ādinā saha.
anya-e0102n:1026_0: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedāti yaṃ hetaṃ ettha aññatra arūpabhavā rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1026_1: uppajjati, taṃ rūpabhave itthindriyapurisindriyasaṅkhātena bhāvena vinā uppattito.
anya-e0102n:1026_2: Kāmabhave aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyā bhāvena saha uppattito sa-bhāvaṃ, a-bhāvanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1027: Sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhāti tatthāpi ca yaṃ sa-bhāvaṃ, taṃ itthipurisabhāvānaṃ aññatarena saha uppattito duvidhameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:1028_0: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā omato ādinā sahāti yaṃ hetamettha “missaṃ amissa”nti duke ādibhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:1028_1: rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ, tena saha vatthukāyadasakavasena dve vā, vatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena
anya-e0102n:1028_2: tayo vā dasakā omato uppajjanti, natthi ito paraṃ rūpaparihānīti. Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1028_3: omakaparimāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ aṇḍajajalābujanāmikāsu dvīsu yonīsu jātiuṇṇāya ekena
anya-e0102n:1028_4: aṃsunā uddhaṭasappimaṇḍappamāṇaṃ kalalanti laddhasaṅkhaṃ hutvā uppajjati. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1030: Niraye bhummavajjesu, devesu ca na yoniyo;
anya-e0102n:1032_0: Tattha devesu cāti casaddena yathā niraye ca bhummavajjesu ca devesu, evaṃ nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu
anya-e0102n:1032_1: ca purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti veditabbā. Opapātikā eva hi te honti. Sese pana
anya-e0102n:1032_2: tiracchānapettivisayamanussasaṅkhāte gatittaye pubbe vajjitabhummadevesu ca catassopi
anya-e0102n:1033: Tiṃsa nava ceva rūpīsu, sattati ukkaṃsatotha rūpāni;
anya-e0102n:1035_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesu cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ jīvitanavakassa cāti
anya-e0102n:1035_1: catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena tiṃsa ca nava ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha rūpāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1035_2: Rūpī brahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesu ukkaṃsato cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyavatthubhāvadasakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1035_3: vasena sattati, tāni ca niccaṃ devesu. Tattha vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā catasso cāpi
anya-e0102n:1035_4: dhātuyo cakkhupasādo jīvitanti ayaṃ dasarūpaparimāṇo rūpapuñjo cakkhudasako nāma.
anya-e0102n:1035_5: Evaṃ sesā veditabbā. Avakaṃsato pana jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1035_6: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti. Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antare anurūpato vikappo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1039: Yā hesā missāmissato duvidhā paṭisandhi, yā cassā atītānantarā cuti, tāsaṃ imehi khandhādīhi bhedābhedaviseso ñātabboti attho.
anya-e0102n:1040_0: Kathaṃ? Kadāci hi catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā catukkhandhāva ārammaṇatopi
anya-e0102n:1040_1: abhinnā paṭisandhi hoti. Kadāci amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāya mahaggataajjhattārammaṇā.
anya-e0102n:1040_2: Ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo. Kadāci pana catukkhandhāya arūpacutiyā anantarā
anya-e0102n:1040_3: pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi. Kadāci pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā rūpāvacaracutiyā
anya-e0102n:1040_4: vā anantarā catukkhandhā arūpapaṭisandhi. Evaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā paccuppannārammaṇā
anya-e0102n:1043: Nāssa tato saṅkanti, na tato hetuṃ vinā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1044_0: Iti hetaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ uppajjamānaṃ bhavantaramupetīti vuccati,
anya-e0102n:1044_1: na satto, na jīvo. Tassa ca nāpi atītabhavato idha saṅkanti atthi. Nāpi tato hetuṃ
anya-e0102n:1044_2: vinā idha pātubhāvo. Tayidaṃ pākaṭena manussacutipaṭisandhikkamena pakāsayissāma.
anya-e0102n:1045_0: Atītabhavasmiṃ hi sarasena upakkamena vā samāsannamaraṇassa asayhānaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanacchedakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1045_2: kamena upasussamāne sarīre niruddhesu cakkhādīsu indriyesu hadayavatthumatte patiṭṭhitesu
anya-e0102n:1045_5: kammaṃ, tadupaṭṭhāpitaṃ vā kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ visayaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1045_6: Tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye
anya-e0102n:1045_7: taṇhā nāmeti, sahajātasaṅkhārā khipanti. Taṃ santativasena taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ saṅkhārehi
anya-e0102n:1045_9: nissayaṃ jahati, aparañca kammasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1046_0: Ettha ca purimaṃ cavanato cuti. Pacchimaṃ bhavantarādipaṭisandhānato paṭisandhīti
anya-e0102n:1046_1: vuccati. Tadetaṃ nāpi purimabhavā idhāgataṃ, nāpi tato kammasaṅkhāranativisayādihetuṃ
anya-e0102n:1050_0: Ettha cetassa viññāṇassa purimabhavato idha anāgamane, atītabhavapariyāpannahetūti
anya-e0102n:1050_1: ca uppāde paṭighosa-padīpa-muddā-paṭibimbappakārā dhammā nidassanāni siyuṃ. Yathā
anya-e0102n:1050_2: hi paṭighosa-padīpa-muddā-chāyā saddādihetukā honti aññatra agantvā evamevaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1051_0: Ettha ca santānabandhato natthi ekatā nāpi nānatā. Yadi hi santānabandhe sati ekantamekatā
anya-e0102n:1051_1: bhaveyya, na khīrato dadhi sambhūtaṃ siyā. Athāpi ekantanānatā bhaveyya, na khīrassādhīno
anya-e0102n:1051_2: dadhi siyā. Esa nayo sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu. Evañca sati sabbalokavohāralopo siyā,
anya-e0102n:1051_3: so ca aniṭṭho. Tasmā ettha na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbāti.
anya-e0102n:1052_0: 634. Etthāha – nanu evaṃ asaṅkantipātubhāve sati ye imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhā,
anya-e0102n:1052_1: tesaṃ niruddhattā, phalapaccayassa ca kammassa tattha agamanato aññassa aññato ca
anya-e0102n:1052_2: taṃ phalaṃ siyā, upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā, tasmā na sundaramidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1053: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
anya-e0102n:1055_0: Ekasantānasmiṃ hi phalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tattha ekantaekattanānattānaṃ paṭisiddhattā
anya-e0102n:1055_1: aññassāti vā aññatoti vā na hoti. Etassa ca panatthassa bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro sādhako.
anya-e0102n:1055_2: Ambabījādīnaṃ hi abhisaṅkhāresu katesu tassa bījassa santāne laddhapaccayo kālantare
anya-e0102n:1055_3: phalaviseso uppajjamāno na aññabījānaṃ, nāpi aññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā uppajjati, na
anya-e0102n:1055_4: ca tāni bījāni, te abhisaṅkhārā vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇanti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1055_5: Vijjāsipposadhādīhi cāpi bālasarīre upayuttehi kālantare vuḍḍhasarīrādīsu phaladehi
anya-e0102n:1056: Yampi vuttaṃ “upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā”ti, tattha,
anya-e0102n:1059_0: Yathā hi rukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa rukkhaphalassa uppattiyā eva
anya-e0102n:1059_1: rukkho phalatīti vā phalitoti vā vuccati, tathā devamanussasaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1059_2: ekadesabhūtassa upabhogasaṅkhātassa sukhadukkhaphalassa uppādeneva devo, manusso
anya-e0102n:1059_3: vā upabhuñjatīti vā, sukhito, dukkhitoti vā vuccati. Tasmā na ettha aññena upabhuñjakena
anya-e0102n:1060_0: 635. Yopi vadeyya “evaṃ santepi ete saṅkhārā vijjamānā vā phalassa paccayā siyuṃ,
anya-e0102n:1060_1: avijjamānā vā, yadi ca vijjamānā pavattikkhaṇeyeva nesaṃ vipākena bhavitabbaṃ, atha
anya-e0102n:1060_2: avijjamānā pavattito pubbe pacchā ca niccaṃ phalāvahā siyu”nti, so evaṃ vattabbo –
anya-e0102n:1061: Katattā paccayā ete, na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā;
anya-e0102n:1063_0: Katattāyeva hi saṅkhārā attano phalassa paccayā honti, na vijjamānattā, avijjamānattā
anya-e0102n:1063_1: vā. Yathāha – “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1063_2: uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi. Yathārahassa ca attano phalassa paccayā hutvā na puna phalāvahā
anya-e0102n:1063_3: honti vipākattā. Etassa catthassa vibhāvane idaṃ pāṭibhogādikaṃ nidassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1063_4: Yathā hi loke yo kassaci atthassa niyyātanatthaṃ pāṭibhogo hoti, bhaṇḍaṃ vā kiṇāti,
anya-e0102n:1063_5: iṇaṃ vā gaṇhāti, tassa taṃ kiriyākaraṇamattameva tadatthaniyyātanādimhi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1063_6: na kiriyāya vijjamānattaṃ, avijjamānattaṃ vā, na ca tadatthaniyyātanādito parampi
anya-e0102n:1063_7: dhārakova hoti. Kasmā? Niyyātanādīnaṃ katattā. Evaṃ katattāva saṅkhārāpi attano phalassa
anya-e0102n:1063_8: paccayā honti, na ca yathārahaṃ phaladānato parampi phalāvahā hontīti. Ettāvatā missāmissavasena
anya-e0102n:1063_9: dvedhāpi vattamānassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa saṅkhārapaccayā pavatti dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1067_0: Tattha tayo bhavā, catasso yoniyo, pañca gatiyo, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava sattāvāsāti
anya-e0102n:1067_1: ete bhavādayo nāma. Etesu bhavādīsu paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca ete yesaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1067_2: paccayā, yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā vijānitabbāti attho.
anya-e0102n:1068_0: Tattha puññābhisaṅkhāre tāva kāmāvacaraaṭṭhacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena
anya-e0102n:1068_1: kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ navannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena
anya-e0102n:1068_2: ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā paccayo. Rūpāvacarapañcakusalacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0102n:1069_1: sattannaṃ parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva dvedhā paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1069_2: Sveva rūpabhave pañcannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1069_3: Kāmabhave pana duggatiyaṃ aṭṭhannampi parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
anya-e0102n:1069_4: no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Tattha niraye mahāmoggallānattherassa narakacārikādīsu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyoge
anya-e0102n:1069_5: so paccayo hoti, tiracchānesu pana petamahiddhikesu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1070_0: Sveva kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ soḷasannampi kusalavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte
anya-e0102n:1070_1: ca paṭisandhiyañca. Avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1071_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedo apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave duggatiyaṃ ekassa viññāṇassa
anya-e0102n:1071_1: tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatte. Channaṃ pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Sattannampi
anya-e0102n:1072_0: Kāmabhave pana sugatiyaṃ tesaṃyeva sattannaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1072_1: Rūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. So
anya-e0102n:1072_2: ca kho kāmāvacare aniṭṭharūpadassanasaddasavanavasena, brahmaloke pana aniṭṭharūpādayo
anya-e0102n:1073: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro arūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
anya-e0102n:1074: Evaṃ tāva bhavesu paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena ete saṅkhārā yesaṃ paccayā, yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā vijānitabbā. Eteneva nayena yoniādīsupi veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1075_0: 637. Tatridaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya mukhamattapakāsanaṃ – imesu hi saṅkhāresu yasmā puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0102n:1075_1: tāva dvīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti. Tathā aṇḍajādīsu
anya-e0102n:1075_3: catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu. Asaññasattāvāse panesa rūpamattamevābhisaṅkharotīti catūsuyeva
anya-e0102n:1075_4: sattāvāsesu ca paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti. Tasmā esa etesu dvīsu
anya-e0102n:1075_5: bhavesu, catūsu yonīsu, dvīsu gatīsu, catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, catūsu sattāvāsesu
anya-e0102n:1075_6: ca ekavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
anya-e0102n:1076_0: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekasmiṃyeva kāmabhave catūsu yonīsu, avasesāsu tīsu
anya-e0102n:1076_1: gatīsu, nānattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhātāya ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā, tādiseyeva ca ekasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1076_2: sattāvāse paṭisandhivasena vipaccati, tasmā esa ekasmiṃ bhave, catūsu yonīsu, tīsu
anya-e0102n:1076_3: gatīsu, ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā, ekamhi ca sattāvāse sattannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:1077_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekasmiṃyeva arūpabhave, ekissā opapātikayoniyā, ekissā
anya-e0102n:1077_1: devagatiyā, ākāsānañcāyatanādikāsu tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, ākāsānañcāyatanādikesu ca
anya-e0102n:1077_2: catūsu sattāvāsesu paṭisandhivasena vipaccati, tasmā esa ekasmiṃ bhave, ekissā yoniyā,
anya-e0102n:1077_3: ekissā gatiyā, tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, catūsu sattāvāsesu catunnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n:1077_4: paccayo hoti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte cāti. Evaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1085_0: Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti ettha hi nāmanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo
anya-e0102n:1085_1: khandhā, rūpanti cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1085_2: vibhāgo khandhaniddese vuttoyevāti. Evaṃ tāvettha vibhāgā nāmarūpānaṃ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1086_0: Bhavādīsu pavattitoti ettha ca nāmaṃ ekaṃ sattāvāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisesasattāvāsesu
anya-e0102n:1086_1: pavattati, rūpaṃ dvīsu bhavesu, catūsu yonīsu, pañcasu gatīsu, purimāsu catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu,
anya-e0102n:1087_0: Evaṃ pavattamāne ca etasmiṃ nāmarūpe yasmā abhāvakagabbhaseyyakānaṃ aṇḍajānañca paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:1087_1: vatthukāyadasakavasena rūpato dvesantatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0102n:1087_2: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato vīsati dhammā, tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tevīsati
anya-e0102n:1087_3: dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana ekasantatisīsato
anya-e0102n:1087_4: nava rūpadhamme apanetvā cuddasa. Sabhāvakānaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ pakkhipitvā tettiṃsa,
anya-e0102n:1087_5: tesampi aggahitaggahaṇena santatisīsadvayato aṭṭhārasa rūpadhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
anya-e0102n:1088_0: Yasmā ca opapātikasattesu brahmakāyikādīnaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1088_1: jīvitindriyanavakassa ca vasena rūpato cattāri santatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā
anya-e0102n:1088_2: pātubhavanti, tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato ekūnacattālīsa dhammā, tayo ca arūpino
anya-e0102n:1088_3: khandhāti ete bācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena
anya-e0102n:1088_4: pana santatisīsattayato sattavīsati dhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
anya-e0102n:1089_0: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānaṃ, saṃsedajānaṃ vā sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1089_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpato satta santatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0102n:1089_2: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato sattati dhammā, tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tesattati
anya-e0102n:1089_3: dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana rūpasantatisīsachakkato
anya-e0102n:1089_4: catupaññāsa dhamme apanetvā ekūnavīsati. Esa ukkaṃso. Avakaṃsena pana taṃtaṃrūpasantatisīsavikalānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1089_5: tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca paṭisandhiyaṃ viññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1090: Arūpīnaṃ pana tayova arūpino khandhā. Asaññīnaṃ rūpato jīvitindriyanavakamevāti. Esa tāva paṭisandhiyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0102n:1091_0: Pavatte pana sabbattha rūpappavattidese paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittena
anya-e0102n:1091_1: saha pavattaututo utusamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ pātubhavati. Paṭisandhicittaṃ pana
anya-e0102n:1091_2: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Tañhi yathā papāte patitapuriso parassa paccayo hotuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1091_3: evaṃ vatthudubbalatāya dubbalattā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Paṭisandhicittato
anya-e0102n:1091_4: pana uddhaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, saddapātubhāvakāle
anya-e0102n:1091_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇato uddhaṃ pavattaututo ceva cittato ca saddanavakaṃ, ye pana kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino
anya-e0102n:1093: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. –
anya-e0102n:1094_0: Vacanato mātarā ajjhoharitāhārena anugate sarīre, opapātikānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano
anya-e0102n:1094_1: mukhagataṃ kheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakanti idaṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānassa
anya-e0102n:1094_2: suddhaṭṭhakassa, utucittasamuṭṭhānānañca ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena chabbīsatividhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1094_3: pubbe ekekacittakkhaṇe tikkhattuṃ uppajjamānaṃ vuttaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānañca sattatividhanti
anya-e0102n:1094_4: channavutividhaṃ rūpaṃ, tayo ca arūpino khandhāti samāsato navanavuti dhammā. Yasmā
anya-e0102n:1094_5: vā saddo aniyato kadācideva pātubhāvato, tasmā duvidhampi taṃ apanetvā ime sattanavuti
anya-e0102n:1094_6: dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ sabbasattānaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbaṃ. Tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1094_7: hi suttānampi pamattānampi khādantānampi pivantānampi divā ca rattiñca ete viññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1094_8: pavattanti. Tañca nesaṃ viññāṇapaccayabhāvaṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma.
anya-e0102n:1095_0: Yampanetamettha kammajarūpaṃ, taṃ bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ patiṭṭhahantampi
anya-e0102n:1095_1: tisamuṭṭhānikarūpena anupatthaddhaṃ na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṃ, nāpi tisamuṭṭhānikaṃ tena
anya-e0102n:1095_2: anupatthaddhaṃ. Atha kho vātabbhāhatāpi catuddisā vavatthāpitā naḷakalāpiyo viya,
anya-e0102n:1095_3: ūmivegabbhāhatāpi mahāsamudde katthaci laddhapatiṭṭhā bhinnavāhanikā viya ca aññamaññupatthaddhānevetāni
anya-e0102n:1095_4: apatamānāni saṇṭhahitvā ekampi vassaṃ dvepi vassāni…pe… vassasatampi yāva tesaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1095_5: āyukkhayo vā puññakkhayo vā, tāva pavattantīti. Evaṃ bhavādīsu pavattitopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1096_0: 639. Saṅgahāti ettha ca yaṃ āruppe pavattipaṭisandhīsu, pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1096_1: viññāṇapaccayā nāmameva, yañca asaññesu sabbattha, pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1096_2: viññāṇapaccayā rūpameva, yañca pañcavokārabhave sabbattha viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1096_3: taṃ sabbaṃ nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti evaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesanayena
anya-e0102n:1097: Asaññesu viññāṇābhāvā ayuttanti ce, nāyuttaṃ. Idampi,
anya-e0102n:1098: Nāmarūpassa yaṃ hetu, viññāṇaṃ taṃ dvidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0102n:1100_0: Yañhi nāmarūpassa hetu viññāṇaṃ, taṃ vipākāvipākabhedato dvedhā mataṃ. Idañca asaññasattesu
anya-e0102n:1100_2: pañcavokāre pavattiyaṃ kusalādicittakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānanti yuttameva idaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1105: Tadaññaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ, tassa tassa yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1106_0: Yañhetaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyaṃ vā vipākasaṅkhātaṃ nāmaṃ, tassa rūpamissassa vā
anya-e0102n:1106_1: amissassa vā paṭisandhikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākāhārindriyaatthiavigatapaccayehi
anya-e0102n:1107_1: navadhā paccayo hoti. Ṭhapetvā pana vatthurūpaṃ sesarūpassa imesu navasu aññamaññapaccayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1107_2: apanetvā sesehi aṭṭhahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1108_0: Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pana asaññasattarūpassa vā pañcavokārabhave vā kammajassa rūpassa
anya-e0102n:1108_1: suttantikapariyāyato upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti. Avasesaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato
anya-e0102n:1108_2: pabhuti sabbampi viññāṇaṃ tassa tassa nāmarūpassa yathārahaṃ paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1108_3: Vitthārato pana tassa paccayanaye dassiyamāne sabbāpi paṭṭhānakathā vitthāretabbā
anya-e0102n:1109_0: Tattha siyā – kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ viññāṇapaccayā hotī”ti?
anya-e0102n:1109_1: Suttato yuttito ca. Sutte hi “cittānuparivattino dhammā”tiādinā nayena bahudhā vedanādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:1110: Cittajena hi rūpena, idha diṭṭhena sijjhati;
anya-e0102n:1112_0: Citte hi pasanne appasanne vā tadanurūpāni rūpāni uppajjamānāni diṭṭhāni. Diṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1112_1: ca adiṭṭhassa anumānaṃ hotīti iminā idha diṭṭhena cittajarūpena adiṭṭhassāpi paṭisandhirūpassa
anya-e0102n:1112_2: viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotīti jānitabbametaṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hi tassa cittasamuṭṭhānasseva
anya-e0102n:1112_3: viññāṇapaccayatā paṭṭhāne āgatāti. Evaṃ paccayanayatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
anya-e0102n:1118_0: Yañhetaṃ saḷāyatanasseva paccayabhūtaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, tattha nāmanti vedanādikkhandhattayaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1118_1: rūpaṃ pana sasantatipariyāpannaṃ niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyanti
anya-e0102n:1118_2: evaṃ bhūtavatthādikaṃ matanti veditabbaṃ. Taṃ pana nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti
anya-e0102n:1118_3: evaṃ katekasesaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesasseva
anya-e0102n:1118_4: saḷāyatanassa paccayoti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā āruppe nāmameva paccayo, tañca chaṭṭhāyatanasseva
anya-e0102n:1118_5: na aññassa. “Nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatana”nti hi vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1119_0: Tattha siyā – kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanassa paccayo”ti? Nāmarūpabhāve
anya-e0102n:1119_1: bhāvato. Tassa tassa hi nāmassa rūpassa ca bhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ hoti, na aññathā.
anya-e0102n:1119_2: Sā panassa tabbhāvabhāvitā paccayanayasmiṃ yeva āvibhavissati. Tasmā,
anya-e0102n:1120: Paṭisandhiyā pavatte vā, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1121: Yathā ca paccayo hoti, tathā neyyaṃ vibhāvinā.
anya-e0102n:1124: Paccayo sattadhā chadhā, hoti taṃ avakaṃsato.
anya-e0102n:1125_1: sattadhā nāmaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena, kiñci
anya-e0102n:1125_2: āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti, tassa vasena ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1126_0: Pavattepi vipākaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti, itaraṃ pana avakaṃsato vuttappakāresu
anya-e0102n:1126_1: paccayesu vipākapaccayavajjehi chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena,
anya-e0102n:1126_2: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti, tassa vasena ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1129_0: Āruppato hi aññasmimpi pañcavokārabhave taṃ vipākanāmaṃ hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā
anya-e0102n:1129_1: chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa yathā āruppe vuttaṃ, tatheva avakaṃsato sattadhā paccayo
anya-e0102n:1129_2: hoti. Itaresaṃ pana taṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ catumahābhūtasahāyaṃ hutvā sahajātanissayavipākavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena
anya-e0102n:1129_3: chahākārehi paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena, kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1129_4: aññathāpi paccayo hoti, tassa vasena ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1130: Pavattepi tathā hoti, pākaṃ pākassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1132_0: Pavattepi hi pañcavokārabhave yathā paṭisandhiyaṃ, tatheva vipākanāmaṃ vipākassa
anya-e0102n:1132_1: chaṭṭhāyatanassa avakaṃsato sattadhā paccayo hoti. Avipākaṃ pana avipākassa chaṭṭhassa
anya-e0102n:1132_2: avakaṃsatova tato vipākapaccayaṃ apanetvā chadhā paccayo hoti. Vuttanayeneva panettha
anya-e0102n:1135_0: Tattheva hi pavatte sesānaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhupasādādivatthukaṃ itarampi
anya-e0102n:1135_1: vipākanāmaṃ pacchājātavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayo hoti. Yathā
anya-e0102n:1135_2: ca vipākaṃ, avipākampi evameva pakāsitaṃ. Tasmā kusalādibhedampi tesaṃ catudhā paccayo
anya-e0102n:1135_3: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ tāva nāmameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa
anya-e0102n:1135_4: paccayo hoti, yathā ca paccayo hoti, tathā veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1136: Rūpaṃ panettha āruppe, bhave bhavati paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1138: Rūpato sandhiyaṃ vatthu, chadhā chaṭṭhassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1140_0: Rūpato hi paṭisandhiyaṃ vatthurūpaṃ chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
anya-e0102n:1140_1: chadhā paccayo hoti. Cattāri pana bhūtāni avisesato paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca yaṃ
anya-e0102n:1140_2: yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa tassa vasena pañcannampi cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi
anya-e0102n:1142: Tāneva chadhā chaṭṭhassa, vatthu tasseva pañcadhā.
anya-e0102n:1143_0: Etesaṃ pana cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca atthi avigataindriyavasena
anya-e0102n:1143_1: rūpajīvitaṃ tidhā paccayo hoti. Āhāro ca atthiavigatāhāravasena tividhā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1143_2: so ca kho ye sattā āhārūpajīvino, tesaṃ āhārānugate kāye pavattiyaṃyeva, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1143_3: Tāni pana pañca cakkhāyatanādīni chaṭṭhassa cakkhu sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0102n:1143_5: honti pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Ṭhapetvā pana pañcaviññāṇāni tasseva avasesamanāyatanassa
anya-e0102n:1143_7: no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Evaṃ rūpameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa paccayo
anya-e0102n:1143_8: hoti, yathā ca paccayo hoti, tathā veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1144: Nāmarūpaṃ panubhayaṃ, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1145: Yathā ca tampi sabbattha, viññātabbaṃ vibhāvinā.
anya-e0102n:1146_2: paccayo hotīti. Idamettha mukhamattaṃ. Vuttanayānusārena pana sakkā sabbaṃ yojetunti
anya-e0102n:1152_0: Saṅkhepena hi saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, ghānasamphasso,
anya-e0102n:1152_1: jivhāsamphasso, kāyasamphasso, manosamphassoti ime cakkhusamphassādayo cha eva phassā
anya-e0102n:1152_2: bhavanti. Vitthārena pana cakkhusamphassādayo pañca kusalavipākā, pañca akusalavipākāti
anya-e0102n:1152_3: dasa, sesā bāvīsati-lokiyavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā ca bāvīsatīti evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1153: Yaṃ panetassa bāttiṃsavidhassāpi phassassa paccayo saḷāyatanaṃ, tattha,
anya-e0102n:1156_0: Tattha ye tāva “upādiṇṇakapavattikathā aya”nti sakasantatipariyāpannameva paccayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1156_1: paccayuppannañca dīpenti, te “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti pāḷianusārato āruppe
anya-e0102n:1156_2: chaṭṭhāyatanañca, aññattha sabbasaṅgahato saḷāyatanañca phassassa paccayoti ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1156_3: katvā chaṭṭhena saha ajjhattaṃ cakkhādiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti. Tañhi chaṭṭhāyatanañca
anya-e0102n:1157_0: Ye pana paccayuppannameva ekasantatipariyāpannaṃ dīpenti, paccayaṃ pana bhinnasantānampi,
anya-e0102n:1157_1: te yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ phassassa paccayo hoti, taṃ sabbampi dīpentā bāhirampi pariggahetvā
anya-e0102n:1157_2: tadeva chaṭṭhena saha ajjhattaṃ bāhirehipi rūpāyatanādīhi saddhiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti.
anya-e0102n:1157_3: Tampi hi chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti etesaṃ ekasese kate saḷāyatanantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1158_0: Etthāha – na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti, nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā,
anya-e0102n:1158_1: ayañca saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti ekova vutto, so kasmāti. Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1158_2: saccametaṃ, sabbehi eko, ekamhā vā sabbe na sambhonti, sambhoti pana anekehi eko.
anya-e0102n:1158_3: Yathā cakkhusamphasso cakkhāyatanā rūpāyatanā cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātā manāyatanā avasesasampayuttadhammāyatanā
anya-e0102n:1158_4: cāti evaṃ sabbattha yathānurūpaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tasmā eva hi,
anya-e0102n:1161: Ekavacananiddesenāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti iminā ekavacananiddesena anekehi āyatanehi eko phasso hotīti tādinā dīpitoti attho. Āyatanesu pana,
anya-e0102n:1162: Chadhā pañca tato ekaṃ, navadhā bāhirāni cha;
anya-e0102n:1164_0: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – cakkhāyatanādīni tāva pañca cakkhusamphassādibhedato pañcavidhassa
anya-e0102n:1164_2: Tato paraṃ ekaṃ vipākamanāyatanaṃ anekabhedassa vipākamanosamphassassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākāhāraindriyasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
anya-e0102n:1164_3: navadhā paccayo hoti. Bāhiresu pana rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhusamphassassa ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena
anya-e0102n:1164_4: catudhā paccayo hoti. Tathā saddāyatanādīni sotasamphassādīnaṃ. Manosamphassassa
anya-e0102n:1164_5: pana tāni ca dhammāyatanañca tathā ca ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva cāti evaṃ bāhirāni
anya-e0102n:1170_0: Etassapi padassa vibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā. Sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya… manosamphassajā
anya-e0102n:1170_1: vedanā”ti evaṃ dvārato saḷeva vedanā vuttā, tā pana pabhedena ekūnanavutiyā cittehi
anya-e0102n:1174: Sesānaṃ ekadhā phasso, manodvārepi so tathā.
anya-e0102n:1175_0: Tattha hi pañcadvāre cakkhupasādādivatthukānaṃ pañcannaṃ vedanānaṃ cakkhusamphassādiko
anya-e0102n:1175_2: hoti. Sesānaṃ pana ekekasmiṃ dvāre sampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1175_3: kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ so cakkhusamphassādiko phasso upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1176_0: Manodvārepi so tathāti manodvārepi hi tadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1176_1: so sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto phasso tatheva aṭṭhadhā paccayo hoti, paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena
anya-e0102n:1176_2: pavattānaṃ tebhūmakavipākavedanānampi. Yā pana tā manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattā
anya-e0102n:1182_0: Imasmiṃ hi pade seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputtoti pitito nāmavasena putto viya “rūpataṇhā.
anya-e0102n:1182_1: Sadda… gandha… rasa… phoṭṭhabba… dhammataṇhā”ti ārammaṇato nāmavasena vibhaṅge cha taṇhā dīpitā.
anya-e0102n:1183_0: Tāsu pana taṇhāsu ekekā taṇhā pavattiākārato kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhāti
anya-e0102n:1183_1: evaṃ tividhā matā. Rūpataṇhāyeva hi yadā cakkhussa āpāthamāgataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena
anya-e0102n:1183_2: assādayamānā pavattati, tadā kāmataṇhā nāma hoti. Yadā tadevārammaṇaṃ “dhuvaṃ sassata”nti
anya-e0102n:1183_3: pavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati, tadā bhavataṇhā nāma hoti. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato
anya-e0102n:1183_4: hi rāgo bhavataṇhāti vuccati. Yadā pana tadevārammaṇaṃ “ucchijjati vinassatī”ti pavattāya
anya-e0102n:1183_5: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati, tadā vibhavataṇhā nāma hoti. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato
anya-e0102n:1183_6: hi rāgo vibhavataṇhāti vuccati. Esa nayo saddataṇhādīsupīti. Etā aṭṭhārasa taṇhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1184_0: Tā ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhā aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa. Iti atītā chattiṃsa,
anya-e0102n:1184_1: anāgatā chattiṃsa, paccuppannā chattiṃsāti aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhā honti. Tā puna saṅkheppamāṇā
anya-e0102n:1184_2: rūpādiārammaṇavasena cha, kāmataṇhādivasena vā tissova taṇhā hontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1185_0: Yasmā panime sattā puttaṃ assādetvā putte mamattena dhātiyā viya rūpādiārammaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:1185_1: uppajjamānaṃ vedanaṃ assādetvā vedanāya mamattena rūpādiārammaṇadāyakānaṃ cittakāra-gandhabba-gandhika-sūda-tantavāyarasāyanavidhāyakavejjādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:1185_2: mahāsakkāraṃ karonti. Tasmā sabbāpesā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1188: Ekadhāti upanissayapaccayeneva paccayo hoti. Yasmā vā,
anya-e0102n:1189: Dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayati, sukhī bhiyyopi icchati;
anya-e0102n:1191: Taṇhāya paccayā tasmā, honti tissopi vedanā;
anya-e0102n:1194: Hoti tasmā na sā hoti, brāhmaṇassa vusīmatoti.
anya-e0102n:1200_0: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – kāmupādānaṃ, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, sīlabbatupādānaṃ, attavādupādānanti
anya-e0102n:1200_1: imāni tāvettha cattāri upādānāni. Tesaṃ ayaṃ atthavibhāgo – vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ
anya-e0102n:1200_2: upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ, kāmo ca so upādānañcātipi kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1200_3: Daḷhattho hettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya. Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti
anya-e0102n:1200_4: diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Diṭṭhiṃ upādiyatīti vā diṭṭhupādānaṃ. “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n:1200_5: hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyati. Tathā sīlabbataṃ upādiyatīti sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1200_6: Sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcātipi sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti
anya-e0102n:1200_7: abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni. Tathā vadanti etenāti vādo. Upādiyanti etenāti upādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1200_8: Kiṃ vadanti, upādiyanti vā? Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ. Attavādamattameva
anya-e0102n:1200_9: vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva tesaṃ atthavibhāgo.
anya-e0102n:1201_0: Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ tāva “tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ? Yo kāmesu
anya-e0102n:1201_1: kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1201_2: idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna”nti āgatattā saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ vuccati. Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1201_3: nāma purimataṇhāupanissayapaccayena daḷhasambhūtā uttarataṇhāva. Keci panāhu “appattavisayapatthanā
anya-e0102n:1201_4: taṇhā andhakāre corassa hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ tasseva
anya-e0102n:1201_5: bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ viya. Appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāpaṭipakkhā ca te dhammā. Tathā pariyesanārakkhadukkhamūlā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1202_0: Vitthārato pana pubbe rūpādīsu vuttaaṭṭhasatappabhedāyapi taṇhāya daḷhabhāvo kāmupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1202_1: Dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1202_2: Natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ…pe… sacchikatvā pavedentīti yā evarūpā diṭṭhi…pe… vipariyesaggāho.
anya-e0102n:1202_3: Idaṃ vuccati diṭṭhupādāna”nti. Sīlabbatehi suddhīti parāmasanaṃ pana sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1202_4: Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ? Sīlena suddhi, vatena suddhi, sīlabbatena
anya-e0102n:1202_5: suddhīti yā evarūpā diṭṭhi…pe… vipariyesaggāho. Idaṃ vuccati sīlabbatupādāna”nti.
anya-e0102n:1202_6: Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi attavādupādānaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1202_7: Idha assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati…pe…
anya-e0102n:1202_8: vipariyesaggāho, idaṃ vuccati attavādupādāna”nti. Ayamettha dhammasaṅkhepavitthāro.
anya-e0102n:1203_0: Kamatoti ettha pana tividho kamo uppattikkamo pahānakkamo desanākkamo ca. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1203_1: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo
anya-e0102n:1203_2: na vuccati. Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso,
anya-e0102n:1203_3: tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ, “ucchijjatī”ti
anya-e0102n:1203_4: gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ, tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti
anya-e0102n:1204: Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha paṭhamaṃ pahīyanti sotāpattimaggavajjhattā. Kāmupādānaṃ pacchā, arahattamaggavajjhattāti ayametesaṃ pahānakkamo.
anya-e0102n:1205_0: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Mahāvisayaṃ hi
anya-e0102n:1205_1: taṃ aṭṭhacittasampayogā, appavisayāni itarāni catucittasampayogā, yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmattā
anya-e0102n:1205_2: pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ, na itarāni. Kāmupādāna vā kāmānaṃ samadhigamatthaṃ kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo
anya-e0102n:1205_3: hoti, sāssa diṭṭhīti tadanantaraṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ, taṃ pabhijjamānaṃ sīlabbataattavādupādānavasena
anya-e0102n:1205_4: duvidhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti
anya-e0102n:1205_5: sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Sukhumattā ante attavādupādānanti ayametesaṃ desanākkamo.
anya-e0102n:1206: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1207: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
anya-e0102n:1208_0: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena
anya-e0102n:1208_1: ekadhāva paccayo hoti, taṇhābhinanditesu visayesu uppattito. Sesattayassa pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena
anya-e0102n:1208_2: sattadhā vā, upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti. Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena
anya-e0102n:1213: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1214_0: Tattha bhavatīti bhavo. So kammabhavo upapattibhavo cāti duvidho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1214_1: “bhavo duvidhena atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo”ti. Tattha kammameva bhavo
anya-e0102n:1214_2: kammabhavo, tathā upapattiyeva bhavo upapattibhavo. Ettha ca upapatti bhavatīti bhavo.
anya-e0102n:1214_3: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo”ti vutto, evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā
anya-e0102n:1214_4: phalavohārena bhavoti veditabbanti. Evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1215_0: 647. Dhammato pana kammabhavo tāva saṅkhepato cetanā ceva cetanāsampayuttā ca abhijjhādayo
anya-e0102n:1215_1: kammasaṅkhātā dhammā. Yathāha – “tattha katamo kammabhavo? Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0102n:1215_2: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vā, ayaṃ vuccati kammabhavo. Sabbampi
anya-e0102n:1215_3: bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti. Ettha hi puññābhisaṅkhāroti terasa cetanā. Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti
anya-e0102n:1215_4: dvādasa. Āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti catasso cetanā. Evaṃ parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vāti
anya-e0102n:1215_5: etena tāsaṃyeva cetanānaṃ mandabahuvipākatā vuttā. Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā
anya-e0102n:1216_0: Upapattibhavo pana saṅkhepato kammābhinibbattā khandhā, pabhedato navavidho hoti.
anya-e0102n:1216_1: Yathāha – “tattha katamo upapattibhavo? Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññābhavo
anya-e0102n:1216_3: ayaṃ vuccati upapattibhavo”ti. Tattha kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo kāmabhavo. Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu.
anya-e0102n:1216_4: Saññāvataṃ bhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo. Vipariyāyena asaññābhavo.
anya-e0102n:1216_5: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā, nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo.
anya-e0102n:1216_6: Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo ekavokārabhavo. Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti
anya-e0102n:1216_7: ekavokārabhavo. Esa nayo catuvokārapañcavokārabhavesu. Tattha kāmabhavo pañca upādiṇṇakkhandhā.
anya-e0102n:1216_8: Tathā rūpabhavo. Arūpabhavo cattāro, saññābhavo pañca. Asaññābhavo eko upādiṇṇakkhandho.
anya-e0102n:1217_0: 648. Sātthatoti yathā ca bhavaniddese, tatheva kāmaṃ saṅkhāraniddesepi puññābhisaṅkhārādayova
anya-e0102n:1217_1: vuttā, evaṃ santepi purime atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā, ime paccuppannakammavasena
anya-e0102n:1217_2: āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva, pubbe vā “tattha katamo
anya-e0102n:1217_3: puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena cetanāva saṅkhārāti
anya-e0102n:1217_4: vuttā. Idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttāpi. Pubbe
anya-e0102n:1217_5: ca viññāṇapaccayameva kammaṃ “saṅkhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni asaññābhavanibbattakampi.
anya-e0102n:1217_6: Kiṃ vā bahunā, “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha puññābhisaṅkhārādayova kusalākusalā
anya-e0102n:1217_7: dhammā vuttā. “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā
anya-e0102n:1217_8: kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā vuttā. Tasmā sabbathāpi sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti
anya-e0102n:1218_0: 649. Bhedasaṅgahāti upādānapaccayā bhavassa bhedato ceva saṅgahato ca. Yañhi kāmupādānapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1218_1: kāmabhavanibbattakaṃ kammaṃ karīyati, so kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
anya-e0102n:1218_2: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā dve kāmabhavā, tadantogadhā ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā,
anya-e0102n:1218_5: saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā. Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha
anya-e0102n:1218_6: bhavā. Tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā bhedato saddhiṃ antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1219_0: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1219_1: antogadhehi eko kāmabhavo. Tathā rūpārūpabhavāti tayo bhavā. Tathā sesupādānapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1219_2: pīti. Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saṅgahato saddhiṃ antogadhehi dvādasa bhavā. Apica avisesena
anya-e0102n:1219_3: upādānapaccayā kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
anya-e0102n:1219_4: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
anya-e0102n:1219_5: dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavāti aparena pariyāyena saṅgahato cha bhavā. Kammabhavaupapattibhavabhedaṃ
anya-e0102n:1219_6: vā anupagamma saddhiṃ antogadhehi kāmabhavādivasena tayo bhavā honti. Kāmabhavādibhedampi
anya-e0102n:1219_7: anupagamma kammabhavaupapattibhavavasena dve bhavā honti. Kammupapattibhedañcāpi
anya-e0102n:1219_8: anupagamma upādānapaccayā bhavoti bhavavasena ekova bhavo hotīti evamettha upādānapaccayassa
anya-e0102n:1220_0: 650. Yaṃ yassa paccayo cevāti yañcettha upādānaṃ yassa paccayo hoti, tatopi viññātabbo
anya-e0102n:1220_1: vinicchayoti attho. Kiṃ panettha kassa paccayo hoti? Yaṃkiñci yassa kassaci paccayo
anya-e0102n:1220_2: hotiyeva. Ummattako viya hi puthujjano. So idaṃ yuttaṃ idaṃ ayuttanti avicāretvā
anya-e0102n:1220_3: yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yaṃkiñci bhavaṃ patthetvā yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1220_4: Tasmā yadekacce sīlabbatupādānena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1221_0: Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco anussavavasena vā diṭṭhānusārena vā “kāmā nāmete manussaloke
anya-e0102n:1221_1: ceva khattiyamahāsālakulādīsu, cha kāmāvacaradevaloke ca samiddhā”ti cintetvā tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1221_2: adhigamatthaṃ asaddhammassavanādīhi vañcito “iminā kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti maññamāno
anya-e0102n:1221_3: kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti, so duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati.
anya-e0102n:1221_4: Sandiṭṭhike vā pana kāme patthayamāno paṭiladdhe ca gopayamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīni
anya-e0102n:1221_5: karoti, so duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati. Tatrāssa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1221_6: kammabhavo. Kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā pana tadantogadhā eva.
anya-e0102n:1222_0: Aparo pana saddhammassavanādīhi upabrūhitañāṇo “iminā kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti
anya-e0102n:1222_1: maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyasucaritādīni karoti. So sucaritapāripūriyā devesu
anya-e0102n:1222_2: vā manussesu vā upapajjati. Tatrāssa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Kammābhinibbattā
anya-e0102n:1222_3: khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti kāmupādānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1223_0: Aparo “rūpārūpabhavesu tato samiddhatarā kāmā”ti sutvā parikappetvā vā kāmupādānavaseneva
anya-e0102n:1223_1: rūpārūpasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samāpattibalena rūpārūpabrahmaloke upapajjati. Tatrāssa
anya-e0102n:1223_2: upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññā-asaññā-nevasaññānāsaññā-eka-catu-pañcavokārabhavā
anya-e0102n:1223_3: pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti kāmupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ rūpārūpabhavānampi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1224_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1224_1: ucchinne suucchinno hotī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādāya tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti, tassa
anya-e0102n:1224_2: taṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo pana
anya-e0102n:1224_3: tadantogadhā eva. Iti diṭṭhupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇampi kāmarūpārūpabhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1225_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1225_1: sukhī hoti vigatapariḷāho”ti attavādupādānena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti, tassa taṃ
anya-e0102n:1225_2: kammaṃ kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo pana tadantogadhā
anya-e0102n:1225_3: eva. Iti attavādupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1226_0: Aparo “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1226_1: paripūrentassa sukhaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti sīlabbatupādānavasena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1226_2: karoti, tassa taṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo
anya-e0102n:1226_3: pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti sīlabbatupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1226_4: paccayo hoti. Evamettha yaṃ yassa paccayo hoti, tatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1227: Kiṃ panettha kassa bhavassa kathaṃ paccayo hotīti ce?
anya-e0102n:1230_0: Rūpārūpabhavānaṃ hi, kāmabhavapariyāpannassa ca kammabhave kusalakammasseva, upapattibhavassa
anya-e0102n:1230_1: cetaṃ catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upanissayapaccayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave
anya-e0102n:1230_3: sahajātādīhi paccayo hoti. Vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevāti.
anya-e0102n:1233_0: 651. Bhavapaccayā jātītiādīsu jātiādīnaṃ vinicchayo saccaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1233_1: Bhavoti panettha kammabhavova adhippeto. So hi jātiyā paccayo, na upapattibhavo.
anya-e0102n:1233_2: So ca pana kammapaccayaupanissayapaccayavasena dvedhā paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1234_0: Tattha siyā – kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ bhavo jātiyā paccayoti ce? Bāhirapaccayasamattepi
anya-e0102n:1234_2: samattepi sattānaṃ yamakānampi sataṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati. So ca na ahetuko
anya-e0102n:1234_3: sabbadā ca sabbesañca abhāvato, na kammabhavato aññahetuko tadabhinibbattakasattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1234_4: ajjhattasantāne aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti kammabhavahetukova. Kammaṃ hi sattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1234_5: hīnapaṇītatādivisesassa hetu. Tenāha bhagavā “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1235_0: Yasmā ca asati jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma, sokādayo vā dhammā na honti. Jātiyā pana
anya-e0102n:1235_1: sati jarāmaraṇañceva, jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātadukkhadhammaphuṭṭhassa ca bālajanassa jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā
anya-e0102n:1235_2: vā tena tena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa anabhisambandhā vā sokādayo ca dhammā honti.
anya-e0102n:1235_3: Tasmā ayampi jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca paccayo hotīti veditabbā. Sā pana
anya-e0102n:1238: 652. Yasmā panettha sokādayo avasāne vuttā, tasmā yā sā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti evametassa bhavacakkassa ādimhi vuttā, sā,
anya-e0102n:1242_0: Kathaṃ panettha sokādīhi avijjā siddhā, kathamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādi, kathaṃ
anya-e0102n:1242_1: kārakavedakarahitaṃ, kathaṃ dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti ce? Ettha hi sokadomanassupāyāsā
anya-e0102n:1242_2: avijjāya aviyogino, paridevo ca nāma mūḷhassāti tesu tāva siddhesu siddhā hoti avijjā.
anya-e0102n:1242_3: Apica “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vuttaṃ. Āsavasamudayā cete sokādayo honti.
anya-e0102n:1243: Kathaṃ? Vatthukāmaviyoge tāva soko kāmāsavasamudayā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1248: “Tassa ‘ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpa’nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1249: Yathā ca diṭṭhāsavasamudayā, evaṃ bhavāsavasamudayāpi. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1250_0: “Yepi te devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā, tepi
anya-e0102n:1250_1: tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ saṃvegamāpajjantī”ti. Pañca pubbanimittāni
anya-e0102n:1251: Yathā ca bhavāsavasamudayā, evaṃ avijjāsavasamudayāpi. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1252: “Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bālo tividhaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1253_0: Iti yasmā āsavasamudayā ete dhammā honti, tasmā ete sijjhamānā avijjāya hetubhūte
anya-e0102n:1253_1: āsave sādhenti. Āsavesu ca siddhesu paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāpi siddhāva hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1253_2: Evaṃ tāvettha sokādīhi avijjā siddhā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1254_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāya siddhāya puna avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n:1254_1: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti evaṃ hetuphalaparamparāya pariyosānaṃ natthi. Tasmā taṃ
anya-e0102n:1254_2: hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattaṃ dvādasaṅgaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1255_0: Evaṃ sati avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti idaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ virujjhatīti ce. Nayidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1255_1: ādimattakathanaṃ. Padhānadhammakathanaṃ panetaṃ. Tiṇṇannaṃ hi vaṭṭānaṃ avijjā padhānā.
anya-e0102n:1255_2: Avijjāggahaṇena hi avasesakilesavaṭṭañca kammādīni ca bālaṃ palibodhenti. Sappasiraggahaṇena
anya-e0102n:1255_3: sesasappasarīraṃ viya bāhaṃ. Avijjāsamucchede pana kate tehi vimokkho hoti. Sappasiracchede
anya-e0102n:1255_4: kate palibodhitabāhāvimokkho viya. Yathāha – “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:1255_5: Iti yaṃ gaṇhato bandho, muccato ca mokkho hoti, tassa padhānadhammassa kathanamidaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1255_6: na ādimattakathananti. Evamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1256_0: Tayidaṃ yasmā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavatti, tasmā tato aññena “brahmā
anya-e0102n:1256_1: mahābrahmā seṭṭho sajitā”ti evaṃ parikappitena brahmādinā vā saṃsārassa kārakena,
anya-e0102n:1256_2: “so kho pana me ayaṃ attā vado vedeyyo”ti evaṃ parikappitena attanā vā sukhadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1257_0: Yasmā panettha avijjā udayabbayadhammakattā dhuvabhāvena, saṃkiliṭṭhattā saṃkilesikattā
anya-e0102n:1257_1: ca subhabhāvena, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā sukhabhāvena, paccayāyattavuttittā vasavattanabhūtena
anya-e0102n:1257_2: attabhāvena ca suññā. Tathā saṅkhārādīnipi aṅgāni. Yasmā vā avijjā na attā, na attano,
anya-e0102n:1257_3: na attani, na attavatī. Tathā saṅkhārādīnipi aṅgāni. Tasmā dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññametaṃ
anya-e0102n:1260: Dve aṭṭha dve eva ca, sarūpato tesu aṅgāni.
anya-e0102n:1261_0: Tassa kho panetassa bhavacakkassa avijjā taṇhā cāti dve dhammā mūlanti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1261_1: Tadetaṃ pubbantāharaṇato avijjāmūlaṃ vedanāvasānaṃ, aparantasantānato taṇhāmūlaṃ
anya-e0102n:1261_2: jarāmaraṇāvasānanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha purimaṃ diṭṭhicaritavasena vuttaṃ, pacchimaṃ
anya-e0102n:1261_3: taṇhācaritavasena. Diṭṭhicaritānaṃ hi avijjā, taṇhācaritānañca taṇhā saṃsāranāyikā.
anya-e0102n:1261_4: Ucchedadiṭṭhisamugghātāya vā paṭhamaṃ, phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanato,
anya-e0102n:1261_6: vā purimaṃ, anupubbapavattidīpanato, opapātikavasena pacchimaṃ, sahuppattidīpanato.
anya-e0102n:1262_0: Atītapaccuppannānāgatā cassa tayo kālā. Tesu pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatavasena “avijjā,
anya-e0102n:1262_1: saṅkhārā cā”ti dve aṅgāni atītakālāni. Viññāṇādīni bhavāvasānāni aṭṭha paccuppannakālāni.
anya-e0102n:1262_2: Jāti ceva jarāmaraṇañca dve anāgatakālānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1267_0: Tattha saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi nāma. Vedanāya
anya-e0102n:1267_1: ca taṇhāya ca antarā eko phalahetusandhi nāma. Bhavassa ca jātiyā ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhīti
anya-e0102n:1268_0: Sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā panassa cattāro saṅgahā honti. Seyyathidaṃ – avijjāsaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1268_1: eko saṅgaho. Viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā dutiyo. Taṇhupādānabhavā tatiyo.
anya-e0102n:1271_0: Etehi pana vīsatiyā ākārasaṅkhātehi arehi vīsatiākārāranti veditabbaṃ. Tattha atīte
anya-e0102n:1271_1: hetavo pañcāti avijjā saṅkhārā cāti ime tāva dve vuttā eva. Yasmā pana avidvā paritassati,
anya-e0102n:1271_2: paritassito upādiyati, tassupādānapaccayā bhavo. Tasmā taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā
anya-e0102n:1271_3: honti. Tenāha “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā,
anya-e0102n:1271_4: upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1272_0: Tattha purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave, atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kariyamāneti
anya-e0102n:1272_1: attho. Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho, yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā.
anya-e0102n:1272_2: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimacetanāyo, yathā “dānaṃ dassāmī”ti cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1272_3: uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānupakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo.
anya-e0102n:1272_4: Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati. Ekāvajjanesu
anya-e0102n:1272_5: vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nāma. Sattame bhavo. Yā kāci vā pana cetanā
anya-e0102n:1272_6: bhavo. Sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nāma. Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa phale
anya-e0102n:1272_7: upapattibhave nikāmanā patthanā, sā taṇhā nāma. Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ kammabhavassa
anya-e0102n:1272_8: paccayabhūtaṃ “idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi ucchijjissāmī”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:1272_9: nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ, idaṃ upādānaṃ nāma. Cetanā bhavoti
anya-e0102n:1272_10: āyūhanāvasāne vuttā cetanā bhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1273_0: Idāni phalapañcakanti viññāṇādivedanāvasānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Yathāha – “idha paṭisandhi
anya-e0102n:1273_1: viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā, ime
anya-e0102n:1273_2: pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā”ti. Tattha paṭisandhi
anya-e0102n:1273_3: viññāṇanti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti vuccati, taṃ
anya-e0102n:1273_4: viññāṇaṃ. Okkanti nāmarūpanti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti āgantvā pavisanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1273_5: viya, idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. Pasādo āyatananti idaṃ cakkhādipañcāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. Phuṭṭho
anya-e0102n:1273_6: phassoti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno, ayaṃ phasso. Vedayitaṃ vedanāti yaṃ
anya-e0102n:1273_7: paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena saha uppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1274_0: Idāni hetavo pañcāti taṇhādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatā taṇhupādānabhavā. Bhave pana gahite
anya-e0102n:1274_1: tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā gahitāva honti. Taṇhupādānaggahaṇena ca
anya-e0102n:1274_2: taṃsampayuttā, yāya vā mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā gahitāva hotīti. Evaṃ pañca.
anya-e0102n:1274_3: Tenāha “idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā,
anya-e0102n:1274_4: upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n:1274_5: paccayā”ti. Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle
anya-e0102n:1275_0: Āyatiṃ phalapañcakanti viññāṇādīni pañca. Tāni jātiggahaṇena vuttāni. Jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1275_1: pana tesaṃyeva jarāmaraṇaṃ. Tenāha – “āyatiṃ paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1275_2: pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā, ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1275_3: idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti. Evamidaṃ vīsati ākārāraṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1276_0: Tivaṭṭamanavaṭṭhitaṃ bhamatīti ettha pana saṅkhārabhavā kammavaṭṭaṃ, avijjātaṇhupādānāni
anya-e0102n:1276_1: kilesavaṭṭaṃ, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā vipākavaṭṭanti imehi tīhi vaṭṭehi
anya-e0102n:1276_2: tivaṭṭamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ yāva kilesavaṭṭaṃ na upacchijjati, tāva anupacchinnapaccayattā
anya-e0102n:1280_0: Tattha yasmā kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ avisesena samudayasaccanti saccavibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1280_1: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti avijjāya saṅkhārā dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1280_2: Saṅkhārehi viññāṇaṃ dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccaṃ. Viññāṇādīhi nāmarūpādīni
anya-e0102n:1280_3: vipākavedanāpariyosānāni paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccaṃ. Vedanāya taṇhā paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ
anya-e0102n:1280_4: dutiyasaccaṃ. Taṇhāya upādānaṃ dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ. Upādānato bhavo
anya-e0102n:1280_6: paṭhamasaccaṃ. Jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccanti evaṃ tāvidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1281_0: 656. Yasmā panettha avijjā vatthūsu ca satte sammoheti, paccayo ca hoti saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1281_1: pātubhāvāya. Tathā saṅkhārā saṅkhatañca abhisaṅkharonti, paccayā ca honti viññāṇassa.
anya-e0102n:1281_2: Viññāṇampi vatthuñca paṭivijānāti, paccayo ca hoti nāmarūpassa. Nāmarūpampi aññamaññañca
anya-e0102n:1281_3: upatthambheti, paccayo ca hoti saḷāyatanassa. Saḷāyatanampi savisaye ca pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1281_4: paccayo ca hoti phassassa. Phassopi ārammaṇañca phusati, paccayo ca hoti vedanāya.
anya-e0102n:1281_5: Vedanāpi ārammaṇarasañca anubhavati, paccayo ca hoti taṇhāya. Taṇhāpi rajjanīye ca
anya-e0102n:1281_6: dhamme rajjati, paccayo ca hoti upādānassa. Upādānampi upādāniye ca dhamme upādiyati,
anya-e0102n:1281_7: paccayo ca hoti bhavassa. Bhavopi nānāgatīsu ca vikkhipati, paccayo ca hoti jātiyā.
anya-e0102n:1281_8: Jātipi khandhe ca janeti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattattā, paccayo ca hoti jarāmaraṇassa.
anya-e0102n:1281_9: Jarāmaraṇampi khandhānaṃ pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhati, paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāya
anya-e0102n:1281_10: sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā. Tasmā sabbapadesu dvedhā pavattikiccatopi idaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1282_0: 657. Yasmā cettha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti idaṃ kārakadassananivāraṇaṃ. Saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1282_2: ghanasaññānivāraṇaṃ. Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādi attā passati…pe… vijānāti,
anya-e0102n:1282_3: phusati, vedayati, taṇhiyati, upādiyati, bhavati, jāyati, jīyati, mīyatītievamādidassananivāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1283_0: 658. Yasmā panettha salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena dhammānaṃ adassanato andho viya
anya-e0102n:1283_1: avijjā. Andhassa upakkhalanaṃ viya avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā. Upakkhalitassa patanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1283_2: viya saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ. Patitassa gaṇḍapātubhāvo viya viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1283_3: Gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viya nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ. Gaṇḍapīḷakāghaṭṭanaṃ viya saḷāyatanapaccayā
anya-e0102n:1283_4: phasso. Ghaṭṭanadukkhaṃ viya phassapaccayā vedanā, dukkhassa paṭikārābhilāso viya
anya-e0102n:1283_5: vedanāpaccayā taṇhā. Paṭikārābhilāsena asappāyaggahaṇaṃ viya taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1283_6: Upādiṇṇaasappāyālepanaṃ viya upādānapaccayā bhavo. Asappāyālepanena gaṇḍavikārapātubhāvo
anya-e0102n:1283_7: viya bhavapaccayā jāti. Gaṇḍavikārato gaṇḍabhedo viya jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0102n:1283_8: vā panettha avijjā appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattibhāvena satte abhibhavati paṭalaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1283_9: akkhīni. Tadabhibhūto ca bālo punabbhavikehi saṅkhārehi attānaṃ veṭheti kosakārakimi
anya-e0102n:1283_10: viya kosappadesehi. Saṅkhārapariggahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ gatīsu patiṭṭhaṃ labhati pariṇāyakapariggahito
anya-e0102n:1283_11: viya rājakumāro rajje. Upapattinimittaparikappanato viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ anekappakāraṃ
anya-e0102n:1283_12: nāmarūpaṃ abhinibbatteti māyākāro viya māyaṃ. Nāmarūpe patiṭṭhitaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ vuddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1283_13: virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito vanappagumbo viya. Āyatanaghaṭṭanato
anya-e0102n:1283_14: phasso jāyati araṇisahitābhimanthanato aggi viya. Phassena phuṭṭhassa vedanā pātubhavati
anya-e0102n:1283_15: agginā phuṭṭhassa dāho viya. Vedayamānassa taṇhā pavaḍḍhati loṇūdakaṃ pivato pipāsā
anya-e0102n:1283_16: viya. Tasito bhavesu abhilāsaṃ karoti pipāsito viya pānīye. Tadassupādānaṃ, upādānena
anya-e0102n:1283_17: bhavaṃ upādiyati āmisalobhena maccho baḷisaṃ viya. Bhave sati jāti hoti bīje sati
anya-e0102n:1283_18: aṅkuro viya. Jātassa avassaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ uppannassa rukkhassa patanaṃ viya. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:1284_0: 659. Yasmā ca bhagavatā atthatopi dhammatopi desanatopi paṭivedhatopi gambhīrabhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:1284_1: sandhāya “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso cā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1285_0: Tattha yasmā na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hoti, itthañca
anya-e0102n:1285_1: jātito samudāgacchatīti evaṃ jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭhassa duravabodhanīyato jarāmaraṇassa
anya-e0102n:1285_2: jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro. Tathā jātiyā bhavapaccaya…pe… saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1285_3: avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro. Tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ atthagambhīranti
anya-e0102n:1285_4: ayaṃ tāvettha atthagambhīratā. Hetuphalañhi atthoti vuccati. Yathāha – “hetuphale
anya-e0102n:1286_0: Yasmā pana yenākārena yadavatthā ca avijjā tesaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1286_1: tassa duravabodhanīyato avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho gambhīro. Tathā saṅkhārānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:1286_2: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho gambhīro, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ dhammagambhīranti
anya-e0102n:1286_3: ayamettha dhammagambhīratā. Hetuno hi dhammoti nāmaṃ. Yathāha – “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1287_0: Yasmā cassa tena tena kāraṇena tathā tathā pavattetabbattā desanāpi gambhīrā, na
anya-e0102n:1287_1: tattha sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ ñāṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhati. Tathāhetaṃ katthaci sutte
anya-e0102n:1287_2: anulomato, katthaci paṭilomato, katthaci anulomapaṭilomato, katthaci vemajjhato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:1287_3: anulomato vā paṭilomato vā, katthaci tisandhicatusaṅkhepaṃ, katthaci dvisandhitisaṅkhepaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1287_4: katthaci ekasandhidvisaṅkhepaṃ desitaṃ, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ desanāgambhīranti
anya-e0102n:1288_0: Yasmā cettha yo so avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvo, yena paṭividdhena avijjādayo sammā salakkhaṇato
anya-e0102n:1288_1: paṭividdhā honti, so duppariyogāhattā gambhīro, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paṭivedhagambhīraṃ.
anya-e0102n:1288_2: Tathā hettha avijjāya aññāṇādassanasaccāsampaṭivedhaṭṭho gambhīro, saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇāyūhanasarāgavirāgaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:1288_8: okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvaṭṭho, jarāmaraṇassa khayavayabhedavipariṇāmaṭṭho gambhīroti
anya-e0102n:1289: 660. Yasmā panettha ekattanayo, nānattanayo, abyāpāranayo, evaṃdhammatānayoti cattāro atthanayā honti, tasmā nayabhedatopetaṃ bhavacakkaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1290_0: Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti evaṃ bījassa aṅkurādibhāvena
anya-e0102n:1290_1: rukkhabhāvappatti viya santānānupacchedo ekattanayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto hetuphalasambandhena
anya-e0102n:1290_2: santānassa anupacchedāvabodhato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Micchā passanto hetuphalasambandhena
anya-e0102n:1291_0: Avijjādīnaṃ pana yathāsakaṃlakkhaṇavavatthānaṃ nānattanayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto
anya-e0102n:1291_1: navanavānaṃ uppādadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Micchā passanto ekasantānapatitassa
anya-e0102n:1292_0: Avijjāya saṅkhārā mayā uppādetabbā, saṅkhārānaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ amhehīti evamādibyāpārābhāvo
anya-e0102n:1292_1: abyāpāranayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto kārakassa abhāvāvabodhato attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1292_2: Micchā passanto yo asatipi byāpāre avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvaniyamasiddho hetubhāvo, tassa
anya-e0102n:1293_0: Avijjādīhi pana kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃyeva sambhavo khīrādīhi dadhiādīnaṃ viya, na
anya-e0102n:1293_1: aññesanti ayaṃ evaṃdhammatānayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto paccayānurūpato phalāvabodhā
anya-e0102n:1293_2: ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiñca pajahati. Micchā passanto paccayānurūpaṃ phalappavattiṃ
anya-e0102n:1293_3: aggahetvā yato kutoci yassa kassaci asambhavaggahaṇato ahetukadiṭṭhiñceva niyatavādañca
anya-e0102n:1296: 661. Idañhi atigambhīrato agādhaṃ. Nānānayagahanato duratiyānaṃ. Ñāṇāsinā samādhipavarasilāyaṃ sunisitena,
anya-e0102n:1299_0: Vuttampi hetaṃ bhagavatā – “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso
anya-e0102n:1299_1: ca. Etassa cānanda, dhammassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamayaṃ pajā tantākulakajātā
anya-e0102n:1299_2: kulāgaṇṭhikajātā muñjapabbajabhūtā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1299_3: Tasmā attano vā paresaṃ vā hitāya ca sukhāya ca paṭipanno avasesakiccāni pahāya,
anya-e0102n:1308_0: 662. Idāni yā “imesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:1308_1: ‘sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cā’ti dve mūlabhūtā visuddhiyo sampādetabbā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1308_2: Tattha sīlavisuddhi nāma suparisuddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādicatubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ, tañca
anya-e0102n:1308_3: sīlaniddese vitthāritameva. Cittavisuddhi nāma saupacārā aṭṭha samāpattiyo, tāpi
anya-e0102n:1308_4: cittasīsena vuttasamādhiniddese sabbākārena vitthāritā eva. Tasmā tā tattha vitthāritanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1309_1: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pana pañca visuddhiyo sarīra”nti,
anya-e0102n:1310_0: 663. Taṃ sampādetukāmena samathayānikena tāva ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1310_1: aññatarato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni, taṃsampayuttā ca dhammā lakkhaṇarasādivasena
anya-e0102n:1310_2: pariggahetabbā. Pariggahetvā sabbampetaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato namanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1311_0: Tato yathā nāma puriso antogehe sappaṃ disvā taṃ anubandhamāno tassa āsayaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1311_1: evameva ayampi yogāvacaro taṃ nāmaṃ upaparikkhanto “idaṃ nāmaṃ kiṃ nissāya pavattatī”ti
anya-e0102n:1311_2: pariyesamāno tassa nissayaṃ hadayarūpaṃ passati. Tato hadayarūpassa nissayabhūtāni,
anya-e0102n:1311_3: bhūtanissitāni ca sesupādāyarūpānīti rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti. So sabbampetaṃ ruppanato
anya-e0102n:1311_4: rūpanti vavatthapeti. Tato namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ, ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpanti saṅkhepato
anya-e0102n:1312_0: 664. Suddhavipassanāyāniko pana ayameva vā samathayāniko catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1312_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena saṅkhepato vā vitthārato vā
anya-e0102n:1312_2: catasso dhātuyo pariggaṇhāti. Athassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato āvibhūtāsu dhātūsu
anya-e0102n:1312_3: kammasamuṭṭhānamhi tāva kese “catasso dhātuyo, vaṇṇo, gandho, raso, ojā, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1312_4: kāyappasādo”ti evaṃ kāyadasakavasena dasa rūpāni, tattheva bhāvassa atthitāya bhāvadasakavasena
anya-e0102n:1312_5: dasa, tattheva āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ, utusamuṭṭhānaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānanti
anya-e0102n:1312_6: aparānipi catuvīsatīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānesu catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu catucattālīsa catucattālīsa
anya-e0102n:1312_7: rūpāni, sedo, assu, kheḷo, siṅghāṇikāti imesu pana catūsu utucittasamuṭṭhānesu dvinnaṃ
anya-e0102n:1312_8: ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ vasena soḷasa soḷasa rūpāni, udariyaṃ, karīsaṃ, pubbo, muttanti imesu
anya-e0102n:1312_9: catūsu utusamuṭṭhānesu utusamuṭṭhānasseva ojaṭṭhamakassa vasena aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni
anya-e0102n:1312_10: pākaṭāni hontīti. Esa tāva dvattiṃsākāre nayo.
anya-e0102n:1313_0: Ye pana imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre āvibhūte apare dasa ākārā āvibhavanti. Tattha asitādiparipācake
anya-e0102n:1313_1: tāva kammaje tejokoṭṭhāsamhi ojaṭṭhamakañceva jīvitañcāti nava rūpāni, tathā cittaje
anya-e0102n:1313_2: assāsapassāsakoṭṭhāsepi ojaṭṭhamakañceva saddo cāti nava, sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu
anya-e0102n:1313_3: aṭṭhasu jīvitanavakañceva tīṇi ca ojaṭṭhamakānīti tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1314_0: Tassevaṃ vitthārato dvācattālīsākāravasena imesu bhūtupādāyarūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu
anya-e0102n:1314_1: vatthudvāravasena pañca cakkhudasakādayo, hadayavatthudasakañcāti aparānipi saṭṭhirūpāni
anya-e0102n:1314_2: pākaṭāni honti. So sabbānipi tāni ruppanalakkhaṇena ekato katvā “etaṃ rūpa”nti passati.
anya-e0102n:1315_0: Tassevaṃ pariggahitarūpassa dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā honti. Seyyathidaṃ – dvepañcaviññāṇāni,
anya-e0102n:1315_1: tisso manodhātuyo, aṭṭhasaṭṭhi manoviññāṇadhātuyoti ekāsīti lokiyacittāni, avisesena
anya-e0102n:1315_2: ca tehi cittehi sahajāto phasso, vedanā, saññā, cetanā, jīvitaṃ, cittaṭṭhiti, manasikāroti
anya-e0102n:1315_3: ime satta satta cetasikāti. Lokuttaracittāni pana neva suddhavipassakassa, na samathayānikassa
anya-e0102n:1315_4: pariggahaṃ gacchanti anadhigatattāti. So sabbepi te arūpadhamme namanalakkhaṇena
anya-e0102n:1315_5: ekato katvā “etaṃ nāma”nti passati. Evameko catudhātuvavatthānamukhena vitthārato
anya-e0102n:1316_0: 665. Aparo aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu atthi imasmiṃ attabhāve cakkhudhātu…pe…
anya-e0102n:1316_1: manoviññāṇadhātūti dhātuyo āvajjitvā yaṃ loko setakaṇhamaṇḍalavicittaṃ āyatavitthataṃ
anya-e0102n:1316_2: akkhikūpake nhārusuttakena ābaddhaṃ maṃsapiṇḍaṃ “cakkhū”ti sañjānāti, taṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0102n:1317_0: Yāni panassa nissayabhūtā catasso dhātuyo, parivārakāni cattāri vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-rūpāni,
anya-e0102n:1317_1: anupālakaṃ jīvitindriyanti nava sahajātarūpāni, tattheva ṭhitāni kāyadasakabhāvadasakavasena
anya-e0102n:1317_2: vīsati kammajarūpāni, āhārasamuṭṭhānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ vasena catuvīsati
anya-e0102n:1317_3: anupādinnarūpānīti evaṃ sesāni tepaṇṇāsa rūpāni honti, na tāni ca “cakkhudhātū”ti
anya-e0102n:1317_4: vavatthapeti. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsupi. Kāyadhātuyaṃ pana avasesāni tecattālīsa
anya-e0102n:1317_5: rūpāni honti. Keci pana utucittasamuṭṭhānāni saddena saha nava nava katvā pañcacattālīsāti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:1318_0: Iti ime pañca pasādā, tesañca visayā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā pañcāti dasa rūpāni
anya-e0102n:1318_1: dasa dhātuyo honti. Avasesarūpāni dhammadhātuyeva honti. Cakkhuṃ pana nissāya rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1318_2: ārabbha pavattaṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu nāmāti evaṃ dvepañcaviññāṇāni pañca viññāṇadhātuyo
anya-e0102n:1318_3: honti. Tīṇi manodhātucittāni ekā manodhātu, aṭṭhasaṭṭhi manoviññāṇadhātucittāni manoviññāṇadhātūti
anya-e0102n:1318_4: sabbānipi ekāsīti lokiyacittāni satta viññāṇadhātuyo. Taṃsampayuttā phassādayo dhammadhātūti
anya-e0102n:1318_5: evamettha aḍḍhekādasa dhātuyo rūpaṃ, aḍḍhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo nāmanti evameko aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena
anya-e0102n:1319_0: 666. Aparo dvādasāyatanavasena. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudhātuyaṃ vuttanayeneva ṭhapetvā tepaṇṇāsa
anya-e0102n:1319_1: rūpāni cakkhupasādamattaṃ “cakkhāyatana”nti vavatthapeti. Tattha vuttanayeneva ca
anya-e0102n:1319_4: taṃsampayuttā phassādayo sesarūpañca “dhammāyatana”nti evamettha aḍḍhekādasa āyatanāni
anya-e0102n:1319_5: rūpaṃ, diyaḍḍhaāyatanāni nāmanti evameko dvādasāyatanavasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1320_0: 667. Aparo tato saṃkhittataraṃ khandhavasena vavatthapeti. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1320_1: sarīre catusamuṭṭhānā catasso dhātuyo, taṃnissito vaṇṇo, gandho, raso, ojā, cakkhupasādādayo
anya-e0102n:1320_2: pañca pasādā, vatthurūpaṃ, bhāvo, jīvitindriyaṃ, dvisamuṭṭhāno saddoti imāni sattarasa
anya-e0102n:1320_3: rūpāni sammasanupagāni nipphannāni rūparūpāni. Kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti, ākāsadhātu,
anya-e0102n:1320_4: rūpassa lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santati, jaratā, aniccatāti imāni pana
anya-e0102n:1320_5: dasa rūpāni na sammasanupagāni, ākāravikāraantaraparicchedamattakāni, na nipphannarūpāni,
anya-e0102n:1320_6: na rūparūpāni. Apica kho rūpānaṃ ākāravikāraantaraparicchedamattato rūpanti saṅkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1320_7: gatāni. Iti sabbāni petāni sattavīsati rūpāni rūpakkhandho, ekāsītiyā lokiyacittehi
anya-e0102n:1320_8: saddhiṃ uppannā vedanā vedanākkhandho, taṃsampayuttā saññā saññākkhandho, saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1320_9: saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti. Iti rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ, cattāro arūpino
anya-e0102n:1320_10: khandhā nāmanti evameko pañcakkhandhavasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1321_0: 668. Aparo “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1321_1: upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ saṃkhitteneva imasmiṃ attabhāve rūpaṃ pariggahetvā, tathā manāyatanañceva
anya-e0102n:1321_2: dhammāyatanekadesañca nāmanti pariggahetvā “iti idañca nāmaṃ idañca rūpaṃ, idaṃ vuccati
anya-e0102n:1322_0: 669. Sace panassa tena tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā
anya-e0102n:1322_1: arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, tena dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1322_2: manasikātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ
anya-e0102n:1322_3: hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ, tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1323_0: Yathā hi cakkhumato purisassa aparisuddhe ādāse mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1323_1: na paññāyati, so “nimittaṃ na paññāyatī”ti na ādāsaṃ chaḍḍeti, atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ
anya-e0102n:1323_2: parimajjati. Tassa parisuddhe ādāse nimittaṃ sayameva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yathā ca telatthiko
anya-e0102n:1323_3: tilapiṭṭhaṃ doṇiyaṃ ākiritvā udakena paripphosetvā ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ pīḷanamattena
anya-e0102n:1323_4: tele anikkhamante na tilapiṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍeti, atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ uṇhodakena paripphosetvā
anya-e0102n:1323_5: madditvā pīḷeti. Tassevaṃ karoto vippasannaṃ tilatelaṃ nikkhamati. Yathā vā pana
anya-e0102n:1323_6: udakaṃ pasādetukāmo katakaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā antoghaṭe hatthaṃ otāretvā ekadvevāre ghaṃsanamattena
anya-e0102n:1323_7: udake avippasīdante na katakaṭṭhiṃ chaḍḍeti, atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ ghaṃsati. Tassevaṃ
anya-e0102n:1323_8: karontassa kalalakaddamaṃ sannisīdati. Udakaṃ acchaṃ hoti vippasannaṃ, evamevaṃ tena
anya-e0102n:1323_9: bhikkhunā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1324_0: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ, tathā tathā tappaccanīkakilesā
anya-e0102n:1324_1: sannisīdanti, kaddamupari udakaṃ viya cittaṃ pasannaṃ hoti. Tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā
anya-e0102n:1324_2: sayameva pākaṭā honti. Evaṃ aññāhipi ucchucoragoṇadadhimacchādīhi upamāhi ayamattho pakāsetabbo.
anya-e0102n:1326_0: 670. Evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahassa panassa arūpadhammā tīhi ākārehi upaṭṭhahanti
anya-e0102n:1326_1: phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā viññāṇavasena vā. Kathaṃ? Ekassa tāva “pathavīdhātu
anya-e0102n:1326_2: kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
anya-e0102n:1326_3: taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho, saddhiṃ phassena cetanā
anya-e0102n:1326_4: saṅkhārakkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Tathā “kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā…pe…
anya-e0102n:1326_5: assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”ti paṭhamābhinipāto phasso, taṃsampayuttā
anya-e0102n:1326_6: vedanā vedanākkhandho…pe… cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ arūpadhammā phassavasena upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n:1327_1: taṃsampayuttā saññā saññākkhandho, taṃsampayutto phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1327_2: taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Tathā “kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā
anya-e0102n:1327_4: vedanākkhandho…pe… taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ vedanāvasena
anya-e0102n:1328_1: taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho, phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti
anya-e0102n:1328_2: upaṭṭhāti. Tathā “kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā…pe… assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu
anya-e0102n:1328_4: vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho, phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti
anya-e0102n:1329_0: Eteneva upāyena “kammasamuṭṭhāne kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena
anya-e0102n:1329_1: dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena, sesesu ca cakkhudhātuādīsu
anya-e0102n:1329_2: rūpapariggahamukhesu sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0102n:1330_0: 671. Yasmā ca evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahasseva tassa arūpadhammā tīhākārehi pākaṭā
anya-e0102n:1330_1: honti. Tasmā suvisuddharūpapariggaheneva arūpapariggahāya yogo kātabbo, na itarena.
anya-e0102n:1330_2: Sace hi ekasmiṃ vā rūpadhamme upaṭṭhite dvīsu vā rūpaṃ pahāya arūpapariggahaṃ ārabhati
anya-e0102n:1330_3: kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati, pathavīkasiṇabhāvanāya vuttappakārā pabbateyyā gāvī viya.
anya-e0102n:1330_4: Suvisuddharūpapariggahassa pana arūpapariggahāya yogaṃ karoto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1331_0: So evaṃ phassādīnaṃ vasena upaṭṭhite cattāro arūpino khandhe nāmanti, tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni
anya-e0102n:1331_1: cattāri mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ rūpanti vavatthapeti. Iti
anya-e0102n:1331_2: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dvādasāyatanāni pañcakkhandhāti sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme khaggena
anya-e0102n:1331_3: samuggaṃ vivaramāno viya yamakatālakandaṃ phālayamāno viya ca nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā
anya-e0102n:1331_4: vavatthapeti. Nāmarūpamattato uddhaṃ añño satto vā puggalo vā devo vā brahmā vā natthīti niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1333_0: 672. So evaṃ yāthāvasarasato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā suṭṭhutaraṃ “satto puggalo”ti
anya-e0102n:1333_1: imissā lokasamaññāya pahānatthāya sattasammohassa samatikkamatthāya asammohabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1333_2: cittaṃ ṭhapanatthāya sambahulasuttantavasena “nāmarūpamattamevidaṃ, na satto, na
anya-e0102n:1333_3: puggalo atthī”ti etamatthaṃ saṃsandetvā vavatthapeti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1335: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammutī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1336_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ, “seyyathāpi, āvuso, kaṭṭhañca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca mattikañca
anya-e0102n:1336_1: paṭicca tiṇañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati, evameva kho,
anya-e0102n:1336_2: āvuso, aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso
anya-e0102n:1338: “Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
anya-e0102n:1339: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1341_0: 673. Evaṃ anekasatehi suttantehi nāmarūpameva dīpitaṃ, na satto na puggalo. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:1341_1: yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu ekenākārena saṇṭhitesu rathoti vohāramattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1341_2: hoti, paramatthato ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi. Yathā ca kaṭṭhādīsu
anya-e0102n:1341_3: gehasambhāresu ekenākārena ākāsaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu gehanti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1341_4: paramatthato gehaṃ nāma natthi. Yathā ca aṅguliaṅguṭṭhādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu muṭṭhīti
anya-e0102n:1341_5: vohāramattaṃ hoti. Doṇitantiādīsu vīṇāti. Hatthiassādīsu senāti. Pākāragehagopurādīsu
anya-e0102n:1341_6: nagaranti. Khandhasākhāpalāsādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu rukkhoti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1341_7: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ avayave upaparikkhiyamāne rukkho nāma natthi. Evamevaṃ pañcasu
anya-e0102n:1341_8: upādānakkhandhesu sati “satto, puggalo”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti, paramatthato ekekasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1341_9: dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmīti vā ahanti vā”ti gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1341_10: Paramatthato pana nāmarūpamattameva atthīti. Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1342_0: 674. Yo panetaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ pahāya “satto atthī”ti gaṇhāti. So tassa vināsaṃ
anya-e0102n:1342_1: anujāneyya avināsaṃ vā. Avināsaṃ anujānanto sassate patati. Vināsaṃ anujānanto ucchede
anya-e0102n:1342_2: patati. Kasmā? Khīranvayassa dadhino viya tadanvayassa aññassa abhāvato. So “sassato
anya-e0102n:1342_3: satto”ti gaṇhanto olīyati nāma. “Ucchijjatī”ti gaṇhanto atidhāvati nāma. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0102n:1343: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhitā devamanussā olīyanti eke, atidhāvanti eke, cakkhumanto ca passanti.
anya-e0102n:1344_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, olīyanti eke? Bhavārāmā, bhikkhave, devamanussā bhavaratā bhavasamuditā.
anya-e0102n:1344_1: Tesaṃ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati
anya-e0102n:1344_2: nādhimuccati. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, olīyanti eke.
anya-e0102n:1345_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, atidhāvanti eke? Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā
anya-e0102n:1345_1: jigucchamānā vibhavaṃ abhinandanti, yato kira bho ayaṃ attā kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati
anya-e0102n:1345_2: vinassati, na hoti paraṃmaraṇā, etaṃ santaṃ, etaṃ paṇītaṃ, etaṃ yāthāvanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1346_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto passanti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhūtaṃ bhūtato
anya-e0102n:1346_1: passati, bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
anya-e0102n:1347_0: 675. Tasmā yathā dāruyantaṃ suññaṃ nijjīvaṃ nirīhakaṃ, atha ca pana dārurajjukasamāyogavasena
anya-e0102n:1347_1: gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi. Saīhakaṃ sabyāpāraṃ viya khāyati, evamidaṃ nāmarūpampi suññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1347_2: nijjīvaṃ nirīhakaṃ, atha ca pana aññamaññasamāyogavasena gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi. Saīhakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1347_3: sabyāpāraṃ viya khāyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n:1349: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1352_0: Na kevalañcetaṃ dāruyantupamāya, aññāhipi naḷakalāpīādīhi upamāhi vibhāvetabbaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1352_1: yathā hi dvīsu naḷakalāpīsu aññamaññaṃ nissāya ṭhapitāsu ekā ekissā upatthambho hoti,
anya-e0102n:1352_2: ekissā patamānāya itarāpi patati, evamevaṃ pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1352_3: nissāya pavattati, ekaṃ ekassa upatthambho hoti. Maraṇavasena ekasmiṃ patamāne itarampi
anya-e0102n:1355_0: 676. Yathā ca daṇḍābhihataṃ bheriṃ nissāya sadde pavattamāne aññā bherī, añño saddo,
anya-e0102n:1355_1: bherisaddā asammissā, bherī saddena suññā, saddo bheriyā suñño, evamevaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:1355_2: rūpaṃ nissāya nāme pavattamāne aññaṃ rūpaṃ, aññaṃ nāmaṃ, nāmarūpā asammissā, nāmaṃ
anya-e0102n:1355_3: rūpena suññaṃ, rūpaṃ nāmena suññaṃ, apica kho bheriṃ paṭicca saddo viya rūpaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0102n:1372_0: 677. Apicettha nāmaṃ nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ sakkoti, na khādati, na
anya-e0102n:1372_1: pivati, na byāharati, na iriyāpathaṃ kappeti. Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ
anya-e0102n:1372_2: sakkoti. Na hi tassā khāditukāmatā, nāpi pivitukāmatā, na byāharitukāmatā, na iriyāpathaṃ
anya-e0102n:1372_3: kappetukāmatā, atha kho nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ pavattati, rūpaṃ nissāya nāmaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1372_4: nāmassa khāditukāmatāya pivitukāmatāya byāharitukāmatāya iriyāpathaṃ kappetukāmatāya
anya-e0102n:1372_5: sati rūpaṃ khādati, pivati, byāharati, iriyāpathaṃ kappeti.
anya-e0102n:1373_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthāya imaṃ upamaṃ udāharanti – yathā jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī
anya-e0102n:1373_1: ca disāpakkamitukāmā assu, jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ evamāha “ahaṃ kho bhaṇe, sakkomi
anya-e0102n:1373_2: pādehi pādakaraṇīyaṃ kātuṃ, natthi ca me cakkhūni yehi samavisamaṃ passeyya”nti.
anya-e0102n:1373_3: Pīṭhasappīpi jaccandhaṃ evamāha “ahaṃ kho bhaṇe, sakkomi cakkhunā cakkhukaraṇīyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1373_4: kātuṃ, natthi ca me pādāni yehi abhikkameyyaṃ vā paṭikkameyyaṃ vā”ti. So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:1373_5: jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi. Pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā
anya-e0102n:1373_6: evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha, dakkhiṇaṃ muñca vāmaṃ gaṇhā”ti. Tattha jaccandhopi
anya-e0102n:1373_7: nittejo dubbalo na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati, pīṭhasappīpi nittejo dubbalo
anya-e0102n:1373_8: na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati, na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ nappavattati,
