anya-e0102n:1373_9: evamevaṃ nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati, na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1373_10: Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati, na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattati, na
anya-e0102n:1373_11: ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0102n:1384: “Yathā ca manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1386: “Ubho nissāya gacchanti, manussā nāvā ca aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1388_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi nāmarūpaṃ vavatthāpayato sattasaññaṃ abhibhavitvā asammohabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1388_1: ṭhitaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhīti veditabbaṃ. Nāmarūpavavatthānantipi
anya-e0102n:1395: 678. Etasseva pana nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1396_0: Taṃ sampādetukāmo bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1396_1: pariyesati. Yathā vā pana anukampako puriso daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1396_2: rathikāya nipannaṃ disvā “kassa nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:1397_0: So āditova iti paṭisañcikkhati “na tāvidhaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ, sabbattha sabbadā
anya-e0102n:1397_1: sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito, na issarādihetukaṃ, nāmarūpato uddhaṃ issarādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:1397_2: abhāvato. Yepi nāmarūpamattameva issarādayoti vadanti, tesaṃ issarādisaṅkhātanāmarūpassa
anya-e0102n:1397_3: ahetukabhāvappattito. Tasmā bhavitabbamassa hetupaccayehi, ke nu kho te”ti.
anya-e0102n:1398_0: 679. So evaṃ nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjetvā imassa tāva rūpakāyassa evaṃ hetupaccaye
anya-e0102n:1398_2: abbhantare nibbattati, na maṇimuttāhārādīnaṃ, atha kho āmāsayapakkāsayānaṃ antare
anya-e0102n:1398_3: udarapaṭalaṃ pacchato piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ purato katvā antaantaguṇaparivārito sayampi
anya-e0102n:1398_5: kimiva nibbattati. Tassevaṃ nibbattamānassa ‘avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kamma’nti ime
anya-e0102n:1398_6: cattāro dhammā nibbattakattā hetu, āhāro upatthambhakattā paccayoti pañca dhammā
anya-e0102n:1398_7: hetupaccayā honti. Tesupi avijjādayo tayo imassa kāyassa mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā
anya-e0102n:1398_8: honti. Kammaṃ pitā viya puttassa janakaṃ. Āhāro dhāti viya dārakassa sandhārako”ti.
anya-e0102n:1398_9: Evaṃ rūpakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ katvā, puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati
anya-e0102n:1399: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ atītepi addhāne paccayato pavattittha, anāgatepi paccayato pavattissatīti samanupassati.
anya-e0102n:1400_0: 680. Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantaṃ ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1400_1: na nu kho ahosiṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ nu kho ahosiṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho
anya-e0102n:1400_2: ahosiṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā
anya-e0102n:1400_3: vicikicchā vuttā, yāpi aparantaṃ ārabbha “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1400_4: na nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ
anya-e0102n:1400_5: nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna”nti
anya-e0102n:1400_6: pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā, yāpi paccuppannaṃ ārabbha “etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1400_7: addhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti – ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi,
anya-e0102n:1400_8: kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā
anya-e0102n:1401_0: 681. Aparo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena duvidhaṃ nāmassa paccayaṃ passati, kammādivasena
anya-e0102n:1401_1: catubbidhaṃ rūpassa. Duvidho hi nāmassa paccayo sādhāraṇo asādhāraṇo ca. Tattha cakkhādīni
anya-e0102n:1401_2: cha dvārāni, rūpādīni cha ārammaṇāni nāmassa sādhāraṇo paccayo, kusalādibhedato sabbappakārassāpi
anya-e0102n:1401_3: tato pavattito. Manasikārādiko asādhāraṇo. Yoniso manasikārasaddhammassavanādiko
anya-e0102n:1401_4: hi kusalasseva hoti, viparīto akusalassa, kammādiko vipākassa, bhavaṅgādiko kiriyassāti.
anya-e0102n:1402_0: Rūpassa pana kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāroti ayaṃ kammādiko catubbidho paccayo. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1402_1: kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo hoti. Cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa
anya-e0102n:1402_2: uppajjamānaṃ. Utuāhārā utuāhārasamuṭṭhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paccayā hontīti. Evameveko
anya-e0102n:1403_0: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ atītepi addhāne
anya-e0102n:1403_1: paccayato pavattittha, anāgatepi paccayato pavattissatīti samanupassati. Tassevaṃ
anya-e0102n:1403_2: samanupassato vuttanayeneva tīsupi addhāsu vicikicchā pahīyati.
anya-e0102n:1404_0: 682. Aparo tesaṃyeva nāmarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāpattiṃ jiṇṇānañca bhaṅgaṃ
anya-e0102n:1404_1: disvā idaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma jātiyā sati hoti, jāti bhave sati, bhavo
anya-e0102n:1404_2: upādāne sati, upādānaṃ taṇhāya sati, taṇhā vedanāya sati, vedanā phasse sati, phasso
anya-e0102n:1404_3: saḷāyatane sati, saḷāyatanaṃ nāmarūpe sati, nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ saṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n:1404_4: sati, saṅkhārā avijjāya satīti evaṃ paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ
anya-e0102n:1405: 683. Aparo “iti kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavaseneva nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti. Athassa vuttanayeneva kaṅkhā pahīyati.
anya-e0102n:1406_0: 684. Aparo “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1406_1: upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n:1406_2: paccayā, idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso,
anya-e0102n:1406_3: vedayitaṃ vedanāti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
anya-e0102n:1406_4: Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā…pe… cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha
anya-e0102n:1406_5: kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa
anya-e0102n:1407_0: 685. Tattha catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1407_1: ahosikammanti. Tesu ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā
anya-e0102n:1407_2: diṭṭhidhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ imasmiññeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. Tathā asakkontaṃ
anya-e0102n:1407_3: pana “ahosikammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, na bhavissati kammavipāko, natthi kammavipāko”ti
anya-e0102n:1407_4: imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā
anya-e0102n:1407_5: upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ anantare attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. Tathā asakkontaṃ
anya-e0102n:1407_6: vuttanayeneva ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Ubhinnaṃ antare pañca javanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1407_7: nāma. Taṃ anāgate yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā vipākaṃ deti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyā
anya-e0102n:1408_0: 686. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – yaṃ garukaṃ, yaṃ bahulaṃ, yadāsannaṃ, kaṭattā
anya-e0102n:1408_1: vā pana kammanti. Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ
anya-e0102n:1408_2: mātughātādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā bahulābahulesupi
anya-e0102n:1408_3: yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti susīlyaṃ vā dussīlyaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Yadāsannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1408_4: nāma maraṇakāle anussaritakammaṃ. Yañhi āsannamaraṇo anussarituṃ sakkoti, teneva
anya-e0102n:1408_5: upapajjati. Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1408_6: nāma hoti, tesaṃ abhāve taṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0102n:1409_0: 687. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – janakaṃ, upatthambhakaṃ, upapīḷakaṃ, upaghātakanti.
anya-e0102n:1409_1: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi. Taṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe
anya-e0102n:1409_2: janeti. Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n:1409_3: janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavatteti. Upapīḷakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1409_4: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti
anya-e0102n:1409_5: bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na deti. Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi
anya-e0102n:1409_6: samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ
anya-e0102n:1409_7: karoti. Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1410_0: Iti imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ kammānaṃ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva
anya-e0102n:1410_1: yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti, asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi. Vipassakena pana kammantarañca
anya-e0102n:1410_2: vipākantarañca ekadesato jānitabbaṃ. Tasmā ayaṃ mukhamattadassanena kammaviseso pakāsitoti.
anya-e0102n:1411_0: 688. Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evaṃ eko kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena
anya-e0102n:1411_1: nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti. So evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato
anya-e0102n:1411_2: nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ atītepi addhāne kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena

anya-e0102n:1413: Kammā punabbhavo hoti, evaṃ loko pavattatīti. –

anya-e0102n:1425: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
anya-e0102n:1428: “Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1429: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.

anya-e0102n:1431: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.

anya-e0102n:1438_0: 690. Tassevaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ katvā tīsu

anya-e0102n:1439_3: punabbhave aññe nibbattissanti, imamhā bhavā punabbhavaṃ ekadhammopi na gamissati.
anya-e0102n:1439_4: Apica kho yathā na ācariyamukhato sajjhāyo antevāsikassa mukhaṃ pavisati, na ca tappaccayā

anya-e0102n:1441: Na ceva āgataṃ nāpi, na nibbattaṃ anantaraṃ.

anya-e0102n:1444: Tesaṃ antarikā natthi, vīci tesaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1445: Na cito gacchati kiñci, paṭisandhi ca jāyatīti.

anya-e0102n:1447: “Avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā. Ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.

anya-e0102n:1460: 692. Ayaṃ maggo, ayaṃ na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ pana maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.

anya-e0102n:1462_2: Pahānapaññā pariccāgaṭṭhe ñāṇa”nti. Tattha “ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, vedayitalakkhaṇā
anya-e0102n:1462_3: vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattā paññā

anya-e0102n:1462_6: nāma. Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā
anya-e0102n:1463_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1463_1: hi antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Kalāpasammasanato
anya-e0102n:1463_2: pana paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiṃ hi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva
anya-e0102n:1463_3: ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi. Tato paṭṭhāya

anya-e0102n:1465_0: “Kathaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane

anya-e0102n:1480_0: Taṃ tattha evaṃ vitthārena vuttattā idha sabbaṃ peyyālena saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ saṃkhitte

anya-e0102n:1481_0: 695. Tatrāyaṃ khandhavasena ārabbhavidhānayojanā – yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ…pe… sabbaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1481_1: aniccato vavatthapeti, ekaṃ sammasanaṃ. Dukkhato anattato vavatthapeti, ekaṃ sammasananti.
anya-e0102n:1481_2: Ettāvatā ayaṃ bhikkhu “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhaṃ sabbampi rūpaṃ atītattikena
anya-e0102n:1481_3: ceva catūhi ca ajjhattādidukehīti ekādasahi okāsehi paricchinditvā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato
anya-e0102n:1482: Kathaṃ? Parato vuttanayena. Vuttañhetaṃ – “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1483: Tasmā esa yaṃ atītaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ yasmā atīteyeva khīṇaṃ, nayimaṃ bhavaṃ sampattanti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1484: Yaṃ anāgataṃ anantarabhave nibbattissati, tampi tattheva khīyissati, na tato paraṃ bhavaṃ gamissatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1485: Yaṃ paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ, tampi idheva khīyati, na ito gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1486: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ, tampi ajjhattameva khīyati, na bahiddhābhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1487: Yaṃ bahiddhā…pe… oḷārikaṃ…pe… sukhumaṃ…pe… hīnaṃ…pe… paṇītaṃ…pe… dūre…pe… santike, tampi tattheva khīyati, na dūrabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1488: Idaṃ sabbampi “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1489_0: Sabbameva ca taṃ dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena. Bhayaṭṭhenāti sappaṭibhayatāya. Yañhi aniccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1489_1: taṃ bhayāvahaṃ hoti sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viya. Iti idampi “dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0102n:1489_2: etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1490_0: Yathā ca dukkhaṃ, evaṃ sabbampi taṃ anattā asārakaṭṭhena. Asārakaṭṭhenāti “attā nivāsī
anya-e0102n:1490_1: kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃ parikappitassa attasārassa abhāvena. Yañhi aniccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1490_2: dukkhaṃ, taṃ attanopi aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapīḷanaṃ vā vāretuṃ na sakkoti, kuto
anya-e0102n:1490_3: tassa kārakādibhāvo. Tenāha – “rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa. Nayidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1490_4: rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”tiādi. Iti idampi “anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena
anya-e0102n:1490_5: ekaṃ sammasanaṃ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṃ hoti. Esa nayo vedanādīsu.
anya-e0102n:1491_0: 696. Yaṃ pana aniccaṃ, taṃ yasmā niyamato saṅkhatādibhedaṃ hoti. Tenassa pariyāyadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1491_2: saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti
anya-e0102n:1491_3: puna pāḷi vuttā. Esa nayo vedanādīsūti.
anya-e0102n:1493_0: 697. So tasseva pañcasu khandhesu aniccadukkhānattasammasanassa thirabhāvatthāya,
anya-e0102n:1493_1: yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā “katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati, katamehi
anya-e0102n:1493_2: cattārīsāya ākārehi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n:1494_0: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato,
anya-e0102n:1494_1: palokato, ītito, upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato,
anya-e0102n:1494_2: atāṇato, aleṇato, asaraṇato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, anattato, ādīnavato, vipariṇāmadhammato,
anya-e0102n:1494_3: asārakato, aghamūlato, vadhakato, vibhavato, sāsavato, saṅkhatato, mārāmisato, jātidhammato,
anya-e0102n:1494_4: jarādhammato, byādhidhammato, maraṇadhammato, sokadhammato, paridevadhammato, upāyāsadhammato,
anya-e0102n:1496: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato passanto anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati. Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho niccaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”tiādinā nayena,
anya-e0102n:1497: Anulomañāṇaṃ vibhajantena pabhedato aniccādisammasanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassāpi vasena ime pañcakkhandhe sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1498_0: 698. Kathaṃ? So hi ekekaṃ khandhaṃ anaccantikatāya, ādiantavantatāya ca aniccato.
anya-e0102n:1498_1: Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāya, dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhato. Paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_2: ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāya, kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya, uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkapabhinnatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_3: ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājanakatāya, antotudanatāya, dunnīharaṇīyatāya ca sallato. Vigarahaṇīyatāya,
anya-e0102n:1498_4: avaḍḍhiāvahanatāya, aghavatthutāya ca aghato. Aseribhāvajanakatāya, ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_5: ca ābādhato. Avasatāya, avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi palujjanatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_6: palokato. Anekabyasanāvahanatāya ītito. Aviditānaṃyeva vipulānaṃ anatthānaṃ āvahanato,
anya-e0102n:1498_7: sabbupaddavavatthutāya ca upaddavato. Sabbabhayānaṃ ākaratāya, dukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0102n:1498_8: paramassāsassa paṭipakkhabhūtatāya ca bhayato. Anekehi anatthehi anubaddhatāya, dosūpasaṭṭhatāya,
anya-e0102n:1498_9: upasaggo viya anadhivāsanārahatāya ca upasaggato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhālābhādīhi
anya-e0102n:1498_10: ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato. Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_11: pabhaṅguto. Sabbāvatthanipātitāya, thirabhāvassa ca abhāvatāya addhuvato. Atāyanatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_12: ceva, alabbhaneyyakhematāya ca atāṇato. Allīyituṃ anarahatāya, allīnānampi ca leṇakiccākāritāya
anya-e0102n:1498_13: aleṇato. Nissitānaṃ bhayasārakattābhāvena asaraṇato. Yathāparikappitehi dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvehi
anya-e0102n:1498_14: rittatāya rittato. Rittatāyeva tucchato appakattā vā, appakampi hi loke tucchanti
anya-e0102n:1498_16: anattato. Pavattidukkhatāya, dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāya ādīnavato, atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti
anya-e0102n:1498_17: gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo, kapaṇamanussassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, khandhāpi ca kapaṇāyevāti
anya-e0102n:1498_18: ādīnavasadisatāya ādīnavato. Jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya
anya-e0102n:1498_19: vipariṇāmadhammato. Dubbalatāya, pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya ca asārakato. Aghahetutāya
anya-e0102n:1498_20: aghamūlato. Mittamukhasapatto viya vissāsaghātitāya vadhakato. Vigatabhavatāya, vibhavasambhūtatāya
anya-e0102n:1498_21: ca vibhavato. Āsavapadaṭṭhānatāya sāsavato. Hetupaccayehi abhisaṅkhatatāya saṅkhatato.
anya-e0102n:1499_0: Ettha hi aniccato, palokato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, vipariṇāmadhammato, asārakato,
anya-e0102n:1499_1: vibhavato, saṅkhatato, maraṇadhammatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe dasa dasa katvā paññāsa
anya-e0102n:1499_2: aniccānupassanāni. Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, anattatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe
anya-e0102n:1499_3: pañca pañca katvā pañcavīsati anattānupassanāni. Sesāni dukkhato, rogatotiādīni ekekasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1499_4: khandhe pañcavīsati pañcavīsati katvā pañcavīsatisataṃ dukkhānupassanānīti.
anya-e0102n:1500_0: Iccassa iminā dvisatabhedena aniccādisammasanena pañcakkhandhe sammasato taṃ nayavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:1500_1: aniccadukkhānattasammasanaṃ thiraṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāvettha pāḷinayānusārena sammasanārambhavidhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1502_0: 699. Yassa pana evaṃ nayavipassanāya yogaṃ karotopi nayavipassanā na sampajjati,
anya-e0102n:1502_1: tena “navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavanti – uppannuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khayameva
anya-e0102n:1502_2: passati, tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya sampādeti, sātaccakiriyāya sampādeti, sappāyakiriyāya
anya-e0102n:1502_3: sampādeti, samādhissa ca nimittaggāhena, bojjhaṅgānañca anupavattanatāya, kāye ca
anya-e0102n:1502_4: jīvite ca anapekkhataṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, tattha ca abhibhuyya nekkhammena, antarā ca abyosānenā”ti
anya-e0102n:1502_5: evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n:1502_6: vuttanayena satta asappāyāni vajjetvā satta sappāyāni sevamānena kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1502_7: kālena arūpaṃ. Rūpaṃ sammasantena rūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1504_0: 700. Seyyathidaṃ – idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kammādivasena catūhi kāraṇehi nibbattati. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1504_1: sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammato nibbattati. Paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0102n:1504_2: hi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva tisantativasena vatthu-kāya-bhāvadasakasaṅkhātāni tiṃsa
anya-e0102n:1504_3: rūpāni nibbattanti, tāni ca kho paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva. Yathā ca uppādakkhaṇe,
anya-e0102n:1505_0: Tattha rūpaṃ dandhanirodhaṃ garuparivatti, cittaṃ khippanirodhaṃ lahuparivatti. Tenāha
anya-e0102n:1505_1: – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ yathayidaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1505_2: bhikkhave, citta”nti. Rūpe dharanteyeva hi soḷasavāre bhavaṅgacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1505_3: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇopi ṭhitikkhaṇopi bhaṅgakkhaṇopi ekasadisā. Rūpassa pana uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇāyeva
anya-e0102n:1505_4: lahukā, tehi sadisā. Ṭhitikkhaṇo pana mahā, yāva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n:1505_5: tāva vattati. Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ
anya-e0102n:1505_6: nissāya dutiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati. Tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ
anya-e0102n:1505_7: vatthuṃ nissāya tatiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati. Iminā nayena yāvatāyukaṃ cittappavatti
anya-e0102n:1505_8: veditabbā. Āsannamaraṇassa pana ekameva ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1506_0: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ paṭisandhicittato uddhaṃ soḷasamena
anya-e0102n:1506_1: cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati. Ṭhānakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇena saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1506_2: nirujjhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhati. Yāva
anya-e0102n:1506_3: pavatti nāma atthi, evameva pavattati. Opapātikānampi sattasantativasena sattati
anya-e0102n:1507_2: Tattha kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā. Kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma vipākakkhandhā ca, cakkhudasakādi
anya-e0102n:1507_3: samasattatirūpañca. Kammapaccayaṃ nāma tadeva, kammaṃ hi kammasamuṭṭhānassa upatthambhakapaccayopi
anya-e0102n:1507_4: hoti. Kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma vipākacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Kammapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1507_5: nāma kammasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n:1507_6: ojā ṭhānaṃ patvā aññanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1507_7: nāma kammajatejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n:1507_8: utu aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Evaṃ tāva kammajarūpassa
anya-e0102n:1508: 702. Cittajesupi cittaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, cittapaccayaṃ, cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ, cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha cittaṃ nāma ekūnanavuticittāni.
anya-e0102n:1511_0: Kāmāvacarato hi aṭṭha kusalāni, dvādasākusalāni, manodhātuvajjā dasa kiriyā, kusalakiriyato
anya-e0102n:1511_1: dve abhiññācittānīti dvattiṃsa cittāni rūpaṃ, iriyāpathaṃ, viññattiñca janenti. Vipākavajjāni
anya-e0102n:1511_2: sesadasarūpāvacarāni, aṭṭha arūpāvacarāni, aṭṭha lokuttaracittānīti chabbīsati cittāni
anya-e0102n:1511_3: rūpaṃ, iriyāpathañca janayanti, na viññattiṃ. Kāmāvacare dasa bhavaṅgacittāni, rūpāvacare
anya-e0102n:1511_5: cittāni rūpameva janayanti, na iriyāpathaṃ, na viññattiṃ. Dvepañcaviññāṇāni, sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1511_6: paṭisandhicittaṃ, khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ, cattāri āruppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni
anya-e0102n:1511_7: neva rūpaṃ janayanti, na iriyāpathaṃ, na viññattiṃ. Yāni cettha rūpaṃ janenti, tāni
anya-e0102n:1511_8: na ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā, tadā hi cittaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti. Uppādakkhaṇe pana
anya-e0102n:1511_9: balavaṃ, tasmā taṃ tadā purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1512_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā, “saddanavakaṃ, kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti,
anya-e0102n:1512_1: ākāsadhātu, lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santatī”ti sattarasavidhaṃ rūpañca.
anya-e0102n:1512_2: Cittapaccayaṃ nāma “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassā”ti
anya-e0102n:1512_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ. Cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu
anya-e0102n:1512_4: ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṃ dve tisso pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1512_5: Cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhāno utu ṭhānappatto aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1512_6: samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṃ dve tisso pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Evaṃ cittajarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1513_1: āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha āhāro nāma kabaḷīkāro
anya-e0102n:1513_2: āhāro. Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma upādiṇṇaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā tattha patiṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:1513_3: ṭhānappattāya ojāya samuṭṭhāpitaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ, ākāsadhātu, lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā,
anya-e0102n:1513_4: upacayo, santatīti cuddasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ. Āhārapaccayaṃ nāma “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa
anya-e0102n:1513_5: kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ. Āhārapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1513_6: nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n:1513_7: ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti. Ekadivasaṃ paribhuttāhāro sattāhampi
anya-e0102n:1513_8: upatthambheti. Dibbā pana ojā ekamāsaṃ dvemāsampi upatthambheti. Mātarā paribhuttāhāropi
anya-e0102n:1513_9: dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Sarīre makkhitāhāropi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_10: Kammajāhāro upādiṇṇakāhāro nāma. Sopi ṭhānappatto rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi ojā
anya-e0102n:1513_11: aññaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1513_12: nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_13: Tatrāyaṃ āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti, sesānaṃ nissayāhāraatthiavigatavasenāti
anya-e0102n:1514_0: 704. Utujesupi utu, utusamuṭṭhānaṃ, utupaccayaṃ, utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ, utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānanti
anya-e0102n:1514_1: esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu, uṇhautu sītautūti
anya-e0102n:1514_2: evaṃ panesa duvidho hoti. Utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhāno utu upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1514_3: labhitvā ṭhānappatto sarīre rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Taṃ saddanavakaṃ, ākāsadhātu, lahutā,
anya-e0102n:1514_4: mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santatīti pannarasavidhaṃ hoti. Utupaccayaṃ nāma utu
anya-e0102n:1514_5: catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hoti. Utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1514_6: nāma utusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n:1514_7: utu aññanti evaṃ dīghampi addhānaṃ anupādiṇṇapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1514_8: Utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1514_9: samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti. Tatrāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1514_10: utu utusamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti, sesānaṃ nissayaatthiavigatavasenāti
anya-e0102n:1514_11: evaṃ utujarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Evañhi rūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1516: 705. Yathā ca rūpaṃ sammasantena rūpassa, evaṃ arūpaṃ sammasantenapi arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Sā ca kho ekāsīti lokiyacittuppādavaseneva.
anya-e0102n:1517_0: Seyyathidaṃ – idañhi arūpaṃ nāma purimabhave āyūhitakammavasena paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva
anya-e0102n:1517_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tadeva paṭisandhicittassa anantaracittato paṭṭhāya bhavaṅgavasena,
anya-e0102n:1517_3: āyupariyosāne cutivasena. Yaṃ tattha kāmāvacaraṃ, taṃ chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena.
anya-e0102n:1518_0: Pavatte pana asambhinnattā cakkhussa āpāthagatattā rūpānaṃ ālokasannissitaṃ manasikārahetukaṃ
anya-e0102n:1518_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nibbattati saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Cakkhupasādassa hi ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:1518_2: ṭhitippattameva rūpaṃ cakkhuṃ ghaṭṭeti. Tasmiṃ ghaṭṭite dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1518_3: nirujjhati. Tato tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1518_4: Tadanantaraṃ tadeva rūpaṃ passamānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākaṃ vā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1518_5: Tato tadeva rūpaṃ sampaṭicchamānā vipākamanodhātu. Tato tadeva rūpaṃ santīrayamānā
anya-e0102n:1518_6: vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu. Tato tadeva rūpaṃ vavatthāpayamānā kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n:1518_7: upekkhāsahagatā. Tato paraṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṃ vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ
anya-e0102n:1518_8: cittaṃ pañca satta vā javanāni. Tato kāmāvacarasattānaṃ ekādasasu tadārammaṇacittesu
anya-e0102n:1518_9: javanānurūpaṃ yaṃkiñci tadārammaṇanti. Esa nayo sesadvāresupi. Manodvāre pana mahaggatacittānipi
anya-e0102n:1518_10: uppajjantīti. Evaṃ chasu dvāresu arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Evañhi arūpassa nibbattiṃ
anya-e0102n:1519: Evaṃ kālena rūpaṃ kālena arūpaṃ sammasitvāpi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno eko paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0102n:1521_0: 706. Aparo rūpasattakaarūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1521_1: Tattha ādānanikkhepanato, vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato, āhāramayato, utumayato, kammajato,
anya-e0102n:1521_2: cittasamuṭṭhānato, dhammatārūpatoti imehi ākārehi āropetvā sammasanto rūpasattakavasena
anya-e0102n:1523: Āhārato ca ututo, kammato cāpi cittato;
anya-e0102n:1525_0: Tattha ādānanti paṭisandhi. Nikkhepananti cuti. Iti yogāvacaro imehi ādānanikkhepehi
anya-e0102n:1525_1: ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Kathaṃ? Etthantare
anya-e0102n:1525_2: sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā. Kasmā? Uppādavayavattito, vipariṇāmato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭikkhepato
anya-e0102n:1525_3: ca. Yasmā pana uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ pāpuṇanti, ṭhitiyaṃ jarāya kilamanti, jaraṃ
anya-e0102n:1525_4: patvā avassaṃ bhijjanti, tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato dukkhavatthuto,
anya-e0102n:1525_5: sukhapaṭikkhepato ca dukkhā. Yasmā ca “uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu, ṭhānappattā
anya-e0102n:1525_6: mā jīrantu, jarappattā mā bhijjantū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo
anya-e0102n:1525_7: natthi, suññā tena vasavattanākārena, tasmā suññato, assāmikato, avasavattito, attapaṭikkhepato ca anattāti.
anya-e0102n:1526_0: 707. Evaṃ ādānanikkhepanavasena vassasataparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tato
anya-e0102n:1526_1: paraṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato āropeti. Tattha vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamo nāma vayavasena vuḍḍhassa
anya-e0102n:1526_2: vaḍḍhitassa rūpassa atthaṅgamo. Tassa vasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1527_0: Kathaṃ? So tameva vassasataṃ paṭhamavayena majjhimavayena pacchimavayenāti tīhi vayehi
anya-e0102n:1527_1: paricchindati. Tattha ādito tettiṃsa vassāni paṭhamavayo nāma. Tato catuttiṃsa majjhimavayo
anya-e0102n:1527_2: nāma. Tato tettiṃsa pacchimavayo nāmāti. Iti imehi tīhi vayehi paricchinditvā, “paṭhamavaye
anya-e0102n:1527_3: pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ. Yadaniccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1527_4: taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā. Majjhimavaye pavattarūpampi pacchimavayaṃ appatvā
anya-e0102n:1527_5: tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā. Pacchimavaye tettiṃsa vassāni
anya-e0102n:1527_6: pavattarūpampi maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1528_0: 708. Evaṃ paṭhamavayādivasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna “mandadasakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1528_1: khiḍḍādasakaṃ, vaṇṇadasakaṃ, baladasakaṃ, paññādasakaṃ, hānidasakaṃ, pabbhāradasakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1528_2: vaṅkadasakaṃ, momūhadasakaṃ, sayanadasaka”nti imesaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato
anya-e0102n:1529_0: Tattha dasakesu tāva vassasatajīvino puggalassa paṭhamāni dasa vassāni mandadasakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1529_1: nāma, tadā hi so mando hoti capalo kumārako. Tato parāni dasa khiḍḍādasakaṃ nāma,
anya-e0102n:1529_2: tadā hi so khiḍḍāratibahulo hoti. Tato parāni dasa vaṇṇadasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa
anya-e0102n:1529_3: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tato parāni dasa baladasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa balañca
anya-e0102n:1529_4: thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tato parāni dasa paññādasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa paññā
anya-e0102n:1529_5: suppatiṭṭhitā hoti, pakatiyā kira dubbalapaññassāpi tasmiṃ kāle appamattakā paññā
anya-e0102n:1529_6: uppajjatiyeva. Tato parāni dasa hānidasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa khiḍḍārativaṇṇabalapaññā
anya-e0102n:1529_7: parihāyanti. Tato parāni dasa pabbhāradasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa attabhāvo purato pabbhāro
anya-e0102n:1529_8: hoti. Tato parāni dasa vaṅkadasakaṃ nāma, tadā hissa attabhāvo naṅgalakoṭi viya vaṅko
anya-e0102n:1529_9: hoti. Tato parāni dasa momūhadasakaṃ nāma. Tadā hi so momūho hoti, kataṃ kataṃ pamussati.
anya-e0102n:1529_10: Tato parāni dasa sayanadasakaṃ nāma, vassasatiko hi sayanabahulova hoti.
anya-e0102n:1530_0: Tatrāyaṃ yogī etesaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetuṃ
anya-e0102n:1530_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati – “paṭhamadasake pavattarūpaṃ dutiyadasakaṃ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n:1530_2: nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā. Dutiyadasake…pe… navamadasake pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1530_3: dasamadasakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Dasamadasake pavattarūpaṃ punabbhavaṃ
anya-e0102n:1530_4: appatvā idheva nirujjhati, tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1531_0: 709. Evaṃ dasakavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva vassasataṃ
anya-e0102n:1531_1: pañcapañcavassavasena vīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1531_2: Kathaṃ? So hi iti paṭisañcikkhati – “paṭhame vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ dutiyaṃ vassapañcakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1531_3: appatvā tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā. Dutiye vassapañcake
anya-e0102n:1531_4: pavattarūpaṃ tatiyaṃ…pe… ekūnavīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ vīsatimaṃ vassapañcakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1531_5: appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Vīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:1531_6: nāma natthi, tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1532_0: Evaṃ vīsatikoṭṭhāsavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna pañcavīsati
anya-e0102n:1532_1: koṭṭhāse katvā catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vassānaṃ vasena āropeti. Tato tettiṃsa koṭṭhāse
anya-e0102n:1532_2: katvā tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ vasena, paññāsa koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1532_3: vasena, sataṃ koṭṭhāse katvā ekekavassavasena. Tato ekaṃ vassaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā
anya-e0102n:1532_4: vassānahemantagimhesu tīsu utūsu ekekautuvasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1533_0: Kathaṃ? “Vassāne catumāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ hemantaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ. Hemante
anya-e0102n:1533_1: pavattarūpaṃ gimhaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ. Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1533_2: appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti. Evaṃ āropetvā puna
anya-e0102n:1533_3: ekaṃ vassaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā – “vassāne dvemāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ saradaṃ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n:1533_4: niruddhaṃ. Sarade pavattarūpaṃ hemantaṃ. Hemante pavattarūpaṃ sisiraṃ. Sisire pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1533_5: vasantaṃ. Vasante pavattarūpaṃ gimhaṃ. Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n:1533_6: niruddhaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1534_0: Evaṃ āropetvā tato kāḷajuṇhavasena – “kāḷe pavattarūpaṃ juṇhaṃ appatvā. Juṇhe pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1534_1: kāḷaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1534_2: Tato rattindivavasena – “rattiṃ pavattarūpaṃ divasaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1534_3: Divasaṃ pavattarūpampi rattiṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1534_4: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Tato tadeva rattindivaṃ pubbaṇhādivasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā
anya-e0102n:1534_5: – “pubbaṇhe pavattarūpaṃ majjhanhaṃ appatvā. Majjhanhe pavattarūpaṃ sāyanhaṃ. Sāyanhe
anya-e0102n:1534_6: pavattarūpaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ. Paṭhamayāme pavattarūpaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ. Majjhimayāme pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1534_7: pacchimayāmaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ. Pacchimayāme pavattarūpaṃ puna pubbaṇhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1534_8: appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1535_1: – “abhikkame pavattarūpaṃ paṭikkamaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Paṭikkame pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1535_2: ālokanaṃ. Ālokane pavattarūpaṃ vilokanaṃ. Vilokane pavattarūpaṃ samiñjanaṃ. Samiñjane
anya-e0102n:1535_3: pavattarūpaṃ pasāraṇaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1536: Tato ekapadavāraṃ uddharaṇa atiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirumbhanavasena cha koṭṭhāse karoti.
anya-e0102n:1537_0: Tattha uddharaṇaṃ nāma pādassa bhūmito ukkhipanaṃ. Atiharaṇaṃ nāma purato haraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_1: Vītiharaṇaṃ nāma khāṇukaṇṭakadīghajātiādīsu kiñcideva disvā ito cito ca pādasañcāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_2: Vossajjanaṃ nāma pādassa heṭṭhā oropanaṃ. Sannikkhepanaṃ nāma pathavītale ṭhapanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_3: Sannirumbhanaṃ nāma puna pāduddharaṇakāle pādassa pathaviyā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_4: Tattha uddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve
anya-e0102n:1537_5: adhimattā honti balavatiyo. Tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti
anya-e0102n:1537_6: dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo. Tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesu.
anya-e0102n:1537_7: Evaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā tesaṃ vasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1538_0: Kathaṃ? So iti paṭisañcikkhati – “yā uddharaṇe pavattā dhātuyo, yāni ca tadupādāyarūpāni,
anya-e0102n:1538_1: sabbe te dhammā atiharaṇaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti, tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā.
anya-e0102n:1538_2: Tathā atiharaṇe pavattā vītiharaṇaṃ. Vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṃ. Vossajjane pavattā
anya-e0102n:1538_3: sannikkhepanaṃ. Sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0102n:1538_4: Iti tattha tattha uppannā itaraṃ itaraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ appatvā tattha tattheva pabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1538_5: pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā
anya-e0102n:1538_6: saṅkhārā bhijjanti. Tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti. Tassevaṃ pabbapabbagate saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n:1539_0: 711. Sukhumatte ca panassa idaṃ opammaṃ. Eko kira dārutiṇukkādīsu kataparicayo adiṭṭhapubbapadīpo
anya-e0102n:1539_1: paccantavāsiko nagaramāgamma antarāpaṇe jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ disvā ekaṃ purisaṃ pucchi
anya-e0102n:1539_2: ambho “kiṃ nāmetaṃ evaṃ manāpa”nti? Tamenaṃ so āha “kimettha manāpaṃ, padīpo nāmesa
anya-e0102n:1539_3: telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca gatamaggopissa na paññāyissatī”ti. Tamañño evamāha
anya-e0102n:1539_4: “idaṃ oḷārikaṃ, imissā hi vaṭṭiyā anupubbena ḍayhamānāya tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge
anya-e0102n:1539_5: jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti. Tamañño evamāha “idampi oḷārikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1539_6: imissā hi aṅgulaṅgulantare aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare tantumhi tantumhi aṃsumhi aṃsumhi
anya-e0102n:1539_7: jālā itarītaraṃ aṃsuṃ appatvāva nirujjhissati. Aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā na sakkā jālaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0102n:1540_0: Tattha “telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca padīpassa gatamaggopi na paññāyissatī”ti purisassa
anya-e0102n:1540_1: ñāṇaṃ viya yogino ādānanikkhepanato vassasatena paricchinnarūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1540_2: “Vaṭṭiyā tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti
anya-e0102n:1540_3: purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsaparicchinne vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe
anya-e0102n:1540_4: tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ. “Aṅgulaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa
anya-e0102n:1540_5: ñāṇaṃ viya yogino dasavassa pañcavassa catuvassa tivassa dvivassa ekavassa paricchinne
anya-e0102n:1540_6: rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ. “Aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti
anya-e0102n:1540_7: purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino ekekautuvasena ekaṃ vassaṃ tidhā, chadhā ca vibhajitvā
anya-e0102n:1540_8: catumāsa-dvimāsaparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ. “Tantumhi tantumhi jālā itarītaraṃ
anya-e0102n:1540_9: appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino kāḷajuṇhavasena, rattindivavasena,
anya-e0102n:1540_10: ekarattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pubbaṇhādivasena ca paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1540_11: “Aṃsumhi aṃsumhi jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1540_12: yogino abhikkamādivasena ceva uddharaṇādīsu ca ekekakoṭṭhāsavasena paricchinne rūpe
anya-e0102n:1541_0: 712. So evaṃ nānākārehi vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva
anya-e0102n:1541_1: rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā āhāramayādivasena cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā ekekakoṭṭhāse tilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1541_2: āropeti. Tatrāssa āhāramayaṃ rūpaṃ chātasuhitavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti. Chātakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0102n:1541_3: rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti kilantaṃ, jhāmakhāṇuko viya, aṅgārapacchiyaṃ nilīnakāko viya
anya-e0102n:1541_4: ca dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ. Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ phassavantaṃ
anya-e0102n:1541_5: hoti. So taṃ pariggahetvā “chātakāle pavattarūpaṃ suhitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1541_6: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitampi chātakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ
anya-e0102n:1542_0: 713. Utumayaṃ sītuṇhavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti. Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti
anya-e0102n:1542_1: kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ. Sītautunā samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ siniddhaṃ hoti. So
anya-e0102n:1542_2: taṃ pariggahetvā “uṇhakāle pavattarūpaṃ sītakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati. Sītakāle
anya-e0102n:1542_3: pavattarūpaṃ uṇhakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1543_0: 714. Kammajaṃ āyatanadvāravasena pākaṭaṃ hoti. Cakkhudvārasmiṃ hi cakkhukāyabhāvadasakavasena
anya-e0102n:1543_1: tiṃsa kammajarūpāni, upatthambhakāni pana tesaṃ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti
anya-e0102n:1543_2: catupaṇṇāsa honti. Tathā sotaghānajivhādvāresu. Kāyadvāre kāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva
anya-e0102n:1544_0: So sabbampi taṃ rūpaṃ pariggahetvā “cakkhudvāre pavattarūpaṃ sotadvāraṃ appatvā ettheva
anya-e0102n:1544_1: nirujjhati. Sotadvāre pavattarūpaṃ ghānadvāraṃ. Ghānadvāre pavattarūpaṃ jivhādvāraṃ.
anya-e0102n:1544_2: Jivhādvāre pavattarūpaṃ kāyadvāraṃ. Kāyadvāre pavattarūpaṃ manodvāraṃ appatvā ettheva
anya-e0102n:1544_3: nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1545_1: uppannaṃ hi rūpaṃ siniddhaṃ mudu pīṇitaṃ phassavantaṃ hoti. Domanassitakāle uppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1545_2: jhattaṃ kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti. So taṃ pariggahetvā “somanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ
anya-e0102n:1545_3: domanassitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati. Domanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ somanassitakālaṃ
anya-e0102n:1545_4: appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1546: Tassevaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropayato ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0102n:1547: Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
anya-e0102n:1549: Cullāsīti sahassāni, kappaṃ tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
anya-e0102n:1550: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā.
anya-e0102n:1551: Ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
anya-e0102n:1553: Anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgate;
anya-e0102n:1563_0: 716. Evaṃ āhāramayādīsu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna dhammatārūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1563_2: vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpaṃ. Tadassa asokaṅkurādivasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1564_0: Asokaṅkuraṃ hi āditova tanurattaṃ hoti, tato dvīhatīhaccayena ghanarattaṃ, puna dvīhatīhaccayena
anya-e0102n:1564_1: mandarattaṃ, tato taruṇapallavavaṇṇaṃ, tato pariṇatapallavavaṇṇaṃ, tato haritapaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1564_2: Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ. Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabhāgarūpasantatimanuppabandhāpayamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1564_3: saṃvaccharamattena paṇḍupalāsaṃ hutvā vaṇṭato chijjitvā patati.
anya-e0102n:1565_0: So taṃ pariggahetvā “tanurattakāle pavattarūpaṃ ghanarattakālaṃ appatvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1565_1: Ghanarattakāle pavattarūpaṃ mandarattakālaṃ. Mandarattakāle pavattarūpaṃ taruṇapallavavaṇṇakālaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1565_3: pavattaṃ haritapaṇṇavaṇṇakālaṃ. Haritapaṇṇakāle pavattaṃ nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālaṃ. Nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakāle
anya-e0102n:1565_4: pavattaṃ paṇḍupalāsakālaṃ. Paṇḍupalāsakāle pavattaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā patanakālaṃ
anya-e0102n:1565_5: appatvāva nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti, evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1565_6: tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā iminā nayena sabbampi dhammatārūpaṃ sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1566: Evaṃ tāva rūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1568: 717. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “arūpasattakavasenā”ti, tattha ayaṃ mātikā – kalāpato, yamakato, khaṇikato, paṭipāṭito, diṭṭhiugghāṭanato, mānasamugghāṭanato, nikantipariyādānatoti.
anya-e0102n:1569_0: Tattha kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā. Kathaṃ kalāpato sammasatīti? Idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n:1569_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati – “ye ime ‘kesā aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā
anya-e0102n:1569_2: dhammā, ye ca ‘lomā…pe… matthaluṅgaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā
anya-e0102n:1569_3: dhammā, sabbe te itarītaraṃ appatvā pabbaṃpabbaṃ odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā
anya-e0102n:1569_4: viya taṭataṭāyantā vinaṭṭhā, tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti. Ayaṃ tāva visuddhikathāyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0102n:1570_0: Ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ pana “heṭṭhā rūpasattake sattasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti
anya-e0102n:1570_1: pavattaṃ cittaṃ aparena cittena ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasanto ‘kalāpato sammasatī’ti”
anya-e0102n:1570_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttataraṃ. Tasmā sesānipi teneva nayena vibhajissāma.
anya-e0102n:1571_0: 718. Yamakatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1571_1: tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1571_2: āhāramayaṃ, utumayaṃ, kammajaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1571_3: sammasitvā tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1572_0: 719. Khaṇikatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1572_1: taṃ paṭhamacittaṃ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṃ tatiyena, tatiyaṃ catutthena, catutthaṃ
anya-e0102n:1572_2: pañcamena “etampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṃ, āhāramayaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1572_3: utumayaṃ, kammajaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1572_4: taṃ paṭhamacittaṃ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṃ tatiyena, tatiyaṃ catutthena, catutthaṃ
anya-e0102n:1572_5: pañcamena “etampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Evaṃ rūpapariggāhakacittato
anya-e0102n:1572_6: paṭṭhāya cattāri cattāri cittāni sammasanto khaṇikato sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1573_0: 720. Paṭipāṭitoti ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā taṃ paṭhamacittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1573_1: dutiyacittena, dutiyaṃ tatiyena, tatiyaṃ catutthena…pe… dasamaṃ ekādasamena “etampi
anya-e0102n:1573_2: aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṃ, āhāramayaṃ, utumayaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1573_3: kammajaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā taṃ
anya-e0102n:1573_4: paṭhamacittaṃ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṃ tatiyena, tatiyaṃ catutthena…pe… dasamaṃ ekādasamena
anya-e0102n:1573_5: “etampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ vipassanā paṭipāṭiyā sakalampi divasabhāgaṃ
anya-e0102n:1573_6: sammasituṃ vaṭṭeyya. Yāva dasamacittasammasanā pana rūpakammaṭṭhānampi arūpakammaṭṭhānampi
anya-e0102n:1573_7: paguṇaṃ hoti. Tasmā dasameyeva ṭhapetabbanti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sammasanto paṭipāṭito sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1574_0: 721. Diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānaugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānatoti imesu tīsu visuṃ sammasananayo
anya-e0102n:1574_1: nāma natthi. Yaṃ panetaṃ heṭṭhā rūpaṃ, idha ca arūpaṃ pariggahitaṃ, taṃ passanto
anya-e0102n:1574_2: rūpārūpato uddhaṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ nāma na passati. Sattassa adassanato paṭṭhāya sattasaññā
anya-e0102n:1574_3: ugghāṭitā hoti. Sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhato diṭṭhi nuppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1574_4: Diṭṭhiyā anuppajjamānāya diṭṭhi ugghāṭitā nāma hoti. Diṭṭhiugghāṭitacittena saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n:1574_5: pariggaṇhato māno nuppajjati. Māne anuppajjante māno samugghāṭito nāma hoti. Mānasamugghāṭitacittena
anya-e0102n:1574_6: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhato taṇhā nuppajjati. Taṇhāya anuppajjantiyā nikanti pariyādiṇṇā
anya-e0102n:1574_7: nāma hotīti idaṃ tāva visuddhikathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1575: Ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ pana “diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānasamugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānato”ti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayaṃ nayo dassito.
anya-e0102n:1576_0: “Ahaṃ vipassāmi, mama vipassanā”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n:1576_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n:1577_0: “Suṭṭhu vipassāmi, manāpaṃ vipassāmī”ti gaṇhato mānasamugghāṭo nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n:1577_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n:1578_0: “Vipassituṃ sakkomī”ti vipassanaṃ assādentassa nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n:1578_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n:1579_0: Sace saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyuṃ, attāti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyyuṃ, anattā ca pana attāti gahitā,
anya-e0102n:1579_1: tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1580_0: Sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṃ, niccāti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyyuṃ, aniccā ca pana niccāti
anya-e0102n:1580_1: gahitā, tasmā te hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1581_0: Sace saṅkhārā sukhā bhaveyyuṃ, sukhāti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyyuṃ, dukkhā ca pana sukhāti
anya-e0102n:1581_1: gahitā, tasmā te uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1582_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāre anattato passantassa diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma hoti. Aniccato passantassa
anya-e0102n:1582_1: mānasamugghāṭanaṃ nāma hoti. Dukkhato passantassa nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma hoti. Iti
anya-e0102n:1582_2: ayaṃ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0102n:1583: Evaṃ arūpasattakavasenāpi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati. Ettāvatā panassa rūpakammaṭṭhānampi arūpakammaṭṭhānampi paguṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1584_0: 722. So evaṃ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena
anya-e0102n:1584_1: sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā, tāsaṃ idheva tāva ekadesaṃ paṭivijjhanto
anya-e0102n:1585_0: Aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā nāma aniccānupassanādikā paññā. Yāsu aniccānupassanaṃ bhāvento
anya-e0102n:1585_1: niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhānupassanaṃ bhāvento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_2: bhāvento attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbidānupassanaṃ bhāvento nandiṃ pajahati, virāgānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_3: bhāvento rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhānupassanaṃ bhāvento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissaggānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_4: bhāvento ādānaṃ pajahati, khayānupassanaṃ bhāvento ghanasaññaṃ pajahati, vayānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_5: bhāvento āyūhanaṃ pajahati, vipariṇāmānupassanaṃ bhāvento dhuvasaññaṃ pajahati, animittānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_6: bhāvento nimittaṃ pajahati, appaṇihitānupassanaṃ bhāvento paṇidhiṃ pajahati, suññatānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_7: bhāvento abhinivesaṃ pajahati, adhipaññādhammavipassanaṃ bhāvento sārādānābhinivesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_8: pajahati, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ bhāvento sammohābhinivesaṃ pajahati, ādīnavānupassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1585_9: bhāvento ālayābhinivesaṃ pajahati, paṭisaṅkhānupassanaṃ bhāvento appaṭisaṅkhaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:1586_0: Tāsu yasmā iminā aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena saṅkhārā diṭṭhā, tasmā anicca-dukkha-anattānupassanā
anya-e0102n:1586_1: paṭividdhā honti. Yasmā ca “yā ca aniccānupassanā yā ca animittānupassanā, ime dhammā
anya-e0102n:1586_2: ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ”. Tathā “yā ca dukkhānupassanā yā ca appaṇihitānupassanā,
anya-e0102n:1586_3: ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ”. “Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā,
anya-e0102n:1586_4: ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tāpi paṭividdhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1587_0: Adhipaññādhammavipassanā pana sabbāpi vipassanā. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā
anya-e0102n:1587_1: eva saṅgahitaṃ. Iti idampi dvayaṃ paṭividdhameva hoti. Sesesu vipassanāñāṇesu kiñci
anya-e0102n:1587_2: paṭividdhaṃ, kiñci appaṭividdhaṃ, tesaṃ vibhāgaṃ parato āvikarissāma.
anya-e0102n:1588_0: Yadeva hi paṭividdhaṃ, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā
anya-e0102n:1588_1: upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0102n:1588_2: mahāvipassanā. Tāsaṃ idheva tāva ekadesaṃ paṭivijjhanto tappaṭipakkhe dhamme pajahatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1590_0: 723. So evaṃ aniccānupassanādipaṭipakkhānaṃ niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo
anya-e0102n:1590_1: sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā, yaṃ taṃ sammasanañāṇānantaraṃ “paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1590_2: vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti udayabbayānupassanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1590_3: tassa adhigamāya yogaṃ ārabhati. Ārabhamāno ca saṅkhepato tāva ārabhati. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:1591_0: “Kathaṃ paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1591_1: Jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo,
anya-e0102n:1591_2: anupassanā ñāṇaṃ. Jātā vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… jātaṃ cakkhu…pe… jāto bhavo
anya-e0102n:1591_3: paccuppanno, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo, anupassanā ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1592_0: So iminā pāḷinayena jātassa nāmarūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ jātiṃ uppādaṃ abhinavākāraṃ
anya-e0102n:1592_1: “udayo”ti, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ khayaṃ bhaṅgaṃ “vayo”ti samanupassati. So evaṃ pajānāti
anya-e0102n:1592_2: “imassa nāmarūpassa uppattito pubbe anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi, uppajjamānassāpi
anya-e0102n:1592_3: rāsito vā nicayato vā āgamanaṃ nāma natthi, nirujjhamānassāpi disāvidisāgamanaṃ nāma
anya-e0102n:1592_4: natthi, niruddhassāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsito nicayato nidhānato avaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1592_5: Yathā pana vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannasaddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
anya-e0102n:1592_6: na uppajjamāno sannicayato āgato, na nirujjhamānassa disāvidisāgamanaṃ atthi, na
anya-e0102n:1592_7: niruddho katthaci sannicito tiṭṭhati, atha kho vīṇañca upavīṇañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ
anya-e0102n:1592_8: vāyāmaṃ paṭicca ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭiveti. Evaṃ sabbepi rūpārūpino dhammā ahutvā
anya-e0102n:1593: 724. Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāraṃ katvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n:1594_2: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1594_3: passati. Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n:1595_1: Taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa
anya-e0102n:1595_2: vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa
anya-e0102n:1595_3: vayaṃ passantopi imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”.
anya-e0102n:1596_1: passati. Taṇhāsamudayā… kammasamudayā… phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1596_2: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
anya-e0102n:1596_3: udayaṃ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n:1596_4: Avijjānirodhā… taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1596_5: vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
anya-e0102n:1596_6: vayaṃ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”.
anya-e0102n:1597: Vedanākkhandhassa viya ca saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhānaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso, viññāṇakkhandhassa phassaṭṭhāne “nāmarūpasamudayā, nāmarūpanirodhā”ti –
anya-e0102n:1598_0: Evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā paññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni.
anya-e0102n:1598_1: Tesaṃ vasena evampi rūpassa udayo evampi rūpassa vayo, evampi rūpaṃ udeti, evampi
anya-e0102n:1598_2: rūpaṃ vetīti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena manasikāraṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1599_0: 725. Tassevaṃ manasikaroto “iti kirime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī”ti
anya-e0102n:1599_1: ñāṇaṃ visadataraṃ hoti. Tassevaṃ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṃ passato
anya-e0102n:1600_0: 726. Yañhi so avijjādisamudayā khandhānaṃ samudayaṃ, avijjādinirodhā ca khandhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1600_1: nirodhaṃ passati, idamassa paccayato udayabbayadassanaṃ. Yaṃ pana nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0102n:1600_2: passanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passati, idamassa khaṇato udayabbayadassanaṃ, uppattikkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0102n:1601_0: 727. Iccassevaṃ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṃ passato paccayato udayadassanena
anya-e0102n:1601_1: samudayasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti janakāvabodhato. Khaṇato udayadassanena dukkhasaccaṃ
anya-e0102n:1601_2: pākaṭaṃ hoti jātidukkhāvabodhato. Paccayato vayadassanena nirodhasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti
anya-e0102n:1601_3: paccayānuppādena paccayavataṃ anuppādāvabodhato. Khaṇato vayadassanena dukkhasaccameva
anya-e0102n:1601_4: pākaṭaṃ hoti maraṇadukkhāvabodhato. Yañcassa udayabbayadassanaṃ, maggovāyaṃ lokikoti
anya-e0102n:1602_0: 728. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anulomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo hoti, “imasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1602_1: sati idaṃ hotī”ti avabodhato. Paccayato vayadassanena paṭilomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo
anya-e0102n:1602_2: hoti, “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti avabodhato. Khaṇato pana udayabbayadassanena
anya-e0102n:1602_3: paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā pākaṭā honti saṅkhatalakkhaṇāvabodhato. Udayabbayavanto
anya-e0102n:1603_0: 729. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena ekattanayo pākaṭo hoti hetuphalasambandhena santānassa
anya-e0102n:1603_1: anupacchedāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Khaṇato udayadassanena
anya-e0102n:1603_2: nānattanayo pākaṭo hoti navanavānaṃ uppādāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṃ sassatadiṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1603_3: pajahati. Paccayato cassa udayabbayadassanena abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1603_4: avasavattibhāvāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Paccayato pana udayadassanena
anya-e0102n:1603_5: evaṃdhammatānayo pākaṭo hoti paccayānurūpena phalassa uppādāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṃ
anya-e0102n:1604_0: 730. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti dhammānaṃ nirīhakattapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n:1604_1: Khaṇato udayabbayadassanena aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti hutvā abhāvāvabodhato, pubbantāparantavivekāvabodhato
anya-e0102n:1604_2: ca. Dukkhalakkhaṇampi pākaṭaṃ hoti udayabbayehi paṭipīḷanāvabodhato. Sabhāvalakkhaṇampi
anya-e0102n:1604_4: tāvakālikattampi pākaṭaṃ hoti udayakkhaṇe vayassa, vayakkhaṇe ca udayassa abhāvāvabodhatoti.
anya-e0102n:1605_1: dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1605_2: upaṭṭhahanti. Na kevalañca niccanavā, sūriyuggamane ussāvabindu viya udakabubbuḷo
anya-e0102n:1605_3: viya udake daṇḍarāji viya āragge sāsapo viya vijjuppādo viya ca parittaṭṭhāyino.
anya-e0102n:1606_0: Ettāvatānena “vayadhammameva uppajjati, uppannañca vayaṃ upetī”ti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa
anya-e0102n:1606_1: lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ nāma taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ
anya-e0102n:1608_0: 732. Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya āraddhavipassakassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā
anya-e0102n:1608_1: uppajjanti. Vipassanupakkilesā hi paṭivedhappattassa ariyasāvakassa ceva vippaṭipannakassa
anya-e0102n:1608_2: ca nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassa kusītapuggalassa nuppajjanti. Sammāpaṭipannakassa pana
anya-e0102n:1609: Katame pana te dasa upakkilesāti? Obhāso, ñāṇaṃ, pīti, passaddhi, sukhaṃ, adhimokkho, paggaho, upaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā, nikantīti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1610_0: “Kathaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ hoti? Aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1610_1: ‘obhāso dhammo’ti obhāsaṃ āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ. Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso
anya-e0102n:1610_2: aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti. Dukkhato… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti”.
anya-e0102n:1611_0: Tathā “aniccato manasikaroto ñāṇaṃ uppajjati…pe… pīti… passaddhi… sukhaṃ… adhimokkho…
anya-e0102n:1611_1: paggaho… upaṭṭhānaṃ… upekkhā… nikanti uppajjati, ‘nikanti dhammo’ti nikantiṃ āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:1611_2: tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ. Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:1611_3: nappajānāti. Dukkhato… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1612_0: 733. Tattha obhāsoti vipassanobhāso. Tasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe
anya-e0102n:1612_1: evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo, addhā maggappattosmi phalapattosmī”ti amaggameva “maggo”ti,
anya-e0102n:1612_2: aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti. Tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ “phala”nti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n:1612_3: vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva assādento nisīdati.
anya-e0102n:1613_0: So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1613_1: Kassaci antogabbhaṃ. Kassaci bahigabbhampi. Kassaci sakalavihāraṃ, gāvutaṃ, aḍḍhayojanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1613_2: yojanaṃ, dviyojanaṃ, tiyojanaṃ…pe… kassaci pathavītalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
anya-e0102n:1613_3: ekālokaṃ kurumāno. Bhagavato pana dasasahassilokadhātuṃ obhāsento udapādi.
anya-e0102n:1614_0: Evaṃ vemattatāya cassa idaṃ vatthu – cittalapabbate kira dvikuṭṭagehassa anto dve
anya-e0102n:1614_1: therā nisīdiṃsu. Taṃdivasañca kāḷapakkhuposatho hoti, meghapaṭalacchannā disā, rattibhāge
anya-e0102n:1614_2: caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ tamaṃ pavattati. Atheko thero āha – “bhante, mayhaṃ idāni cetiyaṅgaṇamhi
anya-e0102n:1614_3: sīhāsane pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni paññāyantī”ti. Taṃ itaro āha – “anacchariyaṃ, āvuso,
anya-e0102n:1614_4: kathesi, mayhaṃ panetarahi mahāsamuddamhi yojanaṭṭhāne macchakacchapā paññāyantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1615_0: Ayaṃ pana vipassanupakkileso yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino uppajjati. So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1615_1: kilesānaṃ asamudācārato “arahā aha”nti cittaṃ uppādeti uccavālikavāsī mahānāgatthero
anya-e0102n:1615_2: viya haṃkanakavāsī mahādattatthero viya cittalapabbate niṅkapeṇṇakapadhānagharavāsī
anya-e0102n:1616_0: Tatridaṃ ekavatthuparidīpanaṃ – talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnapaṭisambhido
anya-e0102n:1616_1: mahākhīṇāsavo mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ attano divāṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n:1616_2: nisīditvā “kinnu kho amhākaṃ ācariyassa uccavālikavāsīmahānāgattherassa samaṇabhāvakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:1616_3: matthakaṃ pattaṃ, no”ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā “mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva
anya-e0102n:1616_4: karissatī”ti ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe
anya-e0102n:1616_5: orohitvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. “Kiṃ, āvuso dhammadinna, akāle
anya-e0102n:1616_6: āgatosī”ti ca vutte “pañhaṃ, bhante, pucchituṃ āgatomhī”ti āha. Tato “pucchāvuso,
anya-e0102n:1617_0: Thero pucchitapucchitaṃ asajjamānova kathesi. Tato “atitikkhaṃ vo, bhante, ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1617_1: kadā tumhehi ayaṃ dhammo adhigato”ti vutte “ito saṭṭhivassakāle, āvuso”ti āha. Samādhimpi,
anya-e0102n:1617_2: bhante, vaḷañjethāti, na yidaṃ, āvuso, bhāriyanti. Tena hi, bhante, ekaṃ hatthiṃ
anya-e0102n:1617_3: māpethāti. Thero sabbasetaṃ hatthiṃ māpesi. Idāni, bhante, yathā ayaṃ hatthī añcitakaṇṇo
anya-e0102n:1617_4: pasāritanaṅguṭṭho soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṃ koñcanādaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ abhimukho
anya-e0102n:1617_5: āgacchati, tathā naṃ karothāti. Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṃ
anya-e0102n:1617_6: ākāraṃ disvā uṭṭhāya palāyituṃ āraddho. Tamenaṃ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṃ pasāretvā
anya-e0102n:1617_7: cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā “bhante, khīṇāsavassa sārajjaṃ nāma hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0102n:1618_0: So tamhi kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “avassayo me, āvuso, dhammadinna hohī”ti
anya-e0102n:1618_1: vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. “Bhante, tumhākaṃ avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato,
anya-e0102n:1618_2: mā cintayitthā”ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha
anya-e0102n:1618_3: tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Thero kira dosacarito ahosi. Evarūpā
anya-e0102n:1619: 734. Ñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tassa kira rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva avihatavegaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ ativisadaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1620: Pītīti vipassanāpīti. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye khuddakāpīti, khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti, ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti ayaṃ pañcavidhā pīti sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1621_0: Passaddhīti vipassanāpassaddhi. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n:1621_1: vā nisinnassa kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho, na gāravaṃ, na kakkhaḷatā, na akammaññatā,
anya-e0102n:1621_2: na gelaññaṃ, na vaṅkatā hoti, atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni
anya-e0102n:1621_3: kammaññāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti. So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto
anya-e0102n:1621_4: tasmiṃ samaye amānusiṃ nāma ratiṃ anubhavati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1623: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
anya-e0102n:1626: Evamassa imaṃ amānusiṃ ratiṃ sādhayamānā lahutādisampayuttā passaddhi uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1627: Sukhanti vipassanāsukhaṃ. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1628: Adhimokkhoti saddhā. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa cittacetasikānaṃ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1629: Paggahoti vīriyaṃ. Vipassanāsampayuttameva hissa asithilaṃ anaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1630_0: Upaṭṭhānanti sati. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa supaṭṭhitā supatiṭṭhitā nikhātā
anya-e0102n:1630_1: acalā pabbatarājasadisā sati uppajjati. So yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjati samannāharati
anya-e0102n:1630_2: manasikaroti paccavekkhati, taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno
anya-e0102n:1631_0: Upekkhāti vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Tasmiṃ hissa samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n:1631_1: majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhāpi balavatī uppajjati. Manodvāre āvajjanupekkhāpi.
anya-e0102n:1631_2: Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhitta
anya-e0102n:1631_3: tattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0102n:1632: Nikantīti vipassanānikanti. Evaṃ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya hissa vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati. Yā nikanti kilesoti pariggahetumpi na sakkā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1633_0: Yathā ca obhāse, evaṃ etesupi aññatarasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe
anya-e0102n:1633_1: evarūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannapubbaṃ, evarūpā pīti, passaddhi, sukhaṃ, adhimokkho, paggaho,
anya-e0102n:1633_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā, nikanti uppannapubbā, addhā maggappattosmi phalappattosmī”ti
anya-e0102n:1633_3: amaggameva “maggo”ti aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti. Tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ
anya-e0102n:1633_4: “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e0102n:1634_0: 735. Ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesāti vuttā, na akusalattā.
anya-e0102n:1634_1: Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca. Vatthuvaseneva cete dasa. Gāhavasena
anya-e0102n:1634_2: pana samatiṃsa honti. Kathaṃ? “Mama obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho hoti,
anya-e0102n:1634_3: “manāpo vata obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato mānagāho, obhāsaṃ assādayato taṇhāgāho, iti
anya-e0102n:1634_4: obhāse diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena tayo gāhā. Tathā sesesupīti evaṃ gāhavasena samatiṃsa
anya-e0102n:1634_5: upakkilesā honti. Tesaṃ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati.
anya-e0102n:1634_6: Obhāsādīsu ekekaṃ “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti samanupassati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n:1635: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
anya-e0102n:1636: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṃ pavedhati.
anya-e0102n:1640_0: 736. Kusalo pana paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1640_1: kho me obhāso uppanno, so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo
anya-e0102n:1640_2: vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
anya-e0102n:1640_3: Atha vā panassa evaṃ hoti, “sace obhāso attā bhaveyya, ‘attā’ti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyya.
anya-e0102n:1640_4: Anattā ca panāyaṃ ‘attā’ti gahito. Tasmā so avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:1640_5: anicco, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkho”ti sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1641_0: So evaṃ upaparikkhitvā obhāsaṃ “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati.
anya-e0102n:1641_1: Ñāṇaṃ…pe… nikantiṃ “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati. Evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1641_2: samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n:1643: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṃ gacchatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1644_0: So evaṃ vikkhepaṃ agacchanto taṃ samatiṃsavidhaṃ upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo
anya-e0102n:1644_1: dhammā na maggo. Upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti maggañca
anya-e0102n:1644_2: amaggañca vavatthapeti. Tassevaṃ “ayaṃ maggo, ayaṃ na maggo”ti maggañca amaggañca
anya-e0102n:1645_0: Ettāvatā ca pana tena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1645_1: tāva nāmarūpassa vavatthāpanena dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1645_3: sammāmaggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccassa vavatthānaṃ katanti, evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva
anya-e0102n:1645_4: ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1652_0: 737. Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā, navamañca saccānulomikañāṇanti
anya-e0102n:1652_1: ayaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma. Aṭṭhannanti cettha upakkilesavimuttaṃ vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:1652_4: imāni aṭṭha ñāṇāni veditabbāni. Navamaṃ saccānulomikañāṇanti anulomassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1652_5: Tasmā taṃ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n:1653_0: 738. Puna udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyoti ce? Lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇattho. Udayabbayañāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1653_1: hi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ
anya-e0102n:1653_2: nāsakkhi. Upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana sakkoti. Tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthamettha puna yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n:1654_0: 739. Lakkhaṇāni pana kissa amanasikārā kena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhahanti? Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1654_1: tāva udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1654_2: abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1654_3: nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Udayabbayampana
anya-e0102n:1654_4: pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1654_5: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Nānādhātuyo
anya-e0102n:1654_6: vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1655_0: 740. Ettha ca aniccaṃ, aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, dukkhaṃ, dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, anattā, anattalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0102n:1655_1: ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā,
anya-e0102n:1655_2: hutvā abhāvato vā. Uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro.
anya-e0102n:1656: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā? Abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanā, abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1657: “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato, avasavattanākāro anattalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1658: Tayidaṃ sabbampi ayaṃ yogāvacaro upakkilesavimuttena vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātena udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkheti.
anya-e0102n:1661_0: 741. Tassevaṃ sallakkhetvā punappunaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti rūpārūpadhamme tulayato
anya-e0102n:1661_1: tīrayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ hutvā vahati, saṅkhārā lahuṃ upaṭṭhahanti, ñāṇe tikkhe
anya-e0102n:1661_2: vahante saṅkhāresu lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu uppādaṃ vā ṭhitiṃ vā pavattaṃ vā nimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1661_3: vā na sampāpuṇāti. Khayavayabhedanirodheyeva sati santiṭṭhati. Tassa “evaṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1661_4: evaṃ nāma saṅkhāragataṃ nirujjhatī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanaṃ nāma
anya-e0102n:1662_0: “Kathaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇaṃ? Rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1662_1: uppajjitvā bhijjati, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0102n:1662_2: Anupassatīti kathaṃ anupassati? Aniccato anupassati no niccato, dukkhato anupassati
anya-e0102n:1662_3: no sukhato, anattato anupassati no attato, nibbindati no nandati, virajjati no rajjati,
anya-e0102n:1662_4: nirodheti no samudeti, paṭinissajjati no ādiyati.
anya-e0102n:1663_0: “Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati. Dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ, anattato
anya-e0102n:1663_1: anupassanto attasaññaṃ, nibbindanto nandiṃ, virajjanto rāgaṃ, nirodhento samudayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1664: “Vedanārammaṇatā…pe… saññārammaṇatā… saṅkhārārammaṇatā… viññāṇārammaṇatā… cakkhārammaṇatā…pe… jarāmaraṇārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati…pe… paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1672: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1673: “Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, tena vuccati ‘ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa”’nti.
anya-e0102n:1674_0: 742. Tattha ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā, khayato
anya-e0102n:1674_1: vayato disvāti attho. Bhaṅgānupassane paññāti tassa, ārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato paṭisaṅkhāya
anya-e0102n:1674_2: uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassane yā paññā, idaṃ vipassane ñāṇanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ
anya-e0102n:1674_3: kathaṃ hotīti ayaṃ tāva kathetukamyatāpucchāya attho. Tato yathā taṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0102n:1675_0: Tattha rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti rūpārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1675_1: bhijjati. Atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti attho. Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1675_2: paṭisaṅkhāti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā, khayato vayato disvāti attho.
anya-e0102n:1675_3: Tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti yena cittena taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato
anya-e0102n:1675_4: diṭṭhaṃ, tassa cittassa aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti attho. Tenāhu porāṇā
anya-e0102n:1676: Ettha ca anupassatīti anu anu passati, anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatīti attho. Tenāha – “anupassatīti kathaṃ anupassati. Aniccato anupassatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:1677_0: Tattha yasmā bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi, tasmā so bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro
anya-e0102n:1677_1: sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato anupassati, no niccato. Tato aniccassa dukkhattā, dukkhassa
anya-e0102n:1677_2: ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato. Anattato anupassati no attato.
anya-e0102n:1678_0: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ. Yañca anabhinanditabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1678_1: na tattha rajjitabbaṃ. Tasmā etasmiṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n:1678_2: diṭṭhe saṅkhāragate nibbindati, no nandati. Virajjati, no rajjati. So evaṃ arajjanto
anya-e0102n:1678_3: lokikeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti, no samudeti. Samudayaṃ na karotīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1679_0: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ, tathā adiṭṭhampi anvayañāṇavasena
anya-e0102n:1679_1: nirodheti, no samudeti. Nirodhatova manasikaroti. Nirodhamevassa passati, no samudayanti attho.
anya-e0102n:1680_0: So evaṃ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ayampi aniccādianupassanā
anya-e0102n:1680_1: tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena
anya-e0102n:1680_2: ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
anya-e0102n:1680_3: cāti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu yathāvuttena nayena kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0102n:1680_4: nibbāne ca pakkhandati. Nāpi nibbattanavasena kilese ādiyati, na adosadassitāvasena
anya-e0102n:1681_0: 743. Idānissa tehi ñāṇehi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto
anya-e0102n:1681_1: niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nandinti sappītikaṃ taṇhaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0102n:1682_0: 744. Gāthāsu pana vatthusaṅkamanāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā puna yena cittena bhaṅgo
anya-e0102n:1682_1: diṭṭho, tassāpi bhaṅgadassanavasena purimavatthuto aññavatthusaṅkamanā. Paññāya ca
anya-e0102n:1682_2: vivaṭṭanāti udayaṃ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā. Āvajjanābalañcevāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā
anya-e0102n:1682_3: puna bhaṅgārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgadassanatthaṃ anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā.
anya-e0102n:1683_0: 745. Ārammaṇaanvayena ubho ekavavatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anvayena
anya-e0102n:1683_1: anugamanena yathā idaṃ, tathā atītepi saṅkhāragataṃ bhijjittha, anāgatepi bhijjissatīti
anya-e0102n:1689_0: Nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ bhaṅgavasena ekavavatthānaṃ katvā tasmiññeva
anya-e0102n:1689_1: bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti
anya-e0102n:1689_2: attho. Vayalakkhaṇavipassanāti esā vayalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1690_0: 746. Ārammaṇañca paṭisaṅkhāti purimañca rūpādiārammaṇaṃ jānitvā. Bhaṅgañca anupassatīti
anya-e0102n:1690_1: tassārammaṇassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati. Suññato
anya-e0102n:1690_2: ca upaṭṭhānanti tassevaṃ bhaṅgaṃ anupassato “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti, tesaṃ bhedo maraṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1690_3: na añño koci atthī”ti suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ ijjhati.
anya-e0102n:1696: Adhipaññāvipassanāti yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ, ayaṃ adhipaññāvipassanā nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1697_0: 747. Kusalo tīsu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanādīsu tīsu cheko bhikkhu. Catasso ca
anya-e0102n:1697_1: vipassanāsūti nibbidādīsu ca catūsu vipassanāsu. Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatāti khayato
anya-e0102n:1697_2: vayato suññatoti imasmiñca tividhe upaṭṭhāne kusalatāya. Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti
anya-e0102n:1698_0: 748. So evaṃ avedhamāno “aniruddhameva nirujjhati, abhinnameva bhijjatī”ti pavattamanasikāro
anya-e0102n:1698_1: dubbalabhājanassa viya bhijjamānassa, sukhumarajasseva vippakiriyamānassa, tilānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1698_2: viya bhajjiyamānānaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhitipavattanimittaṃ vissajjetvā bhedameva
anya-e0102n:1698_3: passati. So yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso pokkharaṇītīre vā nadītīre vā ṭhito thūlaphusitake
anya-e0102n:1698_4: deve vassante udakapiṭṭhe mahantamahantāni udakabubbuḷakāni uppajjitvā uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1698_5: sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjamānāni passeyya, evameva sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantīti
anya-e0102n:1698_6: passati. Evarūpaṃ hi yogāvacaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:1700: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1701_0: 749. Tassevaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantī”ti abhiṇhaṃ passato aṭṭhānisaṃsaparivāraṃ
anya-e0102n:1701_1: bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ balappattaṃ hoti. Tatrime aṭṭhānisaṃsā – bhavadiṭṭhippahānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1709_3: viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tassa “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n:1709_4: anāgate nibbattanakasaṅkhārāpi evameva nirujjhissantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1710_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – ekissā kira itthiyā tayo puttā rājaparādhikā, tesaṃ rājā sīsacchedaṃ
anya-e0102n:1710_1: āṇāpesi. Sā puttehi saddhiṃ āghātanaṃ agamāsi. Athassā jeṭṭhaputtassa sīsaṃ chinditvā
anya-e0102n:1710_2: majjhimassa chindituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Sā jeṭṭhassa sīsaṃ chinnaṃ majjhimassa ca chijjamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1710_3: disvā kaniṭṭhamhi ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1710_4: tassā itthiyā jeṭṭhaputtassa chinnasīsadassanaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1710_5: majjhimassa chijjamānasīsadassanaṃ viya paccuppannānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ, “ayampi etesaññeva
anya-e0102n:1710_6: sadiso bhavissatī”ti kaniṭṭhaputtamhi ālayavissajjanaṃ viya “anāgatepi nibbattanakasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1710_7: bhijjissantī”ti anāgatānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ. Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne uppajjati
anya-e0102n:1711_0: Aparāpi upamā – ekā kira pūtipajā itthī dasa dārake vijāyi. Tesu nava matā, eko hatthagato
anya-e0102n:1711_1: marati, aparo kucchiyaṃ. Sā nava dārake mate dasamañca mīyamānaṃ disvā kucchigate
anya-e0102n:1711_2: ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti. Tattha tassā itthiyā navannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1711_3: dārakānaṃ maraṇānussaraṇaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ, hatthagatassa
