anya-e0102n:1711_4: mīyamānabhāvadassanaṃ viya yogino paccuppannānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ, kucchigate ālayavissajjanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1711_5: viya anāgatānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ. Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ khaṇe uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1712_0: 751. Bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ pana bhāyati na bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati. Tañhi atītā saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1712_1: niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti, anāgatā nirujjhissantīti tīraṇamattameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:1712_2: Tasmā yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso nagaradvāre tisso aṅgārakāsuyo olokayamāno sayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1712_3: na bhāyati, kevalaṃ hissa “ye ye ettha nipatissanti, sabbe anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhavissantī”ti
anya-e0102n:1712_4: tīraṇamattameva hoti. Yathā vā pana cakkhumā puriso khadirasūlaṃ ayosūlaṃ suvaṇṇasūlanti
anya-e0102n:1712_5: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaṃ sūlattayaṃ olokayamāno sayaṃ na bhāyati, kevalaṃ hissa “ye ye
anya-e0102n:1712_6: imesu sūlesu nipatissanti, sabbe anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhavissantī”ti tīraṇamattameva
anya-e0102n:1712_7: hoti, evameva bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ sayaṃ na bhāyati, kevalaṃ hissa aṅgārakāsuttayasadisesu,
anya-e0102n:1712_8: sūlattayasadisesu ca tīsu bhavesu “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n:1712_9: anāgatā nirujjhissantī”ti tīraṇamattameva hoti. Yasmā panassa kevalaṃ sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatā
anya-e0102n:1712_10: saṅkhārā byasanāpannā sappaṭibhayā hutvā bhayato upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1713: Evaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāne panassa ayaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:1714_0: “Aniccato manasikaroto kiṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāti? Dukkhato. Anattato manasikaroto kiṃ
anya-e0102n:1714_1: bhayato upaṭṭhātīti? Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n:1714_2: pavattaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāti. Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1715_0: Tattha nimittanti saṅkhāranimittaṃ. Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānamevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1715_1: Aniccato manasikaronto hi saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇameva passati, tenassa nimittaṃ bhayato
anya-e0102n:1715_2: upaṭṭhāti. Pavattanti rūpārūpabhavapavatti. Dukkhato manasikaronto hi sukhasammatāyapi
anya-e0102n:1715_3: pavattiyā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanabhāvameva passati, tenassa pavattaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1715_4: Anattato manasikaronto pana ubhayampetaṃ suññagāmaṃ viya marīcigandhabbanagarādīni
anya-e0102n:1715_5: viya ca rittaṃ tucchaṃ suññaṃ assāmikaṃ apariṇāyakaṃ passati. Tenassa nimittañca
anya-e0102n:1718_0: 752. Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu
anya-e0102n:1718_1: neva tāṇaṃ, na leṇaṃ, na gati, nappaṭisaraṇaṃ paññāyati. Sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu
anya-e0102n:1718_2: saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti. Tayo bhavā vītaccikaṅgārapuṇṇaaṅgārakāsuyo
anya-e0102n:1718_3: viya, cattāro mahābhūtā ghoravisaāsīvisā viya, pañcakkhandhā ukkhittāsikavadhakā
anya-e0102n:1718_4: viya, cha ajjhattikāyatanāni suññagāmo viya, cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya,
anya-e0102n:1718_5: satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā
anya-e0102n:1718_6: viya ca, sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya
anya-e0102n:1718_7: ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n:1719_0: Kathaṃ? Sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva
anya-e0102n:1719_1: vanagahanaṃ, sasaddūlā viya guhā, sagāharakkhasaṃ viya udakaṃ, samussitakhaggā viya
anya-e0102n:1719_2: paccatthikā, savisaṃ viya bhojanaṃ, sacoro viya maggo, ādittamiva agāraṃ, uyyuttasenā
anya-e0102n:1719_3: viya raṇabhūmi. Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṃviggo
anya-e0102n:1719_4: lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati, evamevāyaṃ yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena
anya-e0102n:1719_5: sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṃ nirassādaṃ ādīnavameva passati.
anya-e0102n:1719_6: Tassevaṃ passato ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1720_0: “Kathaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ? Uppādo bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā
anya-e0102n:1720_1: ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ bhayanti… nimittaṃ bhayanti… āyūhanā bhayanti… paṭisandhi
anya-e0102n:1720_2: bhayanti… gati bhayanti… nibbatti bhayanti… upapatti bhayanti… jāti bhayanti… jarā
anya-e0102n:1720_3: bhayanti… byādhi bhayanti… maraṇaṃ bhayanti… soko bhayanti… paridevo bhayanti… upāyāso
anya-e0102n:1720_4: bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1720_5: Appavattaṃ…pe… anupāyāso khemanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khemanti
anya-e0102n:1720_6: santipade ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso bhayaṃ, anupāyāso khemanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1721_0: “Uppādo dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso dukkhanti
anya-e0102n:1721_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Anuppādo sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Appavattaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:1721_2: anupāyāso sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Uppādo dukkhaṃ, anuppādo sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1721_3: Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso dukkhaṃ, anupāyāso sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1722_0: “Uppādo sāmisanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso sāmisanti
anya-e0102n:1722_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Anuppādo nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Appavattaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:1722_2: anupāyāso nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Uppādo sāmisaṃ, anuppādo nirāmisanti santipade
anya-e0102n:1722_3: ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso sāmisaṃ, anupāyāso nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1723_0: Uppādo “saṅkhārāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso saṅkhārāti
anya-e0102n:1723_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ. Anuppādo nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Appavattaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:1723_2: anupāyāso nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Uppādo saṅkhārā, anuppādo nibbānanti santipade
anya-e0102n:1723_3: ñāṇaṃ. Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāso saṅkhārā, anupāyāso nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1730: Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1731: “Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ. Pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Tena vuccati “bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1732_0: 753. Tattha uppādoti purimakammapaccayā idha uppatti. Pavattanti tathā uppannassa
anya-e0102n:1732_1: pavatti. Nimittanti sabbampi saṅkhāranimittaṃ. Āyūhanāti āyatiṃ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:1732_2: kammaṃ. Paṭisandhīti āyatiṃ uppatti. Gatīti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. Nibbattīti
anya-e0102n:1732_3: khandhānaṃ nibbattanaṃ. Upapattīti “samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā”ti evaṃ vuttā
anya-e0102n:1732_4: vipākappavatti. Jātīti jarādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā bhavapaccayā jāti. Jarāmaraṇādayo pākaṭā
anya-e0102n:1732_5: eva. Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva ādīnavañāṇassa vatthuvasena vuttā. Sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasena.
anya-e0102n:1732_6: Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ. Gati upapattīti
anya-e0102n:1732_7: idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa. Jarādayo nimittassāti. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n:1734: Āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ, ñāṇaṃ ādīnave ida”nti ca.
anya-e0102n:1736_0: Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇantiādi pana ādīnavañāṇassa paṭipakkhañāṇadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:1736_1: vuttaṃ. Bhayatupaṭṭhānena vā ādīnavaṃ disvā ubbiggahadayānaṃ abhayampi atthi khemaṃ
anya-e0102n:1736_2: nirādīnavanti assāsajananatthampi etaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā panassa uppādādayo bhayato
anya-e0102n:1736_3: sūpaṭṭhitā honti, tassa tappaṭipakkhaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0102n:1737_0: Ettha ca yaṃ bhayaṃ, taṃ yasmā niyamato dukkhaṃ. Taṃ vaṭṭāmisalokāmisakilesāmisehi
anya-e0102n:1737_1: avippamuttattā sāmisameva. Yañca sāmisaṃ, taṃ saṅkhāramattameva. Tasmā “uppādo dukkhanti
anya-e0102n:1737_2: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi bhayākārena dukkhākārena
anya-e0102n:1737_3: sāmisākārenāti evaṃ ākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1738_0: Dasañāṇe pajānātīti ādīnavañāṇaṃ pajānanto uppādādivatthukāni pañca, anuppādādivatthukāni
anya-e0102n:1738_1: pañcāti dasa ñāṇāni pajānāti paṭivijjhati sacchikaroti. Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatāti
anya-e0102n:1738_2: ādīnavañāṇassa ceva santipadañāṇassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kusalatāya. Nānādiṭṭhīsu
anya-e0102n:1738_3: na kampatīti paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānādivasena pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
anya-e0102n:1741: 754. So evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passanto sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati.
anya-e0102n:1742_0: Seyyathāpi nāma, cittakūṭapabbatapādābhirato suvaṇṇarājahaṃso asucimhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe
anya-e0102n:1742_1: nābhiramati, sattasu mahāsaresuyeva abhiramati, evameva ayampi yogīrājahaṃso suparidiṭṭhādīnave
anya-e0102n:1742_2: sabhedake saṅkhāragate nābhiramati. Bhāvanārāmatāya pana bhāvanāratiyā samannāgatattā
anya-e0102n:1743_0: Yathā ca suvaṇṇapañjare pakkhitto sīho migarājā nābhiramati, tiyojanasahassavitthate
anya-e0102n:1743_1: pana himavanteyeva ramati, evamayaṃ yogīsīho tividhe sugatibhavepi nābhiramati, tīsu
anya-e0102n:1744_0: Yathā ca sabbaseto sattapatiṭṭho iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo chaddanto nāgarājā nagaramajjhe
anya-e0102n:1744_1: nābhiramati, himavati chaddantadahagahaneyeva abhiramati, evamayaṃ yogīvaravāraṇo
anya-e0102n:1744_2: sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nābhiramati, anuppādo khemantiādinā nayena diṭṭhe santipadeyeva
anya-e0102n:1746: 755. Taṃ panetaṃ purimena ñāṇadvayena atthato ekaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n:1747_0: “Bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhati, sabbasaṅkhāre bhayato addasāti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1747_1: nāma jātaṃ. Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu ādīnavaṃ uppādetīti ādīnavānupassanā nāma jātaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1747_2: Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu nibbindamānaṃ uppannanti nibbidānupassanā nāma jāta”nti.
anya-e0102n:1748: Pāḷiyampi vuttaṃ – “yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā, yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṃ, yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti.
anya-e0102n:1750_0: 756. Iminā pana nibbidāñāṇena imassa kulaputtassa nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa anabhiramantassa
anya-e0102n:1750_2: cittaṃ na sajjati, na laggati, na bajjhati, sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ
anya-e0102n:1750_3: hoti. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nāma jālabbhantaragato maccho, sappamukhagato maṇḍūko, pañjarapakkhitto
anya-e0102n:1750_4: vanakukkuṭo, daḷhapāsavasagato migo, ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappo, mahāpaṅkapakkhando
anya-e0102n:1750_5: kuñjaro, supaṇṇamukhagato nāgarājā, rāhumukhappaviṭṭho cando, sapattaparivārito purisoti
anya-e0102n:1750_6: evamādayo tato tato muccitukāmā nissaritukāmāva honti, evaṃ tassa yogino cittaṃ sabbasmā
anya-e0102n:1750_7: saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti. Athassa evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāresu vigatālayassa
anya-e0102n:1750_8: sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmassa uppajjati muñcitukamyatā ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n:1753_0: 757. So evaṃ sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsagatehi sabhedakehi saṅkhārehi muccitukāmo
anya-e0102n:1753_1: sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccituṃ puna te evaṃ saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1754_0: So sabbasaṅkhāre anaccantikato, tāvakālikato, uppādavayaparicchinnato, palokato,
anya-e0102n:1754_1: calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, vipariṇāmadhammato, assārakato, vibhavato, saṅkhatato,
anya-e0102n:1755_0: Abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato, dukkhavatthuto, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato,
anya-e0102n:1755_1: ābādhato, ītito, upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, atāṇato, aleṇato, asaraṇato, ādīnavato,
anya-e0102n:1755_2: aghamūlato, vadhakato, sāsavato, mārāmisato, jātidhammato, jarādhammato, byādhidhammato,
anya-e0102n:1755_3: sokadhammato, paridevadhammato, upāyāsadhammato, saṃkilesikadhammatotiādīhi kāraṇehi dukkhāti passati.
anya-e0102n:1756: Ajaññato, duggandhato, jegucchato, paṭikkūlato, amaṇḍanārahato, virūpato, bībhacchatotiādīhi kāraṇehi dukkhalakkhaṇassa parivārabhūtato asubhato passati.
anya-e0102n:1757: Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, assāmikato, anissarato, avasavattitotiādīhi kāraṇehi anattato passati.
anya-e0102n:1758: 758. Evañhi passatānena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhārā pariggahitā nāma honti. Kasmā panāyamete evaṃ pariggaṇhātīti? Muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1759_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira puriso “macche gahessāmī”ti macchakhippaṃ gahetvā udake
anya-e0102n:1759_1: oḍḍāpesi so khippamukhena hatthaṃ otāretvā antoudake sappaṃ gīvāya gahetvā “maccho
anya-e0102n:1759_2: me gahito”ti attamano ahosi. So “mahā vata mayā maccho laddho”ti ukkhipitvā passanto
anya-e0102n:1759_3: sovatthikattayadassanena sappoti sañjānitvā bhīto ādīnavaṃ disvā gahaṇe nibbinno
anya-e0102n:1759_4: muñcitukāmo hutvā muñcanassa upāyaṃ karonto agganaṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāya hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvā
anya-e0102n:1759_5: bāhuṃ ukkhipitvā uparisīse dve tayo vāre āvijjhitvā sappaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā “gaccha
anya-e0102n:1759_6: duṭṭha sappā”ti nissajjitvā vegena taḷākapāḷiṃ āruyha “mahantassa vata bho sappassa
anya-e0102n:1760_0: Tattha tassa purisassa “maccho”ti sappaṃ gīvāya gahetvā tuṭṭhakālo viya imassāpi
anya-e0102n:1760_1: yogino āditova attabhāvaṃ paṭilabhitvā tuṭṭhakālo, tassa khippamukhato sīsaṃ nīharitvā
anya-e0102n:1760_2: sovatthikattayadassanaṃ viya imassa ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1760_3: tassa bhītakālo viya imassa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ. Tato ādīnavadassanaṃ viya ādīnavānupassanāñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1760_4: gahaṇe nibbindanaṃ viya nibbidānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Sappaṃ muñcitukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1760_5: muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṃ viya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1760_6: Yathā hi so puriso sappaṃ āvijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā nivattetvā ḍaṃsituṃ asamatthabhāvaṃ
anya-e0102n:1760_7: pāpetvā sumuttaṃ muñcati, evamayaṃ yogāvacaro tilakkhaṇāropanena saṅkhāre āvijjhitvā
anya-e0102n:1760_8: dubbale katvā puna niccasukhasubhaattākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ asamatthataṃ pāpetvā sumuttaṃ
anya-e0102n:1760_9: muñcati. Tena vuttaṃ “muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṃ evaṃ pariggaṇhātī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1761: 759. Ettāvatā tassa uppannaṃ hoti paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1762_0: “Aniccato manasikaroto kiṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati? Dukkhato. Anattato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n:1762_1: kiṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati? Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1762_2: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattaṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Anattato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n:1763_0: Ettha ca nimittaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti saṅkhāranimittaṃ “addhuvaṃ tāvakālika”nti aniccalakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:1763_1: jānitvā. Kāmañca na paṭhamaṃ jānitvā pacchā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, vohāravasena pana “manañca
anya-e0102n:1763_2: paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”ntiādīni viya evaṃ vuccati. Ekattanayena
anya-e0102n:1763_3: vā purimañca pacchimañca ekaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iminā nayena itarasmimpi
anya-e0102n:1766_0: 760. So evaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena “sabbe saṅkhārā suññā”ti pariggahetvā puna
anya-e0102n:1766_1: “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”ti dvikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ pariggaṇhāti. So evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1766_2: neva attānaṃ, na paraṃ kiñci attano parikkhārabhāve ṭhitaṃ disvā puna “nāhaṃ kvacani,
anya-e0102n:1766_3: kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani, kismiñci kiñcanatatthī”ti yā ettha catukoṭikā
anya-e0102n:1767_0: Kathaṃ? Ayañhi nāhaṃ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṃ na passati. Kassaci kiñcanatasminti
anya-e0102n:1767_1: attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati. Bhātiṭṭhānevā
anya-e0102n:1767_2: bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upanetabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1767_3: na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacanīti
anya-e0102n:1767_4: parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci napassatīti ayamattho. Idāni mama-saddaṃ āharitvā mama kismiñci
anya-e0102n:1767_5: kiñcanatatthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passatīti.
anya-e0102n:1767_6: Attano bhātiṭṭhāne vā bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti
anya-e0102n:1767_7: kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1767_8: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1767_9: passati, na parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1767_10: passati. Tasmānena catukoṭikā suññatā pariggahitā hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1768_0: 761. Evaṃ catukoṭikaṃ suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna chahākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:1768_1: Kathaṃ? Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā
anya-e0102n:1768_2: avipariṇāmadhammena vā…pe… mano suñño. Rūpā suññā…pe… dhammā suññā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:1768_3: manoviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhusamphassoti evaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇā nayo netabbo.
anya-e0102n:1769_0: 762. Evaṃ chahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna aṭṭhahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1769_1: – rūpaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena
anya-e0102n:1769_2: vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Vedanā…
anya-e0102n:1769_3: saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena
anya-e0102n:1769_4: vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā
anya-e0102n:1769_5: sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Yathā naḷo asāro nissāro sārāpagato. Yathā eraṇḍo…
anya-e0102n:1769_6: yathā udumbaro… yathā setavaccho… yathā pāḷibhaddako… yathā pheṇapiṇḍo… yathā udakabubbuḷaṃ…
anya-e0102n:1769_7: yathā marīci… yathā kadalikkhandho… yathā māyā asārā nissārā sārāpagatā, evameva
anya-e0102n:1769_8: rūpaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā…pe… avipariṇāmadhammena vāti.
anya-e0102n:1770_0: 763. So evaṃ aṭṭhahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna dasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0102n:1770_1: rūpaṃ rittato passati. Tucchato… suññato… anattato… anissariyato… akāmakāriyato…
anya-e0102n:1770_2: alabbhanīyato… avasavattakato… parato… vivittato passati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ rittato…pe…
anya-e0102n:1771_0: 764. Evaṃ dasahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna dvādasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
anya-e0102n:1771_1: – rūpaṃ na satto, na jīvo, na naro, na māṇavo, na itthī, na puriso, na attā, na attaniyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1771_2: Nāhaṃ, na mama, na aññassa, na kassaci. Vedanā…pe… viññāṇaṃ na kassacīti.
anya-e0102n:1772_0: 765. Evaṃ dvādasahākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhitvā puna tīraṇapariññāvasena dvācattālīsāya
anya-e0102n:1772_1: ākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhāti, rūpaṃ aniccato… dukkhato… rogato… gaṇḍato… sallato…
anya-e0102n:1772_2: aghato… ābādhato… parato… palokato… ītito… upaddavato… bhayato… upasaggato… calato…
anya-e0102n:1772_3: pabhaṅguto… addhuvato… atāṇato… aleṇato… asaraṇato… asaraṇībhūtato… rittato… tucchato…
anya-e0102n:1772_4: suññato… anattato… anassādato… ādīnavato… vipariṇāmadhammato… assārakato… aghamūlato…
anya-e0102n:1772_5: vadhakato… vibhavato… sāsavato… saṅkhatato… mārāmisato… jātidhammato… jarādhammato…
anya-e0102n:1772_7: atthaṅgamato… anassādato … ādīnavato… nissaraṇato passati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe…
anya-e0102n:1773: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “rūpaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhati”.
anya-e0102n:1776: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1777_0: 766. Evaṃ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto bhayañca nandiñca
anya-e0102n:1777_1: vippahāya saṅkhāresu udāsīno ahosi majjhatto, ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhāti vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso.
anya-e0102n:1778_0: Yathā nāma purisassa bhariyā bhaveyya iṭṭhā kantā manāpā, so tāya vinā muhuttampi
anya-e0102n:1778_1: adhivāsetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya, ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya, so taṃ itthiṃ aññena purisena saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1778_2: ṭhitaṃ vā nisinnaṃ vā kathentiṃ vā hasantiṃ vā disvā kupito assa anattamano, adhimattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1778_3: domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya. So aparena samayena tassā itthiyā dosaṃ disvā muñcitukāmo
anya-e0102n:1778_4: hutvā taṃ vissajjeyya, na naṃ mamāti gaṇheyya. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ yenakenaci saddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1778_5: yaṃkiñci kurumānaṃ disvāpi neva kuppeyya, na domanassaṃ āpajjeyya, aññadatthu udāsīnova
anya-e0102n:1778_6: bhaveyya majjhatto. Evamevāyaṃ sabbasaṅkhārehi muñcitukāmo hutvā paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:1778_7: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto ahaṃ mamāti gahetabbaṃ adisvā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya
anya-e0102n:1779_0: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu
anya-e0102n:1779_1: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
anya-e0102n:1780_0: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakapoṇe udakaphusitāni patilīyanti patikuṭanti pativattanti
anya-e0102n:1780_1: na sampasāriyanti, evameva…pe… seyyathāpi nāma kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nahārudaddulaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:1780_2: aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, evameva tassa
anya-e0102n:1780_3: tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ…pe… upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Iccassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1781_0: 767. Taṃ panetaṃ sace santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati, sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1781_1: vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No ce nibbānaṃ santato passati, punappunaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva
anya-e0102n:1781_2: hutvā pavattati sāmuddikānaṃ disākāko viya. Sāmuddikā kira vāṇijakā nāvaṃ ārohantā
anya-e0102n:1781_3: disākākaṃ nāma gaṇhanti, te yadā nāvā vātakkhittā videsaṃ pakkhandati, tīraṃ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n:1781_4: tadā disākākaṃ vissajjenti. So kūpakayaṭṭhito ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā sabbā disā ca vidisā
anya-e0102n:1781_5: ca anugantvā sace tīraṃ passati, tadabhimukhova gacchati. No ce passati, punappunaṃ
anya-e0102n:1781_6: āgantvā kūpakayaṭṭhiṃyeva allīyati. Evameva sace saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1781_7: santato passati, sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No
anya-e0102n:1781_8: ce passati, punappunaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hutvā pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1782_0: Tadidaṃ suppagge piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viya. Nibbaṭṭitakappāsaṃ vihanamānaṃ viya nānappakārato
anya-e0102n:1782_1: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā bhayañca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāravicinane majjhattaṃ hutvā
anya-e0102n:1782_2: tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1783_0: 768. Tatridaṃ tividhānupassanāvasena pavattanato tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyavasena
anya-e0102n:1783_1: tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjati nāma. Tisso hi anupassanā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti vuccanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1784_0: “Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattanti, sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato
anya-e0102n:1784_1: samanupassanatāya, animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n:1784_2: manosamuttejanatāya, appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme
anya-e0102n:1784_3: parato samanupassanatāya, suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, imāni tīṇi
anya-e0102n:1785_0: Tattha paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
anya-e0102n:1785_1: Aniccānupassanaṃ hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ
anya-e0102n:1785_2: samannesamānaṃ “vayato paraṃ na gacchanti, ettheva antaradhāyantī”ti parivaṭumato
anya-e0102n:1785_3: samanupassati. Manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāya. Dukkhānupassanena hi saṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n:1785_4: cittaṃ saṃvejeti. Parato samanupassanatāyāti “nāhaṃ, na mamā”ti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāya.
anya-e0102n:1785_5: Iti imāni tīṇi padāni aniccānupassanādīnaṃ vasena vuttānīti veditabbāni. Teneva tadanantare
anya-e0102n:1785_6: pañhavissajjane vuttaṃ – “aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Dukkhato
anya-e0102n:1785_7: manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1786_0: 769. Katame pana te vimokkhā, yesaṃ imāni anupassanāni mukhānīti? Animitto, appaṇihito,
anya-e0102n:1786_1: suññatoti ete tayo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1786_2: vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati. Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1786_3: paṭilabhati. Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññatavimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1787_0: Ettha ca animitto vimokkhoti animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo.
anya-e0102n:1787_1: So hi animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto. Kilesehi ca vimuttattā vimokkho. Eteneva
anya-e0102n:1787_2: nayena appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihito. Suññatākārena
anya-e0102n:1787_3: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto suññatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1788_0: 770. Yaṃ pana abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1788_1: diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1788_2: upasampajja viharati appaṇihitaṃ suññata”nti evaṃ vimokkhadvayameva vuttaṃ, taṃ nippariyāyato
anya-e0102n:1788_3: vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāya. Vipassanāñāṇaṃ hi kiñcāpi paṭisambhidāmagge –
anya-e0102n:1789_0: “Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṃ niccato abhinivesaṃ muñcatīti suññato vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1789_1: sukhato abhinivesaṃ. Anattānupassanāñāṇaṃ attato abhinivesaṃ muñcatīti suññato vimokkho”ti
anya-e0102n:1789_2: evaṃ abhinivesaṃ muñcanavasena suññato vimokkhoti ca,
anya-e0102n:1790_0: “Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṃ niccato nimittaṃ muñcatīti animitto vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1790_1: sukhato nimittaṃ, anattānupassanāñāṇaṃ attato nimittaṃ muñcatīti animitto vimokkho”ti
anya-e0102n:1790_2: evaṃ nimittaṃ muñcanavasena animitto vimokkhoti ca,
anya-e0102n:1791_0: “Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṃ niccato paṇidhiṃ muñcatīti appaṇihito vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1791_1: sukhato paṇidhiṃ. Anattānupassanāñāṇaṃ attato paṇidhiṃ muñcatīti appaṇihito vimokkho”ti
anya-e0102n:1791_2: evaṃ paṇidhiṃ muñcanavasena appaṇihito vimokkhoti ca –
anya-e0102n:1792_0: Vuttaṃ. Tathāpi taṃ saṅkhāranimittassa avijahanato na nippariyāyena animittaṃ. Nippariyāyena
anya-e0102n:1792_1: pana suññatañceva appaṇihitañca. Tassa ca āgamanavasena ariyamaggakkhaṇe vimokkho
anya-e0102n:1792_2: uddhaṭo. Tasmā appaṇihitaṃ suññatanti vimokkhadvayameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1793_0: 771. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya paccayo hotī”ti, tattha saddhānusārī,
anya-e0102n:1793_1: saddhāvimutto, kāyasakkhi, ubhatobhāgavimutto, dhammānusārī, diṭṭhippatto, paññāvimuttoti
anya-e0102n:1793_2: ime tāva satta ariyapuggalā, tesaṃ vibhāgāya idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1794: 772. Yo hi aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī hoti. Sesesu sattasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto.
anya-e0102n:1795_0: 773. Yo pana dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo samādhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati, so
anya-e0102n:1795_1: sabbattha kāyasakkhi nāma hoti. Arūpajjhānaṃ pana patvā aggaphalappatto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1796: 774. Yo pana anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo paññindriyaṃ paṭilabhati, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī hoti. Chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto aggaphale paññāvimuttoti.
anya-e0102n:1798: “Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhati, tena vuccati saddhānusārī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1799: Tathā “aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti, tena vuccati saddhāvimutto”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:1801_0: “Saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikatoti kāyasakkhi. Diṭṭhantaṃ
anya-e0102n:1801_1: pattoti diṭṭhippatto. Saddahanto vimuccatīti saddhāvimutto. Jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0102n:1801_2: phusati pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhi. ‘Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho
anya-e0102n:1801_3: nirodho’ti ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phusitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto”ti.
anya-e0102n:1802_0: 777. Itaresu pana catūsu saddhaṃ anusarati, saddhāya vā anusarati gacchatīti saddhānusārī.
anya-e0102n:1802_1: Tathā paññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ anusarati, dhammena vā anusaratīti dhammānusārī. Arūpajjhānena
anya-e0102n:1802_2: ceva ariyamaggena cāti ubhatobhāgena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Pajānanto vimuttoti
anya-e0102n:1804_0: 778. Taṃ panetaṃ purimena ñāṇadvayena atthato ekaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā – “idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1804_1: ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhati, heṭṭhā muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ, majjhe paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1804_2: nāma, ante ca sikhāppattaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ nāma”.
anya-e0102n:1806_3: ñāṇaṃ. Uppādo dukkhanti…pe… bhayanti…pe… sāmisanti…pe… uppādo saṅkhārāti…pe… upāyāso
anya-e0102n:1807_0: 780. Tattha muñcitukamyatā ca sā paṭisaṅkhā ca santiṭṭhanā cāti muñcitukamyatā-paṭisaṅkhā-santiṭṭhanā.
anya-e0102n:1807_1: Iti pubbabhāge nibbidāñāṇena nibbinnassa uppādādīni pariccajitukāmatā muñcitukāmatā.
anya-e0102n:1807_2: Muñcanassa upāyakaraṇatthaṃ majjhe paṭisaṅkhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhā. Muñcitvā avasāne ajjhupekkhanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1807_3: santiṭṭhanā. Yaṃ sandhāya “uppādo saṅkhārā, te saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhatīti saṅkhārupekkhā”tiādi
anya-e0102n:1808_0: 781. Apica imāyapi pāḷiyā idaṃ ekamevāti veditabbaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “yā ca muñcitukamyatā,
anya-e0102n:1808_1: yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā, yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti.
anya-e0102n:1809_0: 782. Evaṃ adhigatasaṅkhārupekkhassa pana imassa kulaputtassa vipassanā sikhāppattā
anya-e0102n:1809_1: vuṭṭhānagāminī hoti. Sikhāppattā vipassanāti vā vuṭṭhānagāminīti vā saṅkhārupekkhādiñāṇattayasseva
anya-e0102n:1809_2: etaṃ nāmaṃ. Sā hi sikhaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ pattattā sikhāppattā. Vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0102n:1809_3: vuṭṭhānagāminī. Vuṭṭhānaṃ vuccati bahiddhānimittabhūtato abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva
anya-e0102n:1809_4: ajjhattapavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo, taṃ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī, maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1810_0: 783. Tatrāyaṃ abhinivesavuṭṭhānānaṃ āvibhāvatthāya mātikā – ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n:1810_1: ajjhattā vuṭṭhāti, ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n:1810_2: bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā ajjhattā vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā
anya-e0102n:1810_3: vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti, arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1810_4: arūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti, aniccato
anya-e0102n:1810_5: abhinivisitvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti, aniccato abhinivisitvā dukkhato, anattato vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1810_6: dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhato, aniccato, anattato vuṭṭhāti, anattato abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n:1811_0: 784. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco āditova ajjhattasaṅkhāresu abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā te
anya-e0102n:1811_1: passati. Yasmā pana na suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, bahiddhāpi
anya-e0102n:1811_2: daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā parassa khandhepi anupādiṇṇasaṅkhārepi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti
anya-e0102n:1811_3: passati. So kālena ajjhattaṃ sammasati, kālena bahiddhā. Tassevaṃ sammasato ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1811_4: sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati. Ayaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1812_0: Sace panassa bahiddhā sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati, ayaṃ ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1812_1: abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā ca
anya-e0102n:1813_0: 785. Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca rāsiṃ
anya-e0102n:1813_1: katvā passati. Yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, arūpampi
anya-e0102n:1813_2: daṭṭhabbameva. Tasmā taṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ saññaṃ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca
anya-e0102n:1813_3: “idaṃ arūpa”nti arūpaṃ passati. So kālena rūpaṃ sammasati, kālena arūpaṃ. Tassevaṃ
anya-e0102n:1813_4: sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati, ayaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1814: Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati, ayaṃ arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0102n:1815: 786. “Yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1816_0: 787. Eko āditova aniccato saṅkhāre sammasati. Yasmā pana na aniccato sammasanamatteneva
anya-e0102n:1816_1: vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, dukkhatopi anattatopi sammasitabbameva, tasmā dukkhatopi anattatopi
anya-e0102n:1816_2: sammasati. Tassevaṃ paṭipannassa aniccato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, ayaṃ aniccato
anya-e0102n:1817_0: Sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, ayaṃ aniccato abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n:1817_1: dukkhato, anattato vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisitvā sesavuṭṭhānesupi.
anya-e0102n:1818_0: 788. Ettha ca yopi aniccato abhiniviṭṭho, yopi dukkhato, yopi anattato, vuṭṭhānakāle
anya-e0102n:1818_1: ca aniccato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tayopi janā adhimokkhabahulā honti, saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e0102n:1818_2: animittavimokkhena vimuccanti, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārino honti, sattasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0102n:1818_3: saddhāvimuttā. Sace pana dukkhato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tayopi janā passaddhibahulā honti,
anya-e0102n:1818_4: samādhindriyaṃ paṭilabhanti, appaṇihitavimokkhena vimuccanti, sabbattha kāyasakkhino
anya-e0102n:1818_5: honti. Yassa panettha arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ, so aggaphale ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti.
anya-e0102n:1818_6: Atha nesaṃ anattato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tayopi janā vedabahulā honti, paññindriyaṃ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e0102n:1818_7: suññatavimokkhena vimuccanti, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārino honti, chasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0102n:1819: 789. Idāni saddhiṃ purimapacchimañāṇehi imissā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya āvibhāvatthaṃ dvādasa upamā veditabbā. Tāsaṃ idaṃ uddānaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1820: “Vaggulī kaṇhasappo ca, gharaṃ go yakkhi dārako;
anya-e0102n:1821: Khuddaṃ pipāsaṃ sītuṇhaṃ, andhakāraṃ visena cā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1822_0: Imā ca upamā bhayatupaṭṭhānato pabhuti yattha katthaci ñāṇe ṭhatvā āharituṃ vaṭṭeyyuṃ.
anya-e0102n:1822_1: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne āhariyamānāsu bhayatupaṭṭhānato yāva phalañāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0102n:1823_0: 790. Vaggulīti ekā kira vaggulī “ettha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā labhissāmī”ti pañcasākhe
anya-e0102n:1823_1: madhukarukkhe nilīyitvā ekaṃ sākhaṃ parāmasitvā na tattha kiñci pupphaṃ phalaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:1823_2: gayhupagaṃ addasa. Yathā ca ekaṃ, evaṃ dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ. Pañcamampi sākhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1823_3: parāmasitvā nāddasa. Sā “aphalo vatāyaṃ rukkho, natthettha kiñci gayhupaga”nti tasmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1823_4: rukkhe ālayaṃ vissajjetvā ujukāya sākhāya āruyha viṭapantarena sīsaṃ nīharitvā uddhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1823_5: ulloketvā ākāse uppatitvā aññasmiṃ phalarukkhe nilīyati.
anya-e0102n:1824_0: Tattha vagguli viya yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, pañcasākho madhukarukkho viya pañcupādānakkhandhā,
anya-e0102n:1824_1: tattha vagguliyā nilīyanaṃ viya yogino khandhapañcake abhiniveso, tassā ekekaṃ sākhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1824_2: parāmasitvā kiñci gayhupagaṃ adisvā avasesasākhāparāmasanaṃ viya yogino rūpakkhandhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1824_3: sammasitvā tattha kiñci gayhupagaṃ adisvā avasesakkhandhasammasanaṃ, tassā “aphalo
anya-e0102n:1824_4: vatāyaṃ rukkho”ti rukkhe ālayavissajjanaṃ viya yogino pañcasupi khandhesu aniccalakkhaṇādidassanavasena
anya-e0102n:1824_5: nibbinnassa muñcitukamyatādiñāṇattayaṃ, tassā ujukāya sākhāya upari ārohanaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1824_6: yogino anulomaṃ, sīsaṃ nīharitvā uddhaṃ ullokanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, ākāse uppatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1824_7: viya maggañāṇaṃ, aññasmiṃ phalarukkhe nilīyanaṃ viya phalañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1825_0: 791. Kaṇhasappupamā paṭisaṅkhāñāṇe vuttāva. Upamāsaṃsandane panettha sappavissajjanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1825_1: viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, muñcitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ, gantvā
anya-e0102n:1825_2: abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhānaṃ viya phalañāṇanti ayaṃ viseso.
anya-e0102n:1826_0: 792. Gharanti gharasāmike kira sāyaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ āruyha niddaṃ okkante gharaṃ
anya-e0102n:1826_1: ādittaṃ, so pabujjhitvā aggiṃ disvā “bhīto sādhu vatassa sace aḍayhamāno nikkhameyya”nti
anya-e0102n:1826_2: olokayamāno maggaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā vegena khemaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhito. Tattha gharasāmikassa
anya-e0102n:1826_3: bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ āruyha niddokkamanaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa khandhapañcake “ahaṃ
anya-e0102n:1826_4: mamā”ti gahaṇaṃ. Pabujjhitvā aggiṃ disvā bhītakālo viya sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā
anya-e0102n:1826_5: lakkhaṇaṃ disvā bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ, nikkhamanamaggaṃ olokanaṃ viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1826_6: maggadassanaṃ viya anulomaṃ, nikkhamanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, vegena gamanaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1827_0: 793. Goti ekassa kira kassakassa rattibhāge niddaṃ okkantassa vajaṃ bhinditvā goṇā
anya-e0102n:1827_1: palātā, so paccūsasamaye tattha gantvā olokento tesaṃ palātabhāvaṃ ñatvā anupadaṃ
anya-e0102n:1827_2: gantvā rañño goṇe addasa. Te “mayhaṃ goṇā”ti sallakkhetvā āharanto pabhātakāle “na
anya-e0102n:1827_3: ime mayhaṃ goṇā, rañño goṇā”ti sañjānitvā “yāva maṃ ‘coro aya’nti gahetvā rājapurisā
anya-e0102n:1827_4: na anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti, tāvadeva palāyissāmī”ti bhīto goṇe pahāya vegena palāyitvā
anya-e0102n:1827_5: nibbhayaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Tattha “mayhaṃ goṇā”ti rājagoṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa
anya-e0102n:1827_6: “ahaṃ mamā”ti khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, pabhāte “rājagoṇā”ti sañjānanaṃ viya yogino tilakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:1827_7: khandhānaṃ “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti sañjānanaṃ, bhītakālo viya bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1827_8: vissajjitvā gantukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatā, vissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhu, palāyanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1827_9: viya maggo, palāyitvā abhayadese ṭhānaṃ viya phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1828_0: 794. Yakkhīti eko kira puriso yakkhiniyā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi, sā rattibhāge
anya-e0102n:1828_1: “sutto aya”nti mantvā āmakasusānaṃ gantvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādati. So “kuhiṃ esā gacchatī”ti
anya-e0102n:1828_2: anubandhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādamānaṃ disvā tassā amanussibhāvaṃ ñatvā “yāva maṃ
anya-e0102n:1828_3: na khādati, tāva palāyissāmī”ti bhīto vegena palāyitvā khemaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1828_4: yakkhiniyā saddhiṃ saṃvāso viya khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ mamā”ti gahaṇaṃ, susāne manussamaṃsaṃ
anya-e0102n:1828_5: khādamānaṃ disvā “yakkhinī aya”nti jānanaṃ viya khandhānaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ disvā aniccādibhāvajānanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1828_6: bhītakālo viya bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ, palāyitukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatā, susānavijahanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1828_7: viya gotrabhu, vegena palāyanaṃ viya maggo, abhayadese ṭhānaṃ viya phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1829_0: 795. Dārakoti ekā kira puttagiddhinī itthī, sā uparipāsāde nisinnāva antaravīthiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1829_1: dārakasaddaṃ sutvā “putto nu kho me kenaci viheṭhiyatī”ti vegasā gantvā “attano putto”ti
anya-e0102n:1829_2: saññāya paraputtaṃ aggahesi. Sā “paraputto aya”nti sañjānitvā ottappamānā ito cito
anya-e0102n:1829_3: ca oloketvā “mā heva maṃ koci ‘dārakacorī aya’nti vadeyyā”ti dārakaṃ tattheva oropetvā
anya-e0102n:1829_4: puna vegasā pāsādaṃ āruyha nisīdi. Tattha attano puttasaññāya paraputtassa gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1829_5: viya “ahaṃ mamā”ti pañcakkhandhagahaṇaṃ, “paraputto aya”nti sañjānanaṃ viya tilakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:1829_6: “nāhaṃ, na mamā”ti sañjānanaṃ, ottappanaṃ viya bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ, ito cito ca olokanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1829_7: viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ, tattheva dārakassa oropanaṃ viya anulomaṃ, oropetvā antaravīthiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1829_8: ṭhitakālo viya gotrabhu, pāsādārūhanaṃ viya maggo, āruyha nisīdanaṃ viya phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1830_0: 796. Khuddaṃ pipāsaṃ sītuṇhaṃ, andhakāraṃ visena cāti imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
anya-e0102n:1830_2: Yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūto sujighacchito puriso sādurasaṃ bhojanaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1830_3: saṃsāravaṭṭajighacchāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1831: Yathā ca pipāsito puriso parisussamānakaṇṭhamukho anekaṅgasambhāraṃ pānakaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭapipāsāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggapānakaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1832: Yathā pana sītasamphuṭṭho puriso uṇhaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe taṇhāsinehasītena phuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesasantāpakaṃ maggatejaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1833: Yathā ca uṇhasamphuṭṭho puriso sītaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe ekādasaggisantāpasantatto yogāvacaro ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1834: Yathā pana andhakārapareto puriso ālokaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ avijjandhakārena onaddhapariyonaddho yogāvacaro ñāṇālokaṃ maggabhāvanaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1835_0: Yathā ca visasamphuṭṭho puriso visaghātanaṃ bhesajjaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ kilesavisasamphuṭṭho
anya-e0102n:1835_1: yogāvacaro kilesavisanimmathanaṃ amatosadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti. Tena vuttaṃ – “tassevaṃ
anya-e0102n:1835_2: jānato evaṃ passato tīsu bhavesu…pe… navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati
anya-e0102n:1835_3: pativattati na sampasāriyati. Upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Seyyathāpi nāma
anya-e0102n:1835_4: padumapalāse īsakapoṇe”ti sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1836: 797. Ettāvatā ca panesa patilīnacaro nāma hoti, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1841_0: Evamidaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ yogino patilīnacarabhāvaṃ niyametvā uttari ariyamaggassāpi
anya-e0102n:1841_2: visesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametīti vadanti. Keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā
anya-e0102n:1841_3: niyamentīti vadanti. Keci puggalajjhāsayo niyametīti vadanti. Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1842_0: 798. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi,
anya-e0102n:1842_1: samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi, paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:1842_2: pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikāva honti. Sabbesu satta
anya-e0102n:1842_3: bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti. Tesaṃ hi pubbabhāgavipassanā
anya-e0102n:1842_4: somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā
anya-e0102n:1842_5: somanassasahagatā hoti. Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu
anya-e0102n:1842_6: yathākkameneva jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta
anya-e0102n:1842_7: maggaṅgāni honti. Catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni. Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva
anya-e0102n:1842_8: vipassanāniyamena ca hoti. Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi
anya-e0102n:1842_9: hoti. Vuṭṭhānagāminī somanassasahagatāva. Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge
anya-e0102n:1842_10: pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
anya-e0102n:1842_11: Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiṃ hi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā
anya-e0102n:1842_12: vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti. Vuṭṭhānagāminī upekkhāsahagatāva. Arūpajjhānāni pādakaṃ
anya-e0102n:1842_13: katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo. Evaṃ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya yekeci saṅkhāre sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1842_14: nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti attano sadisabhāvaṃ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
anya-e0102n:1843_0: 799. Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1843_1: maggo nibbattito hoti, taṃtaṃsamāpattisadisova hoti. Tatrāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1844_0: 800. Tatiyattheravāde attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:1844_1: ye ye jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito, taṃtaṃjhānasadisova hoti. Pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1844_2: pana sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva taṃ na ijjhati. Svāyamattho nandakovādasuttena
anya-e0102n:1844_3: dīpetabbo. Etthāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Evaṃ tāva saṅkhārupekkhā
anya-e0102n:1845_0: 801. Sace panāyaṃ ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sappayogena sasaṅkhārena
anya-e0102n:1845_1: vikkhambhetuṃ asakkhi, dukkhāpaṭipadā nāma hoti. Vipariyāyena sukhāpaṭipadā. Kilese
anya-e0102n:1845_2: pana vikkhambhetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ maggapātubhāvaṃ saṇikaṃ kurumānā dandhābhiññā
anya-e0102n:1845_3: nāma hoti. Vipariyāyena khippābhiññā. Iti ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n:1845_4: attano attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti. Tena maggo cattāri nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0102n:1846_0: Sā panāyaṃ paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti, kassaci catūsupi maggesu ekāva.
anya-e0102n:1846_1: Buddhānaṃ pana cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva ahesuṃ. Tathā dhammasenāpatissa.
anya-e0102n:1846_2: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño ahosi. Upari
anya-e0102n:1846_3: tayo dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Yathā ca paṭipadā, evaṃ adhipatayopi kassaci bhikkhuno
anya-e0102n:1846_4: catūsu maggesu nānā honti. Kassaci catūsupi ekāva. Evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā paṭipadāvisesaṃ
anya-e0102n:1846_5: niyameti. Yathā pana vimokkhavisesaṃ niyameti, taṃ pubbe vuttameva.
anya-e0102n:1847_0: 802. Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena
anya-e0102n:1847_1: vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā. Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā
anya-e0102n:1847_2: vuṭṭhāti, animittavimokkhena vimuccati. Sace dukkhato sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, appaṇihitavimokkhena
anya-e0102n:1847_3: vimuccati. Sace anattato sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, suññatavimokkhena vimuccati. Idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1848_0: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni
anya-e0102n:1848_1: pajahanto āgato, tasmā animitto. Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṃ pahāya paṇidhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1848_2: patthanaṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito. Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1848_3: pahāya saṅkhārānaṃ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1849: Rāgādīhi panesa suññattā suññato, rūpanimittādīnaṃ rāganimittādīnaññeva vā abhāvena animitto, rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1850: Svāyaṃ suññaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati. Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1851_0: 803. Āgamanaṃ pana duvidhaṃ vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamanañca. Tattha magge vipassanāgamanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1851_1: labhati, phale maggāgamanaṃ. Anattānupassanā hi suññatā nāma, suññatavipassanāya
anya-e0102n:1851_2: maggo suññato, aniccānupassanā animittā nāma, animittavipassanāya maggo animitto.
anya-e0102n:1851_3: Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati, suttantapariyāyena labbhati. Tatra
anya-e0102n:1851_4: hi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā animittanāmakaṃ hutvā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n:1851_5: ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti. Tena maggo animittoti vutto. Maggāgamanena
anya-e0102n:1851_6: pana phalaṃ animittanti yujjatiyeva. Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā
anya-e0102n:1851_7: āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma, appaṇihitavipassanāya maggo appaṇihito, appaṇihitamaggassa
anya-e0102n:1851_8: phalaṃ appaṇihitaṃ. Evaṃ vipassanā attano nāmaṃ maggassa deti, maggo phalassāti idaṃ
anya-e0102n:1851_9: āgamanato nāmaṃ. Evamayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā vimokkhavisesaṃ niyametīti.
anya-e0102n:1854_0: 804. Tassa taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā
anya-e0102n:1854_1: balavatarā nibbattati, vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ hoti, sati sūpaṭṭhitā, cittaṃ susamāhitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1854_2: tikkhatarā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati. Tassa “dāni maggo uppajjissatī”ti saṅkhārupekkhā
anya-e0102n:1854_3: saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:1854_4: saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1854_5: kurumānaṃ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ. Tato bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppannassa tassa
anya-e0102n:1854_6: kiriyacittassānantaraṃ avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamānaṃ tatheva saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n:1854_7: ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati paṭhamaṃ javanacittaṃ, yaṃ parikammanti vuccati. Tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:1854_8: tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati dutiyaṃ javanacittaṃ, yaṃ upacāranti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1854_9: Tadanantarampi tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati tatiyaṃ javanacittaṃ, yaṃ
anya-e0102n:1854_10: anulomanti vuccati. Idaṃ nesaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1855_0: Avisesena pana tividhampetaṃ āsevanantipi parikammantipi upacārantipi anulomantipi
anya-e0102n:1855_1: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Kissānulomaṃ? Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgānaṃ. Tañhi purimānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1855_2: vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya ca anulometi, upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1855_4: vata dhammānaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādavaye addasā”ti ca, “bhaṅgavantānaṃyeva vata
anya-e0102n:1855_5: bhaṅgānupassanaṃ bhaṅgaṃ addasā”ti ca, “sabhayaṃyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato
anya-e0102n:1855_6: upaṭṭhita”nti ca, “sādīnaveyeva vata ādīnavānupassanaṃ ādīnavaṃ addasā”ti ca, “nibbinditabbeyeva
anya-e0102n:1855_7: vata nibbidāñāṇaṃ nibbinna”nti ca, “muñcitabbamhiyeva vata muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ muñcitukāmaṃ
anya-e0102n:1855_8: jāta”nti ca, “paṭisaṅkhātabbaṃyeva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta”nti ca, “upekkhitabbaṃyeva
anya-e0102n:1855_9: vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṃ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1855_10: ñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tāya
anya-e0102n:1856_0: Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinno vohārikamahāmattānaṃ vinicchayaṃ
anya-e0102n:1856_1: sutvā agatigamanaṃ pahāya majjhatto hutvā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa
anya-e0102n:1856_2: anulometi, porāṇassa ca rājadhammassa, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Rājā viya hi
anya-e0102n:1856_3: anulomañāṇaṃ, aṭṭha vohārikamahāmattā viya aṭṭha ñāṇāni, porāṇo rājadhammo viya sattatiṃsa
anya-e0102n:1856_4: bodhipakkhiyā. Tattha yathā rājā “evaṃ hotū”ti vadamāno vohārikānañca vinicchayassa,
anya-e0102n:1856_5: rājadhammassa ca anulometi, evamidaṃ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1856_6: aṭṭhannañca ñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1859_0: 805. Idañca pana anulomañāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1859_1: hoti. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1859_2: Idāni tassāyeva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya asammohatthaṃ ayaṃ suttasaṃsandanā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1861_1: nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā, taṃ pajahatha taṃ samatikkamathā”ti
anya-e0102n:1862: Alagaddasuttante “nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccatī”ti evaṃ nibbidāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1863: Susimasuttante “pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1864: Poṭṭhapādasuttante “saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇa”nti evaṃ saññagganti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1866: Paṭisambhidāmagge “yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1867: Paṭṭhāne “anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassā”ti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1868: Rathavinītasuttante “kiṃ panāvuso, paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1879_0: 806. Ito paraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ
anya-e0102n:1879_1: na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati, antarā abbohārikameva hoti. Vipassanāsote patitattā
anya-e0102n:1879_2: pana vipassanāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti
anya-e0102n:1879_3: imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1880_0: Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ tāva sampādetukāmena aññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ nāma natthi. Yañhi
anya-e0102n:1880_1: anena kātabbaṃ siyā, taṃ anulomāvasānaṃ vipassanaṃ uppādentena katameva. Evaṃ uppannaanulomañāṇassa
anya-e0102n:1880_2: panassa tehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādake
anya-e0102n:1880_3: tamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragatesu cittaṃ na pakkhandati, na santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n:1880_4: nādhimuccati, na sajjati, na laggati, na bajjhati. Padumapalāsato udakaṃ viya patilīyati
anya-e0102n:1880_5: patikuṭati pativattati. Sabbaṃ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṃ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato
anya-e0102n:1880_6: upaṭṭhāti. Athassa sabbasmiṃ nimittapavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite anulomañāṇassa
anya-e0102n:1880_7: āsevanante animittaṃ appavattaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1880_8: puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkamamānaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyasaṅkhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1880_11: sādhayamānaṃ sikhāppattaṃ vipassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ apunarāvaṭṭakaṃ uppajjati gotrabhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1882_0: “Kathaṃ bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā gotrabhuñāṇaṃ? Uppādaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu.
anya-e0102n:1882_1: Pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāsaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu. Bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti
anya-e0102n:1882_2: gotrabhu. Anuppādaṃ pakkhandatīti gotrabhu. Appavattaṃ…pe… anupāyāsaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1882_3: pakkhandatīti gotrabhu. Uppādaṃ abhibhuyyitvā anuppādaṃ pakkhandatīti gotrabhū”ti
anya-e0102n:1883_0: 807. Tatrāyaṃ ekāvajjanena ekavīthiyaṃ pavattamānānampi anulomagotrabhūnaṃ nānārammaṇe
anya-e0102n:1883_1: pavattanākāradīpikā upamā – yathā hi mahāmātikaṃ laṅghitvā paratīre patiṭṭhātukāmo
anya-e0102n:1883_2: puriso vegena dhāvitvā mātikāya orimatīre rukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṃ rajjuṃ
anya-e0102n:1883_3: vā yaṭṭhiṃ vā gahetvā ullaṅghitvā paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo hutvā paratīrassa
anya-e0102n:1883_4: uparibhāgaṃ patto taṃ muñcitvā vedhamāno paratīre patitvā saṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāti, evamevāyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1883_5: yogāvacaropi bhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsānaṃ paratīrabhūte nibbāne patiṭṭhātukāmo udayabbayānupassanādinā
anya-e0102n:1883_6: vegena dhāvitvā attabhāvarukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṃ rūparajjuṃ vā vedanādīsu
anya-e0102n:1883_7: aññataradaṇḍaṃ vā aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattāti vāti anulomāvajjanena gahetvā
anya-e0102n:1883_8: taṃ amuñcamānova paṭhamena anulomacittena ullaṅghitvā dutiyena paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo
anya-e0102n:1883_9: viya nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso hutvā tatiyena paratīrassa uparibhāgaṃ patto
anya-e0102n:1883_10: viya idāni pattabbassa nibbānassa āsanno hutvā tassa cittassa nirodhena taṃ saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1883_11: muñcitvā gotrabhucittena visaṅkhāre paratīrabhūte nibbāne patati. Ekārammaṇe pana
anya-e0102n:1883_12: aladdhāsevanatāya vedhamāno so puriso viya na tāva suppatiṭṭhito hoti, tato maggañāṇena patiṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0102n:1884_0: 808. Tattha anulomaṃ saccapaṭicchādakaṃ kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ sakkoti, na nibbānamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:1884_1: kātuṃ. Gotrabhu nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, na saccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ
anya-e0102n:1884_2: vinodetuṃ. Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira cakkhumā puriso “nakkhattayogaṃ jānissāmī”ti
anya-e0102n:1884_3: rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṃ passituṃ uddhaṃ ullokesi, tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā
anya-e0102n:1884_4: cando na paññāyittha. Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṃseti. Aparo
anya-e0102n:1884_5: majjhime, aparo sukhumeti. Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
anya-e0102n:1885_0: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumaṃ kilesandhakāraṃ,
anya-e0102n:1885_1: tayo vātā viya tīṇi anulomacittāni, cakkhumā puriso viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, cando viya
anya-e0102n:1885_2: nibbānaṃ, ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa
anya-e0102n:1885_3: saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ, vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1885_4: viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuñāṇassa visuddhanibbānadassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1886_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti, na candaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_1: daṭṭhuṃ, evaṃ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaññeva vinodetuṃ sakkonti, na nibbānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_2: daṭṭhuṃ. Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti, na valāhake viddhaṃsetuṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_3: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nibbānameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti, na kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ. Teneva cetaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_4: maggassa āvajjananti vuccati. Tañhi anāvajjanampi samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_5: nibbattāhī”ti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati. Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
anya-e0102n:1886_6: avīcisantativasena taṃ ñāṇaṃ anuppabandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_0: 809. Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā
anya-e0102n:1887_1: vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannahitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi. Añño puriso cakkayantaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_2: āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti, tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_3: deti. Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasataṃ nibbijjhati. Tattha
anya-e0102n:1887_4: daṇḍakasaññaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, issāso viya maggañāṇaṃ. Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_5: amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_6: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṃ apadālitapubbānaṃ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1888_0: 810. Na kevalañcesa maggo lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanameva karoti, apica kho anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭadukkhasamuddaṃ
anya-e0102n:1888_1: soseti, sabbaapāyadvārāni pidahati, sattannaṃ ariyadhanānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:1888_2: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ micchāmaggaṃ pajahati, sabbaverabhayāni vūpasameti, sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0102n:1888_3: orasaputtabhāvaṃ upaneti, aññesañca anekasatānaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ paṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti
anya-e0102n:1888_4: evaṃ anekānisaṃsadāyakena sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sotāpattimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n:1891_0: 811. Imassa pana ñāṇassa anantaraṃ tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni
anya-e0102n:1891_2: ca “dandhaṃ ānantarikaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ. Keci pana ekaṃ
anya-e0102n:1891_3: dve tīṇi cattāri vā phalacittānīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1892_0: Anulomassa hi āsevanante gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tasmā sabbantimena paricchedena
anya-e0102n:1892_1: dvīhi anulomacittehi bhavitabbaṃ. Na hi ekaṃ āsevanapaccayaṃ labhati, sattacittaparamā
anya-e0102n:1892_2: ca ekāvajjanavīthi. Tasmā yassa dve anulomāni, tassa tatiyaṃ gotrabhu catutthaṃ maggacittaṃ
anya-e0102n:1892_3: tīṇi phalacittāni honti. Yassa tīṇi anulomāni, tassa catutthaṃ gotrabhu pañcamaṃ
anya-e0102n:1892_4: maggacittaṃ dve phalacittāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ “dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1893_0: Keci pana yassa cattāri anulomāni, tassa pañcamaṃ gotrabhu chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0102n:1893_1: phalacittanti vadanti, taṃ pana yasmā catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appeti, na tato paraṃ
