anya-e0102n:2002_1: pajahati, sotaṃ chindati, bhaṇḍaṃ vahati, pārimatīraṃ appeti, evameva maggañāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:2002_2: nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayena abhisameti. Etthāpi yathā nāvā orimatīraṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:2002_3: evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānāti. Yathā sotaṃ chindati, evaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:2002_4: Yathā bhaṇḍaṃ vahati, evaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāya maggaṃ bhāveti. Yathā pārimatīraṃ
anya-e0102n:2002_5: appeti, evaṃ pārimatīrabhūtaṃ nirodhaṃ sacchikarotīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2003: 842. Evaṃ saccābhisamayakālasmiṃ ekakkhaṇe catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ vasena pavattañāṇassa panassa soḷasahākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni honti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:2004_0: “Kathaṃ tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni? Soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n:2004_1: cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni. Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:2004_2: vipariṇāmaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:2004_3: tathaṭṭho. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho, tathaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n:2004_4: Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, adhipateyyaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho. Imehi soḷasahi
anya-e0102n:2004_5: ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni. Yaṃ ekasaṅgahitaṃ, taṃ ekattaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2004_6: Yaṃ ekattaṃ, taṃ ekena ñāṇena paṭivijjhatīti cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhānī”ti.
anya-e0102n:2005_0: 843. Tattha siyā yadā dukkhādīnaṃ aññepi rogagaṇḍādayo atthā atthi, atha kasmā cattāroyeva
anya-e0102n:2005_1: vuttāti. Ettha vadāma, aññasaccadassanavasena āvibhāvato. “Tattha katamaṃ dukkhe
anya-e0102n:2005_2: ñāṇaṃ? Dukkhaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā”tiādinā hi nayena ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi
anya-e0102n:2005_3: saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, samudayampi so passatī”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:2005_4: nayena ekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā sesesupi kiccanipphattivasenāpi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2006_0: Tattha yadā ekekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadā samudayadassanena tāva sabhāvato
anya-e0102n:2006_1: pīḷanalakkhaṇassāpi dukkhassa, yasmā taṃ āyūhanalakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitaṃ saṅkhataṃ
anya-e0102n:2006_2: rāsikataṃ, tasmāssa so saṅkhataṭṭho āvibhavati. Yasmā pana maggo kilesasantāpaharo
anya-e0102n:2006_3: susītalo, tasmāssa maggassa dassanena santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati āyasmato nandassa accharādassanena
anya-e0102n:2006_4: sundariyā anabhirūpabhāvo viya. Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanenassa
anya-e0102n:2007_0: Tathā sabhāvato āyūhanalakkhaṇassāpi samudayassa, dukkhadassanena nidānaṭṭho āvibhavati
anya-e0102n:2007_1: asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena bhojanassa byādhinidānabhāvo viya. Visaṃyogabhūtassa
anya-e0102n:2007_2: nirodhassa dassanena saṃyogaṭṭho. Niyyānabhūtassa ca maggassa dassanena palibodhaṭṭhoti.
anya-e0102n:2008_0: Tathā nissaraṇalakkhaṇassāpi nirodhassa, avivekabhūtassa samudayassa dassanena vivekaṭṭho
anya-e0102n:2008_1: āvibhavati. Maggadassanena asaṅkhataṭṭho, iminā hi anamataggasaṃsāre maggo nadiṭṭhapubbo,
anya-e0102n:2008_2: sopi ca sappaccayattā saṅkhatoyevāti appaccayadhammassa asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo
anya-e0102n:2008_3: hoti. Dukkhadassanena panassa amataṭṭho āvibhavati, dukkhaṃ hi visaṃ, amataṃ nibbānanti.
anya-e0102n:2009_0: Tathā niyyānalakkhaṇassāpi maggassa, samudayadassanena “nāyaṃ hetu nibbānassa pattiyā,
anya-e0102n:2009_1: ayaṃ hetū”ti hetuṭṭho āvibhavati. Nirodhadassanena dassanaṭṭho, paramasukhumāni rūpāni
anya-e0102n:2009_2: passato “vippasannaṃ vata me cakkhū”nti cakkhussa vippasannabhāvo viya. Dukkhadassanena
anya-e0102n:2009_4: evamettha salakkhaṇavasena ekekassa, aññasaccadassanavasena ca itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0102n:2009_5: āvibhāvato ekekassa cattāro cattāro atthā vuttā. Maggakkhaṇe pana sabbe cete atthā
anya-e0102n:2009_6: ekeneva dukkhādīsu catukiccena ñāṇena paṭivedhaṃ gacchantīti. Ye pana nānābhisamayaṃ
anya-e0102n:2009_7: icchanti, tesaṃ uttaraṃ abhidhamme kathāvatthusmiṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0102n:2011: 844. Idāni yāni tāni pariññādīni cattāri kiccāni vuttāni, tesu –
anya-e0102n:2012: Tividhā hoti pariññā, tathā pahānampi sacchikiriyāpi;
anya-e0102n:2013: Dve bhāvanā abhimatā, vinicchayo tattha ñātabbo.
anya-e0102n:2014_0: 845. Tividhā hoti pariññāti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti evaṃ pariññā
anya-e0102n:2014_1: tividhā hoti. Tattha “abhiññāpaññā ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṃ uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā
anya-e0102n:2014_2: abhiññātā honti, te te dhammā ñātā hontī”ti evaṃ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n:2014_3: abhiññeyyaṃ. Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ? Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”ntiādinā
anya-e0102n:2014_4: nayena vitthārato vuttā ñātapariññā nāma. Tassā sappaccayanāmarūpābhijānanā āveṇikā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:2015_0: 846. “Pariññāpaññā tīraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṃ uddisitvā pana “ye ye dhammā pariññātā
anya-e0102n:2015_1: honti, te te dhammā tīritā hontī”ti evaṃ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, pariññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2015_2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ pariññeyyaṃ? Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, pariññeyya”ntiādinā nayena
anya-e0102n:2015_3: vitthārato vuttā tīraṇapariññā nāma. Tassā kalāpasammasanato paṭṭhāya aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti
anya-e0102n:2015_4: tīraṇavasena pavattamānāya yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:2016_0: 847. “Pahānapaññā pariccāgaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṃ pana uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā pahīnā
anya-e0102n:2016_1: honti, te te dhammā pariccattā hontī”ti evaṃ vitthārato vuttā “aniccānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:2016_2: niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādinayappavattā pahānapariññā. Tassā bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n:2016_3: yāva maggañāṇā bhūmi, ayaṃ idha adhippetā.
anya-e0102n:2017_0: Yasmā vā ñātatīraṇapariññāyopi tadatthāyeva, yasmā ca ye dhamme pajahati, te niyamato
anya-e0102n:2017_1: ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti, tasmā pariññāttayampi iminā pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2018_0: 848. Tathā pahānampīti pahānampi hi vikkhambhanappahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ samucchedappahānanti
anya-e0102n:2018_1: pariññā viya tividhameva hoti. Tattha yaṃ sasevāle udake pakkhittena ghaṭena sevālassa
anya-e0102n:2018_2: viya tena tena lokiyasamādhinā nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0102n:2018_3: vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “vikkhambhanappahānañca nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0102n:2018_4: jhānaṃ bhāvayato”ti nīvaraṇānaññeva vikkhambhanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pākaṭattā vuttanti
anya-e0102n:2018_5: veditabbaṃ. Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānassa pubbabhāgepi pacchābhāgepi na sahasā cittaṃ ajjhottharanti,
anya-e0102n:2018_6: vitakkādayo appitakkhaṇeyeva. Tasmā nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2019_0: 849. Yaṃ pana rattibhāge samujjalitena padīpena andhakārassa viya tena tena vipassanāya
anya-e0102n:2019_1: avayavabhūtena ñāṇaṅgena paṭipakkhavaseneva tassa tassa pahātabbadhammassa pahānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2019_2: idaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ nāma. Seyyathidaṃ – nāmarūpaparicchedena tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0102n:2019_3: Paccayapariggahena ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhiyā ceva kaṅkhāmalassa ca. Kalāpasammasanena
anya-e0102n:2019_4: “ahaṃ mamā”ti samūhagāhassa. Maggāmaggavavatthānena amagge maggasaññāya. Udayadassanena
anya-e0102n:2019_5: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā. Bhayatupaṭṭhānena sabhaye abhayasaññāya.
anya-e0102n:2020_0: Yaṃ vā pana aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya. Dukkhānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:2020_1: sukhasaññāya. Anattānupassanāya attasaññāya. Nibbidānupassanāya nandiyā. Virāgānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:2020_2: rāgassa. Nirodhānupassanāya samudayassa. Paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānassa. Khayānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:2020_3: ghanasaññāya. Vayānupassanāya āyūhanassa. Vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññāya. Animittānupassanāya
anya-e0102n:2020_4: nimittassa. Appaṇihitānupassanāya paṇidhiyā. Suññatānupassanāya abhinivesassa. Adhipaññādhammavipassanāya
anya-e0102n:2021: 850. Tattha yathā aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ bhaṅgānupassane vuttameva.
anya-e0102n:2022: Khayānupassanāti pana ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti evaṃ khayaṃ passato ñāṇaṃ. Tena ghanasaññāya pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2026_0: Evaṃ vuttā paccakkhato ceva anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ disvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte
anya-e0102n:2026_1: nirodhe adhimuttatā, tāya āyūhanassa pahānaṃ hoti. Yesaṃ hi atthāya āyūheyya, “te
anya-e0102n:2026_2: evaṃ vayadhammā”ti vipassato āyūhane cittaṃ na namati.
anya-e0102n:2027_0: Vipariṇāmānupassanāti rūpasattakādivasena taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ atikkamma aññathāpavattidassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2027_1: Uppannassa vā jarāya ceva maraṇena ca dvīhākārehi vipariṇāmadassanaṃ, tāya dhuvasaññāya pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2028: Animittānupassanāti aniccānupassanāva, tāya niccanimittassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2030: Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanāva, tāya “atthi attā”ti abhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2034_0: Evaṃ vuttā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ jānitvā tassa ca ārammaṇassa tadārammaṇassa ca cittassa
anya-e0102n:2034_1: bhaṅgaṃ disvā “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti, saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇaṃ, na añño koci atthī”ti bhaṅgavasena
anya-e0102n:2034_2: suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā. Sā adhipaññā ca dhammesu ca vipassanāti katvā
anya-e0102n:2034_3: adhipaññādhammavipassanāti vuccati, tāya niccasārābhāvassa ca attasārābhāvassa ca
anya-e0102n:2035_0: Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho, tena “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādivasena
anya-e0102n:2035_1: ceva, “issarato loko sambhotī”tiādivasena ca pavattassa sammohābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2036: Ādīnavānupassanāti bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppannaṃ sabbabhavādīsu ādīnavadassanañāṇaṃ, tena “kiñci allīyitabbaṃ na dissatī”ti ālayābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2037: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāti muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ, tena appaṭisaṅkhāya pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2038_0: Vivaṭṭānupassanāti saṅkhārupekkhā ceva anulomañca. Tadā hissa cittaṃ īsakapoṇe padumapalāse
anya-e0102n:2038_1: udakabindu viya sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā patilīyati, patikuṭati, pativattatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2038_2: Tasmā tāya saṃyogābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti, kāmasaṃyogādikassa kilesābhinivesassa
anya-e0102n:2038_3: kilesappavattiyā pahānaṃ hotīti attho. Evaṃ vitthārato tadaṅgappahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2038_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “tadaṅgappahānañca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato”ti
anya-e0102n:2039_0: 851. Yaṃ pana asanivicakkābhihatassa rukkhassa viya ariyamaggañāṇena saṃyojanādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:2039_1: dhammānaṃ yathā na puna pavatti, evaṃ pahānaṃ, idaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ
anya-e0102n:2039_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ “samucchedappahānañca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato”ti. Iti
anya-e0102n:2039_3: imesu tīsu pahānesu samucchedappahānameva idha adhippetaṃ. Yasmā pana tassa yogino
anya-e0102n:2039_4: pubbabhāge vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānipi tadatthāneva, tasmā pahānattayampi iminā
anya-e0102n:2039_5: pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṃ. Paṭirājānaṃ vadhitvā rajjaṃ pattena
anya-e0102n:2039_6: hi yampi tato pubbe kataṃ, sabbaṃ “idañcidañca raññā kata”ntiyeva vuccati.
anya-e0102n:2040_1: lokuttarāya dassanabhāvanāvasena bhedato tividhā hoti. Tattha “paṭhamassa jhānassa
anya-e0102n:2040_2: lābhīmhi, vasīmhi, paṭhamajjhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”tiādinā nayena āgatā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:2040_3: phassanā lokiyasacchikiriyā nāma. Phassanāti adhigantvā “idaṃ mayā adhigata”nti paccakkhato
anya-e0102n:2040_4: ñāṇaphassena phusanā. Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya “sacchikiriyā paññā phassanaṭṭhe
anya-e0102n:2040_5: ñāṇa”nti uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti, te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti
anya-e0102n:2041_0: Apica attano santāne anuppādetvāpi ye dhammā kevalaṃ aparappaccayena ñāṇena ñātā,
anya-e0102n:2041_1: te sacchikatā honti. Teneva hi “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbaṃ. Kiñca, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n:2041_2: sabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ? Cakkhu, bhikkhave, sacchikātabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2042_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “rūpaṃ passanto sacchikaroti. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ passanto sacchikaroti.
anya-e0102n:2042_1: Cakkhuṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ…pe… amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ passanto sacchikarotīti. Ye ye dhammā
anya-e0102n:2042_2: sacchikatā honti, te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti.
anya-e0102n:2043_0: Paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe pana nibbānadassanaṃ dassanasacchikiriyā. Sesamaggakkhaṇesu bhāvanāsacchikiriyāti.
anya-e0102n:2043_1: Sā duvidhāpi idha adhippetā. Tasmā dassanabhāvanāvasena nibbānassa sacchikiriyā imassa
anya-e0102n:2044_0: 853. Dve bhāvanā abhimatāti bhāvanā pana lokiyabhāvanā lokuttarabhāvanāti dveyeva
anya-e0102n:2044_1: abhimatā. Tattha lokiyānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññānaṃ uppādanaṃ, tāhi ca santānavāsanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2044_2: lokiyabhāvanā. Lokuttarānaṃ uppādanaṃ, tāhi ca santānavāsanaṃ lokuttarabhāvanā. Tāsu
anya-e0102n:2044_3: idha lokuttarā adhippetā. Lokuttarāni hi sīlādīni catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0102n:2044_4: Tesaṃ sahajātapaccayāditāya tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetīti lokuttarabhāvanāvassa kiccanti.
anya-e0102n:2049: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti. –
anya-e0102n:2050_0: Evaṃ sarūpeneva ābhatāya paññābhāvanāya vidhānadassanatthaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ “mūlabhūtā
anya-e0102n:2050_1: dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā”ti,
anya-e0102n:2050_2: taṃ vitthāritaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ bhāvetabbāti ayañca pañho vissajjitoti.
anya-e0102n:2057_0: 854. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṃso”ti, tattha vadāma. Ayañhi paññābhāvanā
anya-e0102n:2057_1: nāma anekasatānisaṃsā. Tassā dīghenāpi addhunā na sukaraṃ vitthārato ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetuṃ.
anya-e0102n:2059_0: 855. Tattha yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena nānākilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2059_1: vuttaṃ, ayaṃ lokikāya paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso. Yaṃ ariyamaggakkhaṇe saṃyojanādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:2059_2: vasena nānākilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ vuttaṃ, ayaṃ lokuttarāya paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:2067_1: paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso. Ariyaphalanti hi sotāpattiphalādi sāmaññaphalaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0102n:2067_2: Tassa dvīhākārehi rasānubhavanaṃ hoti. Maggavīthiyañca phalasamāpattivasena ca pavattiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2068_0: 857. Apica ye “saṃyojanappahānamattameva phalaṃ nāma, na koci añño dhammo atthī”ti
anya-e0102n:2068_1: vadanti, tesaṃ anunayatthaṃ idaṃ suttampi dassetabbaṃ – “kathaṃ payogapaṭippassaddhipaññā
anya-e0102n:2068_2: phale ñāṇaṃ? Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:2068_3: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:2068_4: Tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā uppajjati sammādiṭṭhi, maggassetaṃ phala”nti vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2069_0: “Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”.
anya-e0102n:2069_1: “Mahaggato dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādīnipi cettha sādhakāni.
anya-e0102n:2070_0: 858. Phalasamāpattiyaṃ pavattidassanatthaṃ panassa idaṃ pañhākammaṃ – kā phalasamāpatti,
anya-e0102n:2070_1: ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjanti, kasmā samāpajjanti, kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2070_2: hoti, kathaṃ ṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ phalassa anantaraṃ, kassa ca phalaṃ anantaranti?
anya-e0102n:2071: 859. Tattha kā phalasamāpattīti yā ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanā.
anya-e0102n:2072_0: 860. Ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n:2072_1: Kasmā? Anadhigatattā. Ariyā pana sabbepi samāpajjanti. Kasmā? Adhigatattā. Uparimā
anya-e0102n:2072_2: pana heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjanti, puggalantarabhāvupagamanena paṭippassaddhattā. Heṭṭhimā
anya-e0102n:2072_3: ca uparimaṃ, anadhigatattā. Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṃ samāpajjantīti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2073_0: Keci pana “sotāpannasakadāgāminopi na samāpajjanti. Uparimā dveyeva samāpajjantī”ti
anya-e0102n:2073_1: vadanti. Idañca tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, ete hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārinoti. Taṃ puthujjanassāpi
anya-e0102n:2073_3: Nanu pāḷiyaṃyeva vuttaṃ – “katame dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti?
anya-e0102n:2073_4: Sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ…pe… upāyāsaṃ bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṃ
anya-e0102n:2073_7: saṅkhāranimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhū”ti. Tasmā sabbepi ariyā attano attano phalaṃ
anya-e0102n:2074_0: 861. Kasmā samāpajjantīti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ. Yathā hi rājā rajjasukhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2074_1: devatā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti, evaṃ ariyā “ariyaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ anubhavissāmā”ti
anya-e0102n:2075_0: 862. Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ hoti, kathaṃ ṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ vuṭṭhānanti dvīhi tāva
anya-e0102n:2075_1: ākārehi assā samāpajjanaṃ hoti – nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā nibbānassa
anya-e0102n:2075_2: ca manasikārā. Yathāha – “dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā
anya-e0102n:2075_3: sabbanimittānañca amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro”ti.
anya-e0102n:2076_0: 863. Ayampanettha samāpajjanakkamo. Phalasamāpattatthikena hi ariyasāvakena rahogatena
anya-e0102n:2076_1: paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā. Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa
anya-e0102n:2076_2: saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantarā phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appeti. Phalasamāpattininnatāya
anya-e0102n:2076_3: cettha sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
anya-e0102n:2077_0: Ye pana vadanti “sotāpanno ‘phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjissāmī’ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n:2077_1: sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī”ti, te vattabbā “evaṃ sati anāgāmī arahā bhavissati,
anya-e0102n:2077_2: arahā paccekabuddho, paccekabuddho ca buddho. Tasmā na kiñci etaṃ, pāḷivaseneva ca
anya-e0102n:2077_3: paṭikkhitta”ntipi na gahetabbaṃ. Idameva pana gahetabbaṃ – sekkhassāpi phalameva
anya-e0102n:2077_4: uppajjati, na maggo. Phalañcassa sace anena paṭhamajjhāniko maggo adhigato hoti.
anya-e0102n:2077_5: Paṭhamajjhānikameva uppajjati. Sace dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhāniko, dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikamevāti.
anya-e0102n:2078_0: 864. “Tayo kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā sabbanimittānañca
anya-e0102n:2078_1: amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro, pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāro”ti vacanato
anya-e0102n:2078_2: panassā tīhākārehi ṭhānaṃ hoti. Tattha pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti samāpattito pubbe
anya-e0102n:2078_3: kālaparicchedo. “Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti paricchinnattā hissā yāva so
anya-e0102n:2078_4: kālo nāgacchati, tāva ṭhānaṃ hoti. Evamassā ṭhānaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0102n:2079_0: 865. “Dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā vuṭṭhānāya sabbanimittānañca
anya-e0102n:2079_1: manasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā amanasikāro”ti vacanato panassā dvīhākārehi vuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:2079_3: na sabbānevetāni ekato manasikaroti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ
anya-e0102n:2079_4: bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ manasikaroto phalasamāpattivuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti evamassā
anya-e0102n:2080_0: 866. Kiṃ phalassa anantaraṃ, kassa ca phalaṃ anantaranti phalassa tāva phalameva
anya-e0102n:2080_1: vā anantaraṃ hoti, bhavaṅgaṃ vā. Phalaṃ pana atthi maggānantaraṃ, atthi phalānantaraṃ,
anya-e0102n:2080_2: atthi gotrabhuanantaraṃ, atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaraṃ. Tattha maggavīthiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:2080_3: maggānantaraṃ, purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ phalānantaraṃ. Phalasamāpattīsu
anya-e0102n:2080_4: purimaṃ purimaṃ gotrabhuanantaraṃ. Gotrabhūti cettha anulomaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0102n:2080_5: paṭṭhāne – “arahato anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sekkhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:2080_6: anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti. Yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:2080_7: hoti, taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaranti. Tattha ṭhapetvā maggavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:2080_8: phalaṃ avasesaṃ sabbaṃ phalasamāpattivasena pavattaṃ nāma. Evametaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:2086: Phalassa paññaṃ bhāvetvā, yasmā vindati paṇḍito.
anya-e0102n:2090_1: ayaṃ pana nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanasamatthatāpi imissā paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:2091_0: Tatridaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā vibhāvanatthaṃ pañhākammaṃ – kā nirodhasamāpatti, ke
anya-e0102n:2091_1: taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjanti, kattha samāpajjanti, kasmā samāpajjanti, kathañcassā
anya-e0102n:2091_2: samāpajjanaṃ hoti, kathaṃ ṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, vuṭṭhitassa kiṃninnaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0102n:2091_3: hoti, matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso, nirodhasamāpatti kiṃ saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā
anya-e0102n:2092_0: 868. Tattha kā nirodhasamāpattīti yā anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:2092_1: appavatti. Ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanā, sotāpannā,
anya-e0102n:2092_2: sakadāgāmino, sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmino, arahanto na samāpajjanti. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino
anya-e0102n:2092_3: pana anāgāmino, khīṇāsavā ca samāpajjanti. “Dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā, tayo ca
anya-e0102n:2092_4: saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā, soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi, navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā
anya-e0102n:2092_5: paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti hi vuttaṃ. Ayañca sampadā ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino
anya-e0102n:2092_6: anāgāmikhīṇāsave aññesaṃ natthi. Tasmā teyeva samāpajjanti, na aññe.
anya-e0102n:2093: 869. Katamāni panettha dve balāni…pe… katamā vasībhāvatāti? Na ettha kiñci amhehi vattabbaṃ atthi. Sabbamidaṃ etassa uddesassa niddese vuttameva. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:2094_0: “Dvīhi balehīti dve balāni samathabalaṃ vipassanābalaṃ. Katamaṃ samathabalaṃ? Nekkhammavasena
anya-e0102n:2094_1: cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ. Abyāpādavasena… ālokasaññāvasena… avikkhepavasena…pe…
anya-e0102n:2094_3: avikkhepo samathabalanti. Kenaṭṭhena samathabalaṃ? Paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇe na kampatīti
anya-e0102n:2094_5: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya na kampatīti samathabalaṃ. Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese
anya-e0102n:2094_6: ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti samathabalaṃ. Idaṃ samathabalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2095_2: Rūpe aniccānupassanā…pe… rūpe paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ. Vedanāya… saññāya…
anya-e0102n:2095_3: saṅkhāresu… viññāṇe… cakkhusmiṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā. Jarāmaraṇe paṭinissaggānupassanā
anya-e0102n:2095_4: vipassanābalanti. Kenaṭṭhena vipassanābalaṃ? Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya na kampatīti
anya-e0102n:2095_5: vipassanābalaṃ. Dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññāya na kampatīti… anattānupassanāya attasaññāya
anya-e0102n:2095_6: na kampatīti… nibbidānupassanāya nandiyā na kampatīti… virāgānupassanāya rāge na
anya-e0102n:2095_7: kampatīti… nirodhānupassanāya samudaye na kampatīti… paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādāne
anya-e0102n:2095_8: na kampatīti vipassanābalaṃ. Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati
anya-e0102n:2095_9: na calati na vedhatīti vipassanābalaṃ. Idaṃ vipassanābalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2096_0: “Tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyāti katamesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā?
anya-e0102n:2096_1: Dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Catutthaṃ
anya-e0102n:2096_2: jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ
anya-e0102n:2096_3: samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Imesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ
anya-e0102n:2097_0: “Soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhīti katamāhi soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi? Aniccānupassanā ñāṇacariyā.
anya-e0102n:2097_1: Dukkhā… anattā… nibbidā… virāgā… nirodhā… paṭinissaggā… vivaṭṭānupassanā ñāṇacariyā.
anya-e0102n:2098_0: “Navahi samādhicariyāhīti katamāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi? Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samādhicariyā.
anya-e0102n:2098_2: vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ
anya-e0102n:2098_3: paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca. Imāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi.
anya-e0102n:2099_0: “Vasīti pañca vasiyo – āvajjanavasī, samāpajjanavasī, adhiṭṭhānavasī, vuṭṭhānavasī,
anya-e0102n:2099_1: paccavekkhaṇavasī. Paṭhamajjhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:2099_2: āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti āvajjanavasī. Paṭhamajjhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ
anya-e0102n:2099_3: yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjati, samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti samāpajjanavasī…pe…
anya-e0102n:2099_4: adhiṭṭhāti adhiṭṭhāne…pe… vuṭṭhāti vuṭṭhāne…pe… paccavekkhati paccavekkhaṇāya dandhāyitattaṃ
anya-e0102n:2099_6: yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ āvajjati …pe… paccavekkhati. Paccavekkhaṇāya dandhāyitattaṃ
anya-e0102n:2100_0: 870. Ettha ca “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī”ti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso esa. Anāgāmino pana cuddasahi
anya-e0102n:2100_1: ñāṇacariyāhi hoti. Yadi evaṃ sakadāgāmino dvādasahi sotāpannassa ca dasahi kiṃ na
anya-e0102n:2100_2: hotīti? Na hoti, samādhipāribandhikassa pañca kāmaguṇikarāgassa appahīnattā. Tesaṃ
anya-e0102n:2100_3: hi so appahīno. Tasmā samathabalaṃ na paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ aparipūre dvīhi balehi
anya-e0102n:2100_4: samāpajjitabbaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ balavekallena samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti. Anāgāmissa
anya-e0102n:2100_5: pana so pahīno, tasmā esa paripuṇṇabalo hoti. Paripuṇṇabalattā sakkoti. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0102n:2100_7: paccayo”ti. Idañhi paṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0102n:2101_1: Catuvokārabhave pana paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppatti natthi. Tasmā na sakkā tattha samāpajjitunti.
anya-e0102n:2102: 872. Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā diṭṭheva dhamme acittakā hutvā “nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n:2103_0: 873. Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ hotīti samathavipassanāvasena ussakkitvā katapubbakiccassa
anya-e0102n:2103_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodhayato, evamassa samāpajjanaṃ hoti. Yo hi samathavaseneva
anya-e0102n:2103_2: ussakkati, so nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati. Yo pana vipassanāvaseneva
anya-e0102n:2103_3: ussakkati, so phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati. Yo pana ubhayavaseneva ussakkitvā pubbakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:2103_4: katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodheti, so taṃ samāpajjatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0102n:2104_0: 874. Ayaṃ pana vitthāro – idha bhikkhu nirodhaṃ samāpajjitukāmo katabhattakicco sudhotahatthapādo
anya-e0102n:2104_1: vivitte okāse supaññattamhi āsane nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya
anya-e0102n:2104_2: parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā, so paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n:2105_0: Vipassanā panesā tividhā hoti – saṅkhāraparigaṇhanakavipassanā, phalasamāpattivipassanā,
anya-e0102n:2105_1: nirodhasamāpattivipassanāti. Tattha saṅkhāraparigaṇhanakavipassanā mandā vā hotu
anya-e0102n:2105_2: tikkhā vā, maggassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotiyeva. Phalasamāpattivipassanā tikkhāva vaṭṭati
anya-e0102n:2105_3: maggabhāvanāsadisā. Nirodhasamāpattivipassanā pana nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭati. Tasmā
anya-e0102n:2105_4: esa nātimandāya nātitikkhāya vipassanāya te saṅkhāre vipassati.
anya-e0102n:2106_0: Tato dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Tato
anya-e0102n:2106_1: tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… tato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva
anya-e0102n:2106_2: vipassati. Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti
anya-e0102n:2107_0: 875. Tattha nānābaddhaavikopananti yaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0102n:2107_1: nānābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ pattacīvaraṃ vā mañcapīṭhaṃ vā nivāsagehaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana
anya-e0102n:2107_2: kiñci parikkhārajātaṃ, taṃ yathā na vikuppati, aggiudakavātacoraundūrādīnaṃ vasena
anya-e0102n:2108_0: Tatridaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ “idañca idañca imasmiṃ sattāhabbhantare mā agginā jhāyatu,
anya-e0102n:2108_1: mā udakena vuyhatu, mā vātena viddhaṃsatu, mā corehi hariyatu, mā undūrādīhi khajjatū”ti.
anya-e0102n:2108_2: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhite taṃ sattāhaṃ tassa na koci parissayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:2109_0: Anadhiṭṭhahato pana aggiādīhi vinassati mahānāgattherassa viya. Thero kira mātuupāsikāya
anya-e0102n:2109_1: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Upāsikā yāguṃ datvā āsanasālāya nisīdāpesi. Thero nirodhaṃ
anya-e0102n:2109_2: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Tasmiṃ nisinne āsanasālāya agginā gahitāya sesabhikkhū attano
anya-e0102n:2109_3: attano nisinnāsanaṃ gahetvā palāyiṃsu. Gāmavāsikā sannipatitvā theraṃ disvā “alasasamaṇo”ti
anya-e0102n:2109_4: āhaṃsu. Aggi tiṇaveṇukaṭṭhāni jhāpetvā theraṃ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi. Manussā ghaṭehi
anya-e0102n:2109_5: udakaṃ āharitvā nibbāpetvā chārikaṃ apanetvā paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā pupphāni vikiritvā
anya-e0102n:2109_6: namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero paricchinnakālavasena vuṭṭhāya te disvā “pākaṭomhi jāto”ti
anya-e0102n:2109_7: vehāsaṃ uppatitvā piyaṅgudīpaṃ agamāsi. Idaṃ nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:2110_0: Yaṃ ekābaddhaṃ hoti nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ vā nisinnāsanaṃ vā, tattha visuṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:2110_1: natthi. Samāpattivaseneva naṃ rakkhati āyasmato sañjīvassa viya. Vuttampi cetaṃ “āyasmato
anya-e0102n:2110_2: sañjīvassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:2111_0: 876. Saṅghapaṭimānananti saṅghassa paṭimānanaṃ udikkhanaṃ. Yāva eso bhikkhu āgacchati,
anya-e0102n:2111_1: tāva saṅghakammassa akaraṇanti attho. Ettha ca na paṭimānanaṃ etassa pubbakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2111_2: paṭimānanāvajjanaṃ pana pubbakiccaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ
anya-e0102n:2111_3: nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne saṅgho uttikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:2111_4: yāva maṃ koci bhikkhu āgantvā na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti. Evaṃ katvā
anya-e0102n:2112_0: Yo pana evaṃ na karoti, saṅgho ca sannipatitvā taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu kuhi”nti
anya-e0102n:2112_1: “nirodhasamāpanno”ti vutte saṅgho kañci bhikkhuṃ peseti “gaccha naṃ saṅghassa vacanena
anya-e0102n:2112_2: pakkosāhī”ti. Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “saṅgho taṃ āvuso paṭimānetī”ti
anya-e0102n:2112_3: vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma. Tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā
anya-e0102n:2113_0: 877. Satthupakkosananti idhāpi satthupakkosanāvajjanameva imassa kiccaṃ. Tasmā tampi
anya-e0102n:2113_1: evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne satthā otiṇṇavatthusmiṃ
anya-e0102n:2113_2: sikkhāpadaṃ vā paññapeti, tathārūpāya vā atthuppattiyā dhammaṃ deseti, yāva maṃ koci
anya-e0102n:2113_3: āgantvā na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti. Evaṃ katvā nisinno hi tasmiṃ samaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0102n:2114_0: Yo pana evaṃ na karoti, satthā ca saṅghe sannipatite taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu
anya-e0102n:2114_1: kuhi”nti “nirodhasamāpanno”ti vutte kañci bhikkhuṃ peseti “gaccha naṃ mama vacanena
anya-e0102n:2114_2: pakkosā”ti. Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “satthā āyasmantaṃ āmantetī”ti
anya-e0102n:2114_3: vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Evaṃ garukaṃ hi satthupakkosanaṃ, tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā
anya-e0102n:2115_0: 878. Addhānaparicchedoti jīvitaddhānassa paricchedo. Iminā bhikkhunā addhānaparicchede
anya-e0102n:2115_1: sukusalena bhavitabbaṃ. Attano “āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṃ pavattissanti na pavattissantī”ti
anya-e0102n:2115_2: āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ. Sace hi sattāhabbhantare nirujjhanake āyusaṅkhāre anāvajjitvāva
anya-e0102n:2115_3: samāpajjati, nāssa nirodhasamāpatti maraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti. Antonirodhe maraṇassa
anya-e0102n:2115_4: natthitāya antarāva samāpattito vuṭṭhāti. Tasmā etaṃ āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2115_5: Avasesaṃ hi anāvajjitumpi vaṭṭati. Idaṃ pana āvajjitabbamevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2116_0: 879. So evaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2116_1: samāpajjati. Athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti, nirodhaṃ phusati.
anya-e0102n:2116_2: Kasmā panassa dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ uparicittāni na pavattantīti? Nirodhassa payogattā.
anya-e0102n:2116_3: Idañhi imassa bhikkhuno dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭha samāpattiārohanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2116_4: anupubbanirodhassa payogo, na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāti nirodhassa payogattā
anya-e0102n:2117_0: Yo pana bhikkhu ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2117_1: samāpajjati, so parato acittako bhavituṃ na sakkoti, paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva
anya-e0102n:2118_0: Eko kira puriso ekaṃ maggaṃ agatapubbo antarā udakakandaraṃ vā gambhīraṃ udakacikkhallaṃ
anya-e0102n:2118_1: atikkamitvā ṭhapitaṃ caṇḍātapasantattapāsāṇaṃ vā āgamma taṃ nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ asaṇṭhapetvāva
anya-e0102n:2118_2: kandaraṃ orūḷho parikkhāratemanabhayena punadeva tīre patiṭṭhāti. Pāsāṇaṃ akkamitvāpi
anya-e0102n:2118_3: santattapādo punadeva orabhāge patiṭṭhāti. Tattha yathā so puriso asaṇṭhapitanivāsanapāvuraṇattā
anya-e0102n:2118_4: kandaraṃ otiṇṇamattova, tattapāsāṇaṃ akkantamatto eva ca paṭinivattitvā oratova patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:2118_5: evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannamattova
anya-e0102n:2119_0: Yathā pana pubbepi taṃ maggaṃ gatapubbapuriso taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgamma ekaṃ sāṭakaṃ daḷhaṃ
anya-e0102n:2119_1: nivāsetvā aparaṃ hatthena gahetvā kandaraṃ uttaritvā tattapāsāṇaṃ vā akkantamattakameva
anya-e0102n:2119_2: karitvā parato gacchati, evamevaṃ katapubbakicco bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0102n:2119_3: samāpajjitvāva parato acittako hutvā nirodhaṃ phusitvā viharati.
anya-e0102n:2120: 880. Kathaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ samāpannāya panassā kālaparicchedavasena ceva antarāāyukkhayasaṅghapaṭimānanasatthupakkosanābhāvena ca ṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2121: 881. Kathaṃ vuṭṭhānanti anāgāmissa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā, arahato arahattaphaluppattiyāti evaṃ dvedhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2122_0: 882. Vuṭṭhitassa kiṃninnaṃ cittaṃ hotīti nibbānaninnaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā
anya-e0102n:2122_1: vuṭṭhitassa kho, āvuso visākha, bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāra”nti.
anya-e0102n:2123_0: 883. Matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko visesoti ayampi attho sutte vuttoyeva. Yathāha
anya-e0102n:2123_1: – “yvāyaṃ, āvuso, mato kālaṅkato, tassa kāyasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, vacīsaṅkhārā…
anya-e0102n:2123_2: cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, āyu parikkhīṇo, usmā vūpasantā, indriyāni
anya-e0102n:2123_3: paribhinnāni. Yo cāyaṃ bhikkhu saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno, tassapi kāyasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:2123_4: niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, vacīsaṅkhārā… cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, āyu
anya-e0102n:2124_0: 884. Nirodhasamāpatti saṅkhatātiādipucchāyaṃ pana saṅkhatātipi asaṅkhatātipi lokiyātipi
anya-e0102n:2124_1: lokuttarātipi na vattabbā. Kasmā? Sabhāvato natthitāya. Yasmā panassā samāpajjantassa
anya-e0102n:2124_2: vasena samāpannā nāma hoti, tasmā nipphannāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, no anipphannā.
anya-e0102n:2131_1: ayaṃ pana āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā lokuttarapaññābhāvanāya ānisaṃsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:2131_2: Avisesena hi catubbidhāyapi etissā bhāvitattā bhāvitapañño puggalo sadevakassa lokassa
anya-e0102n:2131_3: āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalīkaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
anya-e0102n:2132_0: 886. Visesato panettha paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ tāva bhāvetvā mandāya vipassanāya āgato
anya-e0102n:2132_1: mudindriyopi sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti, sattasugatibhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ
anya-e0102n:2132_2: karoti. Majjhimāya vipassanāya āgato majjhimindriyo kolaṃkolo nāma hoti, dve vā tīṇi
anya-e0102n:2132_3: vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Tikkhāya vipassanāya āgato
anya-e0102n:2132_4: tikkhindriyo ekabījī nāma hoti, ekaññeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:2133: 887. Dutiyamaggapaññaṃ bhāvetvā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:2134_0: 888. Tatiyamaggapaññaṃ bhāvetvā anāgāmī nāma hoti. So indriyavemattatāvasena antarāparinibbāyī,
anya-e0102n:2134_2: pañcadhā. Idha vihāyaniṭṭho hoti. Tattha antarāparinibbāyīti yattha katthaci suddhāvāsabhave
anya-e0102n:2134_3: upapajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyati. Upahaccaparinibbāyīti āyuvemajjhaṃ
anya-e0102n:2134_4: atikkamitvā parinibbāyati. Asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti asaṅkhārena appayogena uparimaggaṃ
anya-e0102n:2134_5: nibbatteti. Sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti sasaṅkhārena sappayogena uparimaggaṃ nibbatteti.
anya-e0102n:2134_6: Uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti yatthupapanno, tato uddhaṃ yāva akaniṭṭhabhavā āruyha
anya-e0102n:2135_0: 889. Catutthamaggapaññaṃ bhāvetvā koci saddhāvimutto hoti, koci paññāvimutto hoti,
anya-e0102n:2135_1: koci ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, koci tevijjo, koci chaḷabhiñño, koci paṭisambhidappabhedappatto
anya-e0102n:2135_2: mahākhīṇāsavo. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “maggakkhaṇe panesa taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma. Phalakkhaṇe
anya-e0102n:2137: Yasmā tasmā kareyyātha, ratiṃ tattha vicakkhaṇo.
anya-e0102n:2139: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0102n:2140: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0102n:2141: Imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sānisaṃsā paññābhāvanā paridīpitā hotīti.
anya-e0102n:2148: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0102n:2149: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti. –
anya-e0102n:2179: Visuddhimaggo eso ca, antarāyaṃ vinā idha;
anya-e0102n:2183_0: 895. Parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjava maddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
